story:
The Strone Roam is a smart device that allows you to make and receive calls and messages on your phone in another country while eliminating roaming charges. Simply insert your SIM card into the Roam and leave it at home. While away, calls and messages will find you on our Smartphone App.


Our Story

What does it take to start a Revolution? For Tas Tudor, it was an expensive global roaming bill that was the catalyst for finding a better way to stay connected with family, friends and colleagues while travelling abroad. Following months of research and development with a group of fellow revolutionaries, the Strone Roam was born.

The Strone Roam will revolutionise global roaming. The days of leaving your phone behind when you travel are over. This world first software and hardware solution means you can stay connected on your own mobile number without the fear of your phone bill costing more than your trip.


Meet the Strone Roam

 

Travel without the fear of bill shock

When travelling internationally, your phone bill shouldn't cost as much as your trip. Leave your SIM card safe at home in a Strone Roam and calls and messages will find you via an app on your smartphone or tablet.

Stay connected

Roaming the world and staying in contact with family and colleagues shouldn't send shivers down your spine. Strone lets you keep your mobile number while you are travelling internationally, without incurring global roaming charges.

Convenience

The Strone Roam is easy to install and stays at home with your SIM card while you travel. No more changing numbers, no more juggling multiple phones and no more missing important calls.


How it works


While you are away....

  • Connect to the internet either via (i) Wi-Fi, (ii) a local data SIM at your destination or (iii) using our included GigSky Data SIM. Data plans can be purchased through GigSky in advance, giving you complete control over your spend
  • Outgoing calls and messages to your home country are charged to your mobile plan at local rates, meaning you avoid roaming charges
  • Incoming calls and messages to your mobile number will find you via the Strone App, so you'll never miss an important call
  • Make international calls via the Strone App from as little as 3c per minute. Calling credit is purchased in advance giving you complete control over your spend
  • Calls and messages to other Strone App customers are free which is ideal for people travelling in groups
  • The Strone App offers free voicemail to record messages even when you are unavailable
  • If you lose your phone while travelling, you can buy a new phone, download the Strone App and pick up where you left off

What else can Strone do?

The Strone Roam is much more than the ultimate device for eliminating global roaming costs.

  • If you use more than one mobile phone, the Roam can aggregate calls to a single handset. For example, if you have a work phone number and a personal number, calls can be directed to the phone of your choice via the Strone Smartphone App.
  • The Strone Roam can also be used to create a virtual phone network for businesses. You can allocate one mobile phone number to a sales territory and then reassign it when a team member leaves or is on holiday. Sales staff can bring their own device to work, and you don’t have to worry about them taking their phone number (and your clients) with them when they leave.
  • The Strone Roam is the perfect solution if you live or work in an area that has poor mobile phone reception. Simply leave your Roam in an area with good mobile coverage, and then use the internet to make and receive calls without interruption.

How we compare

Unlike other Global Roaming services and calling apps, the Strone Roam
provides a complete solution to staying connected while travelling.

Click to enlarge comparison table


What do our Apps look like?

We have developed apps for Android, iOS and Web.  Every effort has been made during the design process to create an intuitive experience while at the same time incorporating unique features of the Strone ecosystem.  Separate calling and messaging apps have been developed for our Android customers to mirror the existing Android calling experience.


Perk Summary

As a thank you for supporting us to revolutionise the global roaming market, we are providing a limited number of Strone Roams for the discounted price of $135 USD + Shipping.  You can also purchase multiple Roams at a discounted price.


Where are we in our development?

By contributing to this campaign, not only will you receive one of the first Strone Roams to hit the market, but you'll be helping us through our Beta testing phase and on to mass production. The great news is we already have our contract manufacturers ready and waiting to produce our Strone Roams.  Long lead parts have been ordered, tooling is complete, our exciting packaging is already produced and we will be finalising certifications during the campaign.


What does the future look like?

This is just the beginning for the Strone Roam. We have a full roadmap of exciting enhancements planned, which will be deployed over the coming months. The great news is that these features can be added to the roam remotely through Over The Air (OTA) updates.  We have plenty of ideas to enhance the Roam, but to help us prioritise our development pipeline, we would love to hear from you. Please send us an email to support@strone.co.


Q&A

  1. Will the Strone Roam work in my country?
    Strone will work with any GSM/LTE (2G, 3G, 4G) service provider. Unfortunately Strone does not work with CDMA carriers.

  2. Is Strone compatible with my phone?
    The Strone Roam works with the following operating systems:
    • iOS 8.0 or later, with an iPhone 5 or newer,
    • Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) or later.
    At this stage we do not support Windows Phones and Blackberry devices.

  3. Where do I connect my Strone Roam?
    While you are away, your Roam stays at home with your SIM card inside. You'll need the following for the Strone Roam to work:
    • a broadband/ADSL connection
    • a spare ethernet port on your router/modem
    • a powerpoint to plug your Strone Roam into
    • mobile coverage in the same location as your Strone Roam
  4. Can I use the Strone Roam for business?
    Of course.  If you would like to discuss how Strone can help save roaming costs for your business, please send an email to support@strone.co.

  5. What tech support is available?
    You will have 24/7 access to the Strone Support Centre which has a large range of easy to follow help notes.  If you need help from one of our Support Team they are available to answer emails, live chat and telephone calls between 9:00am and 5:00pm, Monday to Friday, Australian Eastern Standard Time.

  6. What happens if the power or internet connection to the Strone Roam goes out?
    In the unlikely event that power is lost, the Strone Roam will automatically reboot itself once power is restored.  

    If the Roam loses it's connection to either the GSM network or your broadband network, the Roam will automatically start working when the network is reconnected again.  If a call is received when your Roam has no network connection your regular telco will route the call to voicemail if you have this service available.

  7. How does my phone work without my SIM card in it?
    A smartphone will work even if you don’t have a SIM card inserted. The SIM card provides you with connectivity to a telco provider and this enables you to make and receive calls. Without the SIM card your smartphone can still connect to the internet via WiFi.

  8. What are the risks and challenges with this project?
    The Strone Roam is a long way down the product development path. We are currently Beta testing our software and hardware "out in the wild" and this is progressing well. Regular updates will be provided via our Indiegogo campaign page.

  9. Once I support the Indiegogo campaign are there any additional fees, duties or VAT?
    You will be responsible for import duties and value-added tax (VAT) assessed by your country. In some cases, that may be zero, but where there is a cost the mail or package service will most likely require payment of those fees to complete delivery.

  10. How can I find out more about Strone?
    You can learn more about us at our website strone.co or please send email to support@strone.co.

story:
Summary

WiPlug is a WiFi-based wireless display device , WiPlug build a bridge between smart phone/pad and TV, you can push multimedia contents to your TV from your phone or PAD by WiFi network. 

WiPlug testing sample

WiPlug support IOS-based device, such as iPhone,iPad,iTouch,WiPlug also support Android-based smart phone or pad, such as Motorola, Samsung,HTCetc. As for Nokia, WiPlug also support WP-based smartphone. Desktop or laptop with Windows or MacOS, also can do as WiPlug’s front-end. Once these devices are located in one wlan with WiPlug, you can push images ,video or audio to WiPlug and then display on TV. 

WiPug testing sample
WiPlug testing Device
WiPlug device structure diagram

Features

WiPlug Support

1.Support multi-codec multimedia files and online VOD and live streaming;

2.Support many protocols, such as DLNA,AirPlay,WiPlug; 

3.Support video, audio , image and screen WiFi project; 

4.Support many front-end device’s OS, such as IOS, Android,WP8,Windows;

5.Support WiFi 802.11b/g/n.

WiPlug link sketch
wiplug real link

WiPlug Specifications

Size：105X45X28mm //Power：100-240V //OS：Android 4.04 //Protocol：WiPlug/DLNA/AirPlay //Network：Wi-Fi（802.11b/g/n） //CPU：ARM 1.0GHz //GPU：Mali-400 //RAM：512MB DDR3 //Flash：4GB  //VideoCodec：WMV/ASF/AVI/3GP/MPG/MKV/MP4/MOV/MPEG2, MPEG4 //AudioCodec：MP3/OGG/WAV/APE/CDA/MIDI/WMA/AAC //ImageCodec：GIF/JPRG/BMP/TIF/JPG/TIFF //Interface：USB2.0 HDMI1.4 

WiPlug Start Screen

Application Scenarios

1.Home Network

Deploy a WiPlug in home network，you can push unlimited online video to your TV and have some good evenings. You can deploy more WiPlugs in home network, one in living room, another in bed room, maybe in Kitchen also need one.

2.Office Network

WiPlug also can use in business environment, WiPlug can deploy in meeting room and connect projector, then everyone can project their presentations to projector from company intranet and cannot connect projector directly. WiPlug let it so convenient and easy.

WiPlug UI

About us

WiPlug Inc. is a smart device company, We design product and sell it. The smart device will focus on a niche market and function simple. As for Consumer, Gadgets to solve big problems！ We have more experience in the consumer electronics manufacturing and design,we also have close factory partners in ShenZhen China.

push image to WiPlug using airplay

How to use the funds?

We have finnished a functional prototype and product some beta testing devices.

We need money for moving to the next phase: transition and release product.So we must do some work for the phase,such as,modify hardware,finnish remote-control app development,FCC Certificate，product package,initial low-rate production etc. 

Push online live video to TV by AirPlay

The most probable price of WiPlug

We have not decided to the final price of WiPlug,but it should be from 49.99USD to 70USD.However,we will provide it to our backers with the lowest price.

Delivery time

WiPug delivery day is March 30 of  2013.NOT DELAY!

Any question?

Please mail us: in@wiplug.tv

story:
Rebel, the world's 1st Certified Tri-Connector Charging Cable is now launched. All other cables are also available. Please visit: https://igg.me/at/AmazingRebel

 

Stop wasting your money on weak flimsy & gimmicky uncertified cables that don’t last. Meet the Python Charging Cable, the world’s first dual charging cable with Tough Kevlar® Reinforced Braided PVC Skin for superior strength & a lifetime warranty.

We have some amazing perks with free shipping worldwide. So please make a pledge with just a few clicks then share with all of your friends & join our mission to create the strongest, fastest, most durable, most reliable & lasting Charging Cable Ever.

What makes Python so strong is the DuPont Kevlar® Reinforced braided PVC throughout the cable. What is Kevlar? It's the stuff that bulletproof vests are made of. It is the most powerful and strongest material in the world.

Why PVC and Kevlar?

While Kevlar has very high tensile or pulling strength, it has very poor compressive strength (resistance to squashing or squeezing) and combining both Kevlar and PVC together offers us an unmatched strength, flexibility and durability

The tough Kevlar and PVC braiding material and strain-relief collars allow for super agility, movement, strength and flexibility.

Fact is, Python cables are 10 times stronger than the ordinary cables out there, and we are so confident in the strength and durability of our Python cables that we guarantee it for life.You simply cannot break quality!

Python has passed various strict reliability tests, such as tensile test, bending test, swing test, Loss of mass test, Accelerated ageing test, Pressure test and Heat shock test.


We’ve tested so many cables in search of the perfect cable and in answer to this problem, we set out to create the best charging cable ever!

We know you don’t always have a lot of time to charge your devices that’s why we engineered Python cables to charge your devices at the speed of light. It is up to twice as fast as regular charging cables, which allows you to top-off your battery quickly during those times you’re away from the wall.

Many cheaper cables go with thinner wires to cut cost, and they can’t handle enough current to charge newer, power-hungry devices at full speed. A cheaply made cable can also hamper data-transfer speeds. The many leading brands cables we tested had 19% slower data-read speeds than Python, and the slowest-charging cable conducted 41% less current than the Python cable.

Buying after market USB cables will pretty much always result in getting cheap quality 30/30 cables and your device will barely break 500mAh when it charges, maybe even less. This isn't the only issue though. After you use a cable for a while it eventually stress near the plugs and causes poor connectivity between your device and the wire.

Python cables Use 18AWG silver-plated copper cables for lower resistance and faster charging than any other cable out there and offer high speed charging at 3.1A, 3.2v - 20v & 18W and data sync up to 10Gbps, which would save you a lot of time to do other things...

Yes you heard it right. 18AWG! And for data we have used a record breaker– 24AWG tightly braided wires so you can charge and sync at lightning speed. Less time plugged in, more time for going out! 

The random charging cable you have lying around might not be charging your electronics at full speed.

We also designed the Python cable with single or dual functions to provide hassle free charging for all Lightning and MicroUSB devices.

Python is Universal, it combines the two widely used connectors into one charging cable that’s easy to share with anyone whether they use an iPhone or an Android device, it’s the only charging cable you would ever need.

MicroUSB cables provide charging power to basically every non-Apple digital device, and they’re used by everything from portable hard drives to smartphones to tablets to transfer data to and from your computer.

Search the whole world and you will not find a single cable that can beat the Python cable and nothing would even look like it. It is our design inside and out from start to finish and with your help we can make Python a reality. The only thing that is missing from Python is shortcuts, gimmicks and cheap material. The rest is a workhorse that is certified, strong, fast, durable, reliable and lasting. Oh and beautiful!

Gone are the days of carrying multiple charging cables for all of your different devices. With the Python cable you can charge everything, including your iPhone, iPad, Android phone, Tablets, Headphones, Speakers, Remotes, Cameras and more. Python streamlines your life by giving you one cable for all your devices!

When we were creating the Python cable we thought about all the problems one faces when charging personal devices and there were many. One of the biggest struggles we have seen is when the standard 1-meter cable is either not long enough or too long!

This is why we had to offer Python cable in several dynamic lengths as Size Matters. A 3-Meter Python is the world’s longest Apple MFi certified cable and all Python Cables are all QuickCharge 3.0 certified.

The Bed Lean is Mean!

10Ft/3M Super long lightning cable, long enough for using while you are lying in bed or lounging on your couch and charging at the same time. Get rid of limitation of length.

 

Shorter cables, though generally less versatile, can certainly come in handy. They’re better at a desk when you don’t want a mess of extra cable length, they are great with power banks or for travel, when space and weight are important considerations.

Python was born out of the necessity for a reliable and efficient charging solution, to de-clutter and to de-stress your life! The tough 3M braiding material keep the Python Cable inherently tangle-free. The 3, 2 & 1 meter cables also come with a complementary leather tie to keep things further organised.

You’d probably struggle to find a case that the Python isn’t able to fit into, thanks to the ultra-slim aluminium finish that’s just barely wider than Apple’s own flimsy plastic connector. If your case uses a particularly small point of connection, then the Python is sure to offer the best fit.

Python Cables have been designed with a plug housing that is small enough to work with every case we tested. No need to take off your lovely case for charging.

The only thing that is missing from Python is shortcuts, gimmicks, cheap material and wishful promises. The rest is a workhorse that is certified, strong, fast, reliable and durable to last a lifetime.

Every Python Cable is covered by a lifetime warranty. If your cable breaks from normal wear and tear, we’ll replace it.

100% Satisfaction • 100% Performance for life, Guaranteed!

Python is the world's most innovative charging cable using dual charging adaptors that fit into both Micro USB and Lightning devices. Python is also available in dual micro USB and USB Type C adapter or select a single adapter cable.

Apple MFI: each cable contains a unique, verified serial number and an authorisation chip issued by Apple which communicates with any Lightning connector device to ensure 100% compatibility

Our USB-C cable meets or exceeds the following requirements: - 56kΩ Resistor - Vbus IR drop of less than 250mV - GND IR drop of less than 100mV.

Material Kevlar braided PVC by 3M, the most powerful and strongest material in the world, 10X stronger than the ordinary cables, adds durability & reliability in a tangle-free versatile cable.

All Python Cables are all QuickCharge 3.0 certified

Why we need your support 

Python is not just another cable - we are bringing a new and better standard of cables to the world. We have tremendous aspirations and many exciting projects brewing, but none of these will ever happen without your help.

We are certain that the Python Cable is without a doubt the most powerful, fastest charging cable ever, the most versatile to use, and strongest most durable charging cable on the market. We have finalised the prototypes and now we need that last push to bring the product to you as quickly as we can.

We would love for you to join our community and bring real charging cables into our daily lives. We can’t wait for you to try out Python.

Risks and challenges

We’ve worked hard over the last few months to get the Python cable to this point and we've successfully completed critical milestones with the help of many knowledgeable people. We have interviewed, visited and selected a very reputable manufacturer who offers great engineering support and development tools. What remains is completing the manufacturing phase and so we're confident that manufacturing risk is at a minimum.

We are almost ready to push the green button and start production with our manufacturer. We have done our testing and know this will be the best and last cable you will own and cannot wait to put it into your hands. We anticipate a manufacturing period of 6 weeks from the end of the campaign to start shipping Python to you. This is possible because we’ve already completed our R&D, obtained our Apple MFi certification, created the injection mould and the rest we can complete with your help and have the cables shipped to you 6 weeks after the end of this campaign and no later than September 15th, 2016.

Thank you for reading this far - let's make this happen!

It is the most powerful and strongest material in the world.Why PVC and Kevlar?While Kevlar has very high tensile or pulling strength, it has very poor compressive strength (resistance to squashing or squeezing) and combining both Kevlar and PVC together offers us an unmatched strength, flexibility and durabilityThe tough Kevlar and PVC braiding material and strain-relief collars allow for super agility, movement, strength and flexibility.Fact is, Python cables are 10 times stronger than the ordinary cables out there, and we are so confident in the strength and durability of our Python cables that we guarantee it for life.You simply cannot break quality!Python has passed various strict reliability tests, such as tensile test, bending test, swing test, Loss of mass test, Accelerated ageing test, Pressure test and Heat shock test.We’ve tested so many cables in search of the perfect cable and in answer to this problem, we set out to create the best charging cable ever!We know you don’t always have a lot of time to charge your devices that’s why we engineered Python cables to charge your devices at the speed of light. It is up to twice as fast as regular charging cables, which allows you to top-off your battery quickly during those times you’re away from the wall.Many cheaper cables go with thinner wires to cut cost, and they can’t handle enough current to charge newer, power-hungry devices at full speed. A cheaply made cable can also hamper data-transfer speeds. The many leading brands cables we tested had 19% slower data-read speeds than Python, and the slowest-charging cable conducted 41% less current than the Python cable.Buying after market USB cables will pretty much always result in getting cheap quality 30/30 cables and your device will barely break 500mAh when it charges, maybe even less. This isn't the only issue though. After you use a cable for a while it eventually stress near the plugs and causes poor connectivity between your device and the wire.Python cables Use 18AWG silver-plated copper cables for lower resistance and faster charging than any other cable out there and offer high speed charging at 3.1A, 3.2v - 20v & 18W and data sync up to 10Gbps, which would save you a lot of time to do other things...Yes you heard it right. 18AWG! And for data we have used a record breaker– 24AWG tightly braided wires so you can charge and sync at lightning speed. Less time plugged in, more time for going out! The random charging cable you have lying around might not be charging your electronics at full speed.We also designed the Python cable with single or dual functions to provide hassle free charging for all Lightning and MicroUSB devices.Python is Universal, it combines the two widely used connectors into one charging cable that’s easy to share with anyone whether they use an iPhone or an Android device, it’s the only charging cable you would ever need.MicroUSB cables provide charging power to basically every non-Apple digital device, and they’re used by everything from portable hard drives to smartphones to tablets to transfer data to and from your computer.Search the whole world and you will not find a single cable that can beat the Python cable and nothing would even look like it. It is our design inside and out from start to finish and with your help we can make Python a reality. The only thing that is missing from Python is shortcuts, gimmicks and cheap material. The rest is a workhorse that is certified, strong, fast, durable, reliable and lasting. Oh and beautiful!Gone are the days of carrying multiple charging cables for all of your different devices. With the Python cable you can charge everything, including your iPhone, iPad, Android phone, Tablets, Headphones, Speakers, Remotes, Cameras and more. Python streamlines your life by giving you one cable for all your devices!When we were creating the Python cable we thought about all the problems one faces when charging personal devices and there were many. One of the biggest struggles we have seen is when the standard 1-meter cable is either not long enough or too long!This is why we had to offer Python cable in several dynamic lengths as Size Matters. A 3-Meter Python is the world’s longest Apple MFi certified cable and all Python Cables are all QuickCharge 3.0 certified.The Bed Lean is Mean!10Ft/3M Super long lightning cable, long enough for using while you are lying in bed or lounging on your couch and charging at the same time. Get rid of limitation of length. Shorter cables, though generally less versatile, can certainly come in handy. They’re better at a desk when you don’t want a mess of extra cable length, they are great with power banks or for travel, when space and weight are important considerations.Python was born out of the necessity for a reliable and efficient charging solution, to de-clutter and to de-stress your life! The tough 3M braiding material keep the Python Cable inherently tangle-free. The 3, 2 & 1 meter cables also come with a complementary leather tie to keep things further organised.You’d probably struggle to find a case that the Python isn’t able to fit into, thanks to the ultra-slim aluminium finish that’s just barely wider than Apple’s own flimsy plastic connector. If your case uses a particularly small point of connection, then the Python is sure to offer the best fit.Python Cables have been designed with a plug housing that is small enough to work with every case we tested. No need to take off your lovely case for charging.The only thing that is missing from Python is shortcuts, gimmicks, cheap material and wishful promises. The rest is a workhorse that is certified, strong, fast, reliable and durable to last a lifetime.Every Python Cable is covered by a lifetime warranty. If your cable breaks from normal wear and tear, we’ll replace it.100% Satisfaction • 100% Performance for life, Guaranteed!Python is the world's most innovative charging cable using dual charging adaptors that fit into both Micro USB and Lightning devices. Python is also available in dual micro USB and USB Type C adapter or select a single adapter cable.Apple MFI: each cable contains a unique, verified serial number and an authorisation chip issued by Apple which communicates with any Lightning connector device to ensure 100% compatibilityOur USB-C cable meets or exceeds the following requirements: - 56kΩ Resistor - Vbus IR drop of less than 250mV - GND IR drop of less than 100mV.Material Kevlar braided PVC by 3M, the most powerful and strongest material in the world, 10X stronger than the ordinary cables, adds durability & reliability in a tangle-free versatile cable.All Python Cables are all QuickCharge 3.0 certifiedWhy we need your support Python is not just another cable - we are bringing a new and better standard of cables to the world. We have tremendous aspirations and many exciting projects brewing, but none of these will ever happen without your help.We are certain that the Python Cable is without a doubt the most powerful, fastest charging cable ever, the most versatile to use, and strongest most durable charging cable on the market. We have finalised the prototypes and now we need that last push to bring the product to you as quickly as we can.We would love for you to join our community and bring real charging cables into our daily lives. We can’t wait for you to try out Python.Risks and challengesWe’ve worked hard over the last few months to get the Python cable to this point and we've successfully completed critical milestones with the help of many knowledgeable people. We have interviewed, visited and selected a very reputable manufacturer who offers great engineering support and development tools. What remains is completing the manufacturing phase and so we're confident that manufacturing risk is at a minimum.We are almost ready to push the green button and start production with our manufacturer. We have done our testing and know this will be the best and last cable you will own and cannot wait to put it into your hands. We anticipate a manufacturing period of 6 weeks from the end of the campaign to start shipping Python to you. This is possible because we’ve already completed our R&D, obtained our Apple MFi certification, created the injection mould and the rest we can complete with your help and have the cables shipped to you 6 weeks after the end of this campaign and no later than September 15th, 2016.Thank you for reading this far - let's make this happen!

story:
SECRET SAUCE IS NOW COMPLETE AND AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE AT https://www.secretsaucenow.com:

 

Buy the book!

Tired of bullsh*t marketing and growth hacking books that don't give you any f***ing idea what you have to do to get users/traffic/revenue?

We are too, so we made this step-by-step guide anyone can use to start growth hacking immediately, using proven strategies we've used ourselves.

I’m an entrepreneur and one of the creators of the e-book and video course: “Secret Sauce: A step-by-step guide to growth hacking”, along with growth hacker and my co-author, Austen Allred.

 The truth is that marketing is pretty easy once someone tells you what you should be doing. The only problem is that no-one wants do that.

There’s too much money in consulting and selling books about the veneer without ever giving up the actual secret sauce.

“This book and video course won’t be like that. In fact, they’ll be very different from that, and probably nothing like what you’re used to. Here’s why: Secret Sauce is not so much a book as it is a tutorial.

Secret Sauce is a step-by-step, systematic dismantling and dissection of every channel and practice that actually works, laid out one after another. It’s a guide that will handhold you all the way to getting traffic, users, and revenue.

Our goal with this book and course is that someone who knows absolutely nothing about marketing could sit down, follow the instructions, and make what they’re doing blow up. We’ve done this before - a lot.

Our combined efforts account for millions of monthly pageviews, millions of social followers, millions of emails, millions of dollars in revenue -- no matter how you slice it, this stuff just works. We’ve tried hundreds of growth hacks in order to give you only the methods we know will work.

Most everything you’ll read is something anyone can do with a little bit of effort, and which requires very little (or zero) marketing budget.

By the time you finish this book, you will not only have a dozen ideas about different strategies that can help your idea succeed, but you’ll know exactly what it takes to implement each one of them.

After you read this book you will be able to sell units of and get users signed up for literally anything.

What you’ll find in the growth hacking playbook works.

I was on welfare/benefits 3 years ago, and used growth hacking techniques to get millions of visitors to websites I created and raise hundreds of thousands of dollars in investment, and got into the Techstars accelerator. I then launched a growth hacking agency and have used these techniques to move hundreds of thousands of people to websites, and acquire tonnes of users and followers for startups.

A key change in my life happened a year ago. An accelerator had heard I was a “growth hacker” and asked me to give a talk to their current teams. I put together a slide deck of what I considered the basics, and gave a presentation. Halfway through my talk I realised half of the room was taking pages of notes, while the others stared at me in disbelief. The minute my talk finished, founders ran up to me asking for my slides and if I did consulting. I was surprised- I hadn’t seen many people in marketing give talks and presumed you were meant to give practical advice and show people how to do things, pieces of software you can use to automate things, etc. this was not the case. I gave more talks and it’s an incredible feeling how much people find my talks useful. That’s where the idea for this book came from. Give as many people practical, actionable advice and strategies as possible. My growth hacking talk was eventually voted best workshop of SXSW V2V 2015. Earlier this year I gave a 30-date speaking tour of America, and am so excited to get this knowledge out there in full for the first time.

This is the first time I’m pulling back the curtain and unveiling my secrets, along with my co-author Austen Allred, who has moved millions of visitors and dollars through growth hacking across every channel from SEO to Pinterest and everything inbetween.

What you’ll discover in Secret Sauce can be used for good or evil. It is very powerful stuff. Right now, only a few people know how to do these things. We’re blowing the whistle on the tactics other people are using, and handing you the tools to do them yourself, and find your secret sauce.

And with that substantial word of warning, we launch our Indiegogo. If this book gets funded, it will be available very soon after, or most likely, before, the Indiegogo ends. We’re not sure what the blowback is going to be as no-one has done a book like this before. If you’ve ever read a marketing book and found it didn’t contain enough specific strategies to try, the growth hacking playbook is for you. If you work in marketing and want to use new techniques to boost your companies brand and get promoted, this book is for you. And if you run your own company, you are going to adore this book.

Secret Sauce will give you the tools you need to execute growth hacking strategies in a wide range of environments—but I have another goal in sharing it with you. 

As many have pointed out to me, I could keep this information to myself and make more money from clients- but I truly believe we’re all better off if we share the knowledge and grow our companies together. As such, everyone who donates anything will be invited into a private growth hacking group on Facebook, where we’ll create an ongoing community to help each other with our digital marketing and startup growth problems. I wish there had been a group like this when I was on welfare and starting out on my company three years ago, rather than having to learn it all by trial and error. There’ll be no links or spam in the group, just questions, answers, and discussions from and to the community around this area which has so little useful information. This will make sure that the learning will continue after the campaign ends.

Those of you who have followed me for a while know that when give a talk, I love to go big—ridiculously big—in offering as much value as possible.

We’ve created several different backer reward levels with lots of rewards for each bracket.

Tier 1 “GROWTH HACKER” will receive:

A digital copy of the seven-part growth hacking book.

- Entrance to the secret growth hackers’ club on Facebook

- Thank you page in the book. Exclusive content and backer updates

THE "NO BRAINER" PACKAGE

The best package we're doing. Get this package for an insane amount of bonuses and content:

- A digital copy of the seven-part growth hacking book 

- Entrance to the secret growth hackers’ club on Facebook 

- A voucher for the 20+ hour Udemy course walking you through the book, including screencasts so you can follow step-by-step how to perform many of the strategies we talk about in the book. The video course will be sold on Udemy, 3 courses for a total value of $150

- 1x ticket to a free webinar (including Q & A) with Vincent Dignan “Growth hack your content marketing strategy” value $99 

- 1x free webinar (including Q & A) with Vincent Dignan “How to get rich and internet famous (Hacking sales and personal branding)” value $99 

- 1x ticket to a free webinar (including Q & A) with Vincent Dignan “Growth Hacking live: Boost your startup in real-time” (updated version of the talk which was voted best at SXSW V2V 2015) - value $99 

- Entrance to private Q & A with authors Austen Allred and Vincent Dignan 

- Thank you page in the book 

- A special “What we learned from our Kickstarter campaign” Google Hangout (or some similar platform) with both authors, Vincent Dignan and Austen Allred - A Kickstarter exclusive “Kickstarter: Behind the Scenes/What we learned” mini eBook.

Tier 3 “Masters” (very limited numbers) will receive the below:

EVERYTHING in the“Serious about growth” package plus: 

- 1 or 4 Growth hacking brainstorm/sessions from Vincent Dignan via Skype, pending the package chosen 

- An audit of your website/app, social channels and SEO by Vincent Dignan Social media shoutouts to over 100,000 people on Twitter EVERYTHING in the“Serious about growth” package.

Tier 5 (very, very limited numbers) will receive:

FULL DAY WITH VINCENT DIGNAN (UK/Europe ONLY) Package:

This is UBER limited. Only 5 will ever exist.

Spend a FULL day with Vincent Dignan (10am to 6pm) SOLO, meaning no one else, just you and Vincent Dignan in your offices with your team. Build a growth engine, discuss community management techniques, create a full content marketing strategy, learn how to completely automate your social media processes, anything!

story:
What exactly is the SmartUV?

The SmartUV is a connectable UV camera for smartphones that captures the world in UV light and displays it as a video or picture on your phone screen via the SmartUV App. UV light doesn’t have color as it sits outside the visible light spectrum, which explains why the images are in black and white. White shows where UV light is reflected, and black shows where it is absorbed or blocked. 

The SmartUV is very easy to use. It simply requires you to download the app for your smartphone before plugging the device in by using the connector.

(SmartUV is compatible with the OTG supported smartphones.)

 

Choose your color?

The SmartUV is available in two colors. This custom selection will be confirmed on your perk during the checkout process.

 

What does the SmartUV do?

The SmartUV lets you see into the UV light spectrum – which is completely invisible to the naked eye. By seeing into the UV spectrum, you are able to discover a whole new, previously unexplored world. The SmartUV has many uses that let you test product claims with accuracy and allow you to see yourself and your skin in a whole new light.

 

 

Are your UV protection products actually working?

With the SmartUV you can put spectacles, window tints, and UV skin products – such as sunblock and SPF skincare – to the test to see if they actually do what they claim.

In UV light, UV blocking materials show up black, so it's easy to spot when something is protecting you from harmful rays or not. One of the amazing things you will discover is that even when old and new paint has been matched perfectly and looks identical in visible light, they actually have different densities that is easily revealed with the SmartUV under UV light! That means you can spot where a car panel has been resprayed (indicating accident repairs on a second hand vehicle) or if a room has recently been painted – compared to the rest of the building.

 

 

Unlike other UV imaging solutions, the SmartUV is small in size, which makes it more affordable, more portable and easy to attach to your smartphone.

Because it doesn't require charging, it lets you explore the world in UV, anywhere, anytime.

 

 

But the SmartUV isn’t just any gadget, it also supports a cause we feel passionate about – helping you detect and prevent further sun damage to your skin.

 

 

Overexposure to the sun's UV light causes sunburn and 90% of skin cancers; damages the immune system and eyes, ages skin prematurely and fades color in fabrics and furnishings. 

UV light is invisible and most of its harmful effects only show up over time, with sun damage lying beneath the skin, unknown for years. Most of us see our skin in the mirror and can't help but think, "I don't really have too much to worry about". But under UV light, your skin looks quite different.

Firstly, UV light penetrates the outer layer of your skin, showing you what it looks like below the surface. Secondly, pigmentation (melanin) build-up shows up as dark spots, so you can spot invisible sun damage.  This helps you take better precaution and protect against later problems – before it becomes visible.

 

 

It’s not just for adults!

Teaching kids about sun safety is hard when they can't see what you are talking about, but the SmartUV makes this fun for everyone. Sunblock looks black in UV light, showing up uncovered spots when applying it, and when it fades or wears off during the day! Most products wear off in just 2 hours, even without the effects of water or rubbing off on towels which speeds up the process.

 

 

 

Seeing your skin with the SmartUV makes sun safety real and practical. The SmartUV assists in uncovering developing sunspots, monitoring skin damage due to aging, and even getting advance warning of skin health risks that cause melanoma, so you can take proactive measures to make the best decisions for your skin.

 

You can trust us - we’ve done this before!

At Nurugo we have earned our reputation as innovators in the field of technology. Apart from being a repeat Indiegogo creator and having run both a successful Kickstarter campaign for the Nurugo Micro and the SmartUV, we were also named a 2017 Innovation Honoree by CES.  Nurugo is going from strength to strength and we are excited to develop even more new and exciting technology for our customers!

 

In the press

Our teams have been working very hard for months to create the SmartUV, and we are incredibly proud to have been honored by the largest electronics show awards in the world – the 2017 Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas. Here is an excerpt of some media coverage we received at the CES Awards:

Thanks to the media who have picked up on the SmartUV.

 

The SmartUV prototype in action

All UV footage in our videos was shot with our actual working SmartUV prototype, using the exact same UV lens technology that will be in the production of the final SmartUV.

 

 

 

Keep in touch

Follow us on Facebook for updates during the campaign and other news about the Nurugo product line. Please also take a moment to share this campaign, as we need everyone's help to make the SmartUV a reality.

 

About us

NURUGO was designed and manufactured in South Korea by UNIONCOMMUNITY Co Ltd. The brand name NURUGO combines the Korean meaning of "finger-pushing", "enjoying" various aspects of life, and furthermore "going" forward to a better place in the world.

NURUGO refuses to settle for the status quo and will continuously focus on the future of smartphones. It is believed that NURUGO can unleash the potential of smartphones especially with today’s generation, where people use their smartphones daily from morning ’til night.

We are very thankful to our previous Indiegogo backers that made the Nurugo Micro possible in 2016. You can see the Nurugo Micro project and its results here:

 

Risks and challenges

The Nurugo SmartUV team has over 15 years of product engineering experience. With our passion for this project and our previous successful Nurugo Micro Indiegogo project in 2016, we continuously research ways to apply technology in real-life situations and like to explore applications in health and beauty and the micro-world.

We've already completed and tested our SmartUV prototype, so the smartphone software and camera technology has been proven. All that remains now is to create the molds and the manufacturing process to mass produce our final designs to create the production SmartUV, and then to deliver it to people around the world!

We learned a lot from our previous crowdfunding project when we launched the Nurugo Micro - especially about production and shipping management - and we've planned and prepared even more for the SmartUV to ensure a smooth experience for everyone.

However, there are still aspects of this process that may fall outside of our control, such as:

- Unexpected long component leading times  
- Unexpected shortages  
- Any shipping delays outside our control

Nevertheless, we have strong partnerships with every level of our supply chain and every member of the team is dedicated to delivering the best product on time to all of our incredible backers.

Are your UV protection products actually working?
With the SmartUV you can put spectacles, window tints, and UV skin products – such as sunblock and SPF skincare – to the test to see if they actually do what they claim.
In UV light, UV blocking materials show up black, so it's easy to spot when something is protecting you from harmful rays or not. One of the amazing things you will discover is that even when old and new paint has been matched perfectly and looks identical in visible light, they actually have different densities that is easily revealed with the SmartUV under UV light! That means you can spot where a car panel has been resprayed (indicating accident repairs on a second hand vehicle) or if a room has recently been painted – compared to the rest of the building.
 

 
Unlike other UV imaging solutions, the SmartUV is small in size, which makes it more affordable, more portable and easy to attach to your smartphone.
Because it doesn't require charging, it lets you explore the world in UV, anywhere, anytime.
 

 
But the SmartUV isn’t just any gadget, it also supports a cause we feel passionate about – helping you detect and prevent further sun damage to your skin.
 

 
Overexposure to the sun's UV light causes sunburn and 90% of skin cancers; damages the immune system and eyes, ages skin prematurely and fades color in fabrics and furnishings. 
UV light is invisible and most of its harmful effects only show up over time, with sun damage lying beneath the skin, unknown for years. Most of us see our skin in the mirror and can't help but think, "I don't really have too much to worry about". But under UV light, your skin looks quite different.
Firstly, UV light penetrates the outer layer of your skin, showing you what it looks like below the surface. Secondly, pigmentation (melanin) build-up shows up as dark spots, so you can spot invisible sun damage.  This helps you take better precaution and protect against later problems – before it becomes visible.
 

 
It’s not just for adults!
Teaching kids about sun safety is hard when they can't see what you are talking about, but the SmartUV makes this fun for everyone. Sunblock looks black in UV light, showing up uncovered spots when applying it, and when it fades or wears off during the day! Most products wear off in just 2 hours, even without the effects of water or rubbing off on towels which speeds up the process.
 
 
 
Seeing your skin with the SmartUV makes sun safety real and practical. The SmartUV assists in uncovering developing sunspots, monitoring skin damage due to aging, and even getting advance warning of skin health risks that cause melanoma, so you can take proactive measures to make the best decisions for your skin.
 
You can trust us - we’ve done this before!
At Nurugo we have earned our reputation as innovators in the field of technology. Apart from being a repeat Indiegogo creator and having run both a successful Kickstarter campaign for the Nurugo Micro and the SmartUV, we were also named a 2017 Innovation Honoree by CES.  Nurugo is going from strength to strength and we are excited to develop even more new and exciting technology for our customers!
 
In the press
Our teams have been working very hard for months to create the SmartUV, and we are incredibly proud to have been honored by the largest electronics show awards in the world – the 2017 Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas. Here is an excerpt of some media coverage we received at the CES Awards:
Thanks to the media who have picked up on the SmartUV.

 
The SmartUV prototype in action
All UV footage in our videos was shot with our actual working SmartUV prototype, using the exact same UV lens technology that will be in the production of the final SmartUV.
 
 
 
Keep in touch

Follow us on Facebook for updates during the campaign and other news about the Nurugo product line. Please also take a moment to share this campaign, as we need everyone's help to make the SmartUV a reality.


 
About us
NURUGO was designed and manufactured in South Korea by UNIONCOMMUNITY Co Ltd. The brand name NURUGO combines the Korean meaning of "finger-pushing", "enjoying" various aspects of life, and furthermore "going" forward to a better place in the world.
NURUGO refuses to settle for the status quo and will continuously focus on the future of smartphones. It is believed that NURUGO can unleash the potential of smartphones especially with today’s generation, where people use their smartphones daily from morning ’til night.
We are very thankful to our previous Indiegogo backers that made the Nurugo Micro possible in 2016. You can see the Nurugo Micro project and its results here:



 
Risks and challenges
The Nurugo SmartUV team has over 15 years of product engineering experience. With our passion for this project and our previous successful Nurugo Micro Indiegogo project in 2016, we continuously research ways to apply technology in real-life situations and like to explore applications in health and beauty and the micro-world.
We've already completed and tested our SmartUV prototype, so the smartphone software and camera technology has been proven. All that remains now is to create the molds and the manufacturing process to mass produce our final designs to create the production SmartUV, and then to deliver it to people around the world!
We learned a lot from our previous crowdfunding project when we launched the Nurugo Micro - especially about production and shipping management - and we've planned and prepared even more for the SmartUV to ensure a smooth experience for everyone.
However, there are still aspects of this process that may fall outside of our control, such as:
- Unexpected long component leading times  - Unexpected shortages  - Any shipping delays outside our control
Nevertheless, we have strong partnerships with every level of our supply chain and every member of the team is dedicated to delivering the best product on time to all of our incredible backers.

story:
Ideation Of The genshi.box

Genshi.lab Founder and Product Architect Craig Anthony Perkins believes that everybody in the world should have access to the world's information via free internet access, while at the same time having complete control of their own digital life. And so, the genshi.box was born...



The genshi.box solves the following problems we all seem to experience in the online world today: 

  • The Social Networking sites selling your personal information and browsing habits to advertisers 
  • Web and Email Hosts leaking your information to spammers 
  • Photo Sharing sites and online Cloud Services losing your data or "accidentally" deleting your accounts 
  • ISPs over-charging you for internet access
  • And the Privacy issues we all have from over-reaching governments as well as hackers...

With the genshi.box, you can finally take back control of your entire digital life!


In More Detail...

The basic idea of the genshi.box is that it's an easy to use consumer device that replaces your current social networking page by allowing you to upload all of your photos and compose your daily posts directly onto the genshi.box that is sitting right next to you; giving you complete control over all of your content.

Why is this important? Because, as we all know by now, the social networking sites make their money in two ways. First, by posting advertisements all over your page and in your news feed, polluting what was once an ad-free browsing experience. Second, by selling all of your personal information, as well as your browsing habits, to advertisers that can further target you and track you as you navigate the world wide web... not to mention surrendering your private data to over-reaching governments without cause or warrant!

So the genshi.box is your solution to bringing back control of your digital life and maintaining your privacy. 

At it's core, the genshi.box is a simple to use file storage drive and web server which you can access from anywhere in the world using a web browser or the genshi.box app on your iPhone or Android device. But it's more than that...

  • A simple to use consumer friendly device to store all of your digital content
  • A built-in blogging service which you can share securely with just your most trusted friends, or share with the global network of genshi.box users as well as the World Wide Web
  • An online hub for genshi.box users to gather and chat
  • Wireless connectivity
  • Battery operated (with induction charging if we meet our first stretch goal)
  • Create private networks between your friends; use multiple genshi.box devices for Mesh Networking (can be used as a FreedomBox)
  • Completely secure through AES 256-bit encryption
  • For advanced users, complete access to the Linux-based file system 
And if we hit our biggest stretch goal, we want to provide free internet access to all genshi.box users via our own Satellite Network. (We've researched it, and it's actually doable. We are looking into several partners to help with this as well.)


What We Need & What You Get

We're asking for $250,000 to take our proof-of-concept prototype to production ready status. Currently, the genshi.box is using off-the-shelf parts and open source software. We'd like to keep most of the software open source, but we want to make our own proprietary circuit board to boost the current specs of what our working prototype has. (Our current prototype is based on the Beaglebone Black with a few upgrades we've added, such as wireless connectivity, a long lasting battery pack and additional storage.)

This amount will also allow us to make a small run of the genshi.box for our indiegogo supporters. But we want to do so much more! 

STRETCH GOALS:

  • If we reach our $500,000 stretch goal we will be able to add induction charging to the genshi.box so you never have to remember to charge it; simply place it on it's pad and it's always charging.
  • If we reach One Million Dollars, we can take this to mass production, bringing manufacturing costs down and lowering the retail price to $199 (the current retail pricing is estimated at $249).
  • If we make it all the way to Five Million Dollars, we will be able to work on our Satellite Network plan and create the genshi.box Satellite Modem/Antenna Package option; allowing all genshi.box users free internet access with no monthly fees and no advertisements, ever! (Separate purchase of the Satellite Package would be required.)
  • And one of our long term goals, to go along with our Satellite Network goal, is to create a Non-Profit Organization which will allow us to provide a genshi.box to underprivileged people around the world that could not otherwise afford this technology or who are cut-off from the internet by their repressive regimes; in order to help them become part of the information age by joining the global online community. We hope to accomplish this by donating a genshi.box for every one that is sold, as well as partnering with other Non-Profits and NGOs that can help get the genshi.box out to people with the need for this technology, but without the means.


The Importance Of The genshi.box; Why Everyone Needs This!

We here at genshi.lab know this is an important and much needed device for everyone. With the recent news stories of social networking companies collecting, selling and abusing our personal and private information, to the constant bombardment of advertisers and spammers all over the internet, now more than ever is the time that somebody should do something about this, and we have a solution that can really change things and make the online world a better place. 

This project is so important to us that, even if we do not meet our target goal, we will continue to seek funding through Angel Investors and Venture Capitalists until we can get the genshi.box made and into the hands of everyone. Just imagine, rebooting the internet; creating a new "World Wide Web 3.0" free from advertisers, spammers and unscrupulous prying eyes, the way the internet was supposed to be!

This can be done, and one way or another, we will make it happen... hopefully with your help!

Where We Are In Development

We've been working on this since August of 2013 (showing the internal workings publicly in September 2013, with LCD Touchscreen for debugging) and we are now at a point to add additional key members to our team to take this proof-of-concept working prototype to a streamlined, production ready product. 

The next steps will be:

  • Designing our own proprietary circuit board
  • Refining the OS
  • Refining the industrial design of the genshi.box
  • Developing the Software Packages and Apps (we will have a free iPhone and Android app to access and post to your genshi.box)

Then, when we have a production ready product, we'll move on to:

  • Designing the retail packaging
  • Getting product certifications (FCC, etc.)
  • Designing the supply chain process
  • Tooling
  • Materials procurement
  • Production (we are currently looking at two U.S. manufacturers for the genshi.box)
Our target launch date for indiegogo supporters is 1st Quarter of 2015, and for Retail/Web sales by 2nd Quarter 2015.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute financially, we ask that you get the word out to as many people as possible using the indiegogo share tools. We have a chance here to make the online experience safe and secure, and back under your control, but we can't do it without having as many people as possible believing in this project as much as we believe in it. 

Help us help the world take back control of their digital lives!

story:
Tribble™ is your new device for your home and family. You can monitor everything that happens in your house right from your mobile device, change ambient music, take photos or control your computer and phone remotely. In addition, you can use Tribble™ to track your luggage, car or home pets. Tribble™ is also your irreplaceable companion that will always cheer you up in a moment of solitude. 

Tribble™ is equipped with a sensor display and is absolutely user friendly. Moreover, Tribble™ is very compact and complements any home interior. 

Security mode workflow is straightforward. At any given moment, you can connect to Tribble™ and survey your home from your mobile phone. Besides, Tribble™ tracks sounds and movement and sends instant notifications to your phone in case of a disturbance, for example the creak of a door or a sudden noise. The app allows you to call emergency services, the police or ask Tribble™ to restrain your pet with a sound or phrase that you can speak into your mobile device.


Tribble™ recognizes sounds and noise level oscillations in your home. If it senses an uncommon sound in your house, it sends instant notifications to your mobile device.

Anytime you may connect to Tribble™ through your mobile device, you can activate the SAY SOMETHING mode and announce to your pet any command or phrase. For instance: Spunky! Get off the couch, now!

You can receive notification of incoming emails or messages from your friends right on Tribble™.

You will always recognize type of incoming notification or call, it will indeed simplify your life even if your computer or mobile phone is not near you.

You can dictate a reply message to Tribble™ and instantly respond to your interlocutor.


Call answering is extremely easy with Tribble™. You don’t need to search for your phone or run after it upstairs. Just slide to the right on the device if you want to put your incoming call on speaker or slide to the left of the screen if you want to decline.

Your luggage is now safe and under constant control. Put Tribble™ together with your belongings in the traveling bag before checking it in at the airport, activate Tracking mode for easy and fast GPS location right from your mobile device.

Data storage is now easier then ever. Connect Tribble™ to any cloud service (Dropbox iCloud Google Drive etc.)  and safely store all photos and videos. Your video registrations are password protected and cannot be erased even if Tribble™ is stolen.

With the help of Tribble™ you don’t need selfiesticks anymore, just group with your friends in front of Tribble™ and press Photo on your mobile phone. The picture will be stored right away on your iCloud or Google Drive.

Additionally you can record your birthday 24/24 without any concern about storage space on your video camera. Afterwards, all unnecessary data can be erased from the archive.

Controlling your music is much more convenient now with Tribble™. Navigate through music tracks, with just a tap of the finger, slide up or down for volume control and audio scrub with clockwise or counterclockwise finger movements. We selected the best music services for you, integrated with Tribble™.

The most outstanding and interesting feature of Tribble™ is Cheer up mode. Whenever you are not interacting with Tribble™ for over two hours and your mobile device is at least 30 yards away from it, Tribble™ is programmed to welcome you back with a friendly greeting and raise your mood. It boosts you up every morning when passing by Tribble™ you will hear kind words of motivation for the whole day. 

You may use Tribble™ as a platform for advertising deals. Just install Tribble™ at the front desk of your shop or restaurant and it will automatically send your promotional deals review to all bypassing customer’s mobile phones. This method is particularly convenient for you and your clients. You can upload unlimited ads to Tribble™ through your computer.

Use Tribble™ as a navigation device for your bike. Just build the route on your mobile phone and switch it to Tribble™. It’s easy and practical, besides you can see incoming calls and texts hands free right on the road. Thanks to the bright display, you can use this feature during night traveling.   



At this time Tribble™ is available for shipping in the US, Canada, the EU (all 28 countries), Norway, Switzerland, Australia, New Zealand, China, Taiwan, Singapore, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Indonesia, Thailand, Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Peru & Mexico. 

International shipping dates may vary depend on certification in country.

How long it takes to charge Tribble?

Usually it takes up to 1 hour for full battery charge.

How long Tribble works with full battery?

It all depends on how you are using it. There are a lot of modes and in different modes is different energy consumption. Its up to you in stand by Tribble may work up to 4 weeks.

How can I charge my Tribble™?

It's very simple, you charge it like you regular phone or tablet in the box you have magnetic based wireless charger and cable.

Where can I find Tribble tech spec?

You may find it in technical specs section on our indiegogo campaign page.

Is Tribble™ durable?

Yes it is durable.

How long I will be able to record video?

As long, as you like. You may use direct video cloud repository and shoot video 24/7.

How many Photos I will be able to shoot with Tribble™?

As many as you like. The same situation is with video take a look on previous question.

Am I able to put Tribble™ anywhere?

Yes you are able to attach it to any surface you like anywhere and anytime.

Tribble™ has video history?

Yes you will be able to reach it on your cloud or on local storage.

Tribble™ has alert summary?

Yes. All alert on video are marked, so you wont be able to miss thing.

Tribble™ has active zones?

Yes. Highlight the areas you care about and get alerts when something happens there.

May I share my stored videos and photos?

Yes you may share it anywhere.

Am I able to set Tribble to look for something in special?

Yes please take a look on question "Tribble™ has active zones?"

Tribble™ has night vision?

Yes. He detects the absence of light and automatically start running video recording in night vision mode.

When are you going to ship my Tribble?

Indiegogo isn't like Ebay or Amazon or any other online store. When you contribute for Tribble. you are funding all of our engineering, software, manufacturing and shipping. Everything that is needed to make a real product. Estimated national and international shipping date is August 2016.

What if i have changed shipping address since i backed your project and i need it amended?

No problem,when the survey arrives you will be able to amend and verify the shipping address then.

If you have additional question or you have genius idea on how to make Tribble, better feel free to contact us anytime!

story:
ENGLISH : PLEASE SCROLL TO THE SECOND VIDEO !

Fin de campagne : merci à toutes et à tous! Ni une réussite, ni une humiliation cuisante, c'est un échec très instructif et éclairant la suite de l'aventure, qui ne s'arrête pas là! Encore merci pour votre soutien, et à bientôt! 


Aidez-nous à donner à des millions d'adultes un accès instantané, en images, aux bénéfices mutuels d'une communication respectueuse et efficace avec les enfants, dans une appli mobile gratuite sans pub.

Par ici : Démo en diapos

Qu'est-ce qu'il y a dans l'appli SayKids?

  • De multiple solutions aux difficultés de relation ou de communication rencontrées avec les enfants

  • Présentées sous forme de dessins et dialogues personalisés
  • Issues des recherches et des principes de la 'parentalité positive': respect mutuel, écoute des émotions, communication efficace (Thomas Gordon etc.), neurosciences pour comprendre en profondeur les besoins et les aptitudes des enfants...


  • Ajoutez vos situations! Nous dessinerons les solutions pour que tout le monde en bénéficie. En quelques mois, nous aurons ainsi une vaste base de cas utiles à tous!
  • Personnalisez les âges, noms, apparences et plus. SayKids est aussi adaptée pour les enseignants, grands-parents, animateurs, babysitters, parents adoptifs, de toutes origines.
  • Communauté : dans un premier temps, participez sur le site web et les Meetups (regroupant les réunions de parents déjà organisées localement et les groupes de soutien mutuel autour d'un lieu ou thème - papa au foyer, parents de jumeaux, mamans sénégalaises à Lyon... ). Dans un second temps, si nous atteignons 47000€, des fonctions communautaires d'accès immédiat de l'appli : discutez en direct par chat avec des parents qui partagent vos valeurs et des professionnels à l'écoute, aidez d'autres parents...
  • La version premium comprend des fonctions de personnalisation avancée, d'auto-coaching, une communauté dédiée et surtout, permet d'ajouter à l'appli la situation qui vous manque, pour recevoir des solutions personnalisées et en faire bénéficier tous les utilisateurs!

Qu'est-ce que j'offre en échange de votre soutien?

  • Abonnement premium à vie! Vous êtes là depuis le début pour SayKids, je vous garde pour toujours! Si vous l'offrez, c'est un cadeau vraiment unique. Je ne proposerai plus cette offre après la fin de la campagne Indiegogo, c'est maintenant!


  • Satisfait ou remboursé! Ça m'ennuierait de vous décevoir, et je vous rembourserais intégralement votre contribution. 


  • Sur mesure : via appel vidéo ou en personne, dîtes-moi comment je peux vous aider dans la réussite de votre projet parental. Mes interventions et ateliers seront préparés exclusivement autour de vos besoins spécifiques. 

Attention, l'appli est prévue pour le printemps prochain, mais les appels de coaching ou les ateliers sont disponibles avant, sur réservation de date. Merci de me faire savoir si vous souhaitez une autre compensation, j'aime beaucoup les négociations gagnant-gagnant ; )))

À quoi sert votre contribution?


Et si nous n'atteignons pas mon objectif financier?

J'interrogerai et j'écouterai mieux ce dont vous avez envie & besoin, je réviserai le budget et j'enlèverai quelques fonctions de l'appli, puis JE LA RÉALISERAI ; ))) En quarante ans de vie, c'est la première fois que je m'implique et me dévoue aussi entièrement.

A propos de moi et mon équipe

J'ai la chance d'être aidée par des personnes fantastiques qui peuvent y consacrer plus ou moins de leur temps, comme  Isabelle Filliozat, Anouk Dubois (formatrice Gordon, dessinatrice), Renate Frotscher (designer web et IU), Serge Vieillescaze (développeur), Rhiannon Blythe, Brigitte Cassette (Altern'Educ Aspre formation parentalité), Christine Malgouyres (animatrice LLL, formatrice Regulation Non Violente des conflicts), Alexandra Cadillac (expert-comptable), ma sœur Hélène Merlin (comédienne, réalisatrice)...

Pourquoi moi? Je ne sais pas vraiment, mais j'ai vu se rassembler dans SayKids, pleins d'éléments et d'expériences disparates de ma vie, et soudain, tout a pris un sens fort! Voilà exactement ce que je veux apporter au monde, ce qui vaut la peine, à mes yeux, d'y consacrer ma vie. Goût pour l'aventure, exploration de nouvelles pistes pour les sociétés humaines, aversion pour les rapports de pouvoir, édition, intérêt pour les technologies et sciences concrètement utiles, coup de foudre pour les écrans tactiles, accueil bienveillant des générations futures...

Et pourquoi vous? Dîtes-moi ce qui vous tient à cœur et comment je peux vous aider! laure@SayKids.co

MERCI MERCI MERCI! Page SayKids en français

ENGLISH HERE : you're welcome !

End of  the campaign : Thank you all! Neither a success nor a humiliation, it was a very instructive failure, shedding a good light to pursue this adventure! Wishing you the best, thanx again and keep in touch!


Help us give millions of parents, teachers, caregivers, instant access to a clear picture of respectful & efficient communication with kids, in a mobile app, free and ad free!

Look : Demo in slides

 What's in SayKids app?

 

  • Multiple visual solutions to relationship or communication issues you have with your kid.

  • Displayed as customized cartoons
  • All based on positive parenting : mutual respect, efficient communication, emotional literacy, scientific input for thorough understanding of a child's needs, abilities and more.

 

  • Add to the app : If your family situation is missing on the app we'll draw solutions and add them on. That way everyone in the same situation as you can benefit too.
  • Customize the ages, looks, names and more : SayKids can also be tailored for grand-parents, teachers, adoptive parents, gay couples, family friends, babysitters, from all origins.
  • Community features:  Initially SayKids will enable interaction on the website and access to info about meetups (local events already happening or the opportunity to create your own local or interest based group - stay at home dads, parents of twins, Indian mums in Seattle...).  Subsequently, if you help us fly to our stretch goal of 47000€, great community features straight from the app await you.  Permanent 24 hour support to chat things out and vent, directly with other like-minded parents and professionals, and much more.
  • The premium app has extra customization, access to self coaching features, specific community and more importantly, the ability to add to the app what was missing, to get a personal set of solutions and help all the other users.

What am I offering for your support?

  • Lifetime premium subscription only on Indiegogo : you are forever special to me, you're here for SayKids from the start - that makes your gifts truly unique too. No lifetime premium offer after the end of the campaign, it's yours for the taking!


  • Satisfied or your money back guaranteed. I would be sorry to disappoint you & refund you in full. 


  • Via video call or in person, let me know how I can help you or yours with your parenting goals and more. Every talk or workshop would be prepared to fit your specific needs.

Please note that the app is planned for next spring but the video calls or workshops can be scheduled from October. Let me know if you want another kind of perk package, I'm a fan of win-win negotiation ; )))

Where does your money go?

To build the app, the content, spread the word and interact with users : to make sure you find in SayKids what you need to help you act your best.

I'm bringing in 12000€ personal  loans from a startup support fund and their partner bank, and I'm crowdfunding for 19000€ : you are truly making this project up and running!

What if we don't reach my goal ?

I'll ask and listen better to what you want and need, I'll re-budget and cut some features, and I will GET IT DONE anyway ; ))) I've never been that committed in my previous 40 years of life.

More about me and the team

Great people are involved in the project so far, with more or less of their time, including Isabelle Filliozat (famous French therapist and author), Anouk Dubois (Thomas Gordon P.E.T. & cartoonist), Renate Frotscher (web & UI designer), Serge Vieillescaze (senior developer), Rhiannon Blythe, Brigitte Cassette (alternative parenting support training ASPRE), Christine Malgouyres (LLL leader & NVC), Alexandra Cadillac (expert accountant), my sister Hélène Merlin (actress & short film maker)...

Why me? I don't know why this project dawned on me, but I sure saw all the dots connecting! Wow, what a strange feeling to see very different elements of my past all come together in this project to make sense of my life, and make an impact on the world. Love of adventure, exploring new ways for human societies, dislike of top-down power structures which still plague most work environments, editing, appetite for concretely useful tech and science, crush on touch screens, welcoming next generations...

Why you too? Let me know what you are at and how I can help! laure@SayKids.co

THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU! SayKidsApp or SayKids.co
