story:
What is XenonHD?

XenonHD is a custom firmware aka ROM for various Android devices. It is built from Android Open Source Project (AOSP) with additional features, performance and battery life improvements.
story_txt: What is XenonHD?XenonHD is a custom firmware aka ROM for various Android devices. It is built from Android Open Source Project (AOSP) with additional features, performance and battery life improvements.

story:
Can your phone really change the world?

Many of us do something more than a hundred times every day - we unlock our phones. What if, just by doing that, you could change the world?


Let’s say you're on Facebook and you see the cutest photo of a dog, one with the saddest eyes, up for adoption. You already have two dogs so bringing Minnie into your world isn’t an option. You think of your friends and run down the list of people that might have a place for her sweet face. You draw a blank. You reach for your phone; because at the very least you can send the rescue shelter a few dollars. So that’s what you do, and you bask in the warm glow of having made a difference, even a small difference in another creature’s life.

Later, Minnie comes to mind when you’re fixing dinner and you wonder what she’s up to. Is she happy? Is she lonely? How far did your donation really go? You wish you could do more, but money is hard to come by. If you only had a way to donate more, especially now, wouldn’t that be great?

We Heard You & Now You Can.  


Introducing Adora

Adora is an app that puts the power of doing good in your hands, using your phone to help you direct donations to your charity, every day.

How does it work?

We give you access to amazing ads and offers through the lock screen of your mobile device while making free contributions to the social cause of your choice. It’s not a pop-up – it simply replaces your current lock screen, which keeps you from accidentally pocket dialing or purchasing things on Amazon. 

Simply download the app and your current lock screen will be replaced with ours featuring great ads from really cool companies. Don’t like the ad? Let us know by giving it a thumbs down which takes you directly to your home page. Love the ad – give it a thumbs up, share it or save it for later. Don’t have time? Simply slide to unlock your phone. You’re in total control. 

Now for the really amazing thing. For simply using the app, Adora will make a free monthly contribution to your favorite social cause. You choose the cause and Adora makes the payment. And the world changes.

Imagine how good that feels. We see advertisements all the time, but we’ve never had a say in where some of that money goes. Why not partner with the advertisers? They provide the funding in return for you viewing their ad, all so Minnie (and people too) can have a better life! Well, this is why we’ve chosen you to help make that happen.


Doing Good Has Never Been So Easy.

Adora is an app that helps anyone and everyone do good. EVERY day. By simply downloading our app, and using your phone as you would normally, you can do good for a cause or charity of YOUR choice.

Here’s how it works

You lift your phone to unlock it and you see an ad from, let’s say Band-Aid®. When an ad is delivered, a portion of that ad revenue goes directly to your charity. Even if you ignore it. It’s that simple.  What’s more, if you don’t like an ad, you can rate it so that we will deliver ads that you can be interested in again.


Why would an advertiser agree to let you thumbs down their ad? Because they already pay Facebook, Google, TV, radio and everywhere else, but they never know if you really want or like their ads. If you don’t, they are wasting money. By letting you give them feedback, by telling them, “Hey I’m not a fan of this ad, or your product, or your brand”, they get valuable feedback and save money by NOT advertising to people who don’t like them. Maybe they can even adapt and listen to that feedback in a way that could win you over some time in the future, and that is very valuable to them. AND you get to shape your experience; you have more control over what you see with Adora than you do with any other advertising platform.


Real Impact

The more people who do this, the more charities we are able to help across the world.  

While buckets of ice water dumped on heads may be fun, why not simply let your fingers and your phone do good in nano-seconds? No waiting, no promises. Just results.

We know you have a lot of questions. Who gets to choose the charities? What if I don’t want to see that ad or brand? What if I don’t want to see ads at all, can I still help? Does Band-Aid get to tell me who I send the money to? Don’t worry; we’ve answered all those questions below.


What are we asking for?

This project will be our first venture into changing the world on this scale. We’re just like you, hard working people who want to do more. We want to know that we are making a difference in the world. With Adora we believe in the power of the crowd, that small acts by lots of people make for a BIG difference. Help prove us right!

Our project is a request and an invitation to spread some good karma this holiday season. The money raised will be used in a way that all of our supporters can feel good about.

We’ve already raised $25,000 of our own money. We challenge you to help us raise a minimum of $50,000 to get us ready to deliver the fully realized app to the market.

With your pledges, we’ll build out the app AND feed people and pets. To get a feel for the power of your pledge, we will provide at least one meal for a person and  for a pet for each pledge level funded. Most of our pledge gifts actually have many meals attached to them. We’d like to feed at least 10,000 people and pets. Will you help us?

Why not just send money to charity? Well, we’d love it if you did that too, but the reality is, what about next month and the month after that? If you make a pledge to us, not only will some of the money go to feeding a pet and a person, but every month after that. And that won’t cost you anything. Now that’s real change. Plus, we have relationships with non-profits that can deliver meals for pennies, so every dollar stretches far.



Pledgers will make a real impact:

●  We need to fund the development of the database side of the platform, the part that allows us to compete with Facebook & Google Ads. $50,000 helps us complete the app to deliver ads to lock screens and for development on the back end.

●  We don't want to wait to do good, so every pledge gift also delivers a meal to those in need.

●  The more support we receive, the more we can give! If we reach 50,000 downloads and $250,000 we will DOUBLE the amount of meals we provide. If we reach 100,000 downloads and $1,000,000 we will TRIPLE the amount of meals we fund.

Don’t forget, downloads are as important as donations.

We are asking you to support Adora now, so we can support your charity every day, every month, year in and year out without any extra time out of your days or any more money coming out of your pockets.


Once you contribute, just mention your intention to do some good in the comment section of this campaign, let us know your thoughts, and give us your feedback.

Other Ways You Can Help

The key to doing more good is the crowd. The more people we have doing good, the more powerful we are, the more valuable our ads are, and the more each of us can give through the Adora App. There are three other ways you can help in addition to contributing to our campaign:

1.  Download the Adora Charity App

2.  Tell everyone you know and even people you don’t know about Adora. Share our campaign on social media, walk through the streets yelling… ok you get the point…

3.  Finally GO OUT AND DO SOME GOOD! Find a volunteer opportunity and serve.

Even if you can't contribute to our campaign you can download the Adora App and you can go out and do some good. You can even inspire others by sharing your story on our Facebook Page; that alone will spread good karma and put that positive energy into the world.


You can also share our campaign on social media, tell your friends about Adora, you can volunteer at a food bank, soup kitchen, or rescue mission or even just get some friends together and go feed some people all on your own. 

Together WE can make a difference - Let’s do some good!

FAQ's

We know you have a lot of questions so here are some of the most frequently asked! Feel free to leave a comment or email us at info@getadora.com.

How much money will each charity get?

The amount of money a charity gets will depend completely on users and the frequency that ads are delivered. The more users a charity attracts, the more they use their phone, the more money they will receive.

How do I pick my charity?

Users can choose a cause and work with any of the great charities already partnered with us, or they can specify their own. We will contact the charity and ask if they want to receive funds from an Adora user.

How often will more charities be added to the selection?

We will add charities as soon as they have been properly vetted. It’s not a long process, but we want to make sure that any charity we partner with will appropriately use funds donated by our users.

Would you ever turn down a specific charity? Or are all welcome?

Any nonprofit organization which does political work will be excluded. Funds from Adora will be limited to charities which address the more immediate needs of individuals.

How will my charity be paid?

Charities that are partnered with Adora will receive monthly or quarterly payments directly from Adora by electronic transfer or check. The amount donated and frequency of payments will be based on user support. Any charity with less than 100 users will receive quarterly payments. The amount of the donation is based on the information a user gives us and the frequency ads are delivered (how often an app user unlocks their phone or views a notification).

How will I know the charity is actually receiving what you say they're getting?

We are working on allowing users to receive real time updates. This will allow you to track the amount you have earned for your charity during the month and the total amount you have already donated. Charities will also have an account to track the number of users and the amount they have earned in real time.

If you explicitly authorize Adora to share your personal information with your charity of choice, you will be able to request your personal donation information directly from them.

Will I be able to write off my charitable donation on my taxes?

The revenue which is generated as a result of the ads will not be eligible for tax deductions. However, other donations made out of pocket by you to a charity through Adora will be.

Who will have access to my personal information and how will it be used?

Security is very important to us. Personally identifiable information will never be shared with a third party without your express consent. Aggregated user activity may be shared to identify general user characteristics of those who may be most interested in a product, offer, or deal. For example, 13% of men ages 18-34 respond positively to ads for sports related products.

How often will I be seeing pop-up ads on my phone?

In addition to ads, offers, news, and sponsored stories, we want to allow users to add in some of their own content like pictures. We also want users to have the option to decide the frequency of ads. The more ads delivered, the more you generate for your cause.

Is having it going to slow down my phone, take too much memory?

No. Most advertising content is pretty small. Content will be loaded and stored onto your mobile device when you are connected to wifi. This way it will simply pull a small stored file that takes no time at all.

Will you accept anyone as one of your advertisers, or will you be selective about who can advertise?

It’s important for us to use discretion when advertising products. While we anticipate working with most advertisers, we will not show any imagery which we do not deem as being family friendly. We know that anyone can pick up your phone, so the ads delivered cannot be suggestive in any way. We are sensitive to our charity partners who work in a wide range of causes and must ensure that our ads do not contradict the good work they do.

What if I don't want to be associated with a certain advertiser, what can I do to stop getting pop ups from them?

Our innovative lockscreen will allow users to give direct feedback about ads and advertisers. Simply give it a thumbs down and our learning engine will learn your preferences. You can learn more about the learning engine on our website, http://getadora.com/adora-app/.

What do you (Adora) get out of doing this?

We get the opportunity to change the way charity is done. We are a for-profit company, but we know that when we succeed, the causes we are so passionate about do even better.
Have more questions? Check out our more detailed FAQ's on our website http://getadora.com/f-qs/ or send us a note at info@getadora.com.
story_txt:
Can your phone really change the world?
Many of us do something more than a
hundred times every day - we unlock our phones. What if, just by doing that, you
could change the world?



Let’s say you're on Facebook and you see the cutest photo of a dog, one with
the saddest eyes, up for adoption. You already have two dogs so bringing Minnie
into your world isn’t an option. You think of your friends and run down the
list of people that might have a place for her sweet face. You draw a blank.
You reach for your phone; because at the very least you can send the rescue
shelter a few dollars. So that’s what you do, and you bask in the warm glow of
having made a difference, even a small difference in another creature’s life.
Later, Minnie comes to mind when you’re
fixing dinner and you wonder what she’s up to. Is she happy? Is she lonely? How
far did your donation really go? You wish you could do more, but money is hard
to come by. If you only had a way to donate more, especially now, wouldn’t that
be great?

We Heard You & Now You
Can.  



Introducing Adora
Adora is an app that puts the power of
doing good in your hands, using your phone to help you direct donations to your
charity, every day.
How does it work? 
We give you access to amazing ads and offers through the lock screen of your mobile device while making free contributions to the social cause of your choice. It’s not a pop-up – it simply replaces your current lock screen, which keeps you from accidentally pocket dialing or purchasing things on Amazon. 
Simply download the app and your current lock screen will be replaced with ours featuring great ads from really cool companies. Don’t like the ad? Let us know by giving it a thumbs down which takes you directly to your home page. Love the ad – give it a thumbs up, share it or save it for later. Don’t have time? Simply slide to unlock your phone. You’re in total control. 
Now for the really amazing thing. For simply using the app, Adora will make a free monthly contribution to your favorite social cause. You choose the cause and Adora makes the payment. And the world changes.
Imagine how
good that feels. We see advertisements all the time, but we’ve
never had a say in where some of that money goes. Why not partner with the
advertisers? They provide the funding in return for you viewing their ad, all
so Minnie (and people too) can have a better life! Well, this is why we’ve
chosen you to help make that happen.




Doing Good
Has Never Been So Easy.
Adora is an app that helps anyone and
everyone do good. EVERY day. By simply downloading our app, and using your
phone as you would normally, you can do good for a cause or charity of YOUR
choice. 
Here’s how
it works
You lift your phone to unlock it and
you see an ad from, let’s say Band-Aid®.
When an ad is delivered, a portion of that ad revenue goes directly to your
charity. Even if you ignore it. It’s that simple.  What’s
more, if you don’t like an ad, you can rate it so that we will deliver ads that you can be interested in again. 





Why would an advertiser agree to let
you thumbs down their ad? Because they already pay Facebook, Google, TV, radio
and everywhere else, but they never know if you really want or like their
ads. If you don’t, they are wasting money. By letting you give them feedback,
by telling them, “Hey I’m not a fan of this ad, or your product, or your
brand”, they get valuable feedback and save money by NOT advertising to people
who don’t like them. Maybe they can even adapt and listen to that feedback in a
way that could win you over some time in the future, and that is very valuable
to them. AND you get to shape your experience; you have more control over what
you see with Adora than you do with any other advertising platform.




Real Impact
The more people who do this, the more
charities we are able to help across the world.  
While buckets of ice water dumped on
heads may be fun, why not simply let your fingers and your phone do good in
nano-seconds? No waiting, no promises. Just results.
We know you have a lot of questions.
Who gets to choose the charities? What if I don’t want to see that ad or brand?
What if I don’t want to see ads at all, can I still help? Does Band-Aid get to tell me who I send the
money to? Don’t worry; we’ve answered all those questions below.




What are we
asking for?
This project will be our first venture
into changing the world on this scale. We’re just like you, hard working people
who want to do more. We want to know that we are making a difference in the
world. With Adora we believe in the power of the crowd, that small acts by lots
of people make for a BIG difference. Help prove us right!
Our project is a request and an invitation to spread some good karma this holiday season. The money raised will be used in
a way that all of our supporters can feel good about.
We’ve already raised $25,000 of our
own money. We challenge you to help us raise a minimum of $50,000 to get us ready
to deliver the fully realized app to the market. 
With your pledges, we’ll build out the
app AND feed people and pets. To get a feel for the power
of your pledge, we will provide at least one meal for a person and  for a pet for
each pledge level funded. Most of our pledge gifts actually have many meals
attached to them. We’d like to feed at least 10,000 people and pets. Will you help us?
Why
not just send money to charity? Well, we’d love it if you did that too, but
the reality is, what about next month and the month after that? If you make a
pledge to us, not only will some of the money go to feeding a pet and a person, but every month after that. And that won’t cost you
anything. Now that’s real change. Plus, we have relationships with non-profits
that can deliver meals for pennies, so every dollar stretches far. 






Pledgers
will make a real impact:
● 
We need to fund the development of the database side of
the platform, the part that allows us to compete with Facebook & Google Ads.
$50,000 helps us complete the app to deliver ads to lock screens and for
development on the back end. 
● 
We don't want to wait to do good, so every pledge gift
also delivers a meal to those in need.
● 
The more support we receive, the more we can give! If
we reach 50,000 downloads and $250,000 we will DOUBLE the amount of meals we
provide. If we reach 100,000 downloads and $1,000,000 we will TRIPLE the amount
of meals we fund.
Don’t
forget, downloads are as important as donations. 
We are asking you to support Adora now,
so we can support your charity every day, every month, year in and year out
without any extra time out of your days or any more money coming out of your
pockets.




Once you contribute, just mention your
intention to do some good in the comment section of this campaign, let us know
your thoughts, and give us your feedback.
Other Ways
You Can Help
The
key to doing more good is the crowd. The more people we have doing good,
the more powerful we are, the more valuable our ads are, and the more each of
us can give through the Adora App. There are three other ways you can help in
addition to contributing to our campaign:
1. 
Download the Adora Charity App
2. 
Tell everyone you know and even people you don’t know
about Adora. Share our campaign on social media, walk through the streets
yelling… ok you get the point…
3. 
Finally GO OUT AND DO SOME GOOD! Find a volunteer
opportunity and serve.

Even if you can't contribute to our
campaign you can download the Adora App and you can go out and do some good. You can even inspire others by sharing your story on our Facebook Page; that alone
will spread good karma and put that positive energy into the world.
You can also share our campaign on
social media, tell your friends about Adora, you can volunteer at a food bank,
soup kitchen, or rescue mission or even just get some friends together and go
feed some people all on your own. 

Together WE can make a difference - Let’s do some good!
FAQ's
We know you have a lot of questions so here are some of the most frequently asked! Feel free to leave a comment or email us at info@getadora.com.


How much money will each charity get?
The amount of money a charity gets will depend completely on users and the frequency that ads are delivered. The more users a charity attracts, the more they use their phone, the more money they will receive.

How do I pick my charity?Users can choose a cause and work with any of the great charities already partnered with us, or they can specify their own. We will contact the charity and ask if they want to receive funds from an Adora user.
How often will more charities be added to the selection?
We will add charities as soon as they have been properly vetted. It’s not a long process, but we want to make sure that any charity we partner with will appropriately use funds donated by our users.

Would you ever turn down a specific charity? Or are all welcome? Any nonprofit organization which does political work will be excluded. Funds from Adora will be limited to charities which address the more immediate needs of individuals.

How will my charity be paid?
Charities that are partnered with Adora will receive monthly or quarterly payments directly from Adora by electronic transfer or check. The amount donated and frequency of payments will be based on user support. Any charity with less than 100 users will receive quarterly payments. The amount of the donation is based on the information a user gives us and the frequency ads are delivered (how often an app user unlocks their phone or views a notification).

How will I know the charity is actually receiving what you say they're getting?
We are working on allowing users to receive real time updates. This will allow you to track the amount you have earned for your charity during the month and the total amount you have already donated. Charities will also have an account to track the number of users and the amount they have earned in real time.If you explicitly authorize Adora to share your personal information with your charity of choice, you will be able to request your personal donation information directly from them.
Will I be able to write off my charitable donation on my taxes?
The revenue which is generated as a result of the ads will not be eligible for tax deductions. However, other donations made out of pocket by you to a charity through Adora will be.

Who will have access to my personal information and how will it be used?
Security is very important to us. Personally identifiable information will never be shared with a third party without your express consent. Aggregated user activity may be shared to identify general user characteristics of those who may be most interested in a product, offer, or deal. For example, 13% of men ages 18-34 respond positively to ads for sports related products.


How often will I be seeing pop-up ads on my phone?
In addition to ads, offers, news, and sponsored stories, we want to allow users to add in some of their own content like pictures. We also want users to have the option to decide the frequency of ads. The more ads delivered, the more you generate for your cause. 

Is having it going to slow down my phone, take too much memory?
No. Most advertising content is pretty small. Content will be loaded and stored onto your mobile device when you are connected to wifi. This way it will simply pull a small stored file that takes no time at all.
Will you accept anyone as one of your advertisers, or will you be selective about who can advertise?
It’s important for us to use discretion when advertising products. While we anticipate working with most advertisers, we will not show any imagery which we do not deem as being family friendly. We know that anyone can pick up your phone, so the ads delivered cannot be suggestive in any way. We are sensitive to our charity partners who work in a wide range of causes and must ensure that our ads do not contradict the good work they do.

What if I don't want to be associated with a certain advertiser, what can I do to stop getting pop ups from them?Our innovative lockscreen will allow users to give direct feedback about ads and advertisers. Simply give it a thumbs down and our learning engine will learn your preferences. You can learn more about the learning engine on our website, http://getadora.com/adora-app/.
What do you (Adora) get out of doing this?We get the opportunity to change the way charity is done. We are a for-profit company, but we know that when we succeed, the causes we are so passionate about do even better.
Have more questions? Check out our more detailed FAQ's on our website http://getadora.com/f-qs/ or send us a note at info@getadora.com.

story:
Alt. is the ONLY minimalist case with a mounting / handsfree solution for your home, workspace and car. For iPhone 6, 6 Plus, 6s and 6s Plus




Work & Play Handsfree

Alt’s wall mount allows you to use your iPhone as a second screen, view notifications and mount it wherever you find most convenient. Free up your desk space, less clutter by getting your phone off the table!

The world's most capable minimal case from mod-3. Alt is an ultra-light, protective & handsfree/multi-tasking case for iPhone 6/6s and 6 Plus/6s Plus. Phone Protection, Handsfree Solution, Desk & Cable Organizer in One Neat Beautiful Package.


"iPhone is a beautiful piece of industrial design made of glass and aluminum. It's a pleasure to hold and interact with it directly. Traditional cases mask those design features and you're no longer able to appreciate your phone's beauty. That's why we created Alt."



Alt has been designed to provide optimal protection. The outer shell is made of a high-strength polymer. The corners are lined with aerospace-grade 3M padding for added impact-resistance and the X-shaped design helps to disperse the force of impact. The outer shell features a soft-touch, non-slip finish that improves your grip on your iPhone.




However careful you are with your iPhone, drops and knocks are inevitable. Through extensive research, we've discovered that when these accidents do occur, the corners are the most vulnerable. That’s why we have focused protection at these points of impacts.





Alt's design is simple, minimalist and modern, just like your iPhone. We’ve worked tirelessly to make sure that Alt perfectly complements the iPhone it protects. Every line serves a purpose.



Convenient Cable Organizer

No more fishing cables from the floor.

Your Alt mount also works great as key ring holders. Actually, it can hold anything that's steel or magnetic!





Easy-on, Easy-off Magnetic Mounting



At the heart of Alt is a powerful mounting system using neodymium magnets, a small but very strong type of magnet. No more clips or grips that require you to push a release button or pry open arms to release your iPhone. To mount, just place your iPhone on the magnetic mount and it will securely hold the phone in place. To release, just pull the phone away.  NOTE: The magnetic system does not affect the iPhone's operation, camera, lens/flash, ApplePay, charging, or battery life.



Installation is a snap!



Simple Installation Of Wall Mounts & Car Mounts

The wall mount can be attached to any surface: wood, metal, painted walls, even textured walls. At the back of the wall mount is a padded peel-off sticky pad. It's easy to fix onto any surface you choose. It is also easy to remove later on and leaves no residue, so no worries about leaving sticky gunk behind.


The car mount clips directly to the A/C vents in almost any car. It works on most flat type vents, and even works with many circular vent designs.



Every Alt case comes with a matching color wall mount. Each wall mount is supplied with extra sticky pads so you can move your mount if required. Please specify size (6/6s or 6 Plus/6s Plus) and color of your reward. The car mount comes in black.

Go with matching color case or contrasting color with your iPhone, or get more than one color! Have fun!




Where we are in the process 

We have completed 3 rounds of prototypes, the latest prototypes are highly accurate and the mod-3 team have been using them in our daily routine. The next stage is to complete a test (soft) mould to ensure fit, engineering accuracy and manufacturing tolerance. After the test mould and final testing is complete, the production mould will be ordered, which takes 1-2 weeks. We have a series of advanced prototypes for the case, wall mount and car mount, which gets us very close to the final version at this time.



 Stay in touch with us!



Risks and challenges

Alt is based on the design of our first case, RADIUS, which is now a proven product, with a growing global fan base. This is a huge advantage, both from an engineering and manufacturing perspective, as we have taken all the learning from earlier designs forward to create Alt.

Our biggest challenge is manufacturing, with careful attention required to ensure that production meets the stringent quality requirements we expect from a product that comes from the mod-3 name.

To guarantee quality and delivery schedules we have chosen to work with a local manufacturing operation in the San Francisco Bay Area. This ensures that if any issues or delays occur, we can react instantly and work through solutions quickly.

story:
Phone Finder – Key Finder – Phone Stand – Phone Grip

 

 

Find Your Keys or Phone With the Press of a Button!

If you’re like us, your phone and keys pick the worst time to disappear… 

Picture this - You’re getting ready for work and are about to leave. You know you can get to work in 17 minutes. It’s 6:42 am, so you’re right on time for that 7 am shift. 

Ready to go, you reach for the keys on your dresser… Oh #!@% 

You have no idea where they went. You’re late for work… Again.

Lost phone?

We’ve got that covered too - with an attachable key fob for your keys paired with the stand for your phone - the signal on either device works to find the other.

 

KickTrack! - The Re-Stickable Phone Stand & Key Fob That Does It All! 

 

How Does it Work?

KickTrack comes with two Bluetooth devices:

#1 - A 360° rotatable Kickstand that attaches to your phone.

#2 - A Key Fob that attaches to your keys.

By pressing a button on the kickstand, you can ring the key fob to find your keys.

And by pressing a button on the key fob, you can ring the kickstand to find your phone. 

 

 

How is KickTrack Different?

Other products that help you find your things rely on apps installed on your phone which means if your phone dies or is turned off, the system is rendered useless. 

KickTrack is the only product in the world designed to help the user find their phone, even when it’s dead / off / on silent; and it has a range of up to 300 ft!

KickTrack is also much more versatile  because it is both a kickstand that allows users to prop their phone up at any angle and a phone grip that allows users to hold their phone more securely in one hand. 

 

 

Why is this Important?

Phone usage is increasing more and more which has increased the amount of times we need to recharge our phones throughout the day.

Have you ever had your phone die and then go missing?

Have you ever forgotten to put your phone on the charger and not been able to find it the next morning?

Have you ever not been able to get in your car or house because you lost your keys?

KickTrack solves this problem. 

We are saving people time and frustration by assuring that you will be able to find your phone and your keys, no matter the circumstances. 

We are saving people money by preventing the possibility of having to:

  • Replace your lost or stolen phone
  • Replace your lost car keys
  • Have a new house key made
  • Call a tow company to help you open your car
  • Take a taxi somewhere instead of your car
  • Break into your own house
  • Pay to ship your spare key
  • Etc.

 

 

What are people saying?

Joe: ''I’m always looking for something to use to prop my phone up when I watch shows on my phone in the airport. And not to mention being relieved of the cost of having to replace my $1,000 phone or my $500 car keys. This thing is worth every penny! Thank you KickTrack!''

Savannah: ''Thank you KickTrack!! You are going to save me so much time and stress. Accidentally misplacing my phone and keys can be so frustrating sometimes, especially when I’m in a hurry. Also going to love using the kickstand to prop my phone up while I’m studying. Can’t wait to get mine!''

Prop Your Phone Up at Any Angle!

KickTrack is a 360° rotatable kickstand so users can prop their phone up to:

  • Video chat hands free with friends or family.
  • Watch videos/entertainment hands free.
  • Take photos on a timer from a distance.
  • Self-record a presentation, activity, or workout routine.

 

Video Chat Hands Free

 

Watch Shows and Entertainment Hands Free

 

Take Your Own Photos From a Distance

 

Self-Record Your Own Videos

 

Take a Cool Time Lapse Video

 

KickTrack is Also a Phone Grip!

 

Hold Your Phone, Bag, and Water Bottle in the Same Hand!

 

Super Thin and Folds Flat!

 

What's Inside?

Inside both the Kickstand and Key Fob are:

#1 - Bluetooth Speaker System (range of up to 300 ft!)

#2 - LED Indicator Light (blinks so you know your device is in range!)

#3 - Replaceable Coin Cell Battery (lasts an entire year and only costs a $1 to replace!)

 

Directions:

To find your phone, press the button on the Key Fob to ring the Kickstand.

To find your keys, press the button on the Kickstand to ring the Key Fob.

When the device you are looking for is range, the LED light on both devices will blink and the speaker in the device you are searching for will start to ring. 

This gives you visual confirmation that the device you are looking for is in range just in case the sound is being smothered by a pillow, blanket, cushion, etc. 

 

You Can Get the Non-Electronic Version too!

Available in Marble and Black, you can get the non-electronic version of KickTrack too!

This is the kickstand/grip without the locator system.

story:
Why We Are here

The MOTI was created by Donald Chew, who has a strong passion for solving the problems throughout the paid tv industry using a common sense approach. Chew was inspired to design the MOTI device while reading numerous articles about the cable TV industry, and studying its multitude of  problems.  The industry for years has used the same type of medium for decades to deliver cable TV and internet to your home.  This coupled with the never-ending customer service problems/ issues, charging higher prices, and companies merging to become larger and larger has created a hunger to change this.  While the industry has evolved, the delivery method stays the same and as a result they have forgotten about the customer.  Today, in order to receive cable and the internet in your home, wires need to be installed and connected in some way to access the internet and to receive cable.  Also keep in mind that 4 of the world’s largest cable tv and internet provider’s rank at the top of the list for the worst customer service.

With a long list of problems in hand, Chew set out to create the perfect device that would be the solution to the customer service issue, make it affordable, while at the same time delivering on functionality. As a result, our team has worked tirelessly over the past 18 months to bring the MOTI device from an idea, to sketches on a piece of paper, taking steps to build a real life prototype. Thanks to the amazing public support and feedback thus far, we are now seeking support via this campaign to complete, fine tune the prototype, and mass produce this device.  We would like to present to you the worlds first wireless Wi-Fi and cable tv device.  Our goal is to get this device in as many homes as we possibly can around the world. 

THE MOTI DEVICE WILL SOLVE THE FOLLOWING PROBLEMS BY OFFERING THE SOLUTIONS

The MOTI device (Patent Pending) is a device that allows consumers to access Wi-Fi and cable TV without any wires.

The purpose of creating a device like this does a couple of things:

1. Problem: Customer service is a HUGE problem that has plagued the cable

industry for years. (Today, anyone who wants to reach customer service must call

in to reach customer service. The results have been horrible with long wait times,

rude customer service, being disconnected. Etc.)

Solution: The MOTI has a built in button called the MOTI button that can be

pressed and our customer service team will contact you. (Think On-star that’s

installed in cars).

 2. Problem: 125+ channels are currently offered as part of a bundled package to

consumers.

Solution: The Moti device will come with a cloud based app that will allow the

customers to choose the channels that they would like to watch. (A la Carte).

3. Problem: Once you order service, you are given a time/window for an installation

 technician to come out to your home.

Solution: The MOTI device eliminates the need for this because once ordered.

The device is pre-programmed for your household and simply must be activated upon receipt by pressing the MOTI button.


Product Description

The world’s first truly wireless Wi-Fi and cable tv device. Your MOTI device comes Pre-Programmed specifically for you. About the MOTI DEVICE: This amazing device features the MOST innovative technology available which pulls from the existing cable wires underground currently as well as satellite connections to provide you an instant Wi-Fi connection.  This will allow you to receive instant access to the internet, cable (WITH A SUBSCRIPTION), and begin watching your favorite TV shows, movies and sports via the MOTI DEVICE.  The MOTI device comes to you ready to go and takes less than a few minutes to set up. Our MOTI runs extremely smooth with up to 4K viewing capabilities, contains a built in DVR in case you want to record your favorite shows.  The MOTI  device comes in two (2) models, the MOTI 14 and the MOTI S.

PRODUCT FEATURES

FEATURES MOTI14 MOTI S
Built in Wi-fi x x
Push button Customer Service x x
Storage Capacity 4gb unlimited
Built in DVR x x
Universal remote x x
Works in U.S. x x
Worldwide operability No x
Cloud based cable app No x
Comes in different colors Only in black x


What sets the MOTI device apart from the current cable providers and streaming devices out there today?

Our MOTI device is truly different because today’s cable and satellite providers like Comcast, Time Warner, or DIRECTV need to have a wired connection to get cable and Wi-Fi into the home.  Streaming devices the Roku, or Apple TV, and the Fire stick are plug and play but you need a separate Wi-Fi connection for these to work.  With our MOTI device, you don’t need to have this because it is built into the device.  No more waiting for installation guys to show up at your home, no more calling for customer service because we call you.  All you have to do is press the MOTI button on the device and our customer service staff will contact you. 

· ALWAYS STAY UP TO DATE - Easy and simple Over-The-Air updates means that you will automatically always have the newest and greatest movies, TV shows, games and apps at your fingertips!

· BEST WARRANTY AND CUSTOMER SERVICE - GUARANTEED! The MOTI has a 1 year warranty. No matter what happens to your device, all you need are batteries, our customer service team will make sure it is running flawlessly at ALL times. If you need to reach our team, you will simply need to PRESS the MOTI button on your device and our team will CALL YOU and HAPPILY be able to answer any questions you may have.  No more being transferred to 10 different people, repeating the same information because OUR STAFF WILL CALL YOU  and will be able to handle Wi-fi, cable, and billing issues any questions you may have - and with MOTI Support automatically installed on each device, we can see what’s going on and resolve anything that may be causing issues immediately!

COMPARISON OF THE MOTI TO CABLE, SATELLITE, AND STREAMING DEVICE PROVIDERS

FEATURES MOTI14 & S ComCast Directv TimeWarner Roku Firestick
Need to have a wired connection NO YES YES YES YES YES
Need to wait on installation technician NO YES YES YES NO NO
Need to call for customer service NO YES YES YES YES YES

NOTE: Wired connection needed to access wi-fi and internet


 

What is the MOTI Plan and Perks

Throughout the cellphone industry, Apple provides a powerhouse for cutting-edge technologies. The MOTI project aims to do the same for the cable TV industry -- to provide a low-volume, high-technology platform, crowdfunded by enthusiasts and the millions of frustrated cable TV ad internet subscribers. A pioneering project that accelerates the adoption of new technologies and drives subsctribers into demanding this product because there are no wires. 

  • The MOTI is a device that will allow you to receive cable tv, has built in Wi-Fi which allows you connect the the internet, anywhere in the world. 
  • In order to help the MOTI campaign be successful, we have established several levels for you to contribute. 
  • In order to receive one, you simply must help us reach or exceed our goal.


The Impact

We feel that the MOTI device can make a huge impact in the cable tv industry becasue of the curent state of the industry, where many problems have existed for years. . Please Note:  The Cable industry itself is seeking new competition, as well a a new company who can provide new technology.

  • Our  MOTI project is valuable to those who contribute because its give us a chance to create much needed competition throughout the industry
  • 75% of all cable tv subscribers worldwide have been frustrated with their cable tv provider at some point, finally get a chance to have another viable option.
  • Introduce new wireless technology that can revive the industry by offering a lower price, and solve the customer service issue that has destroyed the image of the current cable providers.
  • Allows the customers to create their own package via the app (Ala Carte)


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

While we are confident that we can deliver a device that you will be proud of, let us be open with the fact that there are still risks involved with this (and any) crowd funding campaign.  Please keep in mind that (while we'll strive to deliver,) perks are offered "best effort", and that we are not "selling" these perks to you.

We ask backers to understand that there are many things that could cause this project to be delayed. 

Whatever the situation, we promise to keep open about how we're doing, and communicate frequently.

- Certification delays: one of the most often blamed causes for delays on crowd funding campaigns is delays in certification, and that's the same for us. We have applied for Licensure  through the FCC (Federal Communications Commission) and are awaiting approval.

- Component supplies: our manufacturing process involves many components originating in various countries. Please understand that there is always a risk that the circumstances of our suppliers may change and the essential components we need may be delayed, or have other unexpected troubles.

- Patent- We have applied for a patent for the MOTI device, and are awaiting approval.  With that in mind, we are still moving forward as we anticipate an approval.  (In this business, we must be very careful on releasing too many details until this patent is approved.)  We promise to keep you in the loop.


Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.  So "Let's Take Charge and Be Different"


IMPORTANT QUESTIONS WE CAN ANSWER RIGHT NOW?

1.  Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my pledge?

If you live in the US, shipping is free. For all other destinations, please add the amount specified in the perk description. Local import taxes may apply.

2.  I contributed to a perk but I forgot to add the extra $30 for shipping. How can I increase the amount?

No problem! If you'd like to add funds for shipping, you can make another contribution and select "No Perk, Just a Contribution."

3.  I can't get my payment to work in Pay pal, what should I do?

Email the On-Time support team at support@ontimecommunications.co.  They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

4.  What is On-Time and what does it have to do with the MOTI device?

On-Time Communications, dba, On-Time Cable is the company that is being started to create competition in the Cable Industry.  (Application Pending with FCC)  The MOTI device is our brand builder and the device that connects everything and bring the service from On-Time to you using no wires.

5.  Is MOTI device patented?

The MOTI Device is officially “patent pending” with Patent Application Number 62/244,977

6.  What countries and mobile networks will support the MOTI?

The MOTI device works as an open device, not locked to any particular network. It works in all countries that have cable wires underground or Satellite accessibility.  It will also support the two LTE standards to provide 4G mobile broadband connectivity around the world (subject to network availability and data fees). Before launch we will conduct interoperability testing with networks in the US, Europe, China, South America, India, the Middle East and Africa. This is a normal step in the process of developing a wireless device.

7.  Will the MOTI receive updates after launch?

The MOTI device will feature a built in app that will come to The MOTI device in an update shortly after launch and approval from the FCC to operate On-Time Cable. The app will also receive daily updates as developer images and frequent stable releases. This is an Open Device, so users can tinker with the software and use standard flashing tools to upload custom builds. If anything goes wrong, simply push your MOTI button to also reach our customer service department. 

8.  What is the rationale behind the perk structure?

We tried to accommodate everyone.  To offer the final product at a competitive price we need to produce enough volume to bring the unit costs down. At the same time, we want to be selecting parts that are not yet proven for multi-million-unit production. This appears to be a suitable balance we found. A lower funding target might seem more likely to succeed, but the tiered perk amounts would allow us to exceed our goal and will serve as one of the measures we use to gauge support.  We believe this funding target and these perk levels give us the best chance of success. 

9.  What if we fail to reach the funding target?

We appreciate every bit of support we receive during the 30 days, and every backer will be welcomed into the MOTI family. Turning back is not an option, if we don’t reach our target then we will focus on producing fewer devices.  These will be pre-sold to On-Time Cable subscribers and we will build the company that way.  Also, this is why we decided to go with flexible funding option.

10.  What warranties apply to The MOTI device?

A standard (1) One Year manufacturers’ warranty will apply. If you are not happy with the product, you may return it within 30 days of receiving it for a full refund. Please note, On-Time Communications will not cover the cost of the return postage and packaging.

11.  What if my question isn’t answered here?

We’re happy to respond to any other queries you might have about The MOTI device, the MOTI campaign, and our company as a whole. Email us at support@ontimecommunications.co

story:
Summary

My name is Regina D. Braggs.  I am the creator and founder of Applause Network TV, Inc and I am asking for your financial support for an internet television network that not only plans to provide over the top original entertainment for you, but will provide a distribution platform for your peers who are independent talented writers, directors and producers in need of a distribution outlet that goes directly to the audience.  Also, I am an independent screenplay writer and director.  After frustrating years of shopping my projects to major studios, I decided to create a distribution vehicle where I and other writers, directors and producers could maintain ownership of our creative property while displaying it to a mass audience.  Applause Network is that vehicle.  CHEERS TO NEW MEDIA!  Your contributions will help us launch the network in December 2014 and bring you content that was written, exclusively for Applause Network TV, by some of the most creative folks who have yet to be discovered in the entertainment industry.  ...And by the way, you could be one of those creative individuals with the right project for Applause Network TV.  We support the independent community and are always in the market for original ideas and content such as films of all genres, reality shows, live concerts and sporting events.  To learn how to submit your project, go to www.applausenetwork.tv and click feedback/contact us at the bottom of the homepage.  Send us a message containing a very brief description of your project and we will contact you with submission information.  All films created exclusively for Applause Network TV will be registered with the Screen Actor's Guild under New Media/low budget.

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking to raise $1.4 million dollars within the next 60 days in order to launch in December 2014.  Funds will be used for the following:

1.  One time purchase  of video cameras, lighting equipment and sound equipment that will enable us to avoid the repeated cost of renting equipment for each production and it enables us to produce more shows within a shorter period of time.  This will result in having more shows available on the website. Also, it enables us to cut cost by producing projects for other writers, directors and producers who have great ideas but don't have the financial means to produce their shows.    

2.  Create our own editing studio.  This is important because we can edit our own shows and avoid piracy and theft of our creative content.

3.  Pay licensing fees for content belonging to other directors/producers.

4.  Pay admin staff.  

5.  Pay location fees.

6.  Pay administrative over head cost.

7.  Maintain the website and the security of the website.

PERKS CONSIST OF - Depending upon your contribution, perks that are being offered are free annual membership, exclusive emails about inside productions and actors, exclusive internet screenings, visit to the sets of shows produced in New York City, free admissions to comedy shows and concerts, a part as an extra in certain shows, associate producer credits, free access to on demand shows of your choosing, free access to live shows that are streamed on the website and an exclusive invitation to our launch party.

GOALS - It is my prayer that we reach our gold of $1.4 million dollars in 60 days.  It is time for change in the entertainment industry for independents who lack the resources of the large movie distributors and the ability to gain access to distribution because we're too small to matter...essentially "nobodies." Certainly, there are many more who would agree with me than not...  However, that said, if we do not reach our intended goal of $1.4 million dollars, I will continue to find creative ways to reach our launching goal of December 2014 with the funds that we acquire.   We will use a scaled down approach to make as much content available at that time as possible.  If necessary, we will rent production equipment and produce shows that are 30 minutes in length as opposed to 60 minutes or longer until we acquire the a funding that will allow us to do more.  However, I will not enter into any financial deals where ownership of any of the content displayed on Applause Network TV belonging to independent writers, directors and producers is compromised.  

The Impact

Applause Network TV will prove to be a major contender in the entertainment industry by providing a platform for the stars of tomorrow.  It will be the place that all eyes are on when it comes to searching for talented writers, directors, producers, actors, singers and dancers.  This talent may very well be you, your neighbor, relative or friend that you are supporting by contributing to the funding campaign of Applause Network TV.  Through advertising, we have the potential to reach people all over the world.  This is a concept that's easy to grasp when you consider the potential that the internet has created with all of the information, resources and volumes of people accessing the web daily.  Our goal is to provide that vehicle for those seeking exposure and entertain the heck out of everybody while doing it.  

Risks & Challenges

One possible risk is not acquiring enough funding to offer the quality of shows that an HBO, SHOWTIME, BRAVO or other networks that stream on the internet are able to offer.  It is our intention to offer shows that are 30, 60 and 120 minutes long. However, as already stated, we are talented enough to scale down the shows and keep you entertained.  But it would be so much more fun if you could receive more of the delicious shows that we have lined up for you...

Hacking is another possible and real risk.  However, we have put in place firewalls, security measures and security certificates that keep all content and personal information of our users safe.   

Other Ways You Can Help

There are other ways that you can assist us if you can't provide a financial donation, send a shout out to a friend or relative about Applause Network TV and ask them to support us. You can also stay abreast of what's happening, prior to our launch date, by going to our website and joining our newsletter at www.applausenetwork.tv. 

You can also follow us on TWITTER at twitter.com/applausentv and on FACEBOOK at facebook.com/applausenetworktv.

 Also, remember to use Indiegogo's share tools!
story_txt:
SummaryMy name is Regina D. Braggs.  I am the creator and founder of Applause Network TV, Inc and I am asking for your financial support for an internet television network that not only plans to provide over the top original entertainment for you, but will provide a distribution platform for your peers who are independent talented writers, directors and producers in need of a distribution outlet that goes directly to the audience.  Also, I am an independent screenplay writer and director.  After frustrating years of shopping my projects to major studios, I decided to create a distribution vehicle where I and other writers, directors and producers could maintain ownership of our creative property while displaying it to a mass audience.  Applause Network is that vehicle.  CHEERS TO NEW MEDIA!  Your contributions will help us launch the network in December 2014 and bring you content that was written, exclusively for Applause Network TV, by some of the most creative folks who have yet to be discovered in the entertainment industry.  ...And by the way, you could be one of those creative individuals with the right project for Applause Network TV.  We support the independent community and are always in the market for original ideas and content such as films of all genres, reality shows, live concerts and sporting events.  To learn how to submit your project, go to www.applausenetwork.tv and click feedback/contact us at the bottom of the homepage.  Send us a message containing a very brief description of your project and we will contact you with submission information.  All films created exclusively for Applause Network TV will be registered with the Screen Actor's Guild under New Media/low budget.
What We Need & What You Get
 We are seeking to raise $1.4 million dollars within the next 60 days in order to launch in December 2014.  Funds will be used for the following:1.  One time purchase  of video cameras, lighting equipment and sound equipment that will enable us to avoid the repeated cost of renting equipment for each production and it enables us to produce more shows within a shorter period of time.  This will result in having more shows available on the website. Also, it enables us to cut cost by producing projects for other writers, directors and producers who have great ideas but don't have the financial means to produce their shows.    2.  Create our own editing studio.  This is important because we can edit our own shows and avoid piracy and theft of our creative content.3.  Pay licensing fees for content belonging to other directors/producers.4.  Pay admin staff.  5.  Pay location fees.6.  Pay administrative over head cost.7.  Maintain the website and the security of the website.PERKS CONSIST OF - Depending upon your contribution, perks that are being offered are free annual membership, exclusive emails about inside productions and actors, exclusive internet screenings, visit to the sets of shows produced in New York City, free admissions to comedy shows and concerts, a part as an extra in certain shows, associate producer credits, free access to on demand shows of your choosing, free access to live shows that are streamed on the website and an exclusive invitation to our launch party.GOALS - It is my prayer that we reach our gold of $1.4 million dollars in 60 days.  It is time for change in the entertainment industry for independents who lack the resources of the large movie distributors and the ability to gain access to distribution because we're too small to matter...essentially "nobodies." Certainly, there are many more who would agree with me than not...  However, that said, if we do not reach our intended goal of $1.4 million dollars, I will continue to find creative ways to reach our launching goal of December 2014 with the funds that we acquire.   We will use a scaled down approach to make as much content available at that time as possible.  If necessary, we will rent production equipment and produce shows that are 30 minutes in length as opposed to 60 minutes or longer until we acquire the a funding that will allow us to do more.  However, I will not enter into any financial deals where ownership of any of the content displayed on Applause Network TV belonging to independent writers, directors and producers is compromised.  The ImpactApplause Network TV will prove to be a major contender in the entertainment industry by providing a platform for the stars of tomorrow.  It will be the place that all eyes are on when it comes to searching for talented writers, directors, producers, actors, singers and dancers.  This talent may very well be you, your neighbor, relative or friend that you are supporting by contributing to the funding campaign of Applause Network TV.  Through advertising, we have the potential to reach people all over the world.  This is a concept that's easy to grasp when you consider the potential that the internet has created with all of the information, resources and volumes of people accessing the web daily.  Our goal is to provide that vehicle for those seeking exposure and entertain the heck out of everybody while doing it.  Risks & Challenges One possible risk is not acquiring enough funding to offer the quality of shows that an HBO, SHOWTIME, BRAVO or other networks that stream on the internet are able to offer.  It is our intention to offer shows that are 30, 60 and 120 minutes long. However, as already stated, we are talented enough to scale down the shows and keep you entertained.  But it would be so much more fun if you could receive more of the delicious shows that we have lined up for you...Hacking is another possible and real risk.  However, we have put in place firewalls, security measures and security certificates that keep all content and personal information of our users safe.   Other Ways You Can HelpThere are other ways that you can assist us if you can't provide a financial donation, send a shout out to a friend or relative about Applause Network TV and ask them to support us. You can also stay abreast of what's happening, prior to our launch date, by going to our website and joining our newsletter at www.applausenetwork.tv. You can also follow us on TWITTER at twitter.com/applausentv and on FACEBOOK at facebook.com/applausenetworktv. Also, remember to use Indiegogo's share tools!

story:
Hi, I'm Brian Hall, head of Product Development at CheckSavvy and we need you help to hit our second milestone:

Mobile Payment Security & Mobile Coupon Service

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Successful first milestone: CheckSavvy Alerts App for iPhone and Android up and running.
  • Payment platform in place and major bank sponsor.
  • New cardholders and merchants signing up everyday.

Here is what people are saying so far:

This app rocks!

Safer than Google Wallet.

More fun than Square.

What We Need & What You Get

The funds will allow us to launch our service with mobile payment security and mobile discounts. Here is what we will use the funds for:

  • Setting up Interactive Voice Response (IVR) service.
  • Setting up SMS text based messaging service for payment security and mobile coupons.
  • Providing geo-location based discounts on entertainment, activities, dining, lodging, shopping and transportation.
  • Live translation into any one of 60 major languages.

Achieving subsequent milestones positions the company favorably for future funding.

How We Make A Difference

Last year, credit card fraud totaled $48 Billion in the U.S. Payment card fraud and indentity theft are top concerns for consumers and merchants. Our team is dedicated to fighting fraud and identity theft while saving cardholders and merchants money. Here is what we offer:

  • Our app which works without storing sensitive card numbers on the smart phone, making it completely safe.
  • Secure any debit or credit card, use our card, or make purchases using only a smart phone.
  • Merchants can scan cards anywhere using only their smart phone.
  • All transactions are cardholder verified. Merchants should save serious money with a lower payment tier, less compliance and no more chargebacks!
  • Fun too! It's not just about security. Wouldn't it be great if coupons and discounts helped you shop? We thought so too.
  • It's a global village. Coupons, discounts and rewards are translated into the user's native language on the fly!

Get Involved

You can contribute even if your unable to donate. Here's how:

  • Help spread the word. Share with friends & family.
  • Like us on Facebook. Follow-us on http://twitter.com/AlanRudo1
  • Remember to share at http://indegogo.com/checksavvy

Thank you and Aloha!

story:
FINAL UPDATE:

If you would still like to donate after the end of the campaign, feel free to use my PayPal petya.p.miteva@gmail.com or go on our etsy shop and order your snug directly from there: http://www.etsy.com/shop/SnugEssentials.

My grandma looooves knitting. As does pretty much any Bulgarian grandma. But I just couldn't use any more sweaters and socks and even all my electronics are now nicely snug, so my friends thought that they are so nice we should do something about it - especially given that there are other good knitters like my grandma who really need some extra income. So we created Snug Essentials and found a few more women (exactly 4 at the moment) to help us.

We thought: what if we could empower hundreds or thousands of women make a better living turning a hobby they enjoy into a reliable source of income? What if we showed the world what these Bulgarian women can do and the world fell in love with their knitting?

We bought some local yarn and started experimenting with making laptop sleeves in various colours and patterns. The results were stylish laptop sleeves that all our friends liked so much that they wanted to buy them right away. That’s why we’re here on IndieGoGo to get the support we need to start this project for real.

What we’ve done so far

We want to see this initiative grow and our products to become popular enough to support more knitters and their families. That is why we decided that the most important starting point is having amazing and remarkable products. For that purpose, we:

  1. Took great care in developing the designs and models of our products. We explored different materials, sizes, models and designs for our laptop sleeves and socks to ensure that they deliver 100% snugness, warmth and protection and turn them into eye candy.
  2. Worked with the most experienced knitters to produce samples that we and our friends are now using constantly. So far they are doing wonderfully and we completely believe in them!
  3. Launched our website. We used our limited financial resources to purchase hosting and a domain and are developing its awesome design at the moment.
  4. Started reaching out to women who could use our support and are quickly building a network of wonderful devoted knitters. It’s been really motivational to listen to their dreams of what they will be able to do when “the business picks up”.

Why we need YOUR help

Unfortunately, we don’t have any spare money left to invest in this undertaking since we are recent college graduates with no savings. Our families have already contributed enough to get us started, but we need your help to continue building it.

What we can invest is our time and effort and that is what we are doing. We have quit pursuing other jobs in big corporations and have focused entirely on this project. We care about our Bulgaria too much and would rather be involved with something that has a meaning and could contribute to its development and the well-being of its citizens.

Finally, we want to make sure that we can provide sufficient employment opportunities and fair compensation to our knitters.

For what EXACTLY is your money going to be used

  1. Accumulate stock for the full-fledged launch of the online store
    • fair compensation for our knitters ~ $1000 (we can’t afford to NOT be able to reward their effort)
    • materials (such as yarn, buttons, packaging) ~ $1000
    • other logistic costs ~ $200 (shipping yarn and finished products between yarn suppliers, knitters and our customers)
  2. Finalize our website: add-ons for shopping cart and payment processing ~ $200
  3. Introduce our products to the world
    • attend craft markets/fairs ~ $500
    • reach out to the right audience through online advertising ~ $300
  4. Build a self-sufficient business that will last
    • register as a legitimate business ~ $100 (it’s essential to support the development of Bulgarian economy as a whole and to give a good example to other young entrepreneurs)
    • design & print info materials, cards, etc ~ $150

Finally, money isn’t everything - some other ways you can help us

  1. Design our website, logo, flyers, or email template? Help us create some visuals that correspond to the awesomeness of our venture
  2. Share your enthusiasm - if you think our idea is good, tell your friends!! Facebook, twitter, blog, chat, speak, sing, write... whatever your thing is :) Tell the world that we exist!
  3. Get otherwise involved - maybe you have another idea of how you can help us? Let us know!

story:
The indiegogo campaign has already finished!

If you want to get the last version of AutoTileGen you can do it at www.autotilegen.com

Are you an indie game developer and/or sprite artist? Do you hate tedious and repetitive art work? Worry no more!

AutoTileGen is a small utility that takes a few images and builds a complete terrain tileset for you in a matter of (mili)seconds!

What you get

AutoTileGen Free features:

  • Windows client + Mac client + Linux client
  • Tileset automagic generation (48 tiles) from 2 base textures
  • Custom side/bottom sprites
  • Alpha blending
  • Automatic corner masks (smooth circle, chisel...)
  • Export as PNG tileset & share to ATG gallery
  • 6 different corner blend modes: lightness, caps/sides overlap, random dither and checkboard dither and diagonal cut.
  • Publish + share to ATG gallery on save
  • Access to AutoTileGen.com Free tileset gallery

AutoTileGen Pro features:

  • All the basic and free features
  • Export as separate PNG tiles
  • Optional share-to-AutoTileGen.com on save
  • In app pixel-by-pixel editor
  • Normal map generation (dynamic lighting)
  • Access to AutoTileGen.com Pro tileset gallery
  • [Indiegogo only] Steam key
  • [Indiegogo only] AutoTileSet plugin
  • [Indiegogo only] Pixel Perfect plugin for all your pixel-art needs (Unity Free/Pro)

Stretch features (one per each +$250 above the goal):

  • Slope tiles generation ✓ REACHED
  • Reorder tileset output ✓ REACHED
  • Tileset randomization (AutoTileSet) ✓ REACHED
  • External rounded corners (AutoTileSet) ✓ REACHED
  • Tileset transitions plugin (AutoTileSet) ✓ REACHED
  • Outline generation (AutoTileSet) ✓ REACHED
  • AutoTileSet port to Construct and GameMaker ✓ REACHED
  • Asymetric caps/sides support ✓ REACHED

Get involved!

Help AutoTileGen get published in Steam by voting in the Steam greenlight page.

See the current development status or suggest new features at the Trello board.

Tweet around with the #AutoTileGen hashtag for aditional kudos.

Spread the word!

story:
An online photo auction and gallery for smartphone photography, offering users exposure and revenue for their images.

  AN INTRODUCTION

  The idea is simple: make money with your SmartPhone photography!

  Millions of photos are uploaded to the internet every day through sites and apps like Pinterest and Instagram. Excellent photography can now be fun and easy: and if you’re good at it, why restrict your work to your friends and family? The SmartPhone Photography MarketPlace and Gallery and accompanying app, PhotoScramble, are designed to meet two main goals:

  •  to generate revenue for camera-phone photographers

  •  and to give their work worldwide exposure: 24/7.

The marketplace will also place emphasis on viewer/creator interaction,including subscription tools and other ways to communicate.

 

  So, how does it work?

At its core, the SmartPhone Photography MarketPlace and Gallery is just that: a gallery of images uploaded from different users all over the world. Photographers will be able to put up their work on a live auction, used by consumers of photos and art. Artists looking for stock photography, advertising agencies, and individuals looking for original artwork to own are among the types of people who will most likely be bidding on your photos.

The person who bids the highest (or pays the Buy It Now price) will receive the photograph in print and be given the rights to use it.

Examples:

Instead of a lemonade stand,a girl who owns a smartphone and enjoys taking snapshots of animals around her town wants to learn about e commerce and sell her photos for extra cash to donate to the SPCA

a Business traveler has accumulated great travel and vacation images that he would like to get published and see his name in print (credit line) to show his kids that he is an  accomplished photographer

a Student with a camera-phone has an idea for an educational project that he would like to receive "feedback" and communication.

In addition to photo auctions, the Gallery and Auction also offers ad revenue to its users--so even if you’re not selling the rights to your image, you’re still earning money.

Informative You Tube Video:http://youtu.be/ZSXzWwNpVg8

  A VALUABLE AND EASY-TO-USE PHOTO APP: PhotoScramble

  PhotoScramble is designed to be easy, intuitive, and directly interfaced to the Picture Gallery. With your help, we can create a thriving worldwide marketplace for amateur photographers, providing a service much-needed in today’s visually competitive world.

  The PhotoScramble app will retail for approximately $4.95 - $9.95 USD. After purchasing and downloading the app, users will have access to editing tools (similar to Instagram) and a direct upload to the online Photo Gallery. When uploading images, users will be able to add titles, descriptions, and their social media information--allowing for the growth of a global community. The users will be able to put up their work for auction, or simply have it up for display and collect ad revenue.

  App.net confirmed there is nothing like it and it is needed in the app market: a way for users to edit, add special effects to, upload, and monetize their photos. There is a clear need for PhotoScramble in the industry, and with the correct funding, it is certain to take off.

  For a quick example, take a girl who owns a smartphone and enjoys taking snapshots of animals around her town. Once she purchases and downloads the PhotoScramble app, she will be able to use it to edit her photos to perfection. PhotoScramble will then let her upload her images to the Picture Gallery. She will choose whether she would like to retain the rights and simply collect ad revenue, or put up the photo for auction and see who is interested in buying it from her. It’s easy, intuitive, and will earn her money.

  WHO ARE WE?

 The SmartPhone Photography MarketPlace and Gallery and PhotoScramble APP are brought to you by the Art Marketing Agency (http://www.visualartsmarketing.com), a pioneer of online art and photo galleries since 2009. The Agency represents top artists and photographers around the world in online galleries to get their work seen by millions.

  Lead by president Tuck Tucker, himself an acknowledged curator, photography and art marketing expert, the people behind this campaign have enough experience under their belts to ensure its successful development. The only thing left to consider is the funds to get this project going--and that is where you come in.

An Agency working- prototype of our Auction Gallery is: www.NewModernMastersAuctions.com

  HOW YOU CAN HELP

  If an app and marketplace where you can earn money (and HELP others do the same thing) using SmartPhone photography sounds good to you, we encourage you to consider pledging any amount. Developing an app and marketplace to be easily accessible to the public is no easy task. There are many steps along the road, but with the experience of producer Art Marketing Agency, a step-by-step plan has been laid out for the allocation of funds.

Funds will be used to support these three goals:

 Goal #1: Advertising and Branding

  In order to make this project a global platform, we will need to advertise on search engines and in photography print magazines.

Our targets include the following: Bing, Google Adwords, StumbleUpon, Mashable , Yahoo Search Marketing, Tumblr, Twitter Ads, Delicious,  Modern Photography, and Popular Photography.

Goal #2: Search Engine Optimization

  An essential part of promotion is search engine optimization--making sure that users and potential users will be able to find the Gallery easily. This step includes:

     

  • Search Engine Marketing (SEO)

  • Promotions with Google, Yahoo, Bing

  The expertise of the Art Marketing Agency is also essential for this step of the process.

  Goal #3: Website Design and Maintenance

  This includes the actual development and maintenance of the website and app. These things take some time to set up and all software will be made as user-friendly as possible, which requires plenty of beta testing, redesigning, and maintenance.

REWARDS AND INCENTIVES

  Any amount, no matter how small, is appreciated and goes toward the development of this marketplace. However, pledging an amount equal to or greater than $25 nets you unique rewards with the SmartPhone Picture Gallery system as soon as it is up and running. Be among the first to upload your images--at no additional cost to your pledge--to our Picture Gallery and begin to earn money with them. You will also receive a 11 x 14 custom photo print of your choice from the auction.

The greater your pledge, the larger the amount (and sizes) of images you will be able to upload for free, as outlined to the right.

Depending on the amount pledged, you will also be able to choose photo print(s) of greater size and quality.

  For businesses, we offer the opportunity to exhibit business images and advertisements (such as logos, product imagery, or promotional materials) on our soon-to-be global platform. Pledging an amount equal to or over $250 will net you this benefit, allowing your business worldwide PR and advertising benefits-24/7.

  Large pledges are considered priority investments and will ensure your inclusion in the development of this marketplace innovation, as well as the aforementioned incentives. You will also receive investment details and business development opportunities regarding our POD (Print On Demand) service.

POD is what we use to print (and deliver by mail) images for the photographers to viewers for a 40 % commission--essentially, you will have a chance to earn royalties along with us.

Even if you cannot pledge an amount at this time, we encourage you to spread the word--share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and anywhere else you feel inclined. The SmartPhone Photography MarketPlace and Gallery is an innovative, much-needed feature of smartphone photography platform and an excellent source of income and exposure for camera-phone photographers and our Supporters.

Be part of the BIG Picture- help us to benefit millions
