story:
Only two days to presell our K Kit - and two days for YOU to help us... and help yourselves smarten up your home! 


Thanks to everyone who contributed to K Kit's campaign.Your interest and outreach has continued to amaze us. Please keep supporting us to unlock stretch goals: when we achieve $200k, all backers will get a cam for free! Learn more about our stretch goals at the bottom of this page.

        

Share us and every time your referral purchases a K Kit, you will get a reward.For more information, please refer to our new referral program down the page.

We are excited to be featured on BackerClub.co this week! They are the top community for people who love crowdfunding and back a ton of projects and we are really looking forward to the feedback and hope you like it too!


This is K Kit


K Kit is a small, customizable, modular smart home system that you can control from your smart phone. You will improve your family's quality of life with a smarter home.

For the first time, K Kit has integrated existing smart home features into an easily installed, unobtrusive and intuitive package. It includes basic convenience, security and efficiency features, one-touch preset “themes” as well as infinite potential for customization. You choose how much you want to geek out with K Kit.


Magic happens when the modules work together!


So long as the sensors and linked devices are in range of the hub, they can be networked to deliver you information remotely and control all the electronic features of your home. You can personalize your own unique triggers and custom settings based on your habits and devices.The possibilities are limitless！


The RF remote control will open the electronic curtain every morning for you. Imagine slowly illuminating your room with soft, natural sunlight at 7am instead of an obnoxious alarm clock.


You don't need to rush out of the door early in the morning anymore!  K Kit will turn off devices for energy conservation, open/shut the garage, activate the security system, and you are ready to go.


K Kit will instantly alert you to any unexpected visitors and activities, so you can monitor and secure your home from anywhere.

The temperature sensor detects the environment and triggers the IR remote control to turn on the A/C automatically.  Your home will be a comfortably balanced ecosystem.


Now you can command all of the devices in your home from one single app! You can control them when you are away, or let devices work at preset times. It's an All-In-One Remote Control In Your Pocket!

The motion-activated night light will be engaged in your favorite shade of pink or blue and light up your way when you wake up in the midnight.


Beautiful design for a beautiful home


We developed K Kit according to our customer-first philosophy. K Kit is designed to be a modular and flexible smart home system that seamlessly blends into anyone’s home(no matter if it is a  house or apartment) and lifestyle. Each piece of the K Kit exponentially increases the potential smart home functions, but without any sacrifice to the user-friendliness of the whole. We believe the beauty of the product is a natural byproduct of its simplicity and possibility.


How does each module work separately?



Design features




Product specifications



What you will get


1 K Kit =



Trial set

Apart from a complete set of K Kit, we also added some trial sets so you can start small and expand later. Home security set allows you to monitor and secure you home when you are away. Family entertainment set enables you to control stuff at fingertips!


Stretch goal unlocking!


If we successfully achieve certain amount, for all backers who claimed perks, we will send a smart device as a gift to you along with your K Kit!

The smart plug allows you to control any appliance in your phone that is plugged into a power outlet. Not only can you turn your coffee maker, lights or hair straightener on and off remotely, the smart plug allows you to:

  • Set a timer to turn off potentially dangerous devices and protect devices from overcharging.
  • Group appliances to activate “scenario management” where you turn on multiple devices to a predetermined setting with a single command.

The USB camera can be plugged into any USB outlet in your house and stream live video to your smartphone whenever or wherever you want to see it. If plugged into the hub directly, you can control it using the K Kit app and integrate video streaming into  pre-set themes.


New referral program


Share us and every time your referral purchases a K Kit, you will get a reward!

Tips: 

1. Your referral should purchase a perk ≥$199.

2.If $99 perk get a level up, then the backers will get a K Kit containing 1 hub, 1 induction light, 1 RF remote control, 1 IR remote control, 1 motion sensor, 1 open/shut sensor, 1 temperature&humidity sensor.

3. For new visitors, please ask your referral to leave your IGG account email and name in the “Address line 2” field when place an order.

How to participate in the referral program:

Log in to your Indiegogo account . Then, look below our main video at the top of this page for buttons “link”to generate and copy your unique URL. Start sharing via social media and email! For more instruction, please refer to our update section!


Development timeline


Our story


Two years ago we visited a smart home exhibition and fell in love with the experience of lounging on the couch, sipping coffee, while controlling the appliances and atmosphere of the home around us. We thought this experience could be achieved more simply, without remodeling, wiring or even wall mounts. 
A smartphone app would put all these smart home functions in your pocket for you to take with you everywhere. Intuitive software design would bring smart home convenience to the least tech-savvy consumers while still leaving open endless customization possibilities for tech geeks.

From that day we turned “a smart home for the people” from a dream into our every-day mission. 


We need you help!


Now, two years after our initial vision, after dozens of prototypes and countless software iterations, we have finalised the prototype and are finally ready to deliver the ultimate smart home experience to the world and now we need your help to finance the first production run.We want all of you on Indiegogo to be the first to use K Kit and having you on-board would just give us that last push to have K Kit out to you that much quicker. We can’t wait for you to see and try K Kit. We’re ready for production, we’re just waiting for you.

We’ll need more than just your financial contribution. Tell us what you think of the product design, features and function via email and social media and we’ll do our best to integrate your suggestions into the final product.


Our team


To achieve our vision of a smart home system for everyone, we assembled the best design, engineering and manufacturing talent in the world. We tasked ourselves with the unified goal of creating the smallest, most user-friendly smart home system in the world. 

Here are some of the key contributors to K Kit and their roles.

 

Special thanks to  !     


Manufacturing prowess


We developed K Kit in partnership with one of the largest and most sophisticated electronics manufacturers in the world. We are confident that with your support, K Kit will be in your hands less than 3 months from the completion of this campaign.


We’d love to hear from you.

●Questions about K Kit and business inquires?  liuyr@ikonke.com

●Press inquiries?  zhangh@ikonke.com



 

FAQ


1.Why can’t I buy modules separately?

The modules are manufactured and packaged to ship as a set in order to keep the development and production costs to a minimum.

2. Which plug types does K Kit support?

K Kit currently comes with plug types for US and mainland China.

3. Do you have a mobile app? Is it free?

Yes. We have iOS and Android apps so that you can monitor and control your home remotely. They are  free.

4. What does K Kit think about Privacy?

We know that privacy must be taken incredibly seriously when it concerns your home. Our policy is that your data belongs to you and should only be used to make your life better. Our server is in US and we meet all US laws and requirements for data safety and security. We will not share your data with anyone for any purpose.

5. Is my data secure?

We use 256-bit AES encryption for every communication, both the communications between devices inside of your home as well as those between your home and the cloud. We also have firewall to protect the server.

6. Will there be additional tax charges?

If you are outside China, there might be custom tariff. Please note that you are solely responsible for any taxes, duties, fees and/or surcharges that your country may impose on the ordered products.

7. When will you ship?

We are working with one of the largest and most sophisticated electronics manufacturers in the world. We are confident that your K Kits will get to you within 3 months after the completion of the campaign. 

8. Do you have a warranty?

Yes, we have a 12 month warranty that covers any manufacturing defects. If you ever have a problem with any part of your K Kit, just contact us and we'll do our best to make it right.

Read more FAQs.
story_txt:
Only two days to presell our K Kit - and two days for YOU to help us... and help yourselves smarten up your home! 


Thanks to everyone who contributed to K Kit's campaign.Your interest and outreach has continued to amaze us. Please keep supporting us to unlock stretch goals: when we achieve $200k, all backers will get a cam for free! Learn more about our stretch goals at the bottom of this page.

        
Share us and every time your referral purchases a K Kit, you will get a reward.For more information, please refer to our new referral program down the page.


We are excited to be featured on BackerClub.co this week! They are the top community for people who love crowdfunding and back a ton of projects and we are really looking forward to the feedback and hope you like it too!



This is K Kit
K Kit is a small, customizable, modular smart home system that you can control from your smart phone. You will improve your family's quality of life with a smarter home.For the first time, K Kit has integrated existing smart home features into an easily installed, unobtrusive and intuitive package. It includes basic convenience, security and efficiency features, one-touch preset “themes” as well as infinite potential for customization. You choose how much you want to geek out with K Kit.





Magic happens when the modules work together!






So long as the sensors and linked devices are in range of the hub, they can be networked to deliver you information remotely and control all the electronic features of your home. You can personalize your own unique triggers and custom settings based on your habits and devices.The possibilities are limitless！



The RF remote control will open the electronic curtain every morning for you. Imagine slowly illuminating your room with soft, natural sunlight at 7am instead of an obnoxious alarm clock.




You don't need to rush out of the door early in the morning anymore!  K Kit will turn off devices for energy conservation, open/shut the garage, activate the security system, and you are ready to go.




K Kit will instantly alert you to any unexpected visitors and activities, so you can monitor and secure your home from anywhere.



The temperature sensor detects the environment and triggers the IR remote control to turn on the A/C automatically.  Your home will be a comfortably balanced ecosystem.


Now you can command all of the devices in your home from one single app! You can control them when you are away, or let devices work at preset times. It's an All-In-One Remote Control In Your Pocket!




The motion-activated night light will be engaged in your favorite shade of pink or blue and light up your way when you wake up in the midnight.



Beautiful design for a beautiful home



We developed K Kit according to our customer-first philosophy. K Kit is designed to be a modular and flexible smart home system that seamlessly blends into anyone’s home(no matter if it is a  house or apartment) and lifestyle. Each piece of the K Kit exponentially increases the potential smart home functions, but without any sacrifice to the user-friendliness of the whole. We believe the beauty of the product is a natural byproduct of its simplicity and possibility.


How does each module work separately?




Design features












Product specifications






What you will get


1 K Kit =





Trial set



Apart from a complete set of K Kit, we also added some trial sets so you can start small and expand later. Home security set allows you to monitor and secure you home when you are away. Family entertainment set enables you to control stuff at fingertips!

Stretch goal unlocking!




If we successfully achieve certain amount, for all backers who claimed perks, we will send a smart device as a gift to you along with your K Kit!


The smart plug allows you to control any appliance in your phone that is plugged into a power outlet. Not only can you turn your coffee maker, lights or hair straightener on and off remotely, the smart plug allows you to:



Set a timer to turn off potentially dangerous devices and protect devices from overcharging.


Group appliances to activate “scenario management” where you turn on multiple devices to a predetermined setting with a single command.





The USB camera can be plugged into any USB outlet in your house and stream live video to your smartphone whenever or wherever you want to see it. If plugged into the hub directly, you can control it using the K Kit app and integrate video streaming into  pre-set themes.

story:
eHow Tech editor and CNET contributor features JmGO View
in the latest Geek vs Geek video (watch from 2:38)

The portability of JmGO View unlocks possibilities that will 
change the way you watch the things you love. 

Thank you for helping us reach our goal so quickly! We've introduced Stretch Goals which some of YOU have mentioned that you'd like to see. Please help us reach our goals by sharing this campaign with friends and family, so that these Stretch Goals can be unlocked for everyone.





Actual photo taken indoors with ambient lighting:

Taking the fun outside:

Check out our Gallery for more photos and videos!




Here's a sneak peek of our product at CES this January. That was our first prototype version, and we're constantly improving it based on all of the fantastic feedback we're getting from you!


In simple terms, JmGO View is a smart portable projector. But it's a lot more than that. 

Intricately designed with a gorgeous full metal-casing, this DLP projector offers advanced 3D technology, a powerful Android OS, with both Android & iOS compatibility, industry-leading Texas Instruments optical technology, topped with cinema quality projection and sound. With its built-in battery, it is a portable entertainment portal that you can take with you anywhere.





Connect your USB drive or access Dropbox online to share your work with the people who matter. At only 1KG, you can take JmGO View with you anywhere, without the hassle of wires.




Project onto any white flat surface and watch your favourite movies in widescreen HD. Put on the JmGO Active 3D Glasses for an even more immersive experience.

Experience advanced surround sound audio with the built-in Dolby Digital Plus speakers to get cinema-style audio at home. You can even use JmGO View as just a Bluetooth Speaker.


Control with Apple or Android to view your favourite shows.



Use it to play the latest video games on a cinema-size screen. Now you can invite your friends over to play.

We built JmGO View to be smart. Plug n' play set up, one button on/off, built-in battery, easy smartphone control, WIFI/Bluetooth friendly. 


With HDMI, you can connect to your laptop, PC or even your TV for seamless video transmission. The USB port allows you to access your documents in your memory stick conveniently. With Miracast, you can wirelessly mirror what's showing on your Android device. Happycast (similar idea to Airplay) is also available for iOS users.

 

JmGO View is a LED projector, so it is more energy-efficient and requires less lumens than a traditional light to produce the same effect. With 30,000 hours life span  - that's 10 years even if you use it for 8 hours per day! No lamp replacement is required and it's eco-friendly. At 250 lumens, the light is more than enough to produce a vivid and clear picture even when there is some light in the room. We recommend a distance of 2.5 - 3.5M, with projection size 80-100" for the best effect.



JmGO View supports dual-band WiFi (2.4G/5G), which means whether you're streaming a 3D movie or game that requires extra bandwidth, you can expect faster and a more stable performance with the View.





Wrap your JmGO View in the safety of this leather Travel Case. Made of top quality ABS + PU leather with a soft microfibre sleeve, this travel case gives you a rigid and tough base to protect the lens from any scratches or bumps. It's also water, stain and abrasion-resistant to fully protect your JmGO View from every side. When not in use, you can collapse and fold it away.
See more photos in our Gallery.



Interested in Distributing?

We've received interest from distributors all around the world and we are happy to discuss with you. Please drop us a message at: contact@jmgo.com

Product Warranty

We are confident in our products. However, in the unlikely circumstance where a JmGO View has a glitch, every unit comes with a 1 year warranty.

Please note that the final specifications can change, due to refinements made to improve the device.

How does JmGO View compare with similar projectors?









Our mission is to create Smart Home Theaters that are powerful, but small and beautiful. And so we built the G1 Smart Home Theater in 2014 - and boy, was it a success. Then we thought, what if we built something that is like the G1 in capability, but is also portable? This year we are introducing JmGO View - our newest, smartest and most beautiful Smart Portable Projector yet. 

We can't wait for you to receive one, turn it on, and be amazed. We hope you will love it as much as we do. 

We need your support and we're not just saying it. We've spent countless nights developing and designing JmGO View, but it cannot become a reality without your support. For us to be able to further develop this product, build the international firmware, and mass produce, we will need funding. More importantly, we want this product to reach everyone. From education to quality family time, to backpackers on an adventure, we want the JmGO View to be part of your journey. If you think our product will benefit someone that you know, please help us to spread the message.


We want to ensure that whatever we send to our supporters is flawless and timely. But lets be honest, despite our experience, there are various risks to this project. Our suppliers could let us down. If we're lucky, we might get excess demand for this product, meaning it will take our factories longer to produce them all. Our software may need more time than expected for us to debug and fix. However, whatever challenges we meet, we will definitely keep you posted so you're not left hanging.



BASICS & FEATURES

So what is JmGO View?

JmGO View is a smart portable projector with a beautiful design and advanced OS. It is ideal for watching movies, presentations, gaming, and many more uses! It comes with a built-in powerful surround sound speaker, 16GB internal storage and Android 4.4.4 OS. What's more? View offers 1280x720 pixel resolution and supports 3D movies.


What is the difference between JmGO View and other projectors?

These are a few things which make JmGO View unique in the market:
1. Its shape and weight is similar to a water bottle, so you can carry it around easily.
2. Most projectors are made of plastic. The View however, has a beautiful aluminium alloy casing that is both gorgeous to look at and sturdy to hold.
3. Its an all-in-one projector solution. A powerful surround speaker, 15,600mAH built-in battery,  and internal storage is included, so you can watch movies anywhere without attaching additional devices.
4. Unlike other projectors, the projection angle and fous can be adjusted very easily with the remote control or the app.
5. View can connect to Smartphones (both iOS or Android) wirelessly or Game Consoles (Playstation, XBox, Wii) by HDMI port.
6. It's REALLY cool.


How can I watch 3D movies on JmGO View?

You can watch 3D movies with JmGO View by:
1. Put on a pair of JmGO active shutter 3D glasses (this is available as a perk) and a JmGO View
2. Enable the 3D mode through the Settings page.
3. Play your 3D movie and enjoy! 


What devices can JmGO View connect to?

You can connect JmGO View with:
1. PC, laptop, monitor, game console and more with HDMI port
2. USB Drive, portable hard disk, keyboard and mouse with USB port
3. Smartphones by Miracast (for Android), or HappyCast (for iOS)


What is the optimized distance for projection?

Projection distance is directly proportional to projected size. Here are the projected size and the projection distance needed:
For 1-1.2m distance, you can get projected size of 40 inches.
For 2.1-2.4m distance, you can get projected size of 80 inches.
For 2.6-3m distance, you can get projected size of 100 inches.
For 3.9-4.5m distance, you can get projected size of 150 inches.
For 4.8-5.5m distance, you can get projected size of 180 inches.


What mobile OS and game consoles are compatible with the JmGo View?

Android and iOS smartphones and game consoles with HDMI output are compatible.

Can JmGo View support 1080 HD?

Yes the JmGO View supports 1080 HD playback.

Can I adjust the focal distance?

Yes, you can use the remote control or our iOS or Android App to set the focal distance using our electromotion focusing technology.

Can I use the JmGO View as a bluetooth speaker?

Yes, you can use the power button to switch to bluetooth speaker mode.


Is the JmGO View compatible with both Android and iOS devices?

Yes, JmGo View is compatible with both Android and iOS devices.

What is the difference between JmGO's 3D glasses and those you can get from the cinema?

JmGO's Active Shutter 3D glasses has a special signal receiver and a built-in jam-proof communication module, to ensure that when you use it, you have a smooth and seamless viewing experience. You can expect bright and clear 3D images with JmGO's 3D glasses.


SHIPPING

Who pays for the customs duties and VAT tax?

Customs duties and VAT tax varies by countries. If you incur a customs/VAT tax, your local custom will send you a notice. You can simply go to their carrier or post office to pay the tax before the product is released.


Where can JmGO ship to?

We ship JmGO View to United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Austria, Bulgaria, India, Mexico, Macao, Liechtenstein, Andorra, Netherlands, Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, United Kingdom, Spain, South Korea, Vietnam, China and Hong Kong. If you don't see your shipping country here, please let us know, we can arrange it for you.


Is there a warranty?

Yes the JmGO View comes with a one year warranty.


When is the prospective delivery date for JmGO View?

If everything goes according to plan, the prospective delivery date for JmGO View is May 2016.


CONTACT

How do I get in touch with your team?

If you are unable to find your answer in the FAQ, please contact us at contact@jmgo.com

  jam-proof communication module, to ensure that when you use it, you have a
  smooth and seamless viewing experience. You can expect bright and clear 3D
  images with JmGO's 3D glasses.

SHIPPING

Who pays
  for the customs duties and VAT tax?
Customs duties and
  VAT tax varies by countries. If you incur a customs/VAT tax, your local
  custom will send you a notice. You can simply go to their carrier or post
  office to pay the tax before the product is released.

Where
  can JmGO ship to?
We ship JmGO View
  to United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Austria, Bulgaria, India,
  Mexico, Macao, Liechtenstein, Andorra, Netherlands, Belgium, France, Germany,
  Italy, United Kingdom, Spain, South Korea, Vietnam, China and Hong Kong. If you don't see your shipping country here, please let us know, we can arrange it for you.

Is there
  a warranty?
Yes the JmGO View
  comes with a one year warranty.

When is
  the prospective delivery date for JmGO View?
If everything goes
  according to plan, the prospective delivery date for JmGO View is May 2016.


CONTACT

How do I
  get in touch with your team?
If you are unable to find your answer in the FAQ, please contact us at contact@jmgo.com

story:
Copy and Share our short link->> http://igg.me/at/iphone6umii

Update:

$70 Contribute will receive Umii iUpgrade 64GB Version. 55% off retail($150)

$150 Contribute will receive Umii iUpgrade 128GB Version 50% off retail($300)

Contributer who supported us in the past. All 16GB will be converted to 64GB, and any 128GB from (A3) will be giving a bonus 64GB Mirco SD Card

Feature Media

    

                 

             

             

          


Solving iPhone 6's Storage Problems w/o Sacrificing the Slim, Elegant Design 

Have you ever had to delete photos or videos because you needed more storage?

Ever worry about if you have enough storage when taking a videos?

Did you ever have to delete files just to update the new Apple iOS on your iPhone? 

Ever wish you selected a larger iPhone 6 size from the get-go?

If you said "YES" to any of the questions above then the Umii iUpgrade drive case will solve your problems!  

What is the Umii iUpgrade 

When you're on the go - camping, traveling, sporting events, or festivals - there are times you have tried to take great photos and videos to share with your friends. But what happens when you're out of space and don't have access to the cloud for back up storage? What if you want to keep your data local to avoid hitting bandwidth limitations (meaning extra cost) and privacy reasons?

 This is where the Umii iUpgrade case comes in to save the day. The Umii iUpgrade will give your iPhone a secondary storage drive from 16GB up to 200GB without carrying something extra. 

The iUpgrade also comes with an app that you can use to stream movies/photos from your phone to Apple TV or even Google's Chromecast, 

The iUpgrade is not just a slim bumper case with additional storage; it also acts as a signal booster offering 15-20% increased reception, meaning you never have to worry about dropped calls again.

With the UmiiSoft app you can instantly back up your files even when you don't have internet access to your cloud back-up systems or iTunes. The app also allows you to quickly copy files when your device's memory storage reaches max capacity with 1 click of a button.

Our prototype unit is using certified an Apple lightning connector, but we are applying to be MFI approved. Our goal and wish is to have our product approved by Apple and be sold in their retail spaces.

Introducing the World’s Slimmest Drive Case for iPhone 6 with “Max 328GB drive(128GB+200GB)” – the Umii iUpgrade Case w/ App

Break the storage limit and increase your iPhone storage for unprecedented media control


Umii iUpgrade Bumper Case Design

The Umii Story

At Umii we LOVE creating useful mobile gadgets that solves problems each and every day. We live and breathe innovation - it's in our DNA. 

Umii was inspired by the idea of connecting technology and people. Our company has been in business since 2013, selling accessories in Verizon Stores (WirelessZone). In May 2015 we completed our first exclusive slim line casedrive - the Project iUpgrade - over 13 months specifically for the iPhone 6 due to demand from the phone community and multiple reviewer feedback. Upon creating iUpgrade we knew that we had something special on our hands, something we must share with the world.

We wanted our product to drive home a simple point to users:
Never be forced to delete any of your content due to storage limitations.

How Everything Works - Feature Breakdown 

•  Upgrade your iPhone 6 optional storage 16GB, 64GB, 128GB, 200GB 

•  Power in your palm: Umii Soft app makes it simple with 1-Click transfer and video streaming options (like ChromeCast)

•  Slick high-quality aluminum casing with drop protection for added durability

•  Includes 15-20% Signal Booster for better mobile and wireless connectivity

•  2-way Functionality - use the Umii iUpgrade case as a portable USB storage device with and with out itune

•   "Hacker Free" Protect your Personal private photos/videos from prying eyes

•  Works with PCs & Macs : Converts the Lightning connector to micro-USB port for even higher compatibility without loss of speed or data transfer

•  Improved speaker design for richer sound

•  Works for iPhone 6 (regular) and upcoming iPhone 6S designs

•  Designed to be useable for Qi wireless charging units

•  BONUS: Includes two slim credit card power banks (2000mAh each) for a total 15-20 hours more battery life on-the-go 

We now need your support for mass production and today we are happy to announce if you help support to reach our goal, we will offer you not only the drive, but other additional perks to truly make you a part of our team. Umii means we can do Technology Together.


Details Matter

We designed the Umii drive case so that any of your audio devices work flawlessely without the need for adapters or extra cables. Just plug and play your favorite auxiliary devices for full-bodied sound and recording capabilities.

What We Offer

The iPhone was designed to be slim and elegant - let's keep it that way!

Side by side comparison of the phone with and without the case. The iUpgrade maintains the slim exterior design of the iPhone while providing many benefits.

Slim Design

Avoid bulky cases and keep your phone secure in any style of clothing - from jeans to business wear.

Designed for the Worry-less Traveler

No matter where you are traveling - by plane, train, or automobile - the iUpgrade case also includes 2 additional credit card sized power banks for a total of 16-20 hours of use for your iPhone. Utilize the iUpgrade's storage space to watch HD movies or play the latest games to keep you entertained for hours on end.

Important Files? Always Have Them Available!


Perfect for students or business users, the iUpgrade case comes with a charge-and-sync adapter key. Forget bringing a cable that could potentially fray or break.
The Umii iUpgrade Case can also function as a USB storage device and includes support for Micro SD cards to upgrade your device to the latest storage space available. Only with the Umii iUpgrade Case can you obtain 200+128GB storage!
2-way Functionality - use the Umii iUpgrade case as a portable USB storage device with and with out itune
While the cloud is always a great way to back-up your files, the speed and accessibility of remote storage allows users to control content within seconds. The Umii iUpgrade aims to fulfill that need for users who may not have access to high-speed internet at all times - including on planes or in rural areas.


UmiiSoft Keeps You Up-To-Date 

Simplify your life with the UmiiSoft mobile application which includes 1-click transfers. Don't want to have to pick what videos or photos to delete? Your selected storage model gives you the freedom and flexibilityto keep it all and avoid slowing down your phone.


UmiiSoft App - ChromeCast Support

UmiiSoft also includes ChromeCast streaming for all supported audio/photo/video formats to make your iPhone a multimedia device that goes where you go.
HD Video Recording

Did you know HD video record takes about 1GB of space for 5 minutes of footage?
With the Umii iUpgrade Case, record all of your moments in HD and don't miss a single detail - your son's football game, your favorite concert, sporting event, or even a party. 
This isn't just a great personal use, but can even be useful for business professionals looking to record conferences, training sessions, and trade shows.
An Image Is Still Worth A Thousand Words

The iPhone supports poster size HD photos, so you can cherish those moments and keep them forever. However, as resolution sizes increase, so does the size of the images. The iUpgrade case alleviates those worries and allows you to keep all your photos in HD - whether you're an amateur or pro.
What We Need & What You Get Perks
A majority of the iUpgrade investment has been completed on our end. We need your support for the mass production and to get ahead of the curve and help us continue our dream of being technology innovators.

Select your model based on your size.

Example: If you have a 16GB phone and you want to get to get the Umii iUpgrade 200GB model, your maximum total storage will be 216GB!

We have multiple packages to provide as benefits to you:
  • Family Pack (Pair) - Get an iUpgrade case for you and a loved one for a discounted price.
  • Super Early Bird Special - Get access to special pricing for first 900 units

Where and When Will the Umii iUpgrade Case Ship?

•  The Umii iUpgrade Case will see the first shipment arriving in  August 2015

•  The Umii iUpgrade Case is designed and assembled in the United States

•  The Umii iUpgrade Case will be shipped from Los Angeles, California

You will be receiving the iUpgrade case at least 6 months before any retail store will be able to get their hands on it!

Bonus IndieGogo Upgrade Package

As a testament to our passion for innovation and sharing our unique technology, Umii will also offer future upgradability for new and existing customers.

When you purchase a Umii iUpgrade Case through this indiegogo campaign, you will be added to a unique buyer list that will have access to upgrade your case to ANY new iteration in the future for a simple $50 exchange fee and the original case. We'll cover shipping both ways.


What this means – Here’s an example:

You buy a Umii iUpgrade case from this indiegogo page for the iPhone 6 and we later launch an iPad, iPhone 6 Plus, or even an iPhone 7 model - you only have to pay $50 and send in your existing case. You keep your Micro SD card and all of your content. We'll then ship you a new case which you can plug your card back in and enjoy content without restrictions.

This upgrade offer provides a lifetime of upgradability for any Apple iPhone or iPad models. This is just our way of saying thank you for your support and helping us achieve our dream.

The Impact 

70 Million Users - How Many Want More Storage?

With over 70 million iPhone 6’s available worldwide, 2/5 of smartphone users in the USA and 3/7 of smartphone users in UK are using the iPhone as their go-to connectivity platform.We see the majority of these users are also experiencing storage limitations as 4K video and HD images begin to grow in availability. Why not be able to maximize the latest in your camera hardware and never worry about remote storage?

Most first time iPhone buyers end up with the 16GB model and regret not obtaining more space. The iUpgrade Case removes those restrictions and lets you take control back of your phone's hardware.

Genuine Slim Design

We designed the Umii iUpgrade Case for the mobile gamer, the budding filmmaker, or even users who just prefer to have their files on their phone rather than on the cloud. Our focus on quality and innovation is what helped drive the slim-line development and now we are ready to share our passion with you. As the world continues to stay in touch through connected devices, we also understand the need for a non-bulky unit to ensure total comfort and maintain the unique aesthetics of the iPhone that we have all known and grown to appreciate.

The Umii iUpgrade Case utilizes a highly durable aluminum exterior to protect your iPhone 6 from drops and includes an Apple certified lightning chip, meaning you never have to worry about future iOS updates having issues with the storage functionality. This same chip converts the case to a more accessible micro-USB connection for easier use and allows for access with Qi wireless chargers. This ensures that our users will have a worry-free experience with all the accessibility at their fingertips. On top of the durability, the casing has the ability to protect the protruding iPhone camera lens by an additional 2mm when placed on flat surfaces.

The Umii iUpgrade Case even amplifies sound quality – bringing full, clean sound to your media. Prefer to watch it in your living room? The added support for Apple Play and ChromeCast means your iPhone 6 is the ultimate portable multimedia device and utilizes the most popular ways to broadcast.

Take Control of Your Phone

The Good & Bad News for iPhone users

As the application technology of the ever-popular iPhone increases, so does the requirement of storage. Recent announcements include that applications are increasing in size from 2GB to 4GB – ¼ of the storage space for the most sold iPhone 6 model.  Mobile gaming (the fastest growing platform) will see tremendous benefits from added storage space with high-res graphics to support the Retina HD screen resolutions.

Even if you’re not a gamer, the latest iOS 8 release also clocked in at around 1/5th of space. Why worry about deleting files to update your phone for the latest features?

Future film makers utilizing the hi-res 8MP HD camera on the iPhone 6 allows remote storage of slow-motion videos without worry of limitation. The Umii iUpgrade case design allows you to avoid having to slowly upload large hi-res videos to the cloud and clear up storage space for those long filming sessions.

Patented Signal Booster and Wireless Charging

The Umii iUpgrade case was designed to expand the limitations of your iPhone and includes a patented chip to expand your phone and Wi-Fi signal for cleaner signals when transferring files to and from the phone.

Add-On (QI Charger Pad with adapter)

Also included is the Qi charging capability so that as wireless power technology develops, you are up-to-speed with the latest offerings. Simply place your phone within range of any Qi-enabled charger and your Umii iUpgrade case will restore your iPhone’s battery easily and efficiently.

Risks & Challenges

As a truly innovative hardware and software company, we understand the needs of all types of individuals - including those who are busy (like us!) and want to have content at their fingertips whenever they need. With the ability to watch and play at our leisure, the Umii iUpgrade case removes the limitations of storage and opens up your mobile life for all possibilities. Come help us drive innovation and introduce a new era of content creation for developers and mobile video entertainment.

Many crowdsourced projects begin asking for support without fully realizing the ability to make it a real product. We take that worry out of the equation. 

We already have a working product, but just need the support for mass production. Check out some photos of the product and also our 3D design model.

Real, Unedited Product Photo


We offer full transparency. by providing insight into the risks and obstacles we may face on the way to achieving our goal.

As we are commited to meeting all deadlines, we believe our factory will begin production by the end of June and we will be shipping out all our product by mid Aug 2015.  

Each supporter will also receive the contact information of our CEO, Tony Nguyen, who will personally attend to any questions or issues that may arise. We want to not only provide the best product, but also back it up with our service guarantee.

Our Timeline:

May 3: Indiegogo start

Middle June: Follow up with factory to prepare every unit for production,

End of June: Production starts,

Middle of Aug: We will start to ship out all Perks 

Even after we ship out all ours perks, we won't just stop there. We are constantly trying to impove ways to increasee our Umii iUpgrade drive with apps and support for new technologies like wireless charging capabilities, 

For example, our plan for version 2 will have the umii iUpgrade case offer direct phone to phone transfer with out network or cable needed, This will be great if you're out with your friends and family and want to share a large video content but don't have a data connection. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute due to monetary constraints (or if you're an Android user), please help us spread the word. We are a small group of technology enthusiasts that want to continue developing products that will push the boundaries of content creation through our mobile devices. 

We have many ideas to develop as solutions, so your help will only inspire us to push forward with our dreams and goals to be a leading mobile hardware and software developer.

Thank you!

ttoan@umiidesign.com

http://www.umiidesign.com

story:
Why are people funding the iJUMP?

Contributors will assist in bringing the iJUMP to market and help a cause. For every iJUMP purchased, Social Coast Technologies, the inventors of the iJUMP will help homeless youths by donating 10% of profits to a non-profit organization dedicated to ending the cycle of youth homelessness, Stand Up for Kids.


Our Goal: $5,000

What will we be able to do if we reach our goal of $5,000?  It will assist in the first first round of manufacturing costs and donate $500+ to Stand Up for Kids.


Our Mission 

Social Coast Technologies is social enterprise company manufacturing smartphone accessories and technology with a company principle of giving back and serving its community. Their primary mission is to support causes that are dedicated to ending youth homelessness. 


Our Story


The idea man, visionary of Social Coast Technologies and co-inventor of the iJUMP is Kellen Tallada. He is currently the Founder of uCommerce Solutions and now a social entrepreneur. Working with Mike Malloy the past year, CEO of Waveborn Sunglasses, a luxury Italian sunglasses company with a social mission opened his outlook on social impact and social entrepreneurship. 

  With the positive reception of the iJUMP, he knew its potential could benefit a bigger cause and not only by its profits; in his case, youth homelessness. This cause hits home to Kellen having heard stories of his mother, who grew up in the poor neighborhoods of Caloocan City in the Philippines. His mother's single mother passed away when she was a young teenager leaving her and her 4 year old half sister to grow up on their own and in the streets. Through their personal strength, endurance, hard life experience and support of neighbors and family friends they made it through their teenage years and many years later started new lives in the United States.  The truth is that not everyone with similar stories had the same outcome. There are millions of homeless youth in US and worldwide that need help in many ways. This inspired Kellen to build Social Coast Tech around the iJUMP, a social enterprise tech company.    

Picture of Kellen, his mother and sister.   

Youth Homelessness Facts  (Provided by Stand Up for Kids)

  • An estimated 1.3 to 2.8 million homeless and street youth in America. 
  • If they all lived one city, it would be the 7th largest city in the U.S.  
  • 13 kids die on the streets every day from abuse, disease and suicide.  
  • Human trafficking of youth is the fastest growing crime. An estimated 100,000 children are sold into the sex trade within the US every year.  


Our choice is Stand Up for Kids

Stand Up For Kids continuously strives to provide life-saving and outreach services to homeless, street kids and at-risk youth. StandUp For Kids is primarily a nighttime program, with volunteers walking the streets in the evening, distributing food, clothing, hygiene products, distributing resource information, referrals, and offering an 888 number where the kids can reach a StandUp For Kids counselor in each of our cities nationwide.  

StandUp For Kids teaches youth the basic "life skills" so that they can survive off the streets, helping to build a foundation away from the streets and street life. Life skills focused on during the 2014 year are: 

  1. Anger Management Sessions 
  2. Increased tutoring services for GED, job hunting/resume building  
  3. Financial Management  
  4. Improving Communications
  5. Study Skills 
  6. Goal Setting 
  7. Behavior Management Class 
  8. Social Events for homeless and at-risk youth/families  
StandUp For Kids is a national non-profit charity. Their organization was founded in 1990 by a group of volunteers in San Diego, CA. Starting from a program in one city, StandUp For Kids has grown to a national organization with operations in many states and the District of Columbia. They remain a nearly all-volunteer organization.
For more information about Stand Up for Kids visit their website at www.standupforkids.org


iJUMP – The only P2P charger 

The iJUMP is the only smartphone P2P charging accessory where its technology allows one smartphone to "jump" charge another smartphone in need of battery charge.  Available in iPhone 5/6 and any Android micro-USB smartphone. 



Pictures of our 3D conceptual rendition.

Think of the times when your smartphone is running below 10% or has died and there is not a wall or car charger in sight. What do you do? The iJUMP will be your solution.

How does it work?

Connect two smartphone devices on each end of the iJUMP. Watch and charge. It is that easy. 

This keyring smartphone charging accessory makes it readily available when you need it the most. Just how automotive jumper cables work, the iJUMP works in the same way. Ask a friend or stranger if you could borrow a “boost” from his/her’s smartphone. Connect both smartphones to the iJUMP and watch your smartphone gain battery charge in a matter of seconds! 



Colors

We plan to offer a modern, sleek design in one neutral color to start. We will offer several different cool colors to fit everyone's style and personality once we are in production and have developed the key relationships with manufacturers.

Available versions we plan to release

  • Android micro USB – Samsung, HTC,  Nexus, LG 
  •  iPhone – 5, 5s and 6, 6plus only    

Patent Pending. Utility Provisional Patent filed with United States Patent & Trademark Office. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ

How soon will Stand Up for Kids get their donation?

Immediately after the end of the crowd funding campaign. 

When will I get my iJUMP? 

Once the campaign reaches our goal, manufacturing and fulfilling the pre-purchases may take 3-4 months depending on certain suppliers. Our plans are to have them in your hands by the April of 2015 or earlier.  

How long does the charging take when using the iJUMP? 

Our vision is a 5% boost for every minute the iJUMP is connected. This is the goal and we are determine to work with the engineers to ensure this feature.   

Currently, the prototype charges at the same rate as a standard wall charger or when a phone is attached to a computer via a USB connection.

  Does the iJUMP come in different colors? 

The first manufactured units will only come in one neutral color. The plans are to have multiple colors down the line.    We will contact all the funders once we are in manufacturing to update them on the final style and color. 

Is there a warranty?

We will be glad to replace your iJUMP within one year of receiving it. This will only be available for Indiegogo funders. You'll be responsible for the shipping costs.

  How do I arrange a purchase? 

You order on this site. Simply click on the deal you want from the deals listed on the right hand side of the page.  You can place an order directly from this site.  

  Can you ship internationally?  

No, we cannot ship outside the United States at the moment. 

How can I help?

The biggest way that you can help the campaign is by telling your friends and family about the campaign and encouraging them to back us at any level.

Got another question? Email Kellen at kellen@socialcoasttech.com, and we'll post the answers here.

story:
Product Description

iShortcut is a portable device that allows you to expand your iOS device memory using inexpensive USB thumb drives.

About this Project

We all have USB thumb drives but it's not easy to access this ubiquitous storage from iOS devices

That’s why we created iShortcut - the easiest way to share USB thumb drives with iOS devices.  Simply plug your thumb drive into iShortcut’s USB port.  Then join the WiFi network created by iShortcut from your iOS device and access your thumb drive using the included free app.  You can browse files, transfer files, play music and even stream movies off your thumb drive seamlessly.  Using iShortcut, you can even email attachments directly off your thumb drive. 

How it works?

iShortcut features a powered USB port, just like the one on your computer.  It shares your USB thumb drive with up to 5 iOS devices simultaneously over WiFi much like a networked attached storage (NAS) device.  Access the files from your iOS device using the free app, Tiod.  iShortcut also supports secure WiFi connections via WPA and WPA2 encryption.

Features

  • Compact and light design
  • Built-in 1500mAh rechargeable battery providing up to 4 hours of continuous use
  • WiFi support for IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n
  • Operating range up to 16.50 feet (5 meters)
  • Wireless transfer speed up to 300Mbps
  • USB port: USB host/USB 2.0
  • Sharing to 5 iOS devices simultaneously
  • Included free app, TIOD

Specifications

  • Dimension: 3.05 inches x 2.35 inches x 0.55 inches
  • Weight: 2.47 ounces (70 grams)
  • Four Indicator LEDs: Power status, WiFi status, USB connection status, and Charging status.
  • Ports and Switch: One charging port (NOK-1), one USB port, one on/off switch
  • Battery: 1500mAh Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery
  • Software: Free app-TIOD https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/remote-file-viewer-tiod/id404412400?mt=8

Compatibility

iShortcut Supported iOS devices

iShortcut Supported File Formats

Free app - TIOD                                           

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/remote-file-viewer-tiod/id404412400?mt=8

The iShortcut app enables seamless access to your USB thumb drive from your iOS device. You also don’t need to worry about any file transcoding tasks for any of the supported file types. The app takes care of that for you. 

TIOD operation demo: http://youtu.be/fA3uXOswtec

Color Option:

White, Black, Red, Blue, and Green

Where are we? How will the funds be used?

I am on my fourth version of the prototype. It's final and ready to be manufactured. I just need to cover the cost of manufacturing. I need your help. Need you to support this project and spread the words.

 

  • The latest mainboard:

  • Pictures of two prototypes:

 

 FAQ:

1. What is the different from/better than CloudFTP(a similar and successful project on KickStarter)?

  1. As the chip is customized developed, iShortcut is smaller, cheaper and with lower power consumption.
  2. CloudFTP read files by HTML Browser(no APP for iOS currently provided), while iShortcut can read file by APP on iOS device, so the file play is more fluent and user friendly.
  3. The supported file formats(no file format conversion needed) on iShortcut is much more than CloudFTP which only support what iOS support by default, meanwhile you can copy files from USB storage to iOS device by iShortcut and even send email as attachment directly, but CloudFTP can't.
  4. iShortcut share file by NAS in LAN, which is a more universal and flexible way, all other PC client including: Windows, Linux, Mac and Android devices can also access it by the WiFi network at the same time, and the permission for read and write is configurable.

iShortcut share file by NAS in LAN, which is a more universal and flexible way, all other PC client including: Windows, Linux, Mac and Android devices can also access it by the WiFi network at the same time, and the permission for read and write is configurable.

story:
What is this?

Thank you for supporting. Wahoo is the first biped robot which can walk smoothly with only three servos and controlled by a smartphone. He will be the most affordable robot in his class.
 
[Wahoo only support Android smartphone. We are working on the iPhone version. Please come back in a couple weeks for updates.]

 
 
Portions of this robot are modifications based on work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License. 
 
 
Wahoo is roughly 15cm high, 9 cm diameter Android looking Robot made from a 3D printer. The legs and hip are power by 9g servos. He uses 6 x AAA batteries inside the legs. He uses Bluetooth to communicate with the Android smartphone. He can theoretically talk to any computer via Bluetooth. 

 

 

 

What We Need 

 

Bulk of the money raised will be spent on material cost like:

-3D printer 
-Robot electronics
-Servos
Research on more sophisticated next generation home robots.

 

 

 

What You Get

 

We don't really have a minimum funding amount. You will receive a complete Wahoo Robot shipped to your home even if minimum funding amount is not met. 

You can control Wahoo with your smartphone. He can run on the table and on the floor. He can kick things so you can have a football tournament. Wahoo knows how to headbutt so if you buy two Wahoos they can fight.

Wahoo is configurable via the smartphone. For normal users they can change the parameters and change the way Wahoo walk. For advanced hobbyists and university researchers they can reprogram the Arduino circuit board for doing anything you can imagine e.g. one can add sensors to Wahoo and reprogram him with artificial intelligence. Because Wahoo robots are so affordable you can buy a few of them and command them by a computer to do complex tasks or simulations.

Please support me and the Wahoo project! Thank you!

 

 

 

Our Story

I used to work for iBanks in IT. One day I attended an event and spoke to the speaker. He asked me what I really love to do. I replied Robots and he told me this is what I must do. Not many people can make robots walk smoothly. I had taught people to do just that on Youtube. Therefore I decided to make robots affordable for everybody. 

 

 

Our Goal

Our long term goal is to research and make robots that would help us in our daily life just like personal computers. I notice robots aren’t in our home at all. With the technology we have today, how can robots not be helping us more? In Japan the populations are ageing. Japanese are trying to make robots that would help elderly people with household tasks e.g. lifting people on and off the bed. I believe I can also make this kind of robots. I have an idea for a robot that can monitor our eyes, facial expressions and emotions in front of our computer and help us with our work. I can only do such project if I have more time and fundings. Please support Wahoo project to make this dream come true!

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like what you see, please feel free to share with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, etc!  

 

News Coverage

http://www.robots-dreams.com/2012/03/wahoo-the-affordable-smartphone-biped-robot-video.html

http://www.smartplanet.com/blog/global-observer/programmable-robots-at-100-a-pop/4458 

http://blog.makible.com/robert-lam-making-robots-walk-run-and-punch-e-81213 

http://www.alt-view.co.uk/AltView/March-2012/Wahoo---Smartphone-Controlled-Simple-Robot.aspx

 

More pictures of Wahoo on our website. 

http://www.unclebobtech.com

story:
Order your own multi-tool iPhone case at www.thetasklab.com

 

Thanks to all our backers!

 

 

For press inquiries, please contact media@thetasklab.com or visit www.thetasklab.com

 

Quick answers to your most common questions:

CAN I FLY WITH THIS CASE? The knife is easily removable with no tools in only seconds, so you can leave it at home or stash it in your checked luggage. If you do lose your knife at the airport, we will replace it for the cost of shipping!

See the video of how to remove the knife HERE

WILL USING THE TOOLS HURT MY PHONE? Nope, the housing and tools are incredibly strong so no harm will come to your phone even during heavy use. If you manage to break a tool, we sell replacements for only a few dollars each. 

See the stress test video of TaskOne and an iPhone 5 HERE.

FOR INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: When you pledge, please add $15 to your pledge amount (earlybird special for $75 + $15 shipping = $90 total pledge)

WHERE DO I SELECT IPHONE 4 or 5? At the end of the campaign we will send an email to ALL backers asking which case they would like as well as which color option (for backers at $90 and above).

MEDIA COVERAGE

CNET: "Who nees a bottle opener case when you have TaskOne?"

CNET ASIA: "An iPhone case for MacGyver"

TRENDHUNTER TECH: "TaskOne iPhone Toolkit will now fully equip your smartphone"

TECHNOLOGY TELL: "this will fill a void in any MacGyver’s tool kit"

VENTURE BEAT: "The most unbelievable iPhone case ever"

GUYSPEED: "Everything you need to survive a day on the trail"

KEHN14.vn: "chuẩn bị sắm cho mình một chiếc ốp lưng với những trang bị "khủng" nhất"

TEKZILLA: "Awesomely rediculous"

9TO5 MAC: "the ultimate multi-tool actually made and tested for real world use"

UBERGIZMO: "This is one unique protective case for your iPhone"

MACTRAST: "...a really cool project...I'll be making a pledge as soon as I finish writing this article."

iDownloadBlog: "Mr. Shelton has done something really cool here, marrying all of these tools with an iPhone case."

Jeremy Carr: "I've never cut my steak with an iphone before.  How does it feel?  AWESOME!!!"

Absynthe Jailbreak: "...incorporating all those tools in a moderately thin and sturdy casing is really no child’s play."

The Gadgeteer: "If you’ve dreamed of turning your iPhone into a multi-tool, you can pledge $75 to reserve your own TaskOne case."

Limera1N: "You will not be able to help yourself but give a jaw dropped reaction after seeing all the features of this great case."

TecheBlog: "Simply put, the TaskOne case turns your iPhone into a Swiss Army Knife, literally."

iPhoneInformer: "...the new Task One iPhone Case could be just what you need."

Astounde: "This may be the coolest phone case ever created."

Gear Diary: "Why the heck didn’t I think of that?"

An iPhone case that can do MORE.

Your iPhone is your life. You carry it all the time.  You love your phone, but it falls short when you need to fix your bike, tighten a screw, or cut your steak. There isn't an app for that. But what if there was a CASE for that?

ENTER TASKONE - Now you can carry a multi-tool built right into the case of your iPhone.  Sixteen of the most useful tools engineered into a thin and trim package. And at 89 grams TaskOne adds suprisingly little weight to your phone. 

Utilizing quality hardened tool steels, aircraft aluminum, and polycarbonate, TaskOne is the next generation of multi-tools. 

Not only is TaskOne functional, but it is also stylishly designed. Its total thickness is as thin or thinner than many other cases, and comes in a variety of brilliant colors, including Slate Grey, Cherry Red, Jet Black, and the Indiegogo only color Orange Flame.  TaskOne does not sacrifice performance, yet is elegant and beautifully integrated with your phone.

 

The Tools

Sixteen tools are included in TaskOne. The tools are made to withstand the abuse of real life without ever damaging your phone.

The tools included in TaskOne are:

  • 2.5" knife with 0.75" of serrations

  • 1.8" Sawblade

  • Small and Large flathead screwdrivers

  • Medium Phillips screwdriver

  • Pliers with integrated 3-8mm wrench

  • Wire cutters

  • 6 metric Allen wrenches (bike sizes 2-6)

  • Spoke Wrenchs (0.127, 0.130)

  • Wire stripper

  • 120mm ruler (110mm on iPhone 4/4s)

  • Bottle opener

  • Kickstand

The Details

The tools are housed in a light but strong precision machined aircraft aluminum enclosure connected to your phone through molded outer polycarbonate bands. Use of the tools is simple - when stored the tools are secured via custom spring assemblies. The tools are extended by the low-profile buttons on the back of the phone and are automatically fixed in the extended position during use. The raised bezel on the front of the case keeps the screen safe from damage.

 

2.5" REMOVABLE KNIFE

Useful in so many situations, the knife is sharp but easily removable for flying or small cutting tasks. A steel lock secures the knife in the fully extended position for larger cutting tasks. The case serves as an excellent handle and is strong enough so your phone will never be harmed when using the knife.

 

 

1.8" WOOD SAW

The saw is designed for optimal cutting of woods and plastics with a Peg Tooth saw pattern. Need to fashion a stick for roasting marshmallows on that impromptu camping trip you took with your friends?  No problem with TaskOne!

 

 

HARDENED SCREWDRIVERS

Three Screwdrivers are stored inside the case. Using the ejector button the screwdrivers can be removed and placed in the screwdriver slot at the top of the case. Use the case as your leverage to tackle those hard-to-loosen screws on your motorcycle, or perform an emergency electronics repair with the micro screwdriver.

 

 

PLIERS AND WIRE CUTTERS

Made from hardened tool steel and ground with an aggressive cross grip pattern, these pliers are small but mighty. When extended, the plier's handle pops out of the case edge for access. Use them to grip, twist, and grab; then use the wire cutter to snip through metal wire.

 

 

ALLEN WRENCHES

Screws and bolts that use Allen wrenches are found on bikes and many household items. TaskOne gives you access to six of the most useful sizes in a convenient removable tool. The wrenches are designed to give you plenty of torque for quick repairs and fixes on the go, are precisely ground for a perfect fit, and labeled with their wrench size.

 

 

WIRE STRIPPER

The integrated wire stripper helps you make quick work of electrical repairs.  A broken wire can be re-stripped and re-connected with ease.

 

 

METRIC RULER

Metric ruler marks are engraved on the back of the case. The first mark is precisely positioned 10mm from the bottom edge of the case so you can use the case surface as your measuring reference. Graduations of 1mm get you finer resolution for your measurements.

 

 

BOTTLE OPENER

No true multi-tool can be without a bottle opener.  This opener was optimized and tested on all types of bottles from Coke to beer and beyond. It is positioned right at the edge of the case for easy access, but protrudes just enough (but not too much) from the bottom of the case to reliably and easily open your favorite beverage. Open your next bottle with TaskOne!

 

 

KICKSTAND

Insert the small screwdriver into one of the two machined slots on the back of the phone and turn the tool into a convenient Kickstand for watching video or facetime! The kickstand can be used in either landscape or portrait mode.

 

 

FINE PRINT

We have been working hard designing and manufacturing the prototypes, setting up supply agreements with vendors, and getting everything in order for our first production run. TaskOne has gone through innumerable revisions and tests to get it to its current state.

With your support, we can bring TaskOne to the market and into your pocket. Your contributions will help fund:

  • Production tooling
  • Custom spring manufacturing
  • First large production run

Pledge and be a part of a revolution in iPhone cases!

Rewards

TASKONE  Holiday Gift Card - All supporters at $25 or more will receive a beautiful card with an image of TaskOne on the front and a brief description of the features on the inside. If you pledged $75 and up the card will show the arrival date of your case and a To/From line so you can give TaskOne as a gift!

 

All TaskOne cases arrive in three parts - Fully assembled backplate with all of the tools installed and two edge bands to wrap your phone and secure the backplate. The four allen head screws necessary to attach TaskOne to your case are included, and can be fastened with the included Allen wrench tool.

If you supported the $150 option, you will receive the special Indiegogo-only Orange Flame color with a laser-etched number serial on the case backside.

Thanks for contributing to TaskOne and out Indiegogo campaign!

 

FAQ

Q. How do I specify which color or iPhone case I want?    A. At the end of the campaign, we will send all backers an email asking for their choice of case style (iPhone 4/4s or 5) and color (for backers at $90 and up).

Q. Will I be able to take this case on planes?     A. According to TSA rules, you may not take knives onto planes. We have made the knife portion of this case removable in seconds with no tools so it can be placed in your checked luggage.

Q. Will using the tools break or damage my phone?    A. The design of the case protects your phone and allows the force of the tools to be distributed to the case without damaging your phone. That doesn't mean you can now use your phone as a hammer, but you don't have to worry about damage to your phone in normal use of any of the tools.

Q. Can you offer other colors?    A. If we hit our reach goals, then YES!

Q. Are you going to offer replacement tools in case I lose one?    A. Yes, we will offer replacement tools for a low cost. All of the tools are secured in place while inside the case, so they won't fall out on their own.

Q. How is the reception with the case installed?    A. We have tested and verified that reception is not affected when TaskOne is installed. The edge bands are designed out of a tough polycarbonate plastic which allow signals to pass through un-affected.

Q. How much does the case weigh?    A. The iPhone 4/4s case weighs 89g and the iPhone 5 case weighs 96g.

For more information and a blog fo the development process, visit our website at: www.thetasklab.com

iPhone not included. iPhone, Apple and the Apple Logo are registered trademarks of Apple, Inc.

Order your own multi-tool iPhone case at www.thetasklab.com
 
Thanks to all our backers!
 
 
For press inquiries, please contact media@thetasklab.com or visit www.thetasklab.com
 
Quick answers to your most common questions:
CAN I FLY WITH THIS CASE? The knife is easily removable with no tools in only seconds, so you can leave it at home or stash it in your checked luggage. If you do lose your knife at the airport, we will replace it for the cost of shipping!
See the video of how to remove the knife HERE
WILL USING THE TOOLS HURT MY PHONE? Nope, the housing and tools are incredibly strong so no harm will come to your phone even during heavy use. If you manage to break a tool, we sell replacements for only a few dollars each. 

See the stress test video of TaskOne and an iPhone 5 HERE. 

FOR INTERNATIONAL BACKERS: When you pledge, please add $15 to your pledge amount (earlybird special for $75 + $15 shipping = $90 total pledge)
WHERE DO I SELECT IPHONE 4 or 5? At the end of the campaign we will send an email to ALL backers asking which case they would like as well as which color option (for backers at $90 and above).

story:
The ULTIMATE KASE approach is simple.............. bring affordable, Protection, Comfort and Fashion to your devices. At Ultimate Kase we look at cell cases as "Fashion to your phone"

 -Mobile devices have revolutionized our lives and are in use almost 90% of our waking day and are only going to become more prominent as time goes on.

 -As new devices come onto the market and trends change we quickly adapt and meet your ever changing desires.

EXPRESS YOURSELF!

 -We are adapting to your world, Not you adapting to what is be presented by the “large companies” .Shouldn’t the way we accessorize and individualize be part of our lives .Ultimate Kase has a fresh approach built on creativity with fresh designs and lots of fun, fun, fun. We want you to have “choices” at affordable prices.

Business Philosophy

 -We use unique components and looks when manufacturing including textures, eye appeal, eco friendly components etc……We also beleive in protecting our creations with necessary Patents and Trademarks. This is the key to keeping fresh and new concepts coming. Many more styles of Ultimate Kase are coming, just wait to see what we think of next !!!!

ASTRO BUBBLES  - SELLING FEATURES:

 -Fashionable and comes many colors to choose from.

SIZES AVAILABLE:

-Itouch

-Iphone 4/4s

-Iphone 5/5S

-Samsung Galaxy S4

 -Patented IBeam Technology. Our “Ibeam technology” is designed for fashion but most importantly protect your device. (after all you have a $400 or $500 device a thin layer does not protect as well) 

-Safety Material is made out of Polycarbonate (polycarbonate is Know for it strength). Used in Bullet Proof Glass, jetfighter windshields, Crash Helmets, Medical Devices and many others.

 -Protection: Astro Bubbles has 3 layers of protection and therefore is little thicker this stops damage and leaking (100% Leak Proof). 

-Temperature safety: -AB has a high melting point it can withstand up to 155 degrees in the sun (where ordinary plastic may melt) And can withstand cold negative 40 degrees (where ordinary plastic may crack due to the cold) 

-Liquid is 100% safe made from Soy based (plant) materials.

 -Interactive: It’s fun and a “Conversation Starter”. You will have fun turning it over and over. 

-Generation Gap:Astro Bubbles is Old School meets New School.  Appeals to all Generations 1970’s who remember the old “bubble lamps” to today’s new trends 

-No Place Else: This is an exclusive item (By Ultimate Kase) that is Patent Pending. You will not find it anywhere else. 

-Great Feel: Has a great feel in your hand. -

BUILT IN STAND:Phone can stand up or lay on its side as a built in stand.

What’s Next:

Our next steps are to finalize the tooling for our molds and work with the engineers to carefully sculpt the final case dimensions.  The key to creating this unique case includes precision engraving and prototyping of every aspect of the case.  This includes the filling and sealing of the three layer construction that is part of our patented process.  We have to test and finalized the viscosity of the fill liquids to ensure maximum performance that will last for years and years............Once this is completed we will begin our first production run and begin shipping to our supporters!

NOVEMBER:

Finalize the molds for all cell phone sizes (Itouch, Iphone 4/4s, Iphone 5/5s, Samsung Galaxy S4)

Molds will be tested and adjusted to fit each cell phone device with precision down to the 1,000th Millimeter to ensure accurate fit and maximum protection.

DECEMBER:

Final packaging will be created to ensure product is shipped in a safe and secure manner.  We will now start a test production run and verify any adjustments that are needed in the production process.  Once we test and retest our production team will start full production.  Each case has several parts of which requires “hand assembly”, (not machine assembled).  Each cases is then  sent to the quality control area where they are inspected 1 by 1 to assure it meets the UltimateKase standard of excellence.

JANUARY:

Full production will begin and each reward will be fulfilled.  

OUR TEAM:

Steve Katzke:  Has become enamored with tech devices including cell phones, tablet and others during the tech boom.  Steve recognized that the basic cell phone case was very bland and unimaginative and felt a need to bring consumers more viable options.  Working with a team of engineers he constructed the first prototype late one night.  His vast 23 year experience in manufacturing and design while working for a fortune 500 company gave him the foundation to create this new line of cell phone cases called Ultimate Kase.  Astrobubbles is just the beginning of what is sure to be a growing “tech accessory” category.

Michael Smucker:  Has vast experience in the apparel and accessory field while leading a team of sales professions for more than 18 years.  His vision and experience of knowing what is trending in the marketplace led to double digit growth in this category year over year.  He has worked with all of the Major Sports Leagues including (NFL, MLB, NBA, HNL, NCAA) and major corporations all over the United States.  After working with Steve for many years he saw the immense opportunity to apply his skills to various new product innovations including Ultimate Kase and Astro Bubbles.

Risks and challenges

The risks and challenges are minimal. We have spent an extensive amount of time in working out all of the product and design details. We also have long standing (20 years +) relationships with the factories that we have planned to make the components.

The biggest challenge is raising the capital needed to bring this product to market. We are so grateful to live in a world with amazing opportunities like Indiegogo that provide an audience to help us realize this dream.

Ship date: We have already received prototypes from our factory and have a good idea of how long the molding and developing process takes. All components have been tested by SGS Intertech Testing Services of the world's leading testing facility. All have passed 15 US and European requirements.
