story:
http://www.sideeffectsystems.com/


Motivation

  • Are your net communications private ? No.

  • Are they secure ? No.

  • Forget the NSA

  • In march this year I was approached by an individual on the web who gave me as a sample of his work. The personal information of one million US voters from all across the US.

  • Phone numbers dates of births, home addresses, middle names, party affiliations and more.

  • Just as a sample!

  • This incident was the ignition for this project. Why, most identity theft occurs via messaging or over the phone not in person.

  • If they want your birthday they can find it, but they shouldn’t be able to spoof your phone numbers, or messaging.

  • This alarming episode drove me this project

  • Your most immediate threat is not from governments or shady organizations.

  • Its from identity and information thieves.

  • Personal security if left to chance can be financially and personally devastating.

  • The objective of this project is to create a closed loop 2048 bit SSL encrypted pathway for all of my customers communications, from typical internet traffic, to voice,video and messaging.

  • Enforced anonymity allows the user to retain privacy in communication from end to end users across globe.

  • Target customers are retail consumers, public institutions and businesses.



Status of Project


http://www.sideeffectsystems.com/index.php?called=calvin_yjajym

Currently  the system is in alpha testing phase, investments have already been made in several servers, development systems and software, communication systems and features are still being tweaked.

Current mobile device operating system target is Android (Software available for download on site).
It is compatible with all SIP 2.0 and WebRTC systems including TLS and wss.

It works on all the latest browser systems for all the main platforms.

The requested investment is primarily for Operating Expenditure for Marketing, expansion from a test environment to a production environment and the purchase of Symantec RSA and SSL Certificates, Private and Public Keys to complete the secure architecture loop.

In summary, the project is done and testable online, to be examine and criticised.

  1. First priority spending with the funding is SSL Certs and keys.
  2. Purchase of new servers for a production deployment and rollout.
  3. Marketing and Promotion (Skills and Personnel) with which you can also be of help .
  4. OpEx Stipend for small staff of three etc..


Issues Affecting Project Success

The primary risk to this project is legal and regulatory, local restrictions on internet usage and governmental requirements on encryption. Also net neutrality is under threat which severely impacts the ability of the software to be successful in the future.

Competition is a driver but that just means the project will on cycles of development and maintenance in order to keep it technically relevant.

Inclusion of site function implicitly in popular web browsers or the Ooperating Systems.



As always money is good but not enough, you contribution by helping me test, critiquing and offering preferred suggestion go a long way to this projects success.



Previous Management Responsiblilities:

  • Managed/Engineered all Technical Operations and System Designs Implementations.

  • Responsible for financial management of department.

  • Managed NOC personnel, technical personnel and contractors.

  • Reporting and forecasting of every aspect of the operation (Budgeting, HR

  • Assessments,Customer Service, SLA (Service Level Agreement) metrics and

  • Sales Engineering.

  • Managed relationships and engineered networks with major US IP carriers

  • (Verizon ,TATA etc ....) and Major US customers/carriers Global Crossing,

  • Telefonica, Inteliglobe, AT&T etc...

  • Configured and Managed network services partnerships with vendors like

  • LACNIC,Merit Networks Inc and Telecordia.


Network Infrastructures:

  • National GPON (Gigabit Passive Optical Network)

  • Integration of a Third Party National WiMax Network.

  • Peer to Peer Fibre WAN IP Networks (10G, 1G etc..)

  • International and National Legacy Network Systems (T1/E1/DS3/STM- 1,STM-4 etc....)

  • Ipv4 an Ipv6 LAN and WAN Systems


IP Services Engineering:

  • IMS Systems

  • IP Voice Services – SIP, H323, SS7 over IP

  • IP Emulated Legacy Circuits T1/E1

  • SIP Server, SIP Feature Server using Dell Power edge servers running Linux.

  • Redundant 10Gb national IP backbone using Cisco 4500 switches running stacked vlans and

  • spanning-tree protocol.

  • DIA Services, High Performance Internet Circuits.

  • Carrier Peering – Verizon,TATA Communications,AT&T, Cogent.

  • Developed and augmented OSS and BSS systems by designing/writing programs to gather and

  • analysis network data ( CDR's, SNMP traps etc..).

  • Configured QoS / CoS failover on core network routers using IS-IS,

  • MPLS,RSVP and BGP, core equipment consisted of (Cisco 3845, Juniper M10i, Juniper M7).

  • Carrier grade E1/T1 emulation, DIA (Dedicated Internet Access), VOIP,Video,Enterprise and

  • SMB internet services.

  • Configured/Implemented native IP v6/IP v4 dual stack throughout network including an IP v6

  • internet gateway.

  • Configured/Implemented HTTP , FTP, NTP, DNS, TFTP, SSH, SNMP, SMTP, POP3,

  • TELNET, DHCP,SIP servers on both Windows,Linux and Unix Platforms.

  • Designed and programmed web based applications for Unix,Linux and Windows Server

  • platforms.

  • Designed and Engineered VLAN systems for multi-customer network using Q-in-Q and

  • Stacked VLAN implementations.

  • Designed and Engineered international SIP carrier link to Verizon using a IPSEC VPN Tunnel

  • with 3DES encryption.

  • Implemented Firewalls, NAT, PAT IP intercept and intrusion detection for customers and

  • internal carrier systems.


Telephony/Software Services Engineering:

  • Expert skill/knowledge in Asterisk PBX, Freeswitch, A2Billing, Kamailio, Elastix and Kazoo

  • Expert skill/knowledge in SIPml5, Websockets and RESTFUL systems

  • Expert skill/knowledge in MySql, PHP, Python, C++, Ruby, Erlang

  • Expert skill/knowledge in Linux OS

  • Expert skill/knowledge in ffmpeg and sox

  • Engineered SS7 based Carrier Grade ISDN-T1 cross-connects with Telecommunication Services of Trinidad and Tobago.

  • Engineered Carrier Grade Telephony Transit Circuits with Digicel and Columbus

  • Communications Limited.

  • Managed and Implemented Telecom Authority of Trinidad and Tobago    national numbering scheme and implemented international

  • routing with Telecom services partner Telecordia.

  • Engineered IP/SIP based Feature server including but not limited to real-time billing, Virtual

  • PBX , Virtual Conference Systems and Voice/Video Mail.

  • Integrated Nortel and Avaya PBX's with SIP based telephony system.

  • Design/Implemented Video telephony system based on national number plan.

story_txt:
http://www.sideeffectsystems.com/Motivation


Are your net communications
	private ? No.


Are they secure ? No.


Forget the NSA


In march this year I was
	approached by an individual on the web who gave me as a sample of his
	work. The personal information of one million US voters from all
	across the US. 
	


Phone numbers dates of births,
	home addresses, middle names, party affiliations and more.


Just as a sample!


This incident was the ignition for
	this project. Why, most identity theft occurs via messaging or over
	the phone not in person.


If they want your birthday they
	can find it, but they shouldn’t be able to spoof your phone
	numbers, or messaging.


This alarming episode drove me
	this project


Your most immediate threat is not
	from governments or shady organizations.


Its from identity and information
	thieves.


Personal security if left to
	chance can be financially and personally devastating.


The objective of this project is
	to create a closed loop 2048 bit SSL encrypted pathway for all of my
	customers communications, from typical internet traffic, to
	voice,video and messaging.


Enforced anonymity allows the user
	to retain privacy in communication from end to end users across
	globe.


Target customers are retail
	consumers, public institutions and businesses.




Status
of Project
http://www.sideeffectsystems.com/index.php?called=calvin_yjajym

Currently  the system is in alpha
testing phase, investments have already been made in several servers, development systems and software, communication systems and features are still being tweaked.Current mobile device operating system target is Android (Software available for download on site).It is compatible with all SIP 2.0 and WebRTC systems including TLS and wss.It works on all the latest browser systems for all the main platforms.

story:
Tangoo

Your Pocket Concierge

"Where do you want to go tonight?"

I don't know / I can't decide / Where do YOU want to go / Let's do the usual.

 

Does this sound familiar? Have you ever tried to organize a social outing, but no one can decide where to go? Either you try something new and it leaves much to be desired, or you go to the same old spots. What if there was a way to find the perfect place that fits the moods of the people you’re with? Well now there is, and it’s called Tangoo: Your Pocket Concierge. Whether it’s an outing with your friends, a date, or even a business client, Tangoo allows you to select your mood and occasion, and curates a list of the best restaurants and events happening right now in the city. 

You can then filter by neighbourhood and price range and create a personalized map for your outing.

Tangoo takes the hard work out of having fun. Just like that, you’ll never have to worry about making plans again.


How it works

Tangoo uses your mood, occasion, and social graph to craft the perfect outing of restaurants and venues tailored to you. Through nurturing crowd-sourced recommendations on what moods and occasions restaurants and venues best fit, Tangoo paints a story of how well a place matches your desired experience by going beyond cuisine-type and quality ratings.

Our Secret Sauce

Tangoo also enhances your outing by encouraging restaurants to best cater the experience around your mood with perks and personalization depending on the situation.


The Impact: Help Restaurants Stand Out Through Giving You Personalized Experiences

We have met with our over 100 restaurant and bar partners in the past month and they couldn’t be more excited about Tangoo’s new direction. 



They admit that they have been abused with harmful online reviews and aggressive discounts and want to find a new way to share their story and create loyal customers.

Tangoo is a new way for them to share their story and highlight the unique experience they offer. They see incredible value in widening the scope of traditional online filters like cuisine, price, and neighbourhood to experiential filters such as the moods and the occasions they best serve.

We have also learned that if they know more about why you are visiting and how you feel, they can actually enhance the experience by personalizing it to that. Imagine being in the mood for a romantic, cozy, and unexpected anniversary and showing up to get seated to a candle and rose already set up at your table in the cozy corner of the restaurant. If you come on an off-day, that might even mean a personal greeting from the owner or the chef sending you a complimentary treat. For a business meeting this could mean getting a private area and being interrupted less. For a social and epic birthday, use your imagination!

The better the restaurants make it fit your mood, the higher chance you’ll recommend them for it when you leave. How far will restaurants and venues push the boundaries to be the most romantic, epic, or best place to impress a client?

It’s all about the experience and we have designed a system that works around what experience you feel like, and it being delivered.


Referral Program




We know how vocal and popular you are...

...so we want to give you a kickback of 10% for all donations you refer to us! To sweeten the deal, we'll give you 15% if you've already backed us :) You essentially get refunded until you start making some extra cash!*

We also want to create some friendly competition and award some of our perks for those who can be the biggest contributor with our below contest.

Contest

We'll be awarding prizes for whoever has the most donations referred our way, before the campaign end-date on June 9th.

1st Place: 

Your choice of the Tangoo Marketing 101 perk ($250 value) OR the Never Wait in Line perk ($200 value) 

2nd Place:

Your choice of the Tangoo Birthday Special perk ($99 value) or the Date Night perk ($50 value)

3rd Place:

Any perk with a value of $30 or below

*IMPORTANT - How to get credited for a referral*

1) Make an Indiegogo account (Facebook sign-in is easiest) then press the share buttons or copy your unique URL below the main video at the top of the page.

2) If you don't make an account simply pledge for Tangoo with a donation to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or copy your unique URL below the main video at the top of the page. 

You will be presented with a special URL immediately after contributing (on the completed contribution landing page, under "Spread the word!") that you can copy and share with their network.

Spread the word about Tangoo with your friends and around the web and you will get the credit! Get creative beyond just Facebook and Email... Reddit, Stumble Upon, BuzzFeed and blogs can help greatly! 

*If you refer over $100 we'll reach out to you but if it's below that we'll count on you to reach out if you still want $10 or less sent your way - email paul@tangoo.ca


Perks



Our Story: www.tangoo.ca 


Two years ago, a group of UBC students set out on a mission to help people stay connected with the people they care most about through memorable social outings.

We started by organizing nights at hand-picked restaurants that took all guesswork and planning from people so they could focus on having a great social outing. Guests could pre-book online with everything taken care of when they arrived - that meant no line, reserved seats, a specialized menu from the chef, and a chance to meet new people and reconnect with old friends.


The word started to get out quickly as Tangoo was featured in over 25 media appearances in Vancouver. After hosting various events and working closely with over a hundred of Vancouver’s best establishments, we learned what it took to make a perfect night happen over and over again. We realized we needed to rebuild the experience onto a platform to keep up with demand and expand beyond Vancouver's borders.


CTV: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sCEgUcQxB6c

Global TV: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rhDnKzNm5bY 

Shaw TV: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VVrszGCe41k


We never stop dreaming up new ways for you to get the most out of your social life.


Our Why

We believe that the best way to connect with people you care about is through perfect social outings. These are what create the lasting memories that bond people together. When it’s easy to organize an authentic outing tailored to what you want, you are empowered to live in the moment. 


Our Campaign: Leveraging Dragons' Den for a North America-Wide Launch

We realized that we were on to something big when we got the call to pitch on Dragons’ Den in April, and turned it into the perfect opportunity to expand our mission across Canada and beyond.  

We can't tell you exactly what happened on The Den, but we can tell you that we'd like to be rocking a fully functional product by the time our AWESOME episode airs as early as September - so please help us make it happen!


Check out a warm-up pitch we had with one of the Dragons a year before we appeared on the show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nSy_tpRSzMQ


Help us plant our feet across Canada and then, the US.

With Dragons' Den going well and 2 million Canadians ready to see it as early as September, we have a lot of work to do in order to be set up in all the major Canadian cities we want to be set up in.

Every month is crucial for building out our team and both iOS and Android apps. No matter what happens, we need to grow our platform as much as possible so we need your help to successfully launch the finalized versions of the platform.



Timeline of successes from inception 


We've had the help of over 30 interns and practicum students (alongside an amazing advisory board) the last two years to push our Why to the stage it is at today. People know this dream has to happen and we're ever so close!


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Check out www.tangoo.ca to request early access and plan an outing. 

  • Share this campaign using the referral code below. We'll be giving out some of our top perks to the most active contributor.

  • Read our blog (http://blog.tangoo.ca/) to learn more about what we do.

  • If you know someone who needs stellar video services hit up our EPIC videographer who filmed our Indiegogo video, Troy Gordon!

story:
What is the Smart Mega Machine™ (SMM) or Internet Sports Computer™ (ISC)?

The Smart Mega Machine™ is the World’s First Palm Size Patent Pending Cloud Gaming Smart Mega Sports Device Edutainment Platform™ made for Real Games (Augmented Reality) and Virtual Games.

It allows users/gamers from Different Remote Locations Locally, Globally or Worldwide to Play, Talk via Voice and Compete in Real-Time virtual and non-virtual (augmented reality) and now you can play real games using your own sports apparatus like a golf club, tennis racquet, etc.) You have the controller already, for Genius Cloud Gaming™, we just make them Real Smart™ for cloud gaming.

Welcome to the 21th Century, our Cloud Gaming Mega Sports Device System™ made for the masses. With present and future gamers in mind we make gaming hardware and software extremely affordable and a lot more FUN and now for the first time Play REAL and VIRTUAL sports! No longer are you restricted to playing against an animation only and limited to 3D motion. You can now play against a Real Human Being (your opponent) in remote locations anywhere in the world.

Would you rather Box a Real Human Being or an Animation? Would you rather play a Putting Competition with a Real Golf Club against another Human Being on the Cloud or against an Animation? Would you rather play a Tennis match with a Real Tennis Racquet against another Real Human Being holding a Tennis Racquet? If you would rather compete and play against a Real Human Being then the Smart Mega Machine™ was made for you in mind. Only the Smart Mega Machine ™ allows gamers to Play and Compete against Real Human Beings and or Animations Anyplace and Anytime.

WE ARE THE ONLY GAMING CONSOLE COMPANY, WHICH HAS MADE THE ABOVE ELUSIVE DREAM A REALITY FOR THE FIRST TIME IN HUMAN HISTORY!!

Our Smart Augmented Reality™ Technologies are the most advanced in the world. Learn to Master your game and have a TON of fun.

Make your controller Smart with our Attachable Multiple Sensors, and download our Smart Gaming Software and you are ready to play, practice, compete and master (learn how to play like a Pro) every sport at home, your backyard, on the field, or anywhere you want.

What’s Special about the Smart Mega Machine™?                                     

We are totally different than any gaming console company in the world. We are operating system independent.  

Welcome to the New and Modern World of Gaming, built for the 21th century, using SMART GAMING CLOUD TECHNOLOGIES™. Our Smart Mega Machine™ is perfect merger of the Real World (Augmented Reality) and the Virtual Worlds, whose game play is beyond 3D. Using Smart Cloud Gaming Technologies we eliminate completely the unwanted and unneeded expense associated with the other Gaming Systems through our Smart Mega Sports Devices ™ introduction.    

The Smart Mega Machine™ is touch screen and voice controlled! Our system is powerful, flexible and can easily scale for millions of gamers. It is an Inexpensive way to play with your Worldwide Friends (Real Human beings) and Learn to master your sport at the same time, everywhere, and every hour on the cloud. Its Palm Sized and Clam shaped, and comes in a variety of colors. It’s come in two (2) styles, one with a flip top and the other without.

The Smart Mega Machine™ can stream sports content or play virtual games but can also use our streaming media in Real Games (Augmented Reality). Going to the store is no longer necessary to purchase software. With our Smart Mega Machine™ its ancient history.Just download our Smart Sports Software™ from the Cloud and you are ready to play.            

Another very powerful future feature of the Cloud Gaming Mega Sports Device Physiological Sensor Telemetry Based Measuring System that shows in Real-Time, via Iconic Representation:

a) Heart Rate        

b) Respiration Rate  

c) Brain Wave Activity

                                                           

          Fig.1 Data Recorded from Controller and send to Smart Mega machine

 

        Fig.2 Monitor Physiological Data on Smart Mega Machine

 

While using with our Clouding Gaming Mega Sports Device System, you can learn about science, physics and mathematics and the sports at the same time.

The Smart Mega Machine™ is Multiple Innovations combined into One (1):

1)  It’s a Smart Phone

2)  It’s a Tablet  

3)  It’s a Personal Computer    

4)  It’s a Wireless Hub        

5)  It’s an intelligent Sports Advisor  

6)  It’s a Virtual and Non-Virtual (Augmented Reality) Professor    

7)  It’s a Smart Sensor                          

8)  It’s a Multiple Wireless Physiological Measuring System (Future Feature) 

The Ultimate Game Controller You Already Have

You already have our game controller, it’s your tennis racquet, golf club, baseball bat, hockey stick, baseball, soccer ball, boxing gloves, or chess pieces in your home or office or field of play.

Just attach our Smart Wi-Fi Controller™ or Peripheral Electronics and Smart Sensors to any of the above sports apparatus and now you have the Ultimate Game Controller that makes our game the World’s First Non-Virtual System for playing Real Games.

 

        Fig.3 Real Sports Apparatus can interact with Smart Mega Machine

 

The Vision

As a team we are going to introduce a totally new patent pending gaming system based on cloud gaming technologies. We are asking for your help to Manufacture our Smart Sports Gaming Systems ™. Help us create history and revolutionize globally the games market place with your donations.

Who we are

We are a special group of young visionary, dedicated, hardworking and passionate Graduate Student Entrepreneurs (Guanting Li, Keyur Patel, Xi Wei (left to right)), who are studying Electrical Engineering and Computer Science at NYU-Poly, and want to create the next great gaming company forever changing the future of interactive gaming worldwide.

 

 

How you can use it

1) You can download a mega sports game or have it reside on our game server or both.     

2) No longer you have to go to the store to buy software.

               Fig.4 Download the Game from Server

 

Donate and help build our Cloud Gaming Smart Mega Machine Sports Device System, which is made specifically for cloud gaming.

Use it to play games (virtually and non-virtually), twenty-four (24) hours a day, seven (7) days a week.

The Cloud Gaming Mega Sports Device System is our Smart Gaming Content Delivery System ™ with built-in communications network using cellular protocols.

Any Radio Frequency, Bluetooth or Wi-Fi device will connect to our Cloud Gaming Mega Sports Device System Cellular Network ™.

Choose your Sport:

a)  Baseball

b)  Basketball

c)  Tennis  

d)  Golf  

e)  Soccer  

f)   Football        

g)  Boxing/Martial Arts  

h)  Chess

 

Where will the Cloud Gaming Mega Sports Device System ™ is made initially?

We will make the Cloud Gaming Mega Sports Device System ™ in the United States, using our talented Graduate School Computer Science and Engineering Group. We have already lined up nationally and internationally talented Engineering and Business people to help our dream company go to the next level once initial donations are obtained. 

As International Graduate Students, we want our innovative company to start local (USA) and branch out internationally via licensing agreements. We want to build a globally recognized brand.

 

Established Developers

We welcome established developers to develop new types of hardware and software for our Cloud Gaming Mega Sports Device System ™. You will find our development platform to be world class and easy to develop for, since there is no restriction that makes you operating system dependent. Smart Cloud Gaming ™ frees developers from being operating system dependent. This is true development freedom for all. Our system development kit will make all hackers happy.

 

New Developers

We especially want you, since many of you are young like us. Even if you are in junior high school, or high school, or in college like us you have an equal chance to develop hardware and software and makes money too. If you are not young like us and have a good feel for developing new innovations for the gaming or electronics industry we want you too. You will find our development platform to be world class and easy to develop for, since there is no restriction that makes you operating system dependent. Smart Cloud Gaming ™ frees developers from being operating system dependent. This is true development freedom for all. Our system development kit will make all hackers happy too.

 

Indiegogo Smart Mega Machine Hardware Exclusive

All Indiegogo patrons whose perks include receiving one or more Cloud Gaming Mega Sports Device will receive an ABSOLUTELY FREE hardware upgrades for ONE (1) YEAR, which includes shipping.

Specifically if your perk includes Ten (10) Cloud Gaming Mega Sports Device Systems, you will receive Ten (10) Cloud Gaming Mega Sports Device Systems upgrades free for one year.

 

Smart Mega Machine™ (SMM) or Internet Sports Computer™ (ISC) and Smart Controller in the News

Smart Mega Machine™ or Internet Sports Computer™ News Article

Wireless Week. — The folks who made it possible to play golf over the Internet are planning a new game. Internet Golf Multimedia Inc. here hopes to launch next year the Java-based Internet Sports Computer (ISC), which will handle both golf and interactive sports that "volley" by recording and relaying the players' muscle contractions in real-time.

The company's original smart golf club, the Genius, enabled opponents to remotely play golf against each other on a PC by measuring their real-world performance in hitting a real ball. The ISC, by contrast, will be a freestanding, wireless unit that expands beyond golf to a more generic format capable of representing a variety of one-on-one games — basketball, tennis, racket ball or even a one-on-one baseball variant that is illegal everywhere except cyberspace.

On the other hand, the Internet Sports Computer includes the hardware for real-time transmission of motion information in games where both players are acting simultaneously-such as tennis volleys. Sophisticated motion analysis routines are being put into a custom chip, said the company, to animate a figure on the screen. The animated figure can be used to pinpoint problems with the movements in a swing.

Where the Genius golf club uses PC software along with a couple of ASICs and an RF transceiver, the freestanding ISC has an embedded microprocessor. The smart club (or a smart racket) will communicate with the belt-pack-mounted ISC, which in turn uses a wireless communications strategy to access the Internet.

For the future, the ISC will supplement its golf putter with a new driver model and a new line of wireless tennis rackets, baseball bats, basketballs and other smart sports gear. Because each device is wireless, the clubs, rackets and bats can be taken outdoors, Murdock pointed out.

"Eventually we hope to mediate not just one-to-one contests, but contests among thousands of different players worldwide," said Murdock.

 

Smart Controller in the News

  • Electronic Engineering Times - "The club is said to have a look and heft of our average driver but when a golfer hits a golf ball with it, several sensors in the club's head detect where and how contact with the ball is made. An embedded computer analyzes the input from the sensor array and determines whether contact with sensor array and determines whether contact was made on the clubs heel, toe, “or sweet spot.”

  • EE Times - After the ball is struck, a voice (speaking either English or Japanese tells the golf weather he hit the ball on the club's Sweet spot or right or left of it.

  • Triangle business Journal - A New York entrepreneur whose firm has developed a “smart” golf club is scouting North Carolina for a plant site to manufacture the clubs.

  • EE Times - Blending Java and biofeedback technologies, Internet Golf Multimedia Inc. (Bronx, New York) has created what it calls the world's first smart golf club, which a user can link to the Internet to compete in a global golf competition. The club is a genuine putter of with an aforementioned circuitry and off-the-shelf RF transceiver located in its head.

  • The New York Times - But the Internet opens up even more intriguing possibility: letting golfers compete simultaneously even when teeing up the ball thousand miles apart. Mr. Murdock wants to use cyberspace to free players from the constraints of distance to enjoying not simply a multiplayer virtual game – like sapping digital zombies or racing on 3 – D race tracks – but a game is “totally legal.”

  • New York Daily News – using their knowledge of electrical engineering and fiber optics, they've created club said that let golfers used their home computers to play against one another from anywhere in the world.

  • Wireless Week - Up for around the wireless golf?  Players can watch the best trajectory communicate in real time with distant opponents. It wirelessly synchronizes your motion and movement with the way your brain functions.

  • Golf Digest- Feedback constantly forms of an actual voice in a digital display that indicates how close contact comes in the sweet spot.

 

The Smart Mega Machine Gaming System is supported by One (1) Patent and Multiple Patent Pending

The Smart Mega Machine™ System or Internet Sports Computer™ has a patent pending status.

1)  Patented Smart Golf Club Multiplayer System for the Internet™ (Patent Number US7789742)

2)  Patent Pending Smart Transmitter™ and Smart Receiver™ For Interactive System™    

3)  Patent Pending Smart Golf Software™    

4)  Patent Pending Smart Internet Sports Apparatus with Multiple Wireless Protocols™

 

Software Titles

Our Smart Golfing Software™ will be our first title that ready to be shipped in a few months (July 2013). It is the first and only Smart Golfing Software™ for learning how to Play Real Golf™  for better golf ball and club control individually (single player mode) and with a group (multiplayer mode).

        Fig.5 Play with Players from across the Ocean

 

Another software title is the Smart Basketball Software™ for learning how to Play Real Basketball™ for better basketball control and learning to improve your playing skills.

Use our system to compete and talk with other golfers in both Single and Multiplayer worldwide via our Smart Cloud Gaming System™.

Use our system to compete and talk with other basketball players in both single and multiplayer worldwide via our Smart Cloud Gaming System™.

Use our system to compete and talk with other Tennis players in both single and multiplayer worldwide via our Smart Cloud Gaming System™.

 

Smart Gaming Software

The Smart Gaming Software™ user universal interface and Smart Controller™ prototypes are working smoothly together. With our expertise will we finish building the Smart Mega Machine™1 which is not difficult, but capital intensive or expensive? With your help we can change that.

E-MAIL CONFIRMATION

Before Shipping your Smart Mega Machine™1, an email will be sent out asking you what:

a) Color or Colors you want  

b) What Smart Gaming Software™1 you want, if it does not come with your Perk      

c) Optional Features

 

With Indiegogo Support and Donations We Can:

  • Purchase equipment to manufacture the Smart Mega Machine™ in-house right here in the United States creating jobs and later in other countries.
  • Start to manufacture the Smart Mega Machine™ based on our patent pending and prototype designs and create jobs!!!!
  • Build our Beyond Virtual or Augmented Reality Smart Games Website
  • Miniaturize the Smart Controller™ for All Sports Apparatus
  •  Create more Smart Software Titles™1
  • Finalize Design and Manufacture our Physiological Systems and or Custom Physiological Processor
  • Smart Seed™ our Smart Cloud Gaming Developer Kits™ for all local and international developers

Specifications 

  • Snapdragon S4 processor
  • 1GB RAM 
  • 8GB of internal flash storage
  • Wireless HDMI
  • WiFi 802.11 b/g/n 
  • Bluetooth LE 4.0 
  • USB 2.0

story:
Introducing

What is DeoSpace.com?

Our goal:  To be the social network Pope Francis WILL join!

DeoSpace - the social network of the New Evangelization - brings you dramatic, relevant connections to all aspects of the life of the Church.  The Vatican announced the new Catholic social network in March 2014, and since then the network has grown steadily.  We’re anxious to launch in more languages – currently we feature Spanish, Italian and English – and reach a huge audience of Catholics worldwide.

DeoSpace is a platform whose time has come.  It provides a virtual overlay for the world’s largest physical social network – the Catholic Church.  Today social media dominate mass communications at all levels.  DeoSpace is an answer to the Church’s call to “baptize” the Internet.  By your participation in this campaign and as a DeoSpace member, you can make an enduring contribution to the New Evangelization.

DeoSpace.com is a communication vehicle that enlivens parish and diocesan life by providing a platform to extend prayer after liturgy, helping to build community and accelerate faith formation. DeoSpace puts the best of the digital world at the service of the church, giving even the busiest families a way to connect to their own parish, their diocese and the Universal Church. If you would like to make a significant, lasting contribution to the Catholic Church of the 21st Century, DeoSpace is for you.  Your tax deductible contribution helps DeoSpace.com expand and grow.

Why DeoSpace Matters

The Catholic Church is a ready-made social network in itself, we simply overlay the physical infrastructure with the virtual network – and we will have 100 million users before you know it. Social networks dominate mass communications at all levels.  By creating our own social media vehicle, the Church has a great opportunity to take the leadership in the next frontier of mass communications.  The Church was left behind in the print, radio, and TV but here we have the chance to be at the forefront. 

So what’s different about DeoSpace?  On DeoSpace you are an individual in the image and likeness of God.  Other social networks are really advertising delivery systems using connectivity to family and friends so someone can sell you something.  On DeoSpace the connectivity we’re focused on for users is to the Universal Church.  DeoSpace seeks to connect hearts and souls and thereby build the Kingdom of God.

DeoSpace is an exciting opportunity to change the paradigm of the Internet and Catholics’ interaction with it.  DeoSpace represents this generation’s chance to make a real and lasting difference in evangelization, community, sustainability and the Universal Church. If you’ve ever wanted to make a difference in salvation history, this is your chance.  Become a part of the DeoSpace family as a social network member and help our campaign with your contribution today.

                                                           

How will Funds be Used?

The first $50,000 will enable us to acquire and host the additional servers we need to support the growth of our user base, extend the functionalities of the network, and allow DeoSpace to begin to hire and expand our team.  As our membership grows we come closer to the goal of being self-sustaining.   All contributions to DeoSpace are tax deductible.

Other than crowdfunding, other funding sources include, but are not limited to:

  • Partnerships
  • Advertisers
  • Grants

How You Can Help

  • Is my contribution tax deductible?

Buzz about DeoSpace.com

                                               

                                     Credo                        Wordpress           The Official Vatican News

             

                                           Pontifical Council for Social Communications

                                 

                         TGCom 24                           Facebook                     Daughters of St. Paul

                                                   

                                                                       Forum Libertas

            

                                                     

Who Are We?

NEA – New Evangelization of America and parent of DeoSpace.com - had its inception at a conference held in Dallas in December, 1998. From the conference, an organization was born to begin a coordinated, strategic response to the tragic loss of the faithful in Latin America.  Inspired by Pope John Paul II's call for a new evangelization of America and guided by the greatest evangelist of America, Our Lady of Guadalupe, the first NEA conference drew up a blueprint for carrying forward the ministry begun by Our Lady of Guadalupe into the next millennium and bringing about a renaissance of the Faith in all of America.  Participating bishops guided NEA to focus its mission on mass communications, which is nothing less than a force multiplier in the field of evangelization.

Many fruits resulted in expanding the reach and voice of the Church in the most remote corners of the Americas.  NEA’s mission statement went far beyond facilitating connections between the media producers and the shepherds of the Church: 

  • Inspiring new communication initiatives of benefit to the Church, especially those involved in mass media and new technologies.
  • Serving as a liaison and resource center for Catholic communication organizations throughout the Americas.
  • Serving as a liaison and resource to the particular Churches (Dioceses) in developing and sustaining media outlets and resources, including assisting with the training and education for those within the Church working in the field of communications.
  • Helping to coordinate both fund raising activities and training in fund raising for Catholic communication entities.
  • Providing networking opportunities for Catholic communicators through meetings, publications, conferences and other activities.
  • Working with governmental entities, the business community and other non-Catholic communication organizations on issues pertinent to the work of NEA and the Catholic community it serves.
  • Assisting in any way possible with the training, education and spiritual growth of those within the Church working in the field of communications.

With DeoSpace.com, NEA now embarks on an initiative that synthesizes many of the elements of this mission statement and makes them achievable in on both the physical and virtual plains of the Church. 

The Chairman of DeoSpace, an affiliate of NEA, is Cardinal Óscar Andrés Rodríguez Maradiaga, S.D.B., Archbishop of Tegucigalpa, Chairman of Pope Francis’ Council of Cardinals; the President is Bishop Kevin Farrell, Bishop of Dallas; and the Managing Director is Mario Cappello, President of the Institute for World Evangelization, a Rome-based Pontifical Right organization.   See our Team's bios below!
story_txt:
Introducing

What is DeoSpace.com?
Our goal:  To be the social network Pope Francis WILL join!DeoSpace - the social network of the New
Evangelization - brings you dramatic, relevant connections to all aspects of the
life of the Church.  The Vatican announced the new Catholic social network in March 2014, and since then the
network has grown steadily.  We’re
anxious to launch in more languages – currently we feature Spanish, Italian and
English – and reach a huge audience of Catholics worldwide.
DeoSpace
is a platform whose time has come.  It
provides a virtual overlay for the world’s largest physical social network –
the Catholic Church.  Today social media dominate mass
communications at all levels.  DeoSpace is an answer to the Church’s call
to “baptize” the Internet.  By your
participation in this campaign and as a DeoSpace member, you can make an
enduring contribution to the New Evangelization.
DeoSpace.com is a
communication vehicle that enlivens parish and diocesan life by providing a
platform to extend prayer after liturgy, helping to build community and
accelerate faith formation. DeoSpace puts the best of the digital world at the
service of the church, giving even the busiest families a way to connect to
their own parish, their diocese and the Universal Church. If you would like to
make a significant, lasting contribution
to the Catholic Church of the 21st Century, DeoSpace is for you.  Your tax
deductible contribution helps DeoSpace.com expand and grow.

Why DeoSpace Matters
The Catholic Church is a ready-made social
network in itself, we simply overlay the physical infrastructure with the
virtual network – and we will have 100 million users before you know it. Social
networks dominate mass communications at all levels.  By creating our own
social media vehicle, the Church has a great opportunity to take the leadership
in the next frontier of mass communications.  The Church was left behind
in the print, radio, and TV but here we have the
chance to be at the forefront.  
So
what’s different about DeoSpace?  On DeoSpace you
are an individual in the image and likeness of God.  Other social networks are really advertising delivery systems using connectivity to family and friends so
someone can sell you something.  On
DeoSpace the connectivity we’re focused on for users is to the Universal
Church.  DeoSpace seeks to
connect hearts and souls and thereby build the Kingdom of God.
DeoSpace is an exciting opportunity to change
the paradigm of the Internet and Catholics’ interaction with it.  DeoSpace represents this generation’s chance
to make a real and lasting difference in evangelization, community,
sustainability and the Universal Church. If you’ve ever wanted to make a
difference in salvation history, this is your chance.  Become a part of the DeoSpace family as a
social network member and help our campaign with your contribution today.                                                           How
will Funds be Used?
The first $50,000 will
enable us to acquire and host the additional servers we need to support the
growth of our user base, extend the
functionalities of the network, and allow DeoSpace to begin to hire and expand our team.  As our membership grows we come closer to the goal of being self-sustaining.   All contributions to DeoSpace are tax deductible.Other than crowdfunding, other funding sources include, but are not
limited to:

Partnerships

Advertisers

Grants

Large Donors

                                                                 How
You Can Help
Getting the word out is just as important as
donations. You can support this campaign by:
Joining the site, actively
engaging on it, and inviting your friends. 
DeoSpace.com would love to have you and your friends and family as
members!

your prayers and join us in this Novena!

story:
A personal seismic alarm that alerts you before destructive S waves reach your place with capability to speak the magnitude of quakes.

Earthquakes are natural events that are unpredictable. For this reason they can occur at any time. However, earthquakes emits waves that can be detected seconds before the destructive S waves reach your location. These waves are called P waves. P waves can be used to alert immediately through sounds of high pitch capable to wake you up if you are sleeping at night. When S waves reaches your location the earthquake detector will speak and estimate the magnitude of the earthquake using the Mercalli Scale. Results: saving lives

The earthquake alarm will distinguish the P-wave from the S-wave through the change of their own waves frequencies. When P waves comes in, they will trigger a sensor (horizontal movement sensor) that will switch on a high pitch sound, the alarm sound, with 100 decibels. If there is no S waves, the vertical motion sensor wouldn't trigger its other peculiar alarm. In both cases, will have a sensor that using the sensors information will calculate the most approximate magnitude of the telluric movement at your location and this value will vary upon the epicentre of the earthquake and how distant it is from your specific location. The magnitude of this calculate will be shown on a led screen in front of the device. And it also will speak loudly this magnitude each 30 seconds in English, Spanish, and French according to the settings given to the unit. The unit would be small and conveniently mobile, perfect to hang it on a wall or in other 90 degree structure. It will not require any calibration nor other process to be useful after the customer take it out from its box or package. Another characteristic is that it will function with two AA batteries, and when its charge is so low, the unit will emit a little sound sporadically and will shown an icon on the screen plus will switch on a yellow light. The other lights are green that means perfect functioning and a red light that means an earthquake is occurring with the other functionalities like the sound, the magnitude calculation and so forth.


                 


This alarm could be more than a simple alarm, it would be design to work with smartphones and it will have too a led screen that will give an approximation of the earthquake’s magnitude in Mercalli scale. This information that can be synchronized with your smartphones at instant. Also the information could be use, with the owner permission, to local state’s earthquake office ( like USGS) through the smartphones to make rescue efforts more easy. So, imagine that rescuers can detect your smartphone signal remotely and rescue you faster than today's tecniques. It would be a new product category that would be essential to the personal and family security and it will be at an affordable cost.



----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The earthquake alarm detector does not predict when or where an earthquake will occur. Its vital function is to detect the first and very rapid earthquake’s P waves (or horizontal wave) that travels faster than the velocity of the sound. They are not destructive waves and usually they can be heard with our ears because it is out of human sound range. Animals like dogs and other animals can detect these waves minutes before or even days before as it was seen in Aquila’s earthquake in Italy. In 2009, a region of central Italy named L’Aquila suffered a great quake that cost lives and properties. It was seen that three days before the frogs living in a near pond migrate out of the place and it was a theme that was published out by some scientists.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Approximately size would be 5.1 x 2 x 3.7 x 3.7 inches or 13 x 2 x 2 centimetres. Approximately weight would be 10 ounces or 283 grams.

story:
What are people saying about touchscreen menus?

"I like the idea of having a tablet at the table, so that you can take your time and order without feeling stressed by a waiting waiter. But there should be a 'call waiter' button."

             - Eva G.

 

"I would like it very much if the tablet had a photo of the food so I could see what I was ordering. And nutritional info and ingredients. My biggest pet peeve about eating in restaurants is not knowing the ingredients."

             - Nancy M.

 

"A loyalty program would be awesome. I would probably go to restaurants more if they gave some sort of reward for eating there."

             - Shawn V.

 

Why Touchmenu?

"So its Friday night, date night maybe, and you show up to your favorite restaurant only to find out there's over a half hour wait."

Sound familiar?

If you're lucky some places might provide you with a paging device that notifies you when your table is ready. ("Hey, 1995 called, they want their pagers back.") Next, the hostess seats you and you wait patiently until your server arrives to take drink orders. "I'll have the Very Berry Limeade, please." While the server frantically juggles another ten tables, you look over the menu and try to create images in your mind from the "mouth-watering" descriptions of the items that didn't quite make the cut to get their photo taken.

Then, like any normal human being you get distracted while talking to your friends and forget you still have to decide what it is you want to eat tonight. As the underpaid and over worked server comes by for the second time you frantically scan the menu for anything that looks appetizing, but all you see are words. By this time you couldn't care less what you get. It beats looking like a fool in front of your friends as you ask the ever so patient waitress to "please come back."

Now that you've decided what you want you can finally relax and enjoy. Or can you? My problem is I relax too much and for some reason wait until the last possible second to decide to get dessert. Its usually about this time that the server comes by with the dessert menu and then I regret not ordering it 20 minutes ago instead of now, when I'd rather just go home and fall into a food coma.

Things don't need to be this complicated and old fashioned. Take a look at what we came up with to make eating out a lot more efficient, and of course, fun!

Place and pay for orders at any time

"You can order whenever you're ready and as many times as you want."
 
Unlike traditional menus, the tablets never leave the table. So if you're sitting there enjoying your delicious rib-eye and you decide you want that molten lava chocolate cake you've had your eye on, simply submit it to your check and your server will have it out to you before you can say "could I see a dessert menu?"  

Also, don't feel like you have to inconvenience the server when you're ready to leave. Just select your payment method, provide the necessary information and voilà, you're done!

Make real-time reservations & place orders

"Remember the days when we had to wait almost an hour to be seated?"

The world is moving at a much faster pace today and people are busier than ever. With the Touchmenu mobile app you'll be able to cut up to an hour off your wait time by ordering and reserving your table before you even get to the restaurant.

Customizing your meal

Let's be honest, when it comes to what we eat, people are as different as their hairstyles. With Touchmenu you can check the nutrition facts of an item and even personalize it to your preference. Choose to remove cheese, add extra sauce, put the dressing on the side, or cook it medium rare. And its all at your fingertips!

Play games

Instead of staring awkwardly at your date or listening to grandpa tell his version of D-day, play some entertaining multi-player games that are sure to make waiting a whole lot more fun! 

Watch movie trailers & purchase tickets

While you wait you can watch movie trailers and get showtimes. And if you see one you like you can even purchase tickets!

Splitting checks

When you're ready to leave, you can specify who pays for what with simple "drag and drop."

theMall

Entertainment

Browse through an extensive list of entertainment ideas in your area. 

Events

Much like the Entertainment section, browse upcoming events in your region.

Deals

Like other popular "deal-of-the-day" sites, local and national companies can offer discounted services or products to the public.

 

Favorites List

Create a list of your favorite items and use it to shortcut your ordering process.

Share your visit on Facebook and Twitter

Purchase e-gift cards

Once you've registered for a Touchmenu account you can buy e-gift cards. You can select any amount, and the card never expires.

 

Rewards

Status

We've been developing the Touchmenu tablet and interface for a little over a year now and we are extremely excited to show you what we've come up with. So far we have:

  • A 3D printed prototype of the outer casing. 
  • Developed the Virtual Prototype of the mobile application.
  • Developed the Virtual Prototype of the tablet interface.

The Touchmenu tablet is based on an "off-the-shelf" design that our manufacturer had. (With some slight component modifications and additional features that cater toward restaurant use.) Since we are using an existing reference design for the tablet we are able to get to market a lot quicker and with little to no complications.

Due to copyrights we are unable to show pictures of the circuit board and the design blueprints.

 

Functional Software Prototypes

 

 

Why do we need your help?

The answer is twofold:

1. We need your help to begin development of the iOS and Android mobile applications, the tablet interface, and start production of the first round of tablets.

2. We need you! ALL OF YOU!  In order to share our dream with the world we need help from everyone. That's why we set such a low reward tier of only $12. This way everybody can be a part of Touchmenu's fruition, and get a super fly t-shirt to show off, as well! You're more than welcome to pledge more, and we would be extremely flattered, but our main goal is to create buzz about our awesome plans! 

"Our mission is to help innovate an industry that is long overdue for a makeover, and with your help we'll be able to accomplish a whole lot more!"

 

Production Plans

We have teamed up with a U.S. based manufacturer and are using their reference design tablet as the foundation for the Touchmenu tablet. We are excited about this decision because it gives us the freedom to get to market quicker and have a product that is already tested and reliable!

The first step will be to produce 10 units with the manufacturer to confirm quality and assembly accuracy. Next, we will initiate molding for the outer casing. Once we are pleased with the production quality of both we will start full production.

With any sort of electronics manufacturing there are issues that can arise no matter how prepared. We are fortunate enough to have a manufacturer that we trust and that has an excellent track record with electronics manufacturing, especially with tablet PCs and notebooks. 


Application Development Challenges

Developing the app to work on two platforms requires more work and increases the chances of problems in the final applications. However, we have several seasoned app developers on our team that are proficient in both iOS and Android platforms and have successfully launched top selling apps in both environments. 

 

The Last Word

We believe that this modernization is just what the restaurant industry needs to stand out in the fast pace of our world today. Everything around us is modernizing more and more each day. In the last five years we've seen movie rentals go digital, mobile internet become commonplace, life experiences can be shared worldwide through social networking, and touchscreen devices are in the hands of children as young as two. We are an ever changing people. We long for innovation. As our lives get busier we expect things to move faster too.
story_txt:
What are people saying about touchscreen menus?
"I like the idea of having a tablet at the table, so that you can take your time and order without feeling stressed by a waiting waiter. But there should be a 'call waiter' button."
             - Eva G.
 
"I would like it very much if the tablet had a photo of the food so I could see what I was ordering. And nutritional info and ingredients. My biggest pet peeve about eating in restaurants is not knowing the ingredients."
             - Nancy M.
 
"A loyalty program would be awesome. I would probably go to restaurants more if they gave some sort of reward for eating there."
             - Shawn V.


 
Why Touchmenu?

"So its Friday night, date night maybe, and you show up to your favorite restaurant only to find out there's over a half hour wait."
Sound familiar?
If you're lucky some places might provide you with a paging device that notifies you when your table is ready. ("Hey, 1995 called, they want their pagers back.") Next, the hostess seats you and you wait patiently until your server arrives to take drink orders. "I'll have the Very Berry Limeade, please." While the server frantically juggles another ten tables, you look over the menu and try to create images in your mind from the "mouth-watering" descriptions of the items that didn't quite make the cut to get their photo taken.
Then, like any normal human being you get distracted while talking to your friends and forget you still have to decide what it is you want to eat tonight. As the underpaid and over worked server comes by for the second time you frantically scan the menu for anything that looks appetizing, but all you see are words. By this time you couldn't care less what you get. It beats looking like a fool in front of your friends as you ask the ever so patient waitress to "please come back."
Now that you've decided what you want you can finally relax and enjoy. Or can you? My problem is I relax too much and for some reason wait until the last possible second to decide to get dessert. Its usually about this time that the server comes by with the dessert menu and then I regret not ordering it 20 minutes ago instead of now, when I'd rather just go home and fall into a food coma.
Things don't need to be this complicated and old fashioned. Take a look at what we came up with to make eating out a lot more efficient, and of course, fun!
Place and pay for orders at any time
"You can order whenever you're ready and as many times as you want."
 
Unlike traditional menus, the tablets never leave the table. So if you're sitting there enjoying your delicious rib-eye and you decide you want that molten lava chocolate cake you've had your eye on, simply submit it to your check and your server will have it out to you before you can say "could I see a dessert menu?"  
Also, don't feel like you have to inconvenience the server when you're ready to leave. Just select your payment method, provide the necessary information and voilà, you're done!
Make real-time reservations & place orders
"Remember the days when we had to wait almost an hour to be seated?"


The world is moving at a much faster pace today and people are busier than ever. With the Touchmenu mobile app you'll be able to cut up to an hour off your wait time by ordering and reserving your table before you even get to the restaurant.
Customizing your meal
Let's be honest, when it comes to what we eat, people are as different as their hairstyles. With Touchmenu you can check the nutrition facts of an item and even personalize it to your preference. Choose to remove cheese, add extra sauce, put the dressing on the side, or cook it medium rare. And its all at your fingertips!
Play games
Instead of staring awkwardly at your date or listening to grandpa tell his version of D-day, play some entertaining multi-player games that are sure to make waiting a whole lot more fun! 

Watch movie trailers & purchase tickets
While you wait you can watch movie trailers and get showtimes. And if you see one you like you can even purchase tickets!
Splitting checks
When you're ready to leave, you can specify who pays for what with simple "drag and drop."

theMall
Entertainment
Browse through an extensive list of entertainment ideas in your area. 
Events
Much like the Entertainment section, browse upcoming events in your region.
Deals
Like other popular "deal-of-the-day" sites, local and national companies can offer discounted services or products to the public.

 
Favorites List
Create a list of your favorite items and use it to shortcut your ordering process.

Share your visit on Facebook and Twitter
Purchase e-gift cards
Once you've registered for a Touchmenu account you can buy e-gift cards. You can select any amount, and the card never expires.
 
Rewards

Status
We've been developing the Touchmenu tablet and interface for a little over a year now and we are extremely excited to show you what we've come up with. So far we have:

A 3D printed prototype of the outer casing. 
Developed the Virtual Prototype of the mobile application.
Developed the Virtual Prototype of the tablet interface.
The Touchmenu tablet is based on an "off-the-shelf" design that our manufacturer had. (With some slight component modifications and additional features that cater toward restaurant use.) Since we are using an existing reference design for the tablet we are able to get to market a lot quicker and with little to no complications.

Due to copyrights we are unable to show pictures of the circuit board and the design blueprints.
 
Functional Software Prototypes

 

 
Why do we need your help?
The answer is twofold:
1. We need your help to begin development of the iOS and Android mobile applications, the tablet interface, and start production of the first round of tablets.
2. We need you! ALL OF YOU!  In order to share our dream with the world we need help from everyone. That's why we set such a low reward tier of only $12. This way everybody can be a part of Touchmenu's fruition, and get a super fly t-shirt to show off, as well! You're more than welcome to pledge more, and we would be extremely flattered, but our main goal is to create buzz about our awesome plans! 
"Our mission is to help innovate an industry that is long overdue for a makeover, and with your help we'll be able to accomplish a whole lot more!"
 
Production Plans
We have teamed up with a U.S. based manufacturer and are using their reference design tablet as the foundation for the Touchmenu tablet. We are excited about this decision because it gives us the freedom to get to market quicker and have a product that is already tested and reliable!
The first step will be to produce 10 units with the manufacturer to confirm quality and assembly accuracy. Next, we will initiate molding for the outer casing. Once we are pleased with the production quality of both we will start full production.
With any sort of electronics manufacturing there are issues that can arise no matter how prepared. We are fortunate enough to have a manufacturer that we trust and that has an excellent track record with electronics manufacturing, especially with tablet PCs and notebooks. Application Development Challenges
Developing the app to work on two platforms requires more work and increases the chances of problems in the final applications. However, we have several seasoned app developers on our team that are proficient in both iOS and Android platforms and have successfully launched top selling apps in both environments. 
 
The Last Word
We believe that this modernization is just what the restaurant industry needs to stand out in the fast pace of our world today. Everything around us is modernizing more and more each day. In the last five years we've seen movie rentals go digital, mobile internet become commonplace, life experiences can be shared worldwide through social networking, and touchscreen devices are in the hands of children as young as two. We are an ever changing people. We long for innovation. As our lives get busier we expect things to move faster too.

story:
PurePort is the one tool you need to keep all your Apple devices, plus your cables and accessories, clean where it counts – INSIDE as well as out!

If you’re suffering unreliable connections right now, PurePort can solve them, and restore cables you may have considered ‘faulty’ to perfect working order.

But prevention is always better than cure – regular use (every 3-6 months) ensures you avoid poor connectivity or arcing damage before it occurs.

PurePort in use for basic cleaning of Lightning port and charge cable.

PurePort will extend the life of your iPhone and iPad, save you unnecessarily replacing cables, and solve the hassle of unreliable connections.

If you’ve ever experienced unreliable connections charging your iPhone or iPad, you’ll know how annoying it can be.

intermittent iPhone connection issues are enough to drive you mad!

Our extensive research revealed that the primary cause of these common connection issues was contamination of the Lightning ports with various types of debris – lint, hair, tissue fragments, skin oil, and other dry or moist contaminants.

But because you can’t SEE inside your Lightning port, once these nasties get inside, they stay there, causing increasingly unreliable connections.

But are these issues common?

Unfortunately, connectivity issues with iPhones and iPads are all too common...

Our research, including 150 random iPhone and iPad user surveys and focus groups involving 100 participants, revealed that 57% of them had experienced connectivity issues, with most of those having problems “many times” or “occasionally”.

Through extensive research and testing, we discovered that no single tool could adequately clean the different types of contamination affecting Lightning ports on iPhones and iPads. And certainly couldn’t help repair the damage caused by debris, namely the oxide/arcing (black marks) you may have noticed on cable tips, and won’t have noticed on the connector pins inside your Lightning port.

So we set out to create the ultimate multi-tool to address all aspects of cleaning your Lightning ports and cables, ensuring reliable connectivity, and reviving damaged ports and cables. PurePort’s seven tools help you address three essential issues: 

Tools 1-4: Clean & Revive Lightning Ports

The first four tools make it easy and safe to remove ALL types of debris from your Lightning port. Even reaching the hard-to-reach cavity behind the retainer springs on the edges of the port, repairing oxide damage on internal pins, and removing stains and non-dry contaminants. 

Tools 5-6: Clean & Revive Lightning Connectors on Cables and Accessories

The next two tools can clean the tips of your cables of dry debris and stains. And also reduce oxide damage (the black marks where arcing over the connector has pitted the delicate contacts), restoring strong connectivity. 

Tool 7: Speaker & Switch Brush

To keep your iPhone’s other ‘orifices’ clean, we’ve designed the perfect size, shape, bristle thickness/length mini brush. Use it to clean the lint that tends to build up in the speakers and headphone of your device, as well as around switches. 

If your speaker holes, or headphone slot (where sound comes from when you’re on the phone), look grey or white, it’s likely they’re filled with lint and dust – if they’re clean they should appear black.

Unique Multi-Tool Design

We’ve combined all these tools into a unique multi-tool ‘Swiss Army Knife’ design. Remove and reverse each tool to use it - the body acts as a handle. Or use each tool stand-alone if you prefer.

Micro-Fiber Surface Cloth

To make PurePort the ‘complete’ tool for iPhone and iPad cleaning, we added our preferred surface cleaning solution – a high quality micro-fiber cloth – lint free of course!

Occasional cleaning of your iPhone, iPad and accessories with PurePort will:

Benefits 1 and 2 alone are worth up to $650 for a typical Apple household over five years, in reduced device and cable replacement. But for many iPhone and iPad enthusiasts, being FREE from annoying unreliable connections is the most important thing. All for little more than the price of a single replacement cable...  

Before and After

The problem with contamination of electronic connections, especially inside a Lightning port, is you can’t SEE how bad it is – so you’ll only know it’s a problem when it starts impacting your daily charging and connecting.

A quick clean with PurePort, tools 1-4, can dramatically improve the state of your port and electronic connections:

PurePort tools 5-6 can not only clean the connectors, but reduce the visible oxide/arcing damage (blackening), and restore them to reliable connectivity: 

PurePort will actually reduce the number of new cables you buy – remember, it’s usually not the cable to blame, the cable tips are just ‘the victim’ of contamination inside your device! 

example of PurePort in use

PurePort was founded when wife-and-husband team, Kate & Josh Swinnerton, got tired of cleaning the ports on their iPhones and their young kids’ iPads. After trying many home remedies, and seriously damaging an iPhone with a paperclip (!) they went searching for a product to clean Lightning ports ‘properly’ – but found nothing adequate. 

Researching the problem extensively, they were surprised how many other Apple users also had regular problems with unreliable Lightning port connections – over half of those surveyed complained of similar issues!

Using a digital microscope, they looked inside 100s of Lightning ports, and were shocked by the amount of hair, lint, dust, stains and other debris found, even when the devices looked clean on the outside. 

The PurePort team was put together internationally to further research and develop the product. The team are a group of diverse designers, engineers and digital marketers passionate about keeping their iPhones and iPads working perfectly and free from annoying connection issues. 

Manufacturing 

We’ve partnered with product design and manufacturing experts Production Partners to ensure PurePort is effective, high quality, and gets to market (and into your hands) ASAP.

Production Partners are the design and manufacturing powerhouse behind a string of successful products - KickStarter projects as well as innovative product developments for major brands. Check out their amazing work HERE.

We’ve worked with Production Partners for over 18 months to refine the PurePort design, with extensive Design-for-Manufacture (DfM) optimization of the design to ensure the product can be made at scale and quality. Production Partners will coordinate all aspects of the manufacture, assembly and quality control of your PurePort.

 

Our team followed a rigorous, research-centric process in developing PurePort – from extensive analysis of home remedies and adjacent solutions, to examining relevant cleaning tools used in other industries, and of course a great deal of trial-and-error. 

The PurePort multi-tool concept developed out of the realization that no single tool could possibly clean all types of contamination from both ports and cables, or repair the oxide damage found in many cases.

We took the key tools required to do the job, and combined them into a convenient multi-tool that keeps all sub-tools together and stores each tool, while also acting as a handle.

The multi-tool approach, and the designs of key sub-tools, are now the subject of a US patent and design registration.

If you've read this far, we HUGELY appreciate your support and interest!

If you have questions, please check our FAQ or ask us in comments - we're happy to help.

Choose a reward, back us and we'll get you your very own PurePort, so you can keep clean INSIDE as well as out..

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.

We're working with BackerKit to ensure an easy delivery experience, wherever you are in the world.

Risks and challenges

With your support, we’re confident that we can not only deliver PurePort, but do so promptly and to an exceptional level of quality. Delivery in 2019, NOT two+ years down-the-track!

All product development projects have risks, but PurePort is relatively simple - our latest (v5) prototype, that you can see in the video, is a complete working prototype that we used to clean the ports and cable tip you see in the BEFORE and AFTER shots, so yes, PurePort ‘works’.

We are currently undertaking broader testing with real-world users, and we may make modifications to improve the product based on their feedback - but any changes should only make it even better!

Our team is made up of experienced engineers and designers who’ve successfully delivered large complex, electronics, product, design and software projects.

With our manufacturing partners, Production Partners, we’ve refined the PurePort design for manufacture, with all supply/manufacture/assembly/packaging requirements confirmed and priced in detail.

Thanks for your support!

The PurePort Team
