story:
"This crowdfunding project is probably the most impressive home security product I have reviewed, to date." - indiegogo

"Angee automated home security system doubles as a personal assistant." - gizmag

"Angee is freaking awesome..." - securitygem

"Unparalleled protection ... a brilliant innovation." - Digital Trends

"A new kind of home security. Smart, voice controlled and autonomous." - Robert Siciliano

"The idea of the Echo's capabilities packed into a rotating security cam is quite appealing” - CNET.com




Smart homes will be ubiquitous in the near future, which is why we built Angee to be intelligent, unobtrusive, and, mostly importantly, to just work.


Perhaps Angee’s most important function is fully-automated smart security to protect your home and family. With voice recognition, at-the-door identification, and a portable 360° rotating camera—all without any subscription fees—Angee is revolutionizing home security.



But Angee does so much more than just security. It’s voice-controlled and integrates with your other smart home devices and favorite apps. It has two-way audio and streaming video so you can keep in touch from anyway in the world. And its portable camera is fun, great for recording and sharing! Give your home an upgrade. Get Angee and simplify your world.




Angee automatically arms and disarms based on your location by using phone recognition, with backup voice password authentication. That means no need to enter a code every time you enter or leave your home.

While Angee is meant to be kept in a room where you spend a lot of your time, the entrances and exits of your home are the most important places to monitor. Angee is the world’s first smart security system with complete perimeter security. Just stick security tags on doors and windows and Angee will know exactly who comes and goes.

With Angee you can easily set up to four 'activity zones' which Angee can keep watch over specifically. Angee can keep an eye on your back door, work station, or any other area, and alert you if anyone trespasses in these zones.

Not everyone wants a camera running while they’re home. Angee gets that. Angee will turn away whenever you ask, or you can set Angee not to record you at all and only film unrecognized people. Angee monitors when and how you want it to.

You talk – Angee listens. Angee can understand what you say and who you are. To give you an alternative authentication, set a voice password so that Angee can identify you. You can use your voice as a backup when your phone is dead. Angee is customizable and it's up to you what level of security you choose.

A cool side effect of voice recognition is that all of Angee's intelligent functionality is voice-controlled, so you get hands free communication, access to your favourite online services, and more. 


If your “smart” devices can’t talk to each other, then they’re not really that smart.  Angee gets this, which is why we built Angee to integrate with your other smart devices like Philips Hue, the Honeywell WiFi Smart Thermostat, Belkin WeMo products, and many more more.  Angee’s intelligent machine learning quickly recognizes your normal patterns, and it manages your devices to cohesively work together around the way you live.


For developers and enthusiasts we have an open REST API and IFTTT platform support, so the possibilities are endless for creating your own applications and solutions to integrate with Angee.

Travel a lot? Have people you need to check in on? Angee’s HD video streaming and two-audio makes it easier than ever to communicate with whoever is at home using your smartphone, smartwatch, tablet, or the web. Say you’re on a business trip and you check Angee to find your daughter doing homework in the living room. You can just say hi and start helping her on her algebra! 


Angee's built-in battery lasts 10 hours, making it ideal for keeping an eye on your kids or pets while you’re away or even just in another room.  It also enables Angee to keep working in case of a power outage. Should that happen, you'll receive a notification that the power has gone out and Angee will continue monitoring. If your WiFi goes offline, the server will notify you and Angee will continue to record any activity at home, saving the footage to her local storage.


The most amazing memories aren’t planned. Take Angee wherever the action is, and it’s motion-tracking camera will catch whatever happens. Whether it’s for streaming dance performances for grandparents on the other side of the country or just for catching the weird stuff your cat does, Angee is loads of fun to have around!



Whether it's for your smartphone, iPad or your smart watch we have designed the mobile experience to be a perfect natural extension of interaction with Angee. Connect to your home from anywhere and instantly understand what’s going on there.

Angee tells you what’s happening at home via a beautiful app which works on any device. You’ll receive an instant notification on your smartphone, tablet, and smartwatch if something out of the ordinary happens, and you can also use the app or the web to connect with Angee remotely and see what she sees.



Angee uses smart triggers to detect and record events that matter, so you don't have to waste storage of uneventful video footage. On top of this, we provide 1GB of free cloud storage – no monthly fees required! 



Our system is autonomous. This is important because the only way to effectively secure your home is to eliminate human interaction, namely arming and disarming the system manually. 

To make a system truly autonomous—a feat only we have achieved—requires making it completely reliable. It all comes down to the ability of the system to sense human presence at home, no matter what room you're in, at all times, and under all circumstances.

While other systems use only the main device to sense human presence, we use a combination multiple devices. Angee uses security tags to monitor the area effectively. The tags are placed at all entry points to your home and host a combination of motion and proximity sensors. They can detect when someone has entered or exited the area as well as create a network sensing the proximity of nearby phones more reliably than a single device ever could. As a result — Angee will always know who is at home.

To help evaluate what's going on at home and whether there is a potential threat, Angee uses a combination of parameters, including entry and exit patterns, changes in the background noise, and voice differentiation, all while monitoring motion and background noise to identify and record any suspicious activity. Moreover, with Angee you can also easily set up to four activity zones in Angee's sight. Angee will keep an eye on and alert you when these zones are trespassed. Angee is very easy to use—in fact it's seamless—it just works.

Angee has been built with data protection best practices in mind. Angee core developers are experienced with real-time embedded software development. We are striving to develop high quality software by internally following similarly strict revision rules as they are used in the top open-source projects (i.e. Linux kernel).


Combining electronic and mechanical design as we developed Angee, we were confronted with paradoxes and contradictory demands on functionality. We set our goal clearly: To overcome these challenges without compromising the experience we envisioned, making the form substantial and the design compelling. 

To build such an advanced system with great user experience, we often had to pioneer and innovate our way through. And the result? Form meets the desired function completely. You can read more about the challenges on our blog. 

We will have an open REST API so other developers and enthusiasts can integrate Angee into their applications and solutions. IFTTT platform support will be also available to everyone.



Everyone can live an easier life with the right technology, but it doesn't have to be distracting. It should be powerful, but subtle. Angee is a project we believe has the potential to enhance our lives by changing the way we interact with our homes.

We make products for everyone, so we listen to everyone. By listening to the community, we are constantly improving our product and meeting people’s needs. We are on the forefront of technological innovation, but more importantly we are on the forefront of your experience with technology.  

"In the future, smart hardware and technologies will be omnipresent. They will be easy to use ￼￼￼and perfectly integrated into our environment. These systems will understand and predict ￼￼￼what we need, saving us time and energy, and making our lives easier and more productive. ￼￼￼Angee is a big step toward this future”. -Tomas Turek, CEO and Co-Founder


It’s the 21st century, yet securing our homes is still a frustrating experience.

What started with the curiosity of the founder soon developed into the relentless passion of our talented programmers and designers. We all came together 18 months ago to develop a better way to protect our homes. 

We started by learning from people's experience with early versions of smart security systems. Our team is inspired to make the smartest home security system ever; useful, convenient, and tailored to each individual’s needs. 

After the initial phase of analysing the problem and the available solutions, we experimented extensively, creating prototypes to test individual aspects of our solution. We have gathered the necessary expertise, but soon realized that to scale, we needed both capital and serial production experience. 

To make up for what we lacked, we partnered with a well-established hardware company who had offered to help. We made our first prototype in just four months and it exceeded everyone's expectations, except ours. After this very short and intensive sprint, the big company offered to buy us. We decided to stay independent and invest our own money to pursue our vision of a smarter technology for a simpler life. 

Learning from our mistakes, we re-imagined the whole concept of our product, starting with the original idea and applying all our hard-earned knowledge. Our willingness and ability to sacrifice everything we had done up to that point then start from scratch was the single best decision that has enabled us to create such a remarkable product. 

Now our second prototype is ready, and we are excited to introduce it to the world.


”Great people are driven toward great things, The Angee project has attracted the best and most insane young talents. Together we are creating a beautiful, intuitive product people will love.“ - Rosta, Our CTO

For more details read our blog.
story_txt:
"This crowdfunding project is probably the most impressive home security product I have reviewed, to date." - indiegogo
"Angee automated home security system doubles as a personal assistant." - gizmag
"Angee is freaking awesome..." - securitygem
"Unparalleled protection ... a brilliant innovation." - Digital Trends
"A new kind of home security. Smart, voice controlled and autonomous." - Robert Siciliano
"The idea of the Echo's capabilities packed into a rotating security cam is quite appealing” - CNET.com





Smart homes will be ubiquitous in the near future, which is why we built Angee to be intelligent, unobtrusive, and, mostly importantly, to just work.Perhaps Angee’s most important function is fully-automated smart security to protect your home and family. With voice recognition, at-the-door identification, and a portable 360° rotating camera—all without any subscription fees—Angee is revolutionizing home security.




But Angee does so much more than just security. It’s voice-controlled and integrates with your other smart home devices and favorite apps. It has two-way audio and streaming video so you can keep in touch from anyway in the world. And its portable camera is fun, great for recording and sharing! Give your home an upgrade. Get Angee and simplify your world.













Angee automatically arms and disarms based on your location by using phone recognition, with backup voice password authentication. That means no need to enter a code every time you enter or leave your home.
While Angee is meant to be kept in a room where you spend a lot of your time, the entrances and exits of your home are the most important places to monitor. Angee is the world’s first smart security system with complete perimeter security. Just stick security tags on doors and windows and Angee will know exactly who comes and goes.




With Angee you can easily set up to four 'activity zones' which Angee can keep watch over specifically. Angee can keep an eye on your back door, work station, or any other area, and alert you if anyone trespasses in these zones.

Not everyone wants a camera running while they’re home. Angee gets that. Angee will turn away whenever you ask, or you can set Angee not to record you at all and only film unrecognized people. Angee monitors when and how you want it to.


You talk – Angee listens. Angee can understand what you say and who you are. To give you an alternative authentication, set a voice password so that Angee can identify you. You can use your voice as a backup when your phone is dead. Angee is customizable and it's up to you what level of security you choose.
A cool side effect of voice recognition is that all of Angee's intelligent functionality is voice-controlled, so you get hands free communication, access to your favourite online services, and more. 








If your “smart” devices can’t talk to each other, then they’re not really that smart.  Angee gets this, which is why we built Angee to integrate with your other smart devices like Philips Hue, the Honeywell WiFi Smart Thermostat, Belkin WeMo products, and many more more.  Angee’s intelligent machine learning quickly recognizes your normal patterns, and it manages your devices to cohesively work together around the way you live.
For developers and enthusiasts we have an open REST API and IFTTT platform support, so the possibilities are endless for creating your own applications and solutions to integrate with Angee.



Travel a lot? Have people you need to check in on? Angee’s HD video streaming and two-audio makes it easier than ever to communicate with whoever is at home using your smartphone, smartwatch, tablet, or the web. Say you’re on a business trip and you check Angee to find your daughter doing homework in the living room. You can just say hi and start helping her on her algebra! 

Angee's built-in battery lasts 10 hours, making it ideal for keeping an eye on your kids or pets while you’re away or even just in another room.  It also enables Angee to keep working in case of a power outage. Should that happen, you'll receive a notification that the power has gone out and Angee will continue monitoring. If your WiFi goes offline, the server will notify you and Angee will continue to record any activity at home, saving the footage to her local storage.





The most amazing memories aren’t planned. Take Angee wherever the action is, and it’s motion-tracking camera will catch whatever happens. Whether it’s for streaming dance performances for grandparents on the other side of the country or just for catching the weird stuff your cat does, Angee is loads of fun to have around!






Whether it's for your smartphone, iPad or your smart watch we have designed the mobile experience to be a perfect natural extension of interaction with Angee. Connect to your home from anywhere and instantly understand what’s going on there.




Angee tells you what’s happening at home via a beautiful app which works on any device. You’ll receive an instant notification on your smartphone, tablet, and smartwatch if something out of the ordinary happens, and you can also use the app or the web to connect with Angee remotely and see what she sees.





Angee uses smart triggers to detect and record events that matter, so you don't have to waste storage of uneventful video footage. On top of this, we provide 1GB of free cloud storage – no monthly fees required! 





Our system is autonomous. This is important because the only way to effectively secure your home is to eliminate human interaction, namely arming and disarming the system manually. 
To make a system truly autonomous—a feat only we have achieved—requires making it completely reliable. It all comes down to the ability of the system to sense human presence at home, no matter what room you're in, at all times, and under all circumstances.
While other systems use only the main device to sense human presence, we use a combination multiple devices. Angee uses security tags to monitor the area effectively. The tags are placed at all entry points to your home and host a combination of motion and proximity sensors. They can detect when someone has entered or exited the area as well as create a network sensing the proximity of nearby phones more reliably than a single device ever could. As a result — Angee will always know who is at home.
To help evaluate what's going on at home and whether there is a potential threat, Angee uses a combination of parameters, including entry and exit patterns, changes in the background noise, and voice differentiation, all while monitoring motion and background noise to identify and record any suspicious activity. Moreover, with Angee you can also easily set up to four activity zones in Angee's sight. Angee will keep an eye on and alert you when these zones are trespassed. Angee is very easy to use—in fact it's seamless—it just works.


Angee has been built with data protection best practices in mind. Angee core developers are experienced with real-time embedded software development. We are striving to develop high quality software by internally following similarly strict revision rules as they are used in the top open-source projects (i.e. Linux kernel).



Combining electronic and mechanical design as we developed Angee, we were confronted with paradoxes and contradictory demands on functionality. We set our goal clearly: To overcome these challenges without compromising the experience we envisioned, making the form substantial and the design compelling. 
To build such an advanced system with great user experience, we often had to pioneer and innovate our way through. And the result? Form meets the desired function completely. You can read more about the challenges on our blog. 





We will have an open REST API so other developers and enthusiasts can integrate Angee into their applications and solutions. IFTTT platform support will be also available to everyone.






Everyone can live an easier life with the right technology, but it doesn't have to be distracting. It should be powerful, but subtle. Angee is a project we believe has the potential to enhance our lives by changing the way we interact with our homes.
We make products for everyone, so we listen to everyone. By listening to the community, we are constantly improving our product and meeting people’s needs. We are on the forefront of technological innovation, but more importantly we are on the forefront of your experience with technology.  

"In the future, smart hardware and technologies will be omnipresent. They will be easy to use ￼￼￼and perfectly integrated into our environment. These systems will understand and predict ￼￼￼what we need, saving us time and energy, and making our lives easier and more productive. ￼￼￼Angee is a big step toward this future”. -Tomas Turek, CEO and Co-Founder

What started with the curiosity of the founder soon developed into the relentless passion of our talented programmers and designers. We all came together 18 months ago to develop a better way to protect our homes. 
We started by learning from people's experience with early versions of smart security systems. Our team is inspired to make the smartest home security system ever; useful, convenient, and tailored to each individual’s needs. 
After the initial phase of analysing the problem and the available solutions, we experimented extensively, creating prototypes to test individual aspects of our solution. We have gathered the necessary expertise, but soon realized that to scale, we needed both capital and serial production experience. 
To make up for what we lacked, we partnered with a well-established hardware company who had offered to help. We made our first prototype in just four months and it exceeded everyone's expectations, except ours. After this very short and intensive sprint, the big company offered to buy us. We decided to stay independent and invest our own money to pursue our vision of a smarter technology for a simpler life. 
Learning from our mistakes, we re-imagined the whole concept of our product, starting with the original idea and applying all our hard-earned knowledge. Our willingness and ability to sacrifice everything we had done up to that point then start from scratch was the single best decision that has enabled us to create such a remarkable product.

story:
Flosstime is a smart floss dispenser elegantly designed to help you build daily flossing habits. We know we're supposed to floss, but most of us forget. Traditional floss dispensers are old, outdated and hard to remember. Flosstime is a habit-forming device that will make flossing fun and nearly impossible to forget (patent-pending).

 How does Flosstime work?

Flosstime easily mounts to your bathroom mirror or wall with durable and removable microsuction tape or an adhesive strip.

With a push of a button, Flosstime automatically dispenses exactly 18 inches of floss, the amount recommended by dentists and the American Dental Association. Our research shows that the biggest problem with flossing is simply getting the floss into your hands. Once it's there, almost everyone flosses properly! The automatic dispensing mechanism makes it easier for you to start flossing and removes the worry of having too much or too little.



To form long term habits, according to Charles Duhigg in his seminal book "The Power of Habit", there must exist three key elements: cue, routine and reward. Flosstime is designed with all of these in mind. After flossing, Flosstime will light up with a blue smile for a job well done. If not used daily, an orange frown or reminder light cues the user that it is time to floss again.


The device also has a single and dual user mode so it can be shared by two people. In dual user mode, the frown is split into two and each half is a separate reminder for each person. If one person doesn't floss, the other will know. Talk about peer pressure!

To make flossing fun for kids and teens, Flosstime also comes with cute animal snap-ons. If not used everyday, the animal's eyes glow warning lights to remind kids to floss! 

The three original trio includes Croakersby, Goldy and Siriby. Stay tuned for fun new snap-ons!

Meet Mr. Jack-o-Flossome!


Here we describe in detail the lighting sequence for Single and Dual User modes:

a) In the Single User mode, you can press on either side of the front face to activate Flosstime, which results in blue glowing lights around the "spout" and the dispensing of 18" of floss. In theDual User mode, each user is assigned to either the left or the right side of the front face. Pressing the right side, in this case, will activate the floss for User 2.

b) After the floss has been dispensed, blue-glowing quadrants that move clockwise around the circular light ring indicate how long the user should floss the teeth each quadrant of their mouth. Upon completion, Flosstime will light up with a blue smile.

c) If not used daily, orange warning lights will glow to warn the user that it is time to floss. In theSingle User mode, a full frown will appear. In the Dual User mode, each user gets a separate timing sequence and only his/her side will glow.


Why floss?

Research shows that lack of flossing can lead to gum and periodontal diseases. They have been linked to heart problems, diabetes and numerous other serious medical issues. Bacteria build-up in between your teeth and gum pockets can enter the bloodstream and cause long term cardiovascular complications. In fact, one study shows that daily flossing can add up to more than 6 years to your life!

"...people with gingivitis and periodontitis have a mortality rate that is 23 percent to 46 percent higher than those who don't" Dr. Roisen M.D. author of "RealAge"

"When it comes to your health, flossing your teeth is more important than brushing." Tracy Brown, WebMD

"...research shows that good oral care can prevent heart disease, diabetes and even dementia."Simon Usborne, The Independent

"Flossing your teeth, experts say, may do more to fight the effects of aging — at least over the long-term — than plastic surgery." Lisa Zamosky, NBC News

*Crab face is only representative; you can choose any combinations of animal snap-ons of your choice.


The Story

Hi there, meet the Flosstime team! We are a couple of tech-loving guys out of Silicon Valley who met through a Stanford Biodesign course. Many technologies and solutions today cater to medical treatment, instead of prevention. We passionately believe that incremental improvements and good daily habits are the key to longterm health. That's why we created Flosstime!

It took a lot of sweat and tears to get where we are today. Our invention embodies the hard work we have put into its development during the past busy year. Our first prototype, nicknamed Flosszee, was 3D printed and assembled in our very own apartments! Working with the team, we refined the design, mechanical functions and lighting mechanism. Believe us, there is such a thing as Floss Physics!

From beginning to end, we wanted to bring to life a product that is not only functionally useful and robust, but also so aesthetically pleasing that you would never want to hide it away. From its beautiful circular design to the elegant LED-lit ring, Flosstime will look beautifully elegant in any bathroom.

We are extremely thankful to everyone who has helped us get to where we are now. Firstly we'd like to thank the IEEE Student Venture Fund, Pitchforce, and our early investors for believing in our team and product and for funding our efforts. We are also thankful for our consultants and business partners for helping us develop Flosstime. Tom Grimm, Chris Loew, California Models and Q Design Services in particular have been instrumental in our product development progress! Finally we would like to thank YOU for checking out our story. We would greatly appreciate any support you can offer us. Let your friends and family know that there is now the first smart floss dispenser that will get them to floss. It's Flosstime!



Risks and challenges

We are super excited to deliver Flosstime to everyone's home, but there are intrinsic challenges in building and manufacturing hardware. We've worked day in and day out to perfect the device and have proposed a realistic timeline as to when we can bring you a high quality product.

DESIGN FOR MANUFACTURING: As we gear up for production, there will likely be minor changes and adjustments to improve the final product. We will keep you updated with any changes, and how or why they are implemented.

FULFILLMENT: Although we have done our best to ensure timely delivery, unplanned mishaps can happen and may cause a delay. Our pre-manufacturing process includes, however, selection of back-up suppliers and manufacturers to minimize potential setbacks.

Any pledge amounts will help tremendously in reaching our goal. Thank you for your support in bringing a 21st century solution to the century-old flossing problem.


FAQ

How do I choose my animal snap-on(s) and shipping address?

After the conclusion of the campaign, we'll send out an email asking for your information! We may do this closer to the ship date, so there is less risk of your address changing before we ship Flosstime out.

How does the device stick to the mirror?

We use high quality microsuction tapes to adhere Flosstime to the mirror. These are similar to Gecko feet in their structural design and are reattachable as well!

Can Flosstime stick on wallpaper or other surfaces?

No. Flosstime is designed to be mounted on your mirror and some tiled surfaces. With that said, we will be provide special adhesives/mounting methods if you do want to put it on your wall.

How much floss does Flosstime come with?

The device comes with 100-150 meters of floss, which will last nearly a whole year for one user.

What kind of floss does Flosstime come with? Can I use my own floss?

Currently the device comes with a high quality, mint waxed floss and does not take custom floss rolls (although if you are crafty, you might be able to get it to work). In the future, we will be offering a larger variety of floss.

How do I replace the floss and batteries?

The first generation device was originally designed to last after one year’s use. However, we will provide replacement kits that allow you to remove the rear panel and replace both the floss and batteries through the back of the device. When Flosstime is ready to be shipped, replacement kits will be available for purchase on our website. We will also provide recycling information in case floss/battery replacement is not something you desire.

How long does the battery last?

About a year.

Can I set the length of the floss?

No. The device gives you exactly 18” of floss, as is recommended by dentists and the ADA.

Can I control the timing sequence for the reminder?

No. Dentists recommend that you floss once everyday so the device will remind you after 22 hours of inactivity.

Is the device connected in anyway?

Not for this first generation. We believe that the only time you need to be reminded to floss is when you’re in the bathroom! Getting a push notification on your phone to floss while you’re sitting on the couch enjoying a movie is not very effective. With that said, we are working on connectivity for Gen 2.

I have little ones in my house. When can they start flossing?

Parents can start flossing their kids around the age of two. Once the kids have developed enough dexterity and strength, they can slowly learn to floss on their own!

Who is responsible for taxes and import duties of international buyers?

Import duties, taxes and other charges that might be applied are not included in the item price or shipping cost. These are the buyer’s responsibility. Please, check with your country’s customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to backing.

story:
With contactless card payments growing in popularity, our personal data is increasingly at risk of interception by fraudsters. The RFID technology that allows them to function is not entirely secure and can be accessed by scanning devices that are freely available online. VAULTCARD™ is a credit-card-sized tool, which can be placed inside a wallet to block electromagnetic signals – guaranteeing protection against RFID theft, while still enabling the use of contactless payments.

 

RFID stands for Radio-Frequency Identification Technology. A small chip and an antenna relay information from credit and debit cards to contactless scanners, serving the same purpose as a barcode or magnetic strip on the back of a card. Contactless payment cards are convenient as they don’t need to be in direct contact with the scanner to work and don’t require a PIN or signature. However, the long-range nature of the technology enables an RFID chip to be read from up to 20 feet away with a high-powered skimming device – compromising personal data.

 

Where RFID is used

RFID technology is used everywhere, from retail to banking, and across a variety of documents from identity cards to driving licenses. Most countries use RFID chips in passports, while several cities use the technology in public transport passes – London’s Oyster card is a key example. In addition, many businesses use RFID building access cards. Almost all credit and debit cards now carry contactless technology, which is also referred to as ExpressPay (American Express), payWave (Visa), PayPass (MasterCard), and Zip (Discover).

In addition, most RFID enabled credit or debit cards will carry the following sign:

Dangers of RFID technology

RFID enabled cards undoubtedly save time for consumers and organisations, but as they have become more common around the globe, significant security concerns have also emerged. Criminals can easily acquire equipment capable of accessing the data stored on your cards or passports from several metres away. Fraudsters can utilise this data to replicate credit cards, steal identities, or access secure buildings.  

 

As awareness of RFID fraud has grown, an array of products have attempted to address security concerns. Most products are based on the principle of shielding the RFID card from electromagnetic waves by using metal foils. Yet this approach is susceptible to flaws due to the way electromagnetic waves travel. To ensure full protection, cards must be fully wrapped in steel foil with no gaps – but this is almost impossible to achieve. A typical wallet with metallic shielding can therefore only protect against low power reading devices and not at all angles.

VAULTCARD™ to the Rescue

VAULTCARD™ is a revolutionary product designed to solve these issues by protecting against all RFID skimming devices. When placed inside a wallet, or kept in a pocket alongside credit cards, the VAULTCARD™ device ensures absolute data safety. In fact, the higher the strength of the skimming equipment, the stronger VAULTCARD’s jamming signal will be – protecting you from even the most powerful of machines.

 

VAULTCARD switches on automatically when it senses an electromagnetic wave emitted by an RFID scanner. It responds to signal strengths one hundred times smaller than those required for contactless cards to function, and creates a sophisticated electromagnetic jamming signal that blocks RFID readers.

 

VAULTCARD's patent pending RFID protection technology is unique to contactless card safety devices and is based on highly sophisticated jamming signals frequently used by the military.

We have invested a great deal of time in research and development to create our final VAULTCARD™ prototype. Its unmatched protection utilises an extremely efficient design, which emits a complex jamming signal that completely shuts out any RFID communication.

We have summarised the key pros and cons of the most widely used RFID protection methods. As you can see, several products offer shielding but none are design focused, and they are generally not effective against powerful skimming devices. VAULTCARD™ provides secure protection while allowing you to keep your existing wallet that you know and love.

 

Here are the key benefits that make VAULTCARD™ so unique:

 

Place VAULTCARD™ in the middle of your wallet. All RFID enabled cards will be protected within 1.6 inches (4cm) of the VAULTCARD™, and cards can be placed on either side, offering protection inside wallets up to 8cm thick.

Contactless cards can still be used to pay for transactions in the normal way – just be sure the VAULTCARD™ is held 8 inches (20cm) away when making payments.

 

 

We have spent many months on research, development and prototyping of VAULTCARD™. Many of the prototypes were discarded, but several marked important milestones and mini breakthroughs until we reached the final product.

 

The key components of the VAULTCARD are the receiving and transmitting antennas and the jamming signal generator. Receiving antenna harnesses energy from RFID scanner. The stored energy is then used to power up the jamming signal generator and the transmitter circuitry. The resulting jamming signal is emitted by the transmitting antenna. 

 

EFFICIENT ENERGY HARNESSING

In addition to a highly sophisticated jamming signal, VAULTCARD™ is extremely efficient in harnessing electromagnetic energy emitted by RFID scanners. This allows VAULTCARD™ to retransmit 1,000 times more power than RFID payment cards. 

The table below represents laboratory test results of VAULTCARD™ and a typical RFID enabled credit card. For test purposes we used a popular 250mW NFC scanner with electric E-field shielded antenna (so the scanner only working mainly with magnetic H-field of Electromagnetic Field, diameter of magnetic antenna 45mm).

 

POWER LINEARITY

Another feature of VAULTCARD™ is that its emitted power is directly proportionate to the power of the scanning device, unlike RFID enabled credit cards. This guarantees that VAULTCARD™ stays extremely effective even against high-powered skimming devices.

 

OUTSTANDING PROTECTION IN NEAR FIELD

Due to the form factor of an antenna embedded in the credit card, RFID scanner and VAULTCARD™, the most critical area is the so-called near field zone (within 0-3 inches between credit card and RFID reader). Our team has focused on ensuring that VAULTCARD™ can be used not only against far field scanning devices, but is also extremely effective in the near field.

 

We have launched this Indiegogo campaign to raise awareness of VAULTCARD™ and to give consumers a unique opportunity to pre-order at a discounted rate. They will be the first to receive the finished product when it is released to the public at the end of August 2016.

 

The split between production and our other operations.

 

With an increase in RFID transactions around the world, more and more individuals are becoming susceptible to having their personal information stolen.

VAULTCARD’s mission is to improve data protection and build ground-breaking technologies that ensure consumer safety.

Our multi-talented and innovative team has performed countless tests and trials to guarantee the reliability and consistency of the VAULTCARD™ prototype.

VAULTCARD™ is now ready for mass production, and we want to make it affordable to a wide audience. As with any product, larger quantities typically result in a lower cost to the consumer.

We are continuing research and development trials to further expand our range of personal security innovations. VAULTCARD’s success will be testament to a growing public need for such products.

 

About us

Vaultskin – VAULTCARD’s parent company – is a multi-discipline, creative and international team, headquartered in London. We pride ourselves on diversity and innovation. Our founders – Alex, Thomas and Diana – have extensive knowledge in electrical engineering, IT, and industrial design. While our individual team members are responsible for a particular focus – from engineering, to product design and distribution – we take a collaborative approach to decision-making.

Vaultskin was founded in 2012. In addition to high-tech personal security products, the company creates innovative accessories for mobile devices.

How we got the idea of VAULTCARD™

With the increase in the use of RFID technology, combined with the growing availability of RFID skimming devices, we saw there was a need for someone to protect the consumer from contactless fraud. We felt that banks were not, and still aren’t, recognising contactless credit card fraud as an issue, so we wanted to use our technical expertise to come up with a solution – and so VAULTCARD™ was born.

 

Meet the key players in the VAULTCARD™ story. 

 

VAULTCARD™ will be shipped in slim factor packaging that fits inside a C5 envelope, minimising shipping costs.

 

Every element of the creative process is focused on making life easier for consumers by constructing a more efficient device. To keep quality at the highest standard, we closely monitor each stage of production, as well as offering a six-month warranty programme.

story:
This campaign is over. You can learn more about our products and order iTraq on our web site

www.itraq.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

See us and our amazing product on Science Channel: Nov 25th at 10pm EST.

 

Subscribe to the Newsletter and get $30 off the iTraq+ price.

 

iTraq+ is a hybrid (Cellular+GPS) tracking device - the world’s first global location device that can be found anywhere in the world where cellular service exists.

 

 

The iTraq+ has the added features of being rechargeable and, in addition to cellular tracking technology, includes enhanced GPS tracking to offer more precise location information whenever needed.

 

 

Many location devices use Bluetooth wireless technology which limits their use to finding things within the house  such as lost keys, remote controls, etc.

Other location devices use GPS modules (Global Positioning System), which cannot be found when inside a building.

iTraq+ provides a hybrid approach, which covers the globe and sees through buildings by using Cellular technology (Cell-ID). It also has the ability to switch to GPS for accurate location reading when necessary.

Simply attach iTraq+ to a bicycle or boat, place it in the pocket of your child, or even attach it to your luggage, and find it even if your bags traveled to another country or continent.

 

Most of the time iTraq+ uses cell towers to calculate its location. This determines where your device is located within a city block, while remaining in the low power consumption mode. It will be sufficient to understand if your child is at school or on a football field, or if your car is at home or some place across the city. Only when you have lost your valuable do your switch to GPS mode and receive an exact location based on satellite data.

This approach gives you the best of both worlds - reach with low energy of Cell-ID technology and the accuracy of GPS.

Thus, you can track you assets for a long time and find them with several meter accuracy when needed.

 

As a user you control how long the device will survive until it will require recharging. Mainly it depends on how frequently your device will report its location.

Reporting locations utilizing Cell-ID technology once a day will keep your battery alive for up to one year.  If you enable additional GPS module or increase the frequency of reports, it will decrease the battery life.

Don't worry though - recharging is simple - just place iTraq+ on top of iTraq+ Wireless Charger and your device will soon be charged again.

 

Most other location tracking devices are bulky, which make them hard to carry or hide in a tight spot.

iTraq+ is as small as a credit card, only slightly thicker. It can be placed in the glove compartment of the car, remain hidden under the seat of your mountain bike, or tuck discretely into the secret compartment of a purse.

 

Proprietary software allows  iTraq+ to stay in sleep mode most of the time - this helps to minimize energy consumption and achieve an amazing battery life.

Based on the user defined schedule, iTraq+ wakes up, determines its location by scanning cellular towers in range and transmits data to the server.

During the same communication session (if needed)  iTraq+ will use the GPS module and send its satellite based location data.

All the location information is displayed on your mobile phone or on the website.

 

For each iTraq+ you can:

  • View the map that contains its location history with time stamps
  • Define the schedule of location reports - how frequently do you want it to wake up and report its location
  • Define Guard Zone
  • Switch to Panic Mode
  • See the remaining battery life and number of remaining location reports

You can always change the schedule, rename the device, re-define Guard Zone or turn off Panic Mode.

 

In many cases it’s important not only to know where the iTraq+ is but to be alerted if it has been removed from the designated area (for example, a child left the house after hours). Define your Guard Zone by specifying the radius on the map and once the iTraq+ leaves it, you will receive an alert on the mobile phone. You can also be alerted when the device is back in the Guard Zone.

 

Panic Mode means that you lost your asset and want to get its location as precise as possible. Panic Mode turns on the GPS module and suppliments Cell ID based location data with Satellite location data.

Please note that your iTraq+ will switch to Panic Mode during the next scheduled communication session (not when you pressed the button).

There are two ways to enable Panic Mode:

  • By pressing Panic button in your iTraq Mobile App
  • By selecting "Switch to Panic Mode when outside the Guard Zone" setting. In this case the device will automatically enable Panic Mode once it wakes up outside the Guard Zone.

 

Every iTraq+ will come with 1000 location reports pre-loaded. Since iTraq+ is a rechargeable device, you can keep using it for as long as you need. Once you use your location reports you can buy additional reports using the iTraq Mobile App.

*** Every customer who pledged for the original version of iTraq will receive a free upgrade to iTraq+ and it will come with 1500 location reports. ***

 

  • Most firmware and hardware design work has been completed.
  • We have finished development of iOS & Android mobile applications.
  • We have optimized the Cell-ID based location calculation algorithm.
  • We have working prototypes that we are providing to our partners that started building their custom location tracking solutions.

  • We contracted a manufacturer in China that is currently manufacturing  iTraq+ in required quantities.
  • We have a signed contract for global SIM cards.
  • We have an API ready and multiple partners working on the custom applications.

 

 

If you need to track hundreds of assets using iTraq products and technologies, we have an iTraq platform which makes it super easy to build your own custom application

Check details at www.itraq.com

 

Please visit our support portal http://support.itraqtag.com if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!

 

Don't forget to like and follow us on Facebook to be up to date with the latest information!

Or send us a tweet: @itraqtag

For inquiries regarding Distribution, Retail, and Partnerships please email partner@itraqtag.com.

Press, please email press@itraqtag.com for more information.

story:
CablePower acts as an ultra multi-functional backup charging equipment, with which you never worry about not being able to get your mobile devices charged. It will make your business trip, travel and work more efficient, convenient and comfortable since you no longer have to carry lots of charging equipment and charging cables as before.

CablePower Charging Cable Kit Features:

✅  6-in-1 Charge Cable Kit
✅  18W Apple Fast Charge
✅  Up to 60W Power Delivery(Can charge laptops and tablets)
✅  480Mbit USB 2.0 Fast Data Transfer
✅  On-The-Go (Transfer your phone into a battery pack)

CablePower Power Bank Features:

✅  15W Wireless Charge
✅  18W PD Fast Charge
✅  22.5W/18W QC 3.0 Fast Charge
✅  10000mAh Lithium Battery
✅  9 Charge Protection
✅  3 Recharge Methods

CablePower Card Holder Features:

✅  2 Nano SIM Card Slots, 1 SD Card Slot, 1 Pin Ejector

Media Coverage 

CablePower: The World's Most Convenient Power Bank

 

Six in One, Charge All the Devices

Equipped with a multifunctional charging cable storage function, CablePower has 2 built-in high-quality fast charging cables and 2 changeable charging plugs so as to provide 6 different types of charging modes.

Our 3 connectors (Lightning, Micro USB & USB-C) are designed to be compatible with all your modern devices from headphones to Nintendo Switch, E-Cigs, GoPro the list is endless. It can also work with tablets and USB-C laptops.

 

One Cable Kit To Rule Them All And Save A Lot Money!

Big companies try to sell you 6 cables separately to maximize their profit whereas we just want to make your life easier. Why buy 6 cables and clutter up your bag and workspace when you can get 1 cable kit to do everything for all at such an affordable price!

Goodbye Messy Cable!

Not Only Compatible But Also Enhanced

CablePower can meet various devices' charging needs, not only support to charge all types of electronic devices but also support fast-charge of Android and Apple devices.

Tired of your slow charging iPhone cable? With CablePower charging cable, you can fast charge your iPhone from 0-50% in just 30 minutes! 

In addition,CablePower cable kit supports 480Mbit USB 2.0 Fast Data Transfer. Less time plugged in, more time going out!

 

Charge Everywhere with On-The-Go Function

You can now transform your phone into a battery pack with CablePower's charging cables, On-The-Go charging functionality allows you to share charge between your devices without the need for a charger or a power bank.​

Durable

CablePower charging cables have passed the rigorous durability test for the sake of the repeated use in a long time.

User-friendly Storage Function

CablePower’s storage function can not only store multiple charging cables but also take in 2 Nano SIM cards and 1 TF card, which are very practical for people on business and travel.

4 Ports Input/Output & Wireless Charge

Output - Charge 3 Devices At Once

The creating the best power bank, one that could charge all your wired and wireless devices, truly replacing all your chargers and wireless pads with just 1 device.

CablePower has not 1 only SCP 22.5W/QC3.0 18W USB-A quick charge port but also 18W PD Type-C quick charge port and even a 15W wireless charging pad, can quickly charge 3 devices at once!

CablePower works with any modern USB device and can also charge Cameras, GoPros, Speakers, Headphones, Nintendo Switches etc.

Enjoy Using CablePower's 15W Wireless Charge

CablePower supports 15W Fast Wireless Charging for all wireless devices including phones and Apple AirPods. And meanwhile, its unique folding charging panel design can serve as a phone holder so as to let you enjoy the fun of video during charging.

 

Input - Much More Convenient To Recharge

Compared with other power banks, CablePower supports 3 input methods, USB-C, Micro USB and Lighting, to charge, without worrying about the only-one-charging trouble free from a charging problem.

 

You can also charge other devices when CablePower is recharged at the same time!

3X iPhone 11 Battery Life

3X the battery life if your iPhone 11 with CablePower’s 10,000 mAh capacicty.

Longer Lasting Battery

One of the most useful features of the graphene composite features is that is much longer lasting than traditional batteries. Each CablePower power bank is rated to last 2,000 life cycles vs only 500 cycles of the closest competitors. This means CablePower has a 5 years+ battery life, which means you can use it every single day for 5 years and it would still seem like its brand new.

Through laboratory testing equipment, we've tested the battery to last 1,836 cycles and still have a capacity above 87% (a life cycle is considered above 80%), so in reality the life cycle is far greater than 2,000 but we are being conservative in our statement of 2,000.

World's Safest

In order to make the process of charge/recharge more secure, CablePower supports 9 charging protections by means of multiple rigorous tests, providing safety protection comprehensively to let you use it at ease!

Not only fast and powerful, the battery technology also makes CablePower the world’s safest power bank by allowing it to fast charge at low temperatures compared to standard batteries. It will never go above 50°C (122°F) unlike competitor power banks which can reach 70°C (167°F) ensuring it is safer and also longer lasting.  You'll feel very comfortable knowing that this baby won't heat up or bulge over time like you see in many of your older USB devices.

Pocket-sized

Slim enough to fit in pockets and easily grab with one hand.

Despite all the features, CablePower comes in a pocket-sized lightweight 270g (0.6lb) so you can carry the only battery that matters, that can power all your devices, wherever you go, away from the grid, without fear of ever losing power ensuring your life stays uninterrupted and always on the go.

 

Durable And Comfortable

While designing a high capacity battery, we still wanted a highly compact and portable solution. Adopting an ultra-hard PC shell and a surface made of matte, CablePower takes the comfortable hand feeling as well as the fine heat dissipation into account, characterizing anti-corrosion, scratch-resistance and a longer service life!

Certification

In order to achieve international certification for safe use, all power banks are put through a number of rigorous industrial tests to ensure CablePower can withstand daily use, even the most extreme of circumstances.

Why Choose CablePower

Specifications:

  • Capacity: 10,000mAh / 37 Whr
  • Power Bank Interface:
  • USB-C Power Delivery 18W Input/Output
  • USB-C Power Delivery Input: 5V/2A, 9V/2A
  • USB-C Power Delivery Output: 5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A
  • 22.5W/18W USB-A QualComm Quick Charge 3.0 Output
  • USB-A Output: 5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A
  • Lightning Input: 5V/2A, 9V2A
  • Micro USB Input: 5V/2A, 9V2A
  • Wireless Output 2 coils: 15W Fast Charge + 5W Apple Airpods
  • Maximum Power Output: 22.5W
  • Maximum Power Input: 18W
  • Batteries: High Density Lithium Polymer Battery Cells
  • Battery Life Cycles: 2,000, 4 times more than li-po batteries
  • Battery Life: 5 Years
  • Time to full charge from empty: 1 hr 50 min (with 18W input)
  • DC/DC Input Efficiency: 76% - 82%
  • Output Efficiency: 70% ± 5%
  • Discharge Rate: 57mah per day over 350 days
  • Device Operating Temperature: -10ºC to 60ºC
  • Safety Protection: 9 Protection
  • Dimensions: 130x22x73mm
  • Weight: 270g

What's In The Box

Perks Design

Adds On Perk

When the Magic Happens

Brand Story

LIFEBEE is a tech company in Innovative products and cool gadgets.The industry, the inventions, the manufacturing, has branded a loyal, patriotic, hard-working ethos into us.  Combining excellent creativity, quality and craftsmanship, we strive to create the finest products available that are both innovative and functional.

Mass Production

We have begun our mass production!
story_txt:
CablePower acts as an ultra multi-functional backup charging equipment, with which you never worry about not being able to get your mobile devices charged. It will make your business trip, travel and work more efficient, convenient and comfortable since you no longer have to carry lots of charging equipment and charging cables as before.CablePower Charging Cable Kit Features:✅  6-in-1 Charge Cable Kit✅  18W Apple Fast Charge✅  Up to 60W Power Delivery(Can charge laptops and tablets)✅  480Mbit USB 2.0 Fast Data Transfer✅  On-The-Go (Transfer your phone into a battery pack)CablePower Power Bank Features:✅  15W Wireless Charge✅  18W PD Fast Charge✅  22.5W/18W QC 3.0 Fast Charge✅  10000mAh Lithium Battery✅  9 Charge Protection✅  3 Recharge MethodsCablePower Card Holder Features:✅  2 Nano SIM Card Slots, 1 SD Card Slot, 1 Pin EjectorMedia Coverage CablePower: The World's Most Convenient Power Bank 
Six in One, Charge All the DevicesEquipped with a multifunctional charging cable storage function, CablePower has 2 built-in high-quality fast charging cables and 2 changeable charging plugs so as to provide 6 different types of charging modes.Our 3 connectors (Lightning, Micro USB & USB-C) are designed to be compatible with all your modern devices from headphones to Nintendo Switch, E-Cigs, GoPro the list is endless. It can also work with tablets and USB-C laptops. One Cable Kit To Rule Them All And Save A Lot Money!Big companies try to sell you 6 cables separately to maximize their profit whereas we just want to make your life easier. Why buy 6 cables and clutter up your bag and workspace when you can get 1 cable kit to do everything for all at such an affordable price!Goodbye Messy Cable!Not Only Compatible But Also EnhancedCablePower can meet various devices' charging needs, not only support to charge all types of electronic devices but also support fast-charge of Android and Apple devices.Tired of your slow charging iPhone cable? With CablePower charging cable, you can fast charge your iPhone from 0-50% in just 30 minutes! In addition,CablePower cable kit supports 480Mbit USB 2.0 Fast Data Transfer. Less time plugged in, more time going out! Charge Everywhere with On-The-Go FunctionYou can now transform your phone into a battery pack with CablePower's charging cables, On-The-Go charging functionality allows you to share charge between your devices without the need for a charger or a power bank.​DurableCablePower charging cables have passed the rigorous durability test for the sake of the repeated use in a long time.User-friendly Storage FunctionCablePower’s storage function can not only store multiple charging cables but also take in 2 Nano SIM cards and 1 TF card, which are very practical for people on business and travel.4 Ports Input/Output & Wireless ChargeOutput - Charge 3 Devices At OnceThe creating the best power bank, one that could charge all your wired and wireless devices, truly replacing all your chargers and wireless pads with just 1 device.CablePower has not 1 only SCP 22.5W/QC3.0 18W USB-A quick charge port but also 18W PD Type-C quick charge port and even a 15W wireless charging pad, can quickly charge 3 devices at once!CablePower works with any modern USB device and can also charge Cameras, GoPros, Speakers, Headphones, Nintendo Switches etc.Enjoy Using CablePower's 15W Wireless ChargeCablePower supports 15W Fast Wireless Charging for all wireless devices including phones and Apple AirPods. And meanwhile, its unique folding charging panel design can serve as a phone holder so as to let you enjoy the fun of video during charging. Input - Much More Convenient To RechargeCompared with other power banks, CablePower supports 3 input methods, USB-C, Micro USB and Lighting, to charge, without worrying about the only-one-charging trouble free from a charging problem. You can also charge other devices when CablePower is recharged at the same time!3X iPhone 11 Battery Life3X the battery life if your iPhone 11 with CablePower’s 10,000 mAh capacicty.Longer Lasting BatteryOne of the most useful features of the graphene composite features is that is much longer lasting than traditional batteries. Each CablePower power bank is rated to last 2,000 life cycles vs only 500 cycles of the closest competitors. This means CablePower has a 5 years+ battery life, which means you can use it every single day for 5 years and it would still seem like its brand new.Through laboratory testing equipment, we've tested the battery to last 1,836 cycles and still have a capacity above 87% (a life cycle is considered above 80%), so in reality the life cycle is far greater than 2,000 but we are being conservative in our statement of 2,000.World's SafestIn order to make the process of charge/recharge more secure, CablePower supports 9 charging protections by means of multiple rigorous tests, providing safety protection comprehensively to let you use it at ease!Not only fast and powerful, the battery technology also makes CablePower the world’s safest power bank by allowing it to fast charge at low temperatures compared to standard batteries. It will never go above 50°C (122°F) unlike competitor power banks which can reach 70°C (167°F) ensuring it is safer and also longer lasting.  You'll feel very comfortable knowing that this baby won't heat up or bulge over time like you see in many of your older USB devices.Pocket-sizedSlim enough to fit in pockets and easily grab with one hand.Despite all the features, CablePower comes in a pocket-sized lightweight 270g (0.6lb) so you can carry the only battery that matters, that can power all your devices, wherever you go, away from the grid, without fear of ever losing power ensuring your life stays uninterrupted and always on the go. Durable And ComfortableWhile designing a high capacity battery, we still wanted a highly compact and portable solution. Adopting an ultra-hard PC shell and a surface made of matte, CablePower takes the comfortable hand feeling as well as the fine heat dissipation into account, characterizing anti-corrosion, scratch-resistance and a longer service life!CertificationIn order to achieve international certification for safe use, all power banks are put through a number of rigorous industrial tests to ensure CablePower can withstand daily use, even the most extreme of circumstances.Why Choose CablePowerSpecifications:

story:
Introducing JUICED 2.0:

Wireless group charging- charge wherever, whenever, and cable free. Charge on the go or while sitting back on the couch watching a movie.  Charge anywhere, faster!

Free yourself from the 18 inch wall outlet!

  • Faster Charge. 1530mah battery pack (iphone/android/USBC)
  • Extra thin profile. Charging cord fits into a cutout
  • Aluminum outer layer. Stronger and more durable 
  • Charge on the go. Attaches to the back of any phone/phone case.
  • Save extra JUICE.  On/off switch lets you save extra juice for later
  • Can charge anywhere.  Also can recharge via micro usb cable if away from home. 

JUICED gives the ultimate freedom.  We don't need some bulky base that charges your phone 30 times over.... We need a quick always charged boost to get through the night.  

 

The problem we all deal with all too often....

Universal Wireless Charging Station for Everyone 

Charge up to 6 phones at once with 3 battery packs and 3 more from our patented charging base. 

 

Charge The Battery Pack With Any Micro USB Cable    

With JUICED, you can also charge your battery packs with a micro USB cable, so you’ll have an extra boost in your pocket no matter where the world takes you.

Shipping

FREE shipping to the USA.  International shipping costs $20.  

Technically speaking, our goal was to create a new 1of1 original charger that solved all the issues that the existing market has yet to resolve (cords and wires, ugly charging cases, single chargers, and big bulky battery stations).

So we designed JUICED 2.0 with the greatest amount of portability, simplicity, and freedom in mind. By creating a pack small enough to fit in any pocket, eliminate the need to be tethered to a 2ft cable, and solving the group charging we felt JUICED 2.0 was the perfect all in one station.

 

The Impact

Every year cheap disposable battery packs are discarded into landfills. When taken to landfills, most batteries release harmful metals such as mercury, lead and cadmium into the environment causing soil contamination and water pollution. The incineration of batteries can also cause air pollution. Battery waste can endanger wildlife and is potentially hazardous to humans.  So we designed JUICED packs as an alternative giving long term high quality batteries. 

FAQ

When is my JUICED 2.0 expected to ship?

Delivery time will vary, but in North America, Canada and Europe we expect to have about a 10 day delivery time. In Asia we expect to have a 2-3 week delivery time.

-All Orders will be shipped immediately following the campaigns end. 

-JUICED will be delivered by the start of July.

Return/Refund Policy

For In Demand campaigns IndieGoGo can offer a refund within 10 days of backing the campaign.

story:
To our generous supporters,

On behalf of everyone involved with Link, I want to extend a heartfelt thank you to those of you who have supported our campaign so far. It is truly incredibly to think that of all the ideas and campaigns you could support, you chose to back ours.

Link will forever change the way people carry, stream and share data. It will break down the barriers of current methods and truly enable communication without limitations. This is no small feat and we feel a great sense of responsibility to provide the best device we possibly can. That is why we’ve chosen to end this current campaign.

We want to assure you, our supporters, and anyone else who may learn about us in the coming weeks and months that we are fully committed to developing and launching Link. In the time since we launched our campaign, we’ve been working tirelessly to spread the message and have received some early feedback from experts in the field that we respect and trust, and from you – our supporters. This was always a part of our original game plan and it has proven to be more valuable than we could have predicted.

Thanks to this feedback, we’ve decided that we need to hit the pause button for a bit to ensure we are creating the best version of Link we possibly can. We are not slowing down; in fact, closing this campaign gives us the time to perfect the technology, iron out any potentially issues and make the most visually appealing device we can. With that in mind, we ask you to visit this questionnaire to rate the 20 designs we’re considering and answer a few brief questions at the end. Your input will directly impact Link’s new look and feel.

We will be launching a new IndieGoGo campaign in October and there will be no stopping us from reaching our goal to bring Link to the masses. We are so excited to share this technology with the world and your early support means so much to us.

We will update this page when our new launch date is official. A sincere thanks again for everything. Please feel free to reach out to me directly if you have any questions or feedback – I truly do value your opinion.

Thanks and best,

Coy Christmas, Co-Founder & CEO


Link is a wireless wristband with up to 1TB of SSD storage—to keep those important files safe while you’re on the go.  

The band is designed to strip away restrictions from your media. Use Link and its app counterpart to stream any file to any device, without any wires or an internet connection.

As many as 20 devices can connect to one wristband and up to seven can seamlessly stream from it.

Link works with all devices 

Link isn't affected by changes to device hardware or software so you can upgrade your phone, tablet and laptop, or swap device platforms, without losing a single file. 

With your wristband, play iTunes files on an Android device, watch Windows movies on your Apple tablet or view all of your saved files on any device you're using. 


No more downloading the same song for different platforms or forgetting that important document on a broken device. Link keeps all your data in one secure place.   

Link is currently in a working prototype stage  

The wristband you see throughout our campaign is our prototype model, which shows how we can practically use the technology we have. When you pre-order Link, the wristband you’ll receive will be visually slicker and smaller than our prototype but still packed with the features that let you carry your memories wherever you roam.

By focussing on the technology first, it allows us to stress-test Link and iron out any potential issues before you receive your wristband.

You’ll be joining our beta as early adopters, which means you’ll have an input into how Link develops in future, helping us to design and develop the wristband to fit your lifestyle.

Pre-order your Link band

For Link’s early adopters, you’ll exclusively receive the only models made this year.

By pre-ordering through our campaign, you’ll be getting your hands on Link before anyone else as the wristband won’t retail to the mass market until 2016.

We’re also offering free upgrades to Link’s 2016 model to make sure you have the most up-to-date hardware and software available.

By pre-ordering Link, you are supporting us to get this to market (read more about timeline below!)—thank you.

Link is for storage

For wandering photographers, use Link to keep that once-in-a-lifetime shot safe.

Automatically transfer photos as you take them, so you can snap without worrying about making backups.

Save any file type and access them from your devices without any wires. 

Below is a rough estimate of how many files you can fit on each Link band: 

Link is for sharing

For media junkies, seamlessly stream from your Link wristband to any device.

Let your friends listen to your iTunes playlists, read your work documents or giggle at those embarrassing GoPro videos on their TV, tablet or phone.  

Share all files types across all devices without any restrictions.

Link is for security

For your business on-the-go, keep your digital life secure by storing your private files offline.

Link protects your work documents while you’re on the move, storing them in one secure place so you can keep your laptop free of confidential files. 

Your wristband communicates directly with its app counterpart so there won’t be a trace of your data left on the device you’re using.  


How Link works 

Link uses peer to peer communication to send or stream files. 

Your wristband speaks directly to your devices, rather than using an internet connection or your router, which creates an easy and quick way to share offline.

When streaming, Link uses its app counterpart which removes the restrictions caused by file types and different platforms. This allows users to wirelessly stream any file type stored on their wristband to any device. 

For solid security, your wristband only communicates with the app, meaning there is no trace of data left on the device you’re using. This leaves no digital imprint, helping to keep your data completely safe from hackers or online threats.


A closer look at Link


Link’s timeline

Where your funds are going

We’ve already taken some huge steps with Link, now we need your help to reach our final goal. 

Link was officially unveiled to the world as a prototype at CES 2015.


To finalise the wristband itself, our team is currently hard at work putting Link’s software and hardware through rigorous testing.
We’ve also built brilliant relationships with our materials suppliers who we’ll work closely with until launch to make sure you receive your wristband within our timeline.



Your contributions will help us fund our production parts (such as wifi chips, SSDs and PCBs), our tooling and refined stress testing of the wristband. All of these combined will allow us to release Link as a viable product for all ages to use, wherever they roam.


Risks and challenges

With the manufacture of any product, risks can always happen unexpectedly—from material ordering setbacks to a shortage of semiconductors.

Our team is working closely with Link vendors to minimize any production challenges we may face. By creating these strong relationships with suppliers, we're confident that we've addressed any possible setbacks and accounted for them within our shipping time frame. 

As a company, it is absolutely imperative for us to meet our product goals without compromising on the quality or performance of Link. For our contributors, this means we're committed to making sure you receive your wristband on time, for you to use straight from the box. 

FAQs 

Q) What size wrist does Link fit?

A) Link will fit any wrist size between 6, 7/8” and 9 1/8”.


Q) How do I charge Link’s battery?

A) Link uses a wireless charging block which powers Link in the shortest full charge time available. Place Link on the charging block and it will automatically begin charging.


Q) Is Link waterproof?

A) Link is waterproof up to 15m. The wristband can be worn in the shower, washing the dishes and when swimming in a pool.


Q) What is Link made of?

A) Link is made of allergen-free, silicon rubber.


Q) What are Link’s dimensions?

A) Link is 35mm wide and 11mm thick.


Q) How much storage does Link have?

A) Link has tiers of Solid State Drive storage from 128GB to 1TB.


Q) What type of storage format does Link use?

A) Link uses Solid State Drive storage. This is the most capable storage format available today, it allows you to read and write data as fast MacBook.  


Q) How does Link send data to my devices?

A) Link uses the WiFi chip in your devices to send information. This is done via ARCH™—a Patent Pending transport layer created by Fasetto.


Q) Can Link be used without the internet?

A) Link can be used without internet access.

The wristband never uses the internet to send your information to your devices. It uses the ARCH™ transport layer to create peer-to-peer, or device-to-device, communication.


Security

Q) How does Link keep my data off my devices when I take pictures or video?

A) With Link, data is streamed and stored to your wristband rather than written on to your device’s hard drive. This means there will be no digital imprint of your data left on your device.


Q) Can unauthorized people access my Link band?

A) No unauthorized individuals can use your wristband. Link has many security protocols in place to notify you if someone tries to access your band. The information stored on Link becomes totally inaccessible if it’s stolen or lost.


Q) What type of encryption does Link use to protect my data?

A) Link gives the user control over the security level of their data from the app dashboard. This ranges from the leading industry encryption security to our patent pending uncrackable one-way reform.


Q) Does Link allow me to create backups of my data stored on my wristband?

A) Link gives the user the option to create back ups on a local computer or Link cloud storage on our secure portal.


Q) When does Link backup my files?

A) Link backs up your files while it is charging.


Convenience

Q) Can I transfer my iTunes files or Google Play files to Link?

A) All file types are compatible with Link and can be easily transferred from purchasing portals to your wristband.


Q) Can I stream my iTunes files to any device regardless of that device’s operating system?

A) iTunes files can be seamlessly streamed from Link to any device.


Q) Can I stream my Google Play files to any device regardless of that devices operating system?

A) Google Play files can be seamlessly streamed from Link to any device.


Q) Does Link have health tracker?

A)  Link allows you to track your steps and movements throughout the day to measure how active you are. This data is stored in the “My Health” section of the Link app.
