DIY Video (Do it Yourself) Hub for Men and Women
Find A Shop section (Top rated local shops - No Booking capabilities)
VIP Shop Section (Top rated participating shops - Booking Capabilities)
Hair Blog
Barbershop Spotlights ( Special Features on Salons and Barbershops)
Haircut and Hairstyle o the week
Jam of The Week Section
Social Networking Section
Advertising Opportunities
Login Portal for Shops
Hair products Section
Trmster Store


 
 
Benefits for Barbershops and Salons
The VIP Shop section will include participating Shops who will have Barber portfolios, photos/videos of their work, shop address, website,  hours of operation and prices. This brings convenience to both barbers and clients whereas a client would not have to wait long periods before being seen. This perk is meant to provide comfort and confidence in the stylist to meet their hairstyle needs. The VIP Shop section will not only drive traffic to the participating shops, but it will also help with retention and positive feedback. 

What We Need & What You Get 

The app is up and running, but we are looking to expand by hiring additional employees, office space, travel expenses to cater to the 7 cities we are currently servicing, growing our services to other cities, funds for independent contractors to handle our social media needs, and much more. 
We are hoping to raise an amount of $50,000 because it is meant to cover the expenses which includes app maintenance, payroll, lease, tech support, hair care product distribution, vlogging equipment, ads, street teams, additional marketing, travel, miscellaneous expenses and more. 
For you support, we offer unique perks as mentioned in our perk section and our full gratitude. If we do not reach our entire goal, we will dedicate the funds we have received towards the business to cover our needs and work to raise additional capital to move the business forward.

The Impact 
Convenience is Key - The Trmster App not only benefits local clients, it also  makes it easy for travelers to find the best shops around an unfamiliar location. Users who are flying out of town would benefit from the ability to locate and view the work of a barber or stylist prior to driving to that location. 
We've received incredible feedback on our DIY sections for men and women, because when barbershops were closed during lock down, a lot of people had to figure out how to maintain and manage their hair. Our blog and DIY sections provided a lot of insight and useful information.


Risks & Challenges
Given that we are a startup company that's in the process of making a name for ourselves. We have to build our audience from the ground up which we are currently doing now. Shops may be a little hesitant to participate, but to counter that, we will be offering a "Try it Free" option for shops to test the waters before fully committing. We will also tech support and customer service to adhere to any concerns clients and shops may have. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help
We appreciate your support in anyway possible. Sharing this link and getting the word out about this campaign would be valued. You can use the Indiegogo share tools to help get the message out. 
 
Thank You,
Trmster Inc.

story:
As Featured In



  "NeuroscanPro is working in the healthcare world, trying to push it
    into the 21st century.  Early detection in Autism is key…
    and that's what this is attempting to address."

   - - CBC news  (see icon link at 22:22 )


Contents Menu

What is NeuroscanPro? •  Early Detection is Key •  The Science is Sound •  Who Developed and Uses this sort of Approach? •  And Now... a Simple, Quick, Mobile Solution •  Key Benefits •  Contributor Rewards •  Project Plan & Use of funds •  Stretch goals •  What are people saying about us? •  The Company Has Won Multiple Top Prizes •  The social impact will be huge •  Our Team •  FAQs


What is NeuroscanPro?


If you are concerned that a child may be at an increased risk of  autism, it can be a continual worry to have to wait until they are old enough to begin formal evaluations and diagnosis.

NeuroscanPro’s screening tool has been developed to bring advanced, early autism screening technology into a mobile, practical, and accessible format.

When you're ready to know, we're here for you.



Early Detection is Key


No Early Detection Tools - Until Now


  • There have been no blood tests or scans available for Autism.
  • Diagnosis is based on behavior.
  • Diagnosis is often done from ages 2-5, and often later due to delays.


And yet, all therapists working with children with Autism prefer that they begin therapy as young as possible, as outcomes are better.

Further, new research shows that early treatment allows some children with Autism to recover and catch up to the level of independence of typical kids.

[1]

[1] Dr. Deborah Fine
[2] Granpeesheh et al. Retrospective analysis of clinical records in 38 cases of recovery from autism. Ann Clin Psychiatry. 2009


The Science is Sound


Over ten years of research in peer-reviewed journals has shown that by using video to accurately track what children look at, one can detect children who have autism, or who will later go on to be diagnosed with autism.





Who Developed and Uses this Sort
of Approach?


A number of top thought leaders at major institutions around the world have developed the foundation for this approach for over a decade [3]. 

[3] Bedford, Chawarska,  Elison, Elsabbagh, Falck-Ytter, Holmqvist, Hosozawa, Key/Stone, Klin/Jones, Noris, Pierce, Shic, Young, and more.

Dr. Ami Klin and Dr. Warren Jones are two of the thought leaders in the field, and direct research at the Marcus Autism Center in Atlanta, Georgia.   The center employs hundreds of staff for research and clinical care, and is a national Autism Center of Excellence.

Here is a 2-minute news report describing how the technology is being employed, with Dr. Jones commenting.

Please note, NeuroscanPro has not, to date, worked with or been affiliated with Dr. Klin, Dr. Jones, or the Marcus Autism Center, though like all researchers in the field, we are indebted to their groundbreaking research, as well as that of other renowned eye-tracking thought leaders mentioned.

Here is an excellent 20 minute TED presentation by Dr. Ami Klin on the background behind the eye-tracking approach.



And Now: A Simple, Quick, Mobile Solution



The Science  +  Mobile Devices =
A Revolutionary Screening Capability


We have taken the results of years of eye-gaze tracking research published in  peer-reviewed journals, derived proprietary algorithms, and created a patented system with a mobile app, and laptop-based software.  It can begin to screen children for autism risk as early as 3-6 months old.

Results can be made more precise by repeating the test over several months, just as repeating a blood pressure check over time gives a more accurate  picture overall.

Initial users will need to use the app to take several readings over a three month period, before a risk assessment will be available.


Key Benefits



Our point-of-care technology is a revolutionary screening and monitoring tool that can flag infants at high-risk for future Autism diagnosis. 

It may also be used to objectively monitor how the child is doing, while different therapeutic interventions are tried in children who have already been diagnosed. 

It does not replace formal diagnosis by a professional, which can only be done once a child is old enough to be clinically evaluated for Autism.

The first releases will be for laptops and iPad tablets. Other devices will then have versions released with the patented technology.


Contributor Rewards


Through this campaign, you can get first access to the screening system, as well as internet and telephone-based support for test interpretation, counseling, and referral to local resources.  This is via an ongoing home-based clinical trial, which will be used to continue to gather data to further improve the system.  

It is important to understand that the tool gives a risk-assessment, and not a diagnosis.  It is also important to understand that the tool will undergo continual development and improvement over the next few years, as our datasets and systems grow. 

You can either choose to get the tool for yourself, gift it to someone you know, or sponsor a child who would otherwise not be able to afford it to receive access. Here's how:



Project Plan & Use of funds


We seek to get it into your hands in six months, perhaps a bit earlier if possible.  At the same time, we realistically budget up to two months of delay, because that is the  nature of complex software releases.    We want to provide a solid and user-friendly experience, and sometimes that requires extra development time.

We know you want results as soon as possible, and that drives us to deliver a top product, as soon as possible.

Access will be provided in several sequential group releases, in order of user signup.

The software currently has basic functionality, and requires further development for commercial release to be user-friendly.    A significant portion of our budget goes towards funding support (online plus telephone-based) to those whose results return as high-risk.



What are people saying about us?



The Company Has Won Multiple Top Prizes




Our multi-award winning company (6 prestigious prizes in 2014) has a strategic partnership with a top academic children’s hospital for validation testing and technology trials.


The social impact will be huge


If our system succeeds in getting 10% of children on track to early treatment and recovery, we can

  • save over $12 billion/year in the USA alone, and
  • get over 1 million kids independent worldwide, over the next 25 years. 


Our Team


Our team has a combined 30 years of experience in delivering complex health-IT database solutions, to hundreds of clients around the world, including many of the top medical schools and hospitals. We know how to deliver.

Our CEO has previously raised 7-figure venture capital and grants. He founded a prior health database company (Evidence Matters) and sold it to a U.S.A public company for a successful exit for all stakeholders.

The team holds authorship on two health-tech patents involving motion detection.


FAQs

1. Why is it important to know about my child’s risk for Autism early?
2. Why should I use NeuroscanPro?

1. Why is it important to know about my child’s risk for Autism early?

Diagnoses of Autism and Developmental Delay are becoming very common.  The CDC says that 1 in 68 children, and 1 in 42 in boys, are being diagnosed with autism, with a 15% increase each year.

Virtually all therapists that work with kids with Autism agree on one thing: the earlier you begin intervention, the easier it is to work with kids and to achieve better outcomes.

Early treatment and intervention allow some kids to catch up to the normal level of function of typical children in day-to-day activities.

2. Why should I use NeuroscanPro?

NeuroscanPro can screen for autism risk at a younger age than any available system. It takes the results of ten years of scientific research and puts it on a simple-to-use mobile device.

NeuroscanPro is partnered with leading academic children’s hospitals that are preparing multiple clinical trials demonstrating the effectiveness of the tool in different populations.

It has already won awards for People’s Choice and Most Innovative Product at an awards event at St. Justine’s Hospital in February 2014. It went on to win 2 of 10 awards, out of several hundred companies, at the International Startup Festival in July 2014.

story:
As we all know, Android and Apple phones dominate the mobile phone market. Most Android phones come with Dual-SIM-Dual-Standby support. However, Apple has continued to keep a single-SIM design for all their mobile products. Aiming at the more than 100 million Apple iPhone users, our team has decided to change this situation and spend lots of time and research to design a product that adds the Dual SIM feature to your Apple handset. While we can’t change the original internal design of Apple’s devices, what we can do is produce a concept of an external accessory to add this function for the millions of users who seek it.

Knowing that most people use cases to protect their phones and also carry external power sources to charge their devices on the go, we decided to combine these features with our DUAL SIM functionality, thus creating a new product that is both beautiful, efficient, and extremely useful. 

 

What can Airphone do for you?

Airphone is a smart Bluetooth gadget, connecting to iPhone via our Morecord app. This app is downloadable for free from the Apple App Store. When combined with Airphone, it enables single-SIM iPhone to become a Dual SIM Dual Standby device. Morecord and Airphone support all GSM network frequencies at present.

How does Airphone work?

 Making Morecard your personal assistant

  • Easy to Install & Remove

 

  • ​Making Personal Calls

When dialing a call using Morecard, all call records will be kept in the Morecard app and won’t appear on your iPhone’s standard phone app, more easily allowing phone logs to be kept private from others.

 

  • Send Short Messages

You can also send text messages to anyone through Morecard and these records will also be kept within the Morecard app.

 

  • Lock Screen

Require pattern or fingerprint locks in order to open and access Morecard, increasing security and protecting your privacy.

 

  • Charge iPhone

Never need to pack an extra bulky power bank ever again. Airphone is designed with a built-in high-capacity Li--polymer battery to charge your phone anywhere, anytime.

If you don't want to charge, just press for 5s, it will stop charging your iPhone.

 

  • Multiple Languages

​Morecard includes support for 12 languages, including English, French, Chinese, Spanish, Japanese, and many more. So use Morecard wherever you live!

 

 Airphone in the press

 

 Product Features

  • Specifically designed for iPhone 6/6S, 6 Plus/6S Plus, iPhone 7/7 Plus, iPad and iTouch
  • Charges your iPhone on the go via built-in high-capacity Li-polymer battery
  • Smart integrated circuit design to avoid short circuit or overcharging
  • Designed with an intelligent charging button and precise power indication
  • Bluetooth working distance up to 10 meters. Enjoy DSDS function even when you remove Airphone for charging

 

 

 SPECIFICATION

 

There have been many changes to Airphone’s design throughout its development.

  • Card Slot Position: We first designed the card slot to be on the top edge of the battery case. However, we were worried it would not be resistant enough to water, dust, oil, sweat, etc., so we changed to an "inner slot" design that placed the SIM slot internally in the back of Airphone.
  • Edge Design: We use premium TPU material to make the edges of the Airphone’s case so it is very easy to slide your phone in and out of without damaging the phone’s surface. At the same time these edges are strong enough to protect the phone’s screen when dropped.
  • Charging Led Indicator Light: We utilize one power button with LED color indicators to display charge level.

 

Production Timeline

 

What We Need & What You Get

When we create Airphone, we hope everyone who are expected the birth of it. Through our almost one-year efforts for researching design, improving functionalities, finally Airphone can successfully conbined charging and dual-card support functions. But when our idea came true, we heartfeltly hope Airphone can come into our life and bring great convinience to the world. So we decided to make mass production. If you pledge us, and once funded, we will be able to start mass production right away and send you your new Airphone very quickly! Thank you for support in advance!

 

About us

Plus One was founded by a small young team who have creative idea with great passion in manufacturing that want to create something impossible. We have recently partnered with a premier manufacturer who specialize in smart gadgets like bluetooth speaker, smart watch, smart phone case and so many awesome products to create a unique rechargeable Dual-card iPhone case. This product will bring different and pleasant experience to all of you.

 

Why we need your help?

Dear backers, when you’re trying to creat a great product, you need the support of a passionate community. That’s exactly why we’re here. We have spent almost a year searching for reliable and capable manufacturers, consulting project design with different designers, and rigorously testing prototypes. We can now safely and proudly say: We are ready to produce Airphone! Your ideas and feedback are vital to our product development efforts. Your pledges will help us accelerate the manufacturing process and most importantly grow the Plus One community. We need your help to start  production of this useful, exciting new gadget!

 

Our Risks and Challenges

All tech projects run into unexpected risks and challenges along the lengthy, winding road which goes from designing a prototype to the actual final creation.

We, on the other hand, have already completed the most challenging parts of out project as we have created a working prototype and have finalized all manufacturing arrangements. Once funded, we will be able to start mass production right away and send you your new Airphone very quickly!

story:
Our kids are precious

We want the best for our kids...but we are often protecting them with solutions that were developed decades ago, don't always work, are easily circumvented, difficult to use and that keep stress and danger levels high. 

Protecting them from danger

As parents, we want both safety and usability ... a combination currently unavailable in outlet protection. We want and need safer and easier alternatives to use throughout our homes.

Electrical shock symptoms can vary from small burns to full cardio events. Every year, thousands of kids visit the emergency room due to electrical shock...many of which never recover. 

These "accidents" happen regularly - despite widespread use of plastic inserts and other outlet protection.  All of these accidents can be avoided.

Guarding against distraction 

The Guardian Angel Outlet is an electric outlet that provides BOTH the absolute safety AND the convenience parents desire. After 5 years invested in research, engineering, patents, trademarks and design, the Guardian Angel Outlet is nearly ready for distribution.

We’re putting intelligence in child safety 

The Guardian Angel technology is always on – using capacitive sensing to continuously monitor the electrical receptacle’s immediate surroundings for dangerous actions or situations – ensuring a child is always safe.

Electrodes in the housing allow the circuit to see beyond its plastic walls and distinguish a dangerous object from an acceptable plug.

We Need You!

Our innovation won 1st place at the MIT Whiteboard Challenge and has been featured in multiple news outlets and blogs. Support us on Indiegogo and help us get the Guardian Angel Outlet in the hands of parents and protect children from the dangers of electricity.

Outlet Specs: 

• 100% shock proof protection 

• Peace of mind 

• Ease of use 

• Cannot be circumvented by childhood curiosity 

• Installs easily (professional installation not required) 

• Uses a sensor technology that is always vigilant 

• Outlet is protected and power is available for use 

• One full piece for installation (No small pieces  that create choking hazards)

Guardian Angels

Dan Masterson has spent his entire professional career in product innovation and development. He has invented dozens of products and has built innovations centers at several major corporations. He is the driving force behind Guardian Angel.

Over the past 35 years Dennis Gruber has developed over 100 new consumer and commercial products, including the original Memorywriter typewriter. Dennis spearheads the electronics design and software development.

Dipan Surati is a master of mechanical design and "making things work."  He has invented and developed category changing products as diverse as paper shredders, air fresheners, space heaters, air cleaners, and more. Dipan leads the product design, packaging, tooling and commercialization efforts.

With over 30 years of brand and marketing experience, Jeff Glass launched one of the first fully integrated, full-service communications agencies, J.M. Glass & Associates. Jeff leads the brand strategy, marketing and public relations for Guardian Angel.

These "accidents" happen regularly - despite widespread use of plastic inserts and other outlet protection.  All of these accidents can be avoided.
Guarding against distraction 
The Guardian Angel Outlet is an electric outlet that provides BOTH the absolute safety AND the convenience parents desire. After 5 years invested in research, engineering, patents, trademarks and design, the Guardian Angel Outlet is nearly ready for distribution.
We’re putting intelligence in child safety 
The Guardian Angel technology is always on – using capacitive sensing to continuously monitor the electrical receptacle’s immediate surroundings for dangerous actions or situations – ensuring a child is always safe.
Electrodes in the housing allow the circuit to see beyond its plastic walls and distinguish a dangerous object from an acceptable plug.
We Need You!
Our innovation won 1st place at the MIT Whiteboard Challenge and has been featured in multiple news outlets and blogs. Support us on Indiegogo and help us get the Guardian Angel Outlet in the hands of parents and protect children from the dangers of electricity.
Outlet Specs: 
• 100% shock proof protection 
• Peace of mind 
• Ease of use 
• Cannot be circumvented by childhood curiosity 
• Installs easily (professional installation not required) 
• Uses a sensor technology that is always vigilant 
• Outlet is protected and power is available for use 
• One full piece for installation (No small pieces  that create choking hazards)
Guardian Angels
Dan Masterson has spent his entire professional career in product innovation and development. He has invented dozens of products and has built innovations centers at several major corporations. He is the driving force behind Guardian Angel.
Over the past 35 years Dennis Gruber has developed over 100 new consumer and commercial products, including the original Memorywriter typewriter. Dennis spearheads the electronics design and software development.
Dipan Surati is a master of mechanical design and "making things work."  He has invented and developed category changing products as diverse as paper shredders, air fresheners, space heaters, air cleaners, and more. Dipan leads the product design, packaging, tooling and commercialization efforts.
With over 30 years of brand and marketing experience, Jeff Glass launched one of the first fully integrated, full-service communications agencies, J.M. Glass & Associates. Jeff leads the brand strategy, marketing and public relations for Guardian Angel.

story:
Meet µPlayer -- an amazing, small, but tough, mobile audio player for all the audiobooks and albums lovers, that actually ROCKS!

µPlayer is planned to be released as a mobile application for iOS, Android, Windows Mobile, Windows 8, Blackberry, Bada and other platforms.

I'm a passionate, mobile developer, with 15+ years of overall experience in software and web development. I want to create an outstanding, yet simple and easy to use mobile audio player, that will perfectly fit all the audiobooks and albums lovers needs.

µPlayer will:

  • offer many features, that other audio players lacks,
  • allow you to listen to many audiobooks or albums simultaneously,
  • always remember, where you left each book or album, and resume there,
  • be simple and powerful in the same time and translated into many languages,
  • available to many mobile platforms, incl. iOS, Android, Windows, Blackberry and more.

By funding this project, you're supporting creation of an application, that will be (I hope) used by millions. And you're winning chance to make your name or logo visible to these millions.

Perks

In exchange for your contribution I'll offer:

  • ad-free version to each supporter (supporting €1 or more),
  • an access to an exclusive newsletter, distributed to supporters only (€5),
  • access to source code or to an early beta product (€10).

You can also become an official supporter and get your name or logo placed in about-box of µPlayer (€25) or an official sponsor and get your name name or logo placed in the splash screen of application (€100, limited to three perks maximum).

If overall contribution will be much bigger, than excepted, supporters and sponsor will also receive an unique T-shirt with µPlayer logo and their logo or name on it.

Perks are inclusive, so for example an official sponsor receives also an access to source code, exclusive newsletter and ad-free version of µPlayer.

The Goal

I need money mostly to pay developer fees in mobile apps markets. I've estimated, that $300 will be fine for this purpose (including taxes and fees), which is equivalent of aproximately €225.

Anything I raise above this sum will go for:

  • registering own domain for µPlayer,
  • designing a cool-looking layout & logo,
  • making professional translation to many languages,
  • some marketing campaign, to let people know, we're here,
  • paying for some mobile developers or analytic tools and services,
  • ...and a bit or more of developer's consultancy, to make app even better.

µPlayer will be released, even if I don't get even an euro. If I don't reach the goal, I'll also try to follow all plans and make µPlayer available to as many platforms as possible.

You can't contribute? But, you still can help!

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Blog about this project, write an article or a review.
  • Spread the word about µPlayer to your family, colleagues and friends.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools, to tell your Facebook, Twitter etc. friends about it.

I will appreciate any kind of support! Money isn't everything, that matters in this world... Thank you!

BTW: µPlayer has noting to do with uPlayer from us.com. See "Updates" tab for more details.

story:
UPDATE: Yes, Cyan will be compatible with iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus. Our concepts for the same are is given below.

Cyan For Facebook - What Is It?

Cyan is the most powerful Facebook client for iPhone ever developed. Cyan is fast, intuitive and sports more than a dozen of the most demanded features, ranging from details as mild as 'reducing the number of taps to get things done' to powerful ones like 'support for Read it Later services such as Instapaper'. Scroll down to see the details of Cyan's features. (Our Website)


Our Story - What Are We Trying To Do?

I am Roshan Daniel, a med student and part-time developer from India. I and a few other indie developers created what we like to call the Bluish Lab, and this is the story of our app, Cyan!
Now-a-days, our Facebook feeds are stuffed with sponsored posts, page promotions, celebrity videos and funny memes. Not only are we getting a lot of stories from people who we haven't subscribed to, but Facebook also uses an algorithm to demote a majority of our Friend's posts. I used to solve this issue by filtering in Friends' posts on the iPhone app, but FB decided to remove that too in a later update. This tingled our developer senses and instead of just leaving a poor review on the AppStore and waiting for FB to do something, we decided to act. We headed out to create Cyan.
We have been working on Cyan for the past 6 months, doing part-time jobs to fund the project. But now, we realize that in order to do full justice to the app, we need more resources, especially a dedicated UI designer and access to some third party services. And that is why we turned to Indiegogo for your help to make Cyan a reality.


Features - Why Cyan?

1. Super Fast - One of the AppStore user reviews for the Facebook app reads "S-O-O-O-O S-L-O-W". In fact, lag is one of the most complained features of the FB app and from the beginning, it has been one of our areas of focus. Thanks to the light-weight coding and a simplistic design, Cyan is upto 2 times faster than the official Facebook app, even on older devices.

2. Intuitive - The elegant interface (beta) is flat and iOS-7 inspired, showing an increased use of white spaces and transparency. The actions are mostly gesture-based and we have significantly reduced the number of taps it takes to get things done.

3. Powerful - We literally spent weeks going through thousands of user reviews left at the AppStore for the Facebook app. We then shortlisted about 50 of the most demanded and practical features to be implemented in Cyan. The first release of Cyan will see over a dozen of these features with more coming in the later updates.

4. Filter your feed - Facebook's algorithm to sort the user's feeds has been widely critisized and when they removed the ability to sort Friends out of the feed, everybody started missing important stories. Cyan will bring back the ability to filter only posts from Friends or Pages. You can also create a custom group of friends and get a feed of just their stories.

5. Save for Later - Have you ever found a long blog post or a video in your feed which you really wanted to see but din't have the time to do so? Save for Later helps you with just that. You can Save certain stories and links either locally or to third party clients like Pocket, Readability and Instapaper, to read later.

6. Bookmark posts - Bookmarking is like a permanent save. For example, you find a post on "Top ten places to visit before you die." or a video on "How to fix a frozen iPhone" which you want to save forever and access in times of need. These Bookmarks can be sorted, tagged and are also searchable, for easy access.

7. Pin Friends or Pages to side bar - If you have a close friend or a business page or a favorite celebrity whom you closely follow, you can create a shortcut to their feeds by pinning them to the homescreen or sidebar. These icons can also show notifications when they posts something new.

8. Mute - Admit it, you have always had that one guy who always posts something annoying or offensive but you just can't unfriend him. With Cyan, you can just hit a Mute button to hide all his posts without him ever finding out. Not only friends, but pages and groups can also be muted.

9. Powerful search for feeds - Facebook app's search is great for finding people and fan pages, but finding stories are not that easy except for the limited tags. Cyan comes with a powerful search which can search through the feeds based on time, user, page and more.

10. iOS 8 ready - By the time Cyan is launched, iOS 8 would have already been rolled out but, Cyan won't be late to join the party. We're already working on some great iOS 8 features including interactive notifications, notification center widgets and app extensions.

11. Live in-app notifications - Thanks to Facebook's real-time APIs, Cyan will be able to give live notifications when users are within the app. These will be non-obtrusive banners on the top bar which can be either dismissed or opened to bring a pop-up story where you can quickly reply, like or comment without losing whatever you're doing.

12. Modes - Modes are something super exciting and exclusive to Cyan. Though we won't be able to give you the exact details of each at this time, we can assure that Cyan will come with a Driving mode, Exercise mode, Night mode, Kid's mode and a "top secret" mode.

13. More - In addition to the above mentioned features, minor additions like Password locking, multiple profiles, faster ways to consume feeds, powerful media controls and accessibility features will also make into Cyan.


What We Need?

We funded Cyan's development for the past 6 months by doing some freelancing and part-time jobs. But at this point, we realize that with the limited budget and slow pace, we wont be able to bring out Cyan as we visioned it to be. 

We need a couple more people to join us and also access to some third party resources to complete the app satisfactorily. Unfortunately these are out of our budget and that is why we decided to showcase the prototype of Cyan on Indiegogo. A detailed sheet of our estimated expenditures is given below.
If you liked what we're doing, back Cyan and share it with as many as you can.


What You'll Get?

Most importantly, you'll be contributing the development of a revolutionary app which you'll be proud to be a part of. Cyan is not just about the looks. It saves time, increases your productivity, keeps you closer with friend and family and even helps in managing your business pages.
Then of course, there are the perks! We have distributed our offerings across a range of $1 to $1000 and have made sure that whichever one you choose, you'll be getting the best value for your money. Even if you can't buy a perk, we'd really appreciate if you could spread the word about Cyan.;


    Challenges and Estimates - How will we spend $7000?

    1. UI/UX Designer - $3000

    The major problem our team is currently facing is that we donot have a dedicated UI designer amongst us. The current UI is just bought from Envato Marketplace. You might have already noticed in the demo video and pictures that the interface is kind of glitchy. Though we interviewed some professionals for the post, none shared the same passion as we did while others were heavy on pockets. We believe that the interface is what defines the whole experience of the user and consider an UI/UX designer as our priority need.

    2. A developer and some external APIs - $2000

    Believe me, we can't wait to tell you guys more on this. But we'e working on a couple of cool Modes on Cyan which require access to some paid APIs. These will be Cyan exclusive and you guys are gonna love it. We also need a developer to join our team to work on their implementation, for a short period of time. 

    3. Hosting - $2000

    We've been working with cheap and shared hostings to test Cyan during the developement period. However it has now become necessary to move to a more secure, private and larger capacity hosting facility. The money you back us with will host us through the next two months of developments and the first month after release.

    What if we fall short of the target?

    As a buyer, it is important for you to know what happens to your money if the campaign doesn't meet its goal.

    If we do manage to get a significant funding, we plan to move forward with the development but Cyan will be lacking some key features, at least to start with.

    Else, we will either refund you or can donate to charity whichever you choose.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Even if you can't contribute, please consider sharing the campaign with your friends. Also any doubts, clarifications and suggestions reagarding Cyan will be more than welcome and you can post them a comments on the campaign. You can mail us at contact@cyanapp.info also. We're eager to hear back from you. 
    Thanks!

    UPDATE 1 - The Exercise Mode

    We wanted to keep this a secret but thanks to all who asked about the exercise mode. Yes it is what it sounds like  - this mode lets you use Facebook while exercising. However, only those users with an Apple TV will be able to make use of this. 

    You can use AirPlay to see the feeds on you TV while we intelligently turn your iPhone into a remote. How? Shhhhh!

    UPDATE 2 - Compatibility Of The App

    We're really really sorry about missing out to mention the compatibility of the app and thanks to those who pointed that out. 

    Cyan will be compatible with all retina iPhones, namely iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5S and also the upcoming iPhone 6. Obviously iPod Touch 4th and 5th gen are also supported. 

    Cyan will also run natively on iPads, but will be boxed in (until we make the app universal). 

    About the firmware, you'll need iOS 5 or up to install Cyan though some features are restricted to iOS 7 and iOS 8.

    UPDATE 3 - iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus

    The answer is yes! Just like we promised, Cyan will be optmised for the new iPhones at the time of launch. The iPhone 6 Plus version will also include the landscape split screen mode.

    About the Apple Watch Extensions, we haven't thought about it yet, Maybe some time after Cyan comes out and if you guys really want it, we will start working on that too.

    A concept image of how Cyan will come out on on iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus is given below.

story:
This project has 2 goals:

1.  To create a website/app that is a tool to help people live happier, healthier lives.

2.  To illusrtate the fact that crowd funding makes it possible for regular people to create amazing things.

All I have is a laptop and an idea...

I believe that everyone has the ability to do something great.  I believe the greatest barrier to a man or woman accomplishing great things is the fear of failure. 

After 6 years of school and jobs that never lived up to the hype, this is my attempt at making my own break.  At the risk of sounding corny, I want to prove that the American dream still exists.  I think that, through crowd-funding, every person has a chance to do something amazing.

This project is an underdog...

You may notice that this project is a bit backwards.  Most of the time, groups seeking crowd funding have working prototypes, pictures and fantastic rewards.  Their management teams have resumes filled with their experience in corporate America and degrees from well known universities.

Generally speaking, it appears that most people who attempt to build websites or apps have a background in IT or programming.  I don't.  

Most companies would have family or friends that give large sums of money for capital, we don't.

All we have is an idea and a plan.  Fortunately, I believe that ideas are more important and more powerful than any degrees, money or experience.

This project will succeed...

...because it has something for everyone.  Letsplaycatch (LPC) has the potential to give every person an outlet to play.  Exercise and socialization are key to human happiness.  Using LPC, people will be able to get away from their computers and out into the world with people who share their same interests.

For younger users it is a chance to celebrate their achievements in their chosen activities.  

For adult users, it gives them the chance to recapture the enjoyment of playing like a child.  It allows them to find friends (old and new) that share the same love of casual sports and activities that they do.  

For parents it gives the ability to stay better connected to the activities their children participate in.


Quick Story about letsplaycatch.org (LPC)

I came up with the concept one day when I was at the dog park with my pup and no other dogs arrived.  After thinking about the idea more and more, I realized that the problem was not limited to dogs.  Why not give people a way to interact over their love for casual activities like dog parks, hikes or Frisbee?

I broke letsplaycatch.org into 3 areas, all have a specific purpose in creating more opportunity for users to play and participate.

Please see our website for more info about us:

www.letsplaycatch.org

What We Need & What You Get

We need money and clicks.  

  • The money goes to website and app design, additional funds will go to marketing the product (the more users, the more fun)
  • The clicks raise awareness.  Every click gives us more opportunity to bring good people together for good time.
  • With proper funding, our plan is to go live with full functionality on 10.1.2014

A link to our Investment Page:

http://www.letsplaycatch.org/investment-1.html

Please check out our perks.  We expect to begin shipping mid-November.


Social Impact

I believe that getting people together for fun, casual activites more often can change the way people live their lives for the better:

  • LPC  users the ability to find local friends or strangers to play with
  • LPC21 gives adults more opportunity to participate in organized activities and find local people their age to play with.
  • LPC Leagues gives stakeholders (coaches, parents, grandparents) the ability to stay connected to their favorite athlete's team.


If you can't invest, please click!

Please do not underestimate the value of your click!  The more people we have that like our pages, the better. 

I completely understand if you cannot afford to donate (we can still be friends).  Please do us a favor and like our page on FB and other social media. 

That's about it for now.  For the purposes of crowd funding, I have intentionally kept this short and sweet.  Please feel free to contact us with any questions, even if you are just donating $1-.

http://www.letsplaycatch.org/contact-us.html
story_txt:
This project has 2 goals:1.  To create a website/app that is a tool to help people live happier, healthier lives.2.  To illusrtate the fact that crowd funding makes it possible for regular people to create amazing things.All I have is a laptop and an idea...I believe that everyone has the ability to do something great.  I believe the greatest barrier to a man or woman accomplishing great things is the fear of failure. After 6 years of school and jobs that never lived up to the hype, this is my attempt at making my own break.  At the risk of sounding corny, I want to prove that the American dream still exists.  I think that, through crowd-funding, every person has a chance to do something amazing.This project is an underdog...You may notice that this project is a bit backwards.  Most of the time, groups seeking crowd funding have working prototypes, pictures and fantastic rewards.  Their management teams have resumes filled with their experience in corporate America and degrees from well known universities.Generally speaking, it appears that most people who attempt to build websites or apps have a background in IT or programming.  I don't.  Most companies would have family or friends that give large sums of money for capital, we don't.All we have is an idea and a plan.  Fortunately, I believe that ideas are more important and more powerful than any degrees, money or experience.This project will succeed......because it has something for everyone.  Letsplaycatch (LPC) has the potential to give every person an outlet to play.  Exercise and socialization are key to human happiness.  Using LPC, people will be able to get away from their computers and out into the world with people who share their same interests.For younger users it is a chance to celebrate their achievements in their chosen activities.  For adult users, it gives them the chance to recapture the enjoyment of playing like a child.  It allows them to find friends (old and new) that share the same love of casual sports and activities that they do.  For parents it gives the ability to stay better connected to the activities their children participate in.Quick Story about letsplaycatch.org (LPC)I came up with the concept one day when I was at the dog park with my pup and no other dogs arrived.  After thinking about the idea more and more, I realized that the problem was not limited to dogs.  Why not give people a way to interact over their love for casual activities like dog parks, hikes or Frisbee?I broke letsplaycatch.org into 3 areas, all have a specific purpose in creating more opportunity for users to play and participate.Please see our website for more info about us:www.letsplaycatch.orgWhat We Need & What You GetWe need money and clicks.  
The money goes to website and app design, additional funds will go to marketing the product (the more users, the more fun)
The clicks raise awareness.  Every click gives us more opportunity to bring good people together for good time.
With proper funding, our plan is to go live with full functionality on 10.1.2014
A link to our Investment Page:http://www.letsplaycatch.org/investment-1.htmlPlease check out our perks.  We expect to begin shipping mid-November.Social ImpactI believe that getting people together for fun, casual activites more often can change the way people live their lives for the better:
LPC  users the ability to find local friends or strangers to play with
LPC21 gives adults more opportunity to participate in organized activities and find local people their age to play with.
LPC Leagues gives stakeholders (coaches, parents, grandparents) the ability to stay connected to their favorite athlete's team.
If you can't invest, please click!Please do not underestimate the value of your click!  The more people we have that like our pages, the better. I completely understand if you cannot afford to donate (we can still be friends).  Please do us a favor and like our page on FB and other social media. That's about it for now.  For the purposes of crowd funding, I have intentionally kept this short and sweet.  Please feel free to contact us with any questions, even if you are just donating $1-.http://www.letsplaycatch.org/contact-us.html

story:
Our new "PEEK" Gateway. (Your Personal Entertainment Link) will allow you to watch free TV broadcasts, "Pay Per View" movies or Live Events on your smart phone, Tablet, PC or later on a Bluetooth enabled Smart TV!

  The "PEEK" Gateway is a cell phone Gateway that enables you to connect to the  Aboo network to view broadcasts of participating local TV stations , movies, and live events carried by the "ABoo Worldwide Network” on most cel phones or your home computer. The "PEEK" System delivers a super sharp picture and sound on Apple products and most Android devices.

  The “PEEK” Gateway and the ABoo Entertainment Network are being developed by the broadcast engineers of KCTU TV,  the first Commercial television station to broadcast 24/7 on the worldwide web. The top broadcast news publications have acknowleged this with articles published worldwide.  With a combined total of over 100 years of experience in broadcast, program acquisition, marketing, digital development and production our engineers have developed the next step in on- line broadcast, The “PEEK” Aboo Personal entertainment system”!  It’s kinda like the streaming service you currently use, but on steroids.

  The "PEEK" Gateway will be offered Worldwide on most App Store sites and cell phone retailers for only $24.95 U.S. Upon purchase the Gateway can be downloaded directly to the licensed device. Television broadcasts from affiliated stations and networks will be available to licensed clients Free, while " Pay Per View" selections and special events will cost a reasonable fee payable thru PayPal right on the "PEEK" Gateway.

  All Broadcast stations and networks available using the "PEEK" Gateway will be legally licensed for retransmission of the programming by the "ABoo Worldwide Network". Stations located in Oklahoma City, Dallas, Los Angeles, Wichita and Atlanta will be the first of many available worldwide.

  The "PEEK" Gateway will allow the "ABoo Worldwide Network " to be watched on your cell phone and forwarded to your Smart TV for viewing on a larger screen. A later software upgrade will feature a recorder for purchased "Pay Per View" events. Professional sports, concerts and other events will also be available for the viewers’ enjoyment. The PeekABoo Worldwide Network will compete directly with the existing pay services such as NetFlix and Roku but at drastically lower costs. For those "cutting the cord" of cable tv we offer a very attractive alternative. Families are spending an average of $200 a month for cable/satellite tv.  PeekABoo is available on multiple types of mobile and home devices at a cost of $24.95 per year plus any PPV events desired.   

  Beta testing of the basic Gateway with the "On Demand" feature is currently under way. The full "ABoo Worldwide Network" is scheduled to be on line by late Spring of  2016. To meet that goal we need to raise capital for equipment, bandwidth, "Pay Per View" programming and operating expenses.  Your help in funding is requested  on the  Indiegogo.com site.

Peek Gateway Beta Testers are needed. Beta Testers will have FREE local televison broadcasts,  PPV and On Demand programming during the Beta Test period. Sign up today under "Perks"on our Indiegogo site!

  We have developed the latest technology and we know it works! Prove it to yourself by checking out our beta test channels at www.ABooWorldwide.com.

If you are unable to help financially we would appreciate your helping to spread the word about our project by using the Indiegogo share tools available on this site. You might save your friends hundreds of dollars over the next year.

story:
Short Summary

Following the success of our over $50,000 Indiegogo launch of the YNOT Magnetic Series, we're expanding the line with a new laptop messenger bag - The CATCH.

The CATCH will be made in the same durable materials with the same great features available in the original Magnetic Series backpacks. Plus great new features made just for The CATCH.      

  • Auto-locating magnetic closure system.
  • Separated padded laptop sleeve - fits up to 15" computers. 
  • Luggage pass-through slot, so you can attach the CATCH to your rolling bag.
  • 2 extra interior pockets and pen slot for more organization.
  • 1000d Cordura Nylon or 1Ooz Waxed Canvas.
  • Super-strong seat-belt strap with soft matching removable shoulder pad. 
The CATCH is ready for whatever adventure life takes you on!



A detailed look the features of The CATCH: 



What We Need & What You Get

While most bag companies grow sales by advertising, our high (domestic) manufacturing costs mean we count on YOU to spread the word. Campaigns like this help us raise the funds we need to keep growing and investing in our equipment, our people, and our products.

By supporting our campaign, you'll be among the first to get your hands on our newest bag, and for a price we may never offer again!


Additional Perks!

The Magnetic Key Chain 





Risks & Challenges

We've been making quality bags for years in our own factory, and we have all the tools and experience we need to deliver the quality products you expect from us. Depending on the volume of production required, it may take longer than anticipated to deliver rewards. We rely on suppliers to deliver the materials we require to make our products. Those materials with the longest lead-times have already been stocked up so we can make up to 3000 bags! Other materials are generally available within 2 weeks, which means production will start almost immediately when the campaign ends.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't help with a contribution, you can still help us achieve our goal by sharing the campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools to tell your friends about our great Canadian-made products!


Click HERE to download The Press Kit 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Dimensions?

A: Dimensions are as follows:

  • The zipper opening for the rear pocket is 14.5" or 36.8cm.
  • The depth of that pocket is 10.5" or 26.8cm.
  • The luggage handle slip should work with luggage handles up to 8" wide or 20.3cm.
  • The zipper opening on the front pocket is 12.75" or 32.4cm.
  • The depth of that pocket is 9" or 22.9cm
  • The outside width of the bag is 17" or 43.2cm and the height is 10.5" or 26.7cm
  • The depth of the bag loaded to capacity (but not over stuffed) is 6.5" or 16.5cm
  • When worked into a rectangular shape, the inside dimensions are about W 15" (38cm) x D 5.5" (14cm) x H 11" (28cm), a total volume of 15L or 4 gal.

Q: I forgot to add shipping to my contribution. What should I do?

A: Worry not! When the campaign is over, we'll confirm all of your choices. If there is a balance due (for shipping, upgrades, or some other change), we will send payment instructions.

story:
Simple but meaningful than e-mail.
POSTIE is your personal postman connecting special friends and family who live far away with handwritten messages.




POSTIE was exhibited at SXSW INTERACTIVE 2016 from March 13 to March 16, 2016. We'd like to thank the many people who tried POSTIE. Their feedback is important to us as we move towards production.






POSTIE is more than a gadget; it’s a friend. He can deliver personalized handwritten messages and pictures to family and friends with a special touch.




Before starting to send/receive messages,  both the recipient and the sender need to install the app on their smartphones. Next the recipient need to place the smartphone onto POSTIE to be able to receive personalized messages freely. 






To achieve the best possible user experience, our team puts a great deal of efforts into designing and developing both the hardware and the app of POSTIE.


POSTIE is not just our regular postman; He is your personalized buddy who delivers special messages to family and  friends. Our POSTIE is cute, a little silly, and playful. We reflected his personality in the lovely design. When POSTIE is in his “free time”, he likes to wiggle, blink or look around, so you won't get bored staring at him. When POSTIE delivers a message, he looks like a playful child making  funny face by sticking his tongue off.  We spent a great deal of time and effort to make sure the POSTIE's design oozes cuteness and joy for all ages.

POSTIE is your designated postman to deliver your messages to family and friends.



During the prototype process, we were determined to improve the quality of thermal printing. Through extensive research, we reached the conclusion that partnering up with SANEI ELECTRIC INC. One of the leading thermal printing companies in the world would enable us to produce the highest quality of thermal printers.

We believe that by adopting one of the world’s leading thermal printing technology developed by  SANEI ELECTRIC INC. , it will ensure the printing quality for POSTIE.



POSTIE is your friend who can send memos, deliver messages, and help to express feelings that might otherwise be difficult to express through a simple text message. Unlike a digital message, POSTIE prints out a physical paper, which will preserve your emotions and thoughts. To make POSTIE a lovable character, we spent a great deal of  time and effort on the app design and UX.

When in receiving mode, POSTIE app will display POSTIE’s interface with different “facial expressions”.  The “facial expression”  on POSTIE’s interface will change depends on the mode such as when receiving messages.

















Risks & Challenges

Design&Features

In our experience, most pre-production samples still have a slight variation from the final mass produced unit.


Manufacturing

We need to finish tooling to manufacture different parts of the product. 

This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule.  To tackle this risk we selected one of the top thermal printer manufacturers "Sanei Electric Inc." as a manufacturing partner.   This company has been supplying thermal printer product and has come in response to lots of printing demand.This way, the project risks are minimized.


Shipping

We've given a conservative estimate for our delivery dates. We are committed to keeping you informed of our progress both during and following our campaign. We will do our best to ship the product to your door on time. However, if there are any problems with it, we will let you know immediately and we will do everything to solve the problem.

 



Q. Do we need 2 POSTIEs to start sending/receiving messages?

Only one POSTIE is needed to start the communication. By setting the recipient's smartphone to “receive message“ mode and pairing with POSTIE via Bluetooth, the recipient is able to receive messages instantly from other users who send messages from POSTIE app on their smartphones. 

However, the interactive communication and messaging is abled when 2 POSTIEs are in use on both the recipient ‘s side and sender ‘s side. 

Q. What OS is required  to run the POSTIE application?

It’s compatible with iOS and Android. There might be some restriction on older versions. Please be advised, we will update the detail information about  recommended versions in the near future.

Q. What color options are available for POSTIE?

Currently POSTIE  is only available in egg yolk yellow. We will release new color options depending on the feedback and demands.

Q. Can we download SDK?

We are currently not looking to release an official SDK. However, we consider the options depending on the demands. Please be advised that the SDK might only be released as an unofficial SDK. 

Q. Is ink required for POSTIE?

It uses thermal printing, therefore you will not need to use any ink. It uses a standard thermal paper for receipt (58mm size), which could be easily obtained. Please check the size before purchase.

Q. Which countries do we ship our product?

We currently only deliver within Japan and the U.S. If there is a high demand from other market, we may consider the options of expanding our services in the future






POSTIE　was developed by “HACKist”(R&D team) which consists of several veteran creative designers, hardware designers, software engineers and UX designers.

story:
Wouldn't it be great to have a charger that is discrete enough to always carry with you? and what if it also met your functional needs by containing a USB drive, cables,Bluetooth remote and even a Bluetooth locator? Why a Bluetooth locator you ask? Simple, so you could always find it when you need it most!    EVO takes the worry out of carrying multiple accessories around!

EVO combines EVERY possible essential you could need in your daily digital life! Charging | Memory Expansion | Bluetooth Locator. These  are just a few features that EVO contains to make your life more CONVENIENT 


Never run out of power again. Charge ANYWHERE with EVO.
Supports 110-240v you can use it anywhere on the planet!


We have developed North American plugs, but EU and Asia plugs will follow shortly within a month or so. If you order now we will still honor the same price when its released for your market!


EVO can act as On The Go storage expansion for phones/tablets


EVO is designed to work as a USB flash drive with MAC or PC to securely store and retrieve files.

Use EVO's 3 unique shortcut buttons to remote control your Smartphone, Tablet, or PC



One of the many functions..use EVO as a selfie remote!

 
Music mode:


Our patent pending design even integrates a flip stand, use it while watching a video or securely hold your phone when using a wall outlet..SMART!


 The stand also doubles as a holder for your phone while charging on the wall! 



Choose from USB Type-C , Micro-USB, MFI Lightning versions. No matter what device you have, EVO has you covered!

*BLUE & RED available as stretch goal. EU and Asia plugs will be shipped approximately 1 month after North American shipment!

To recap... EVO is a sleek little device that has one purpose : To simplify your daily digital life!


We already have a functional prototype, and are working towards manufacturing. Support us and we will complete our manufacturing readiness process and take this from prototype to in your hands ready to use!

story:
Mobile communications will be cheap, convenient and available worldwide. In every possible spot a man can set a foot to. Right at your smartphone.

This company was founded because like you, we have a dream to stay connected to the ones we love, no matter where we are in the world. We want global mobile service at about $10 a month, with unlimited data, no roaming, or other crappy charges and inconveniences. 

Maybe you think that will happen one day in the future. Well, we're happy to announce we have a solution today.


Jump to: Satellite | Device | App | Roadmap | Perks | Team | FAQs


Yaliny in the press



“It could reshape how people use mobile phones”

- CNET

“Yaliny is offering inexpensive satellite-based phone calls and data coverage anywhere in the world”

- GIZMAG

"Yaliny will revolutionize the smart phone into an inexpensive global satellite phone"

- FUTURISTECH.INFO


How it works



Our Satellite

Info about our constellation

The satellite constellation will consist of 135 LEO satellites on circular orbit, at 370 miles [600 km] altitude. They will cover the entire planet’s surface.

One of the most important points about our satellites is they should be fairly light and small enough to be stacked in one large rocket such as Falcon Heavy. We’re designing them exactly that way - to do just one launch. This will cut initial funding required to create an infrastructure, so we’ll be able to provide cheaper services.

Jump to: How it works | App | Roadmap | Perks | Team | FAQs


Meet Yaliny Point



Some details


Exclusive Yaliny Point for our Indiegogo supporters

Jump to: How it works | Satellite | Device | Roadmap | Perks | Team | FAQs


Yaliny Mobile Application

Our application will be available in such stores as AppStore or Google Play. Once installed, the application will provide your smartphone with full-scale control over Yaliny Point for always-with-you internet connection and VoIP-like services – the ability to place and receive calls, texts and so on. We’re designing it to be fast and reliable, with excellent encryption, convenient synchronization, and the ability to connect to standard internet links like 3G and others. This application will also have several additional important features that you can’t imagine a mobile app without.


Some interesting facts 

  • Canadians using their cellphones abroad pay some of the most expensive wireless data roaming charges out there, according to a study from the Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD).

  • The U.S. ranks among the highest in the world in the cost of phone data plans. According to research by the International Telecommunication Union (ITU) the average phone plan with 500MB of data costs $85 in the U.S., compared to $24.10 in China and $8.80 in the U.K.

  • Yahaya Wahab from Malaysia received the highest cell phone bill of all time. It was $218 Trillion.

Jump to: How it works | Satellite | Device | App | Perks | Team | FAQs


Our Roadmap


Perks for our Indiegogo Contributors



For full details click HERE

Jump to:How it works | Satellite | Device | App | Roadmap | Perks | FAQs


Why we need your support

The real key to ending all those bad experiences we face with mobile phone services is effective infrastructure. Realistically, there is only one way to make communications actually available worldwide - and that’s through the use of satellites in space. 

Here at Yaliny, we use cutting edge technologies and have been working hard for more than a year, to design small, light, inexpensive and high performance satellites from cratch. Simultaneously, we’ve also been working on the other components that make up the telecommunication infrastructure.

We've successfully completed that research stage, and are going to the next level - actually building a satellite, Yaliny Point and other hardware. 

However, making this a reality is a process which demands a lot of extensive scientific innovation, time and money.

We invite you to partner with us to create our future together.


Why we need $250 000

All funds we'll raise through Indiegogo will be spent on a hardware. In order to build a full scale satellite prototype on this stage, we need very expensive equipment for Super High Frequency electronics, different satellite parts and so on. 

Please support us to make this happen.


Meet the Yaliny Team

Vadim Teplyakov

Founder, Navigator, Primary Responsible Person
Navigates and inspires this awesome team, thinks of himself as a tightly compressed spring that makes all gears moving.



Oleg Ivanenko

Laser Charmer, Space RnD
With extensive experience ranging from quantum electronics to optics of turbulent atmosphere, in Yaliny Oleg develops its laser communication system and several other system issues.


Vasily Ruchenkov

Microwaving Radiation Shaman, Antennas
He thinks he is the luckiest man being a part of such an ambitious and exciting project. For Yaliny he designs antenna systems and serves as our in-house visionary who constantly looks one step ahead into the future.


Mikhail Vorozhtsov

Head of Software
Software architecture and development. Network stack and protocol design.



Alex Chernyshoff

Soft-core Designer, Hardcore Programmer
Specializes in DSP programming, FPGA design, stack processors architectures and analog circuitry.


Evgeny Sidorov

Device Architect, Software Сhallenges
Spent all of his professional life discovering different mysteries of programming various electronic devices. But only here he feels like he works on really important things.


Anna Chinenova

Life Support Hero
Fantastic administrator, natural born talent manager and is generally good at pretty much everything. Can do anything that engineers can not.


Elena Ievleva

Interactive Wizard, Media
Loves travelling, surfing and exploring something new and exciting.


In addition to this people we've assembled a group of exellent space engineers,  software developers, mathematicians and so on. Also we have several partners including space tech companies and research universities. We're not just working in this company, we're making our dream come true - to provide you with mobile experience you've never had before.      

Jump to: How it works | Satellite | Device | App | Roadmap | Perks | Team|


Frequently Asked Questions

 1.What will be the latency in the service we provide?

2. What about Uplink?

3. What is the bandwidth? 

4. Why do we need 135 satellites? 

5. Why do we think we can make mobile communications cheap, convenient and worldwide, while large tech corporations can’t?

6. What about prices?

7. What size/weight will Yaliny Point have? How long will its battery last?

8. Which smartphones will Yaliny Point support?

9. Can I use Yaliny Point as a backup battery for my smartphone?

Still have a question? Feel free to email us at welcome@yaliny.com


Q: What will be the latency in service we provide?

A: Latency inside our system will not be more than 350-400 ms and typically it’s much lower. It is our top priority to keep issues like that under control.We are able to provide that latency because our satellites will be on a low orbit, so any signals will have a short path, and because we’re working on smart routing.

We think 400 ms is a pretty good value for latency of satellite service, and it will allow our customers to use the satellite connections for all applications including voice conversations, internet services and so on without inconvenience.

Q: What about Uplink?

A: Uplink channel has more energy than downlink, and is easier to design.

This occurs because each satellite has plenty of connections and its transmitter shares energy between many receivers on devices. And each device’s transmitter works with just one satellite receiver. So the energy of the combined transmitters of many devices is higher than the energy of a single satellite transmitter. Since the antennas of both channels are the same, the uplink has more energy. 

Each device will have a 2W transmitter and unique antennas with narrow radiation patterns. This will help to save a particular device’s and a particular satellite’s energy and maintain good connection.

Q: What is the bandwidth?

A: We’ll provide each device with up to 2Mbps (uplink and downlink combined) of bandwidth. However, in rush hours the bandwidth could be lower, but still enough to maintain a good connection for voice conversations and simple internet activity.

Our priority in the initial stages is to provide our customers with cheap, convenient and worldwide mobile communications. Once we have accomplished that then in successive stages we’ll increase the bandwidth of our links. 

Q: Why do we need 135 satellites?

A: There’re two key reasons:

a) We’d like to cover the whole planet.

b) We need to keep latency under control and provide sufficient bandwidth.

Those issues combined define many factors like: satellite type, altitude of orbit (Low Earth Orbit), quantity of satellites and so on. We have spent plenty of time doing research, and we think 135 is the right number to provide great global services at affordable price.

Q: Why do we think we can make mobile communications cheap, convenient and worldwide, while large tech corporations can’t?

A: Large corporations usually are not very quick, innovative or smart. They do have money, but money is not the only ingredient, and definitely not the most important one. Moreover there’re many management levels, special decision making processes and so on. Good ideas much rather get a “no” from management, because new ideas imply new risks. And who likes risks? And who is willing to take it? Entrepreneurs are, not managers. 

Skype, Facebook, Google, Apple, Microsoft, Amazon - those companies weren’t large corporations when they decided to change the world. But ultimately they did. That’s how it works.

Q: What about prices?

A: Yaliny Point, our device, will cost about $150.

Communications within our network, internet and all incoming calls will be free, with a $10 monthly subscription fee.

Outgoing calls to outside of our network will be cheaper than usual VoIP rates (like Skype).

Q: What size/weight will Yaliny Point have? How long will its battery last?

A: Yaliny Point will weigh not more than a regular smartphones, and will have about the same size. And our devices will be able to maintain at least 10 hours of talk time, or internet use, and will last up to 240 hours in standby mode.

Q: Which smartphones will Yaliny Point support?

A: It will support smartphones with Android 2.3.x+ and iOS 7.1+ from the beginning.We’ll continue updating it and making it compatible with other smartphones as soon as possible. 

Q: Can I use Yaliny Point as a backup battery for my smartphone?

A: Yes, our devices will have this feature.


Still have a question? Feel free to email us at welcome@yaliny.com

story:
The Elevare shower step is an easy, non-slip way to shave, tan, exfoliate or moisturise your legs in the shower.

We have all been frustrated with the awkward balancing act trying to shave our legs in the shower. The alternative was to lean on the bathtub but this is often messy, slippery and what happens when you don’t have a bathtub at all?

THE ANSWER IS ELEVARE.


SIMPLE TO USE.

  1. Simply place the ergonomically designed step in the corner of your shower and the non-slip rubber grips will keep your leg balanced and secure.

  2. With your leg at a convenient, ergonomic height you can shave, tan, exfoliate, apply hair removal treatments or moisturise comfortably and safely.

When you are finished simply rinse the Elevare down in the shower. The elegant, one piece design is easy to clean and has an integrated hanger detail that can also store your razor neatly.


MADE FROM HIGH QUALITY, PREMIUM MATERIALS.


UNIQUE DRAWSTRING TRAVEL BAG AND SPECIAL COLOR OPTION OF LILAC.


PROFESSIONALLY DESIGNED AND ENGINEERED.

The Elevare has been professionally designed by one of Australia’s best industrial design companies, Charlwood design. They have a history of designing award winning products and have created a simple, one piece design that is not only functional but also beautiful to look at. The design has been fully detailed, prototyped and ready for production. This unique and innovative design has been protected through patents.


HELP US BRING ELEVARE INTO PRODUCTION.

The Elevare has been completely self-funded up until this point but we now need your help to get this product to market. The money raised will go towards covering the cost of necessary tooling and manufacturing. Contributing to the campaign ensures we can make The Elevare available to everyone who wants a better, safer and more convenient way to balance in the shower and as a contributor you can be the first to get your hands (or legs) on one.


So take the next step and choose a perk to contribute to Elevare’s Indiegogo campaign so you too can enjoy a better, easier way to get great looking legs in the shower.



FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

When will I get my Elevare?
The first production run is scheduled for January 2014, we are hoping to be ready before this.

Is shipping included if I pledge for an Elevare?

You add shipping listed in the Perk amount. For example: EARLY BIRD REWARD amount is $19 plus $6 shipping, totalling $25.

What is the recommended retail price (RRP)?
The Recommended Retail Price for 1 x Elevare shower step will be $39.00.

What stage of development are you at?
The elevare has currently been made into a functional prototype to test the functionality. The next step for us is to order the tools for production and get manufacturing underway. We can't do this without your contributions! We will be starting as soon as we see strong support for the campaign.

Do you have another question?

Please contact us directly via elevareshowerstep@gmail.com

story:
Thanks for taking a look at our project!

We are creating a solution to a problem that almost every traveler has faced - the frustration of losing something while on a trip. 

First comes the hassle of retracing your steps, trying to contact every Lost and Found along the way (if you can figure out how). Hoping against all odds that your stuff is found and someone contacts you, knowing that the chances are slim. And how long do you wait before you give up and tell your carrier about the lost phone, or (gulp) tell your boss about your lost laptop?

What about the frustration of trying to reload your apps, your contact list, your preferences, your projects and data? Or having to get new keys cut for the ones you had on that lost ring?

Pijunn is a project that we are confident will help people avoid these frustrations, by making it easy to get back the stuff that you lose. 

We start by creating tamper proof labels, key fobs, and other identifiers that you put on your valuables. They look something like this:

We sell these AT COST to travelers, in various packages. We don't want to make a cent on the labels - we want everyone to use them!

When you lose something, you go to the website or hotline and report it. We log it, and then send out an APB to every Lost and Found department where you think you may have left it. Oh, and it doesn't have to have one of our labels - we will take down a description of the item and try and find it that way.

When someone finds your stuff, they simply call the hotline or go to the website and report it. We work to match the finder with the lost item. And then the magic happens.

We broker a connection between the owner and the finder. The owner proves that the item is theirs, and specifies how they want to get it back. We take care of the processing and shipping (for a fee). Presto the lost item is returned to the owner, the finder is issued a reward, and the world is a better place!

We need your help to get this off the ground. We need to finish building the software to support all of this, which we are doing ourselves but there is overhead (and we like to eat). We also need to order the first batch of labels.

In exchange for your help, you will be the first ones to take advantage of the labels and the service that we provide behind them! We hope that you never have to count on them, but you will sleep better knowing that the valuables that you travel with are protected.

Thanks, and happy travels.

Jim and Mark

story:
To stay up to date with our campaign and to learn about new rewards, be sure to Like us on Facebook and Follow us on Twitter and Pinterest.

Dock Minimal - One Size Fits All

Dock Minimal is a colorful tablet dock/stand with more than 20 different viewing angles. The Dock Minimal works with a wide range of tablets from leading brands, making it a perfect fit for both your gadgets and your lifestyle. It currently supports iPad®, iPad Mini, Kindle, Samsung and Nexus tablets/e-book readers, and we will continue to test and add compatibility for even more after we begin manufcturing. Just swap in the connector that fits your device and then charge it using your normal charging/sync cable.

Minimalist Design, Maximum Convenience

With an initial lineup of four colors—Arctic White, Black Onyx, Lava Red and Glacial Blue—Dock Minimal will let you put your device and personal style on display at home or in the office.

Using the kickstand to adjust the dock, you will be able to view your tablet in portrait or landscape mode and position it in more than 20 different working and viewing angles. Watch videos, write emails, play games and browse the web in the position that's most comfortable for you.

What We Need & What You Get

The concept and design phases of the Dock Minimal are 100% complete, and we even have a fully-functional prototype! So now we are ready to move to the next phase - manufacturing, which is the reason behind the project requiring $25,000 in funding. Once we reach our funding goal, we will be able to pull the trigger with the factory and begin production of the Dock Minimal.

We have lots of perks for those who support our project! Perks range from single dock minimals to packs of multiples.

Each Dock Minimal Will Come With:

  • 1 main dock 
  • 1 kickstand 
  • 1 touch-screen stylus pen 
  • 3 side fittings
  • 4 connector fittings

More About Dock Minimal

The Inspiration Behind The Dock Minimal:

We know how annoying it is to buy all new accessories when you upgrade to a new model or different brand. So, we wanted to create a dock and stand that evolved with the latest technology, but it also needed to have a simple, colorful design that looked good on display and was durable.

Materials:

The Dock Minimal will be made with ABS plastic that has a light rubber coating for a smoother feel. The kickstand and stylus pen will both have aluminum bodies. The current colors are red, white, blue and black, and if our project is funded, we hope to add even more.

Glacial Blue, Lava Red, Arctic White, Black Onyx

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help! Help us reach our goal by spreading the word about the Dock Minimal! 

Like us on Facebook, Follow us on Twitter and Pinterest and don't forget to tell your friends and family about our awesome new tablet dock.

 

The Dock minimal is a versatile tablet dock that is great:

                                   While in the kitchen

                                  Convenient for typing

                           Great while listening to music

                             Drawing with the kids

                             Extending your desktop

                  One tablet dock that fits almost all tablets

About us

Founded in 2011 by Icelander Petur Olafsson, onanoff is a small design and technology company which takes it's name from the most essential feature of all electronics: the on and off button. Drawing inspiration from diverse backgrounds and experiences, the creative team focuses on designs that are both distinctive and practical and strive to make products that are simple and quickly become essential to peoples daily lives. Of course, we also like to have fun, and we want our products to have a fun feel too.
