Of course, we also like to have fun, and we want our products to have a fun feel too.

story:
FREE SHOPPING ELECTRONIC RECEIPTS

A Shopping Eco-Friendly Platform

Despite the challenge in developing this unique software for consumers worldwide, it’s as simple as saying YES to the retailer adding your email to their request and the rest is easy—stores the receipt, the photo of the item purchased, and instantly you can  send images to family & friends on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram,  Pinterest, etc.—anywhere your imagination desires.  You have a receipt for a return if the need arises, a quality photo of the item and  purchase date; a receipt for taxes and charitable contributions; and fun of sharing your great purchase with anyone in your social network.

Major retailers are now offering email receipts as Old Navy, American Outfitters, Kmart, Nordstrom’s, Flor, Best Buys, Banana Republic, Gap, Sears, Whole Foods, and many more. 

PayNShow is the newest way to make the shopping experiences just one step better.  Now, you can be part of this shopping revolution by helping us get one step closer in making this a worldwide eco-friendly movement a reality—we have a patent pending —and we might add, it has the utmost security programmed to protect your personal information.  Most important, your contribution will make PayNShow FREE!!!!  Your contribution to make this possible will revolutionize retail purchases for the coming decade.  Join Us!

HOW PayNShow MAKES LIFE EASIER

1.  Download the App, Sign Up

2.  Go Shopping!

3.  At Check-Out, say Yes to Registering Your Email for Store Specials and Ask for the receipt be sent to your email.  Simple!! 

4. PayNShow sends you a receipt notification to your mobile device.

5.  Pay NShow gives you the option to post the photo of your item at Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest or Instagram.

6.  PayNShow reads the bar code of your item and delivers a quality photo.

7.  PayNShow is fast, easy, and know that you are contributing to keeping our environment cleaner without accepting papery receipts—How cool is that.

8. Every major Retailer is asking for your email, so choose the ones you favor the most and make PayNShow a part of your daily shopping experience.



   

                                                             

                                    

                             

                         

                         

                            

                                         Enjoy Sharing

                                   

Advantages Of Using PayNShow

-  Share Your Great Purchase on Your Social Media Page.


-  Get precise images of your shopping without a camera.  No more worrying about color distortion, blurriness, or poor lighting .                        

                                

      

USE OF FUNDS

It’s all about programming, security and user-friendly so funds will be used to complete the development of PayNShow and provide you with a list of the stores at our website where email is just part of everyday business.  We ask you to register today at PayNShow.com to keep you updated and register for some of our online Gift Certificate Giveaways.  Don't forget, PayNShow is Free!!

Thank you for being part of our Campaign and please share this with family and friends.


PayNShow TIMELINE

At the completion of our campaign, we’ll be in the market to share the FREE App download by September 2014.  You’ll be the first to know and the first to download PayNShow. We’ll have a a gift certificate drawing at one of the participating retailers—so SIGN UP.


If you’d like to read about the platform design and development, find more information at our website PayNShow.com


Challenges

Our software developers and the team are ready to move forward. There are two main challenges:

-   The first is to ensure near perfect reading and recognition of all receipts no matter what they look like or where they originate. We have identified a solution that will guarantee almost 100% accurate recognition and reading.

-  The second challenge is Marketing to ensure that all users are updated to which stores have joined PayNShow at Check-Out.  We will do this via email and at our website PayNShow.com



The PayNShow Team


From left to right: Dan C., Gary S., Sada N., and Scott

Thank You for Your Support

Please pass this along to your friends and family and SHARE the link to this campaign.   


Please feel free to ask us Questions! You can email us at: support@paynshow.com

story:
Soutlet Overview

  • 2 Powerful 2.4-amp USB charger built into an outlet.
  • Charges any USB device at full speed (phones, tablets, etc.) and lets you keep the bulky wall adapters elsewhere (your bag, your office, for travel)
  • Built-in LED night light.
  • Smartlet PRO offers WiFi to wirelessly control your outlets (automatically boiling the kettle in the morning, turning off the television after midnight - the possibilities are endless!)
  • Requires ZERO DIY work: no screwdrivers and no wiring!


Take control over your devices and your electricity bill by giving devices set times for when they need power.

Add an easy-to- see night-light to any part of your home, with the added bonus of being able to control it via WiFi


At smartlet, we're all geeks. Every few weeks brings us another delivery of another new, often USB-powered device. At some point it started making more sense to have USB ports instead of outlets in our homes. We searched high and low but no-one seemed to be making the outlet the right way.

                 


What should an outlet for 2015 be?

Firstly, most obviously, it needs to be backward compatible with the outlets from the last 100 years, or else no-one will adopt it. This new outlet needs to work with everything else you probably won't upgrade in the next few years: coffee-maker, kettle, toaster etc. and add some extra functionalities to them.

Secondly, it needs to power the devices of today and tomorrow. That means giving it a full 2.4A, rather than a paltry 1A like some products already on the market.

Lastly, it should be connected. It should be smart. It should be able to talk to many other devices in my home and be able to make decisions. This means adding WiFi and an ever-upgradeable mobile app.

A little LED light for seeing where everything is when it's dark would be a handy addition too!

                         


We couldn't find this device on the market, so we built one ourselves. Smartlet has been in development for over a year now, having validated our idea through market research last September we're launch it on Indiegogo this September with the first of many Smartlets shipping to supporters in January 2016.

The device will cost just $18 for a single Smartlet, and $26 for the WiFi-powered model. You can buy a double or triple pack, a pack for the whole home (6) or your entire office (20). It's not just limited to US-customers either! We're offering the Smartlet with support for Australian, European, Irish & UK and United States plug types. Simply choose the plug type you'd like after the campaign is over!

We've worked really hard on Smartlet over the last year. We really think we've struck the right balance between ease-of-use, features and price. Smartlet, for us, is the ultimate outlet, and we hope through Indiegogo, this idea will be validated and Smartlet can be your ultimate outlet too!

                


  • Contributors will have the option to choose US/UK/EU/AU after campaign ends.

story:
It is messy that different electronic devices need to use different chargers, and there is a more increasing demand for fast charging. Thus our team developed the world's tiny multi-country charger: Qcharger, an 8-in-1 adapter for work, travel, home, and power 4 devices simultaneously.

 

 

Pick the Qcharger for 5 reasons:

Among those international plug chargers, Qcharger brings you:

✔️ The dimension is super tiny in the same power output of other international plugs

✔️ It provides the most ports (2 USB-C +1 USB-A + AC Outlet) in other same dimension and power charger

✔️ The 65W PD output supports PD3.0, PPS, QC4.0+, QC3.0, QC2.0, AFC, SCP, FCP, Apple2.4A, PE+, BC1.2, and more

✔️ Very handy works in over 200 countries with just two slide pins

✔️ The delicateness and hand-feeling are the most pleasing ones


https://twitter.com/nintendolife/status/1367800636549586947

 

Smaller than similar chargers

Using the latest gallium nitride technology, Qcharger has realized a precise and small design concept. The pocket-size is only 37 x 56 x 65mm and the weight is 160g, more portable for you.

 

 

Why can GaN shrink the size?

A key benefit of GaN and other WBG materials is their relationship between breakdown voltage and Ron, which improves conduction losses.

GaN reduces switching losses through the absence of a body diode. The switching losses are lower in GaN, the time between switches can be reduced, increasing the switching frequency. The increased switching frequency allows the size of many large components (such as the transformer, inductors, and output capacitors) to be reduced.

 

 

GaN and other WBG devices also have better thermal conductivity and can withstand higher temperatures than silicon. Both help to reduce the need for thermal management components such as bulky heatsinks, frames, or fans. The absence of these devices (along with the shrinking of the powertrain components mentioned earlier) all lead to significant reductions in the overall size of the power supply.

 

8-in-1

Don't underestimate its small size, Qcharger is equipped with 3 USB charging ports and one universal AC outlet. In other words, Qcharger integrates the US, UK, EU & AU plug into one sleek unit. 4 kinds of pins can be used at will by only two push bars, compatible with more than 200 countries or regions.

 

 

 

 

At the same time, Qcharger can plug into type A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, N, and O outlets. You can work with 4 devices simultaneously.

So perfect & delicate design! Wherever you go, you only need to carry one Qcharger instead of more different chargers for multiple devices, which saves more space for you to store other things and your package would look cleaner. So many plugs depend on which one do you need to use or where you are from.

 

Stackable GaN Charger

Tiny yet powerful 65W GaN chargers with pass-thru AC outlet that can stack to become a 2500W charger, all from a single wall outlet. Qcharger stacks upon itself and lets you power multiple laptops from a single power outlet. 

Qcharger 65W Stackable GaN Chargers provide that even after stacking 3 chargers over a single power outlet, it is able to pass through more than 2500W of power to power a water kettle and each Qcharger is still able to provide the maximum power of 65W respectively.

 

 

65W USB Output

The Qcharger 65W PD output is super powerful among other multi-country chargers. It supports 65W output to fully charge 3 devices at the same time, which is enough to charge a laptop, smartphone & mobile devices simultaneously. With a Qcharger and a USB-C to USB-C cable, you can charge a Samsung laptop up to 50% in about 30 minutes. When powers multiple devices, USB-C1 delivers 45W Max, and the rest of the ports share 18W in total.

 

 

Intelligent Power Distribution

 

  • USB-C1 = 65W
  • USB-C2 = 33W
  • USB-A = 30W
  • USB-C1 + USB-C2 = 45W + 18W (63W Max)
  • USB-C1 + USB-A = 45W + 18W (63W Max)
  • USB-C2 + USB-A = 5V/4.8A (24W Max)
  • USB-C1 + USB-C2 + USB-A = 45W + 15W (60W Max)

 

Fast charge iPhone 12, Samsung, and more

Qcharger supports mainstream fast charging protocols like PD3.0, PPS, QC4.0+, QC3.0, QC2.0, AFC, SCP, FCP, Apple2.4A, PE+, BC1.2, and more, compatible with Macbook Pro/Air, iPad Pro, iPhone 12/ 12 mini / 12 Pro/ 12 Pro Max, DELL XPS, Nintendo Switch, Samsung, Huawei and more.

 

 

2500W AC rating

Qcharger has been upgraded to 10A and the AC rating has reached 2500W Max. This means that it can allow using electric hair dryers, electric kettles, electric rice cooker, induction cooker, and other high-power electrical products within 2500W.

 

 

 

Reliable charging technology solution

According to the results of the research and testing, our team unanimously decided to adopt the Navitas NV6115 chip, which is with more stable performance and higher charging efficiency. The PCBA of the GaN circuit board has multiple protection functions, such as short-circuit protection, multi-current protection.

 

Safety measures against electric shock

Some adapters with wide-open slots can easily attract curious toddlers putting their fingers in. It’s too dangerous. Now Qcharger AC outlet has a child-proof shield which effectively prevents children from getting an electric shock.

 

Built-in heat dissipation measures

Care for too long charging time and the charger is hot? Take a rest. The circuit board PCBA in the product is filled with AB heat-dissipating glue to balance heat dissipation and reduce the surface temperature of the product.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are an independent R&D team that develops plugs, sockets, chargers, power bars and other electrical products. We have senior product structure engineers, mold design engineers and electronic engineers. We strictly follow the ISO9001 quality management system to improve our production, and our products have passed CE, FCC, ETL, PSE, KC, CCC, BS, CB and other certifications and comply with RoHS standards. Products were mainly sold to Europe, North America, Southeast Asia.

Other product lines:

 

 

 

We estimate that we will start shipping Qcharger  in April 2021.However, due to the COVID-19 and large orders ofQcharger, we cannot ship all the Qcharger at the same time. Hence the long duration of Mass Production to Delivery from April 2021 to June 2021, timelines may get pushed up or pushed back but we will give our 100% to make sure that things are completed on, or even ahead of schedule.

Shipping will be calculated and paid at the end of the campaign before we ship the Qcharger out to you. During these uncertain times, shipping costs have gone up significantly. Let’s invite more friends/families/companies to get Qcharger and free shipping worldwide.


* Prices do not include taxes and VAT. That will be subject to the laws and regulations of each individual country.

** Note that these prices are dependent on the situation and may increase or decrease by a few dollars in the months to come.

*** Above price in USD currency. Price in other currencies slightly different vary on current exchange rate.

The increased switching frequency allows the size of many large components (such as the transformer, inductors, and output capacitors) to be reduced.  GaN and other WBG devices also have better thermal conductivity and can withstand higher temperatures than silicon. Both help to reduce the need for thermal management components such as bulky heatsinks, frames, or fans. The absence of these devices (along with the shrinking of the powertrain components mentioned earlier) all lead to significant reductions in the overall size of the power supply. 8-in-1Don't underestimate its small size, Qcharger is equipped with 3 USB charging ports and one universal AC outlet. In other words, Qcharger integrates the US, UK, EU & AU plug into one sleek unit. 4 kinds of pins can be used at will by only two push bars, compatible with more than 200 countries or regions.    At the same time, Qcharger can plug into type A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, N, and O outlets. You can work with 4 devices simultaneously.So perfect & delicate design! Wherever you go, you only need to carry one Qcharger instead of more different chargers for multiple devices, which saves more space for you to store other things and your package would look cleaner. So many plugs depend on which one do you need to use or where you are from. Stackable GaN ChargerTiny yet powerful 65W GaN chargers with pass-thru AC outlet that can stack to become a 2500W charger, all from a single wall outlet. Qcharger stacks upon itself and lets you power multiple laptops from a single power outlet. Qcharger 65W Stackable GaN Chargers provide that even after stacking 3 chargers over a single power outlet, it is able to pass through more than 2500W of power to power a water kettle and each Qcharger is still able to provide the maximum power of 65W respectively.  65W USB OutputThe Qcharger 65W PD output is super powerful among other multi-country chargers. It supports 65W output to fully charge 3 devices at the same time, which is enough to charge a laptop, smartphone & mobile devices simultaneously. With a Qcharger and a USB-C to USB-C cable, you can charge a Samsung laptop up to 50% in about 30 minutes. When powers multiple devices, USB-C1 delivers 45W Max, and the rest of the ports share 18W in total.  Intelligent Power Distribution 
USB-C1 = 65W
USB-C2 = 33W
USB-A = 30W
USB-C1 + USB-C2 = 45W + 18W (63W Max)
USB-C1 + USB-A = 45W + 18W (63W Max)
USB-C2 + USB-A = 5V/4.8A (24W Max)
USB-C1 + USB-C2 + USB-A = 45W + 15W (60W Max)
 Fast charge iPhone 12, Samsung, and moreQcharger supports mainstream fast charging protocols like PD3.0, PPS, QC4.0+, QC3.0, QC2.0, AFC, SCP, FCP, Apple2.4A, PE+, BC1.2, and more, compatible with Macbook Pro/Air, iPad Pro, iPhone 12/ 12 mini / 12 Pro/ 12 Pro Max, DELL XPS, Nintendo Switch, Samsung, Huawei and more.  2500W AC ratingQcharger has been upgraded to 10A and the AC rating has reached 2500W Max. This means that it can allow using electric hair dryers, electric kettles, electric rice cooker, induction cooker, and other high-power electrical products within 2500W.   Reliable charging technology solutionAccording to the results of the research and testing, our team unanimously decided to adopt the Navitas NV6115 chip, which is with more stable performance and higher charging efficiency. The PCBA of the GaN circuit board has multiple protection functions, such as short-circuit protection, multi-current protection. Safety measures against electric shockSome adapters with wide-open slots can easily attract curious toddlers putting their fingers in. It’s too dangerous. Now Qcharger AC outlet has a child-proof shield which effectively prevents children from getting an electric shock. Built-in heat dissipation measuresCare for too long charging time and the charger is hot? Take a rest. The circuit board PCBA in the product is filled with AB heat-dissipating glue to balance heat dissipation and reduce the surface temperature of the product.            

 
  

 
    We are an independent R&D team that develops plugs, sockets, chargers, power bars and other electrical products. We have senior product structure engineers, mold design engineers and electronic engineers. We strictly follow the ISO9001 quality management system to improve our production, and our products have passed CE, FCC, ETL, PSE, KC, CCC, BS, CB and other certifications and comply with RoHS standards. Products were mainly sold to Europe, North America, Southeast Asia.Other product lines:   We estimate that we will start shipping Qcharger  in April 2021.However, due to the COVID-19 and large orders ofQcharger, we cannot ship all the Qcharger at the same time. Hence the long duration of Mass Production to Delivery from April 2021 to June 2021, timelines may get pushed up or pushed back but we will give our 100% to make sure that things are completed on, or even ahead of schedule.Shipping will be calculated and paid at the end of the campaign before we ship the Qcharger out to you. During these uncertain times, shipping costs have gone up significantly. Let’s invite more friends/families/companies to get Qcharger and free shipping worldwide.* Prices do not include taxes and VAT. That will be subject to the laws and regulations of each individual country.** Note that these prices are dependent on the situation and may increase or decrease by a few dollars in the months to come.*** Above price in USD currency. Price in other currencies slightly different vary on current exchange rate.

story:
Who's Talking About Us

 

 

See What Our Backers Are Saying

"I have to say, you have one of the best-run campaigns I have backed. You have really delivered – not only did you deliver when you said you would, but I am thrilled with the product."  - Monnett Soldo

"I just received my Koala Storage bank and I must say it was VERY, VERY well presented when I opened the package. It is everything I thought it would be from watching the video presentation. The lights on the side for determining how much charge the bank has, is a very very convenient feature. I plan on using it on camping trips, as I have a lot of electronic gear that is rechargeable via usb. Flashlights, lighters, mp3 players, and speakers are all USB rechargable. Thank you so much Kogalla, I believe this is a tool that everyone should have from Urban to Rural. The light included nearly blinded me when I plugged it in facing myself, won't do that again. You have definitely made a quality product everyone should own." - Joseph T. Barber 

"The design is beautifully compact and efficient. My primary plan is to use it for emergency and survival purposes. I would highly recommend it." - Lewis Aide

"As an electrical engineer…I love the design, fit, finish and the fact that detailed specifications are provided. More power to you!" - John Wood

"Got mine today!!! Really good quality!! Ready to use it!!" - Alain Garibay

"Solar pack looks very well made and functional. I was truly impressed with the prompt order fulfillment. Wish other campaigns worked that fast and reliable." - Jens Randolff

 

Featured on CBS Morning News: Tech Report

 

Ultra-Portable Kit

The SSB2210 Solar Storage Bank is a high-energy, ultra-slim power bank matched to a high-effieciency foldable solar array housed in rugged waterproof fabric. This compact, portable kit includes a zippered pouch for accessories. The kit also includes a USB light, micro-USB cable and lightning cable.

Anywhere You Go

No matter where you go, the SSB2210 is a great power companion. With dual high-current USB-A power ports (up to 12 W each) you can power lights, accessories or fast-charge devices. A red Solar LED indicates that the solar array is harvesting energy while four blue Charge Status LEDs form a fuel gauge to indicate the battery charge level.

 

Portable Renewable Energy

Whether evacuating in an emergency or heading out on your next adventure, you need the power to stay connected. The Kogalla SSB2210 Solar Storage Bank integrates a rugged solar panel array with an ultra-slim storage bank in a compact, easy-to-carry package. Harvest energy during the day, recharge and power your devices at night.

 

Powerful Solar Array

Sets up in seconds. With no connections to make, all you have to do is unfold the unit and place it in sunlight. It automatically begins harvesting solar energy.  Even on a short break during a hike, the 22W solar array is powerful enough to top off the 10,000mAh storage bank.

 

Rapid Solar Charging

In full sun with reasonable orientation, the SSB2210 will recharge the internal 10,000 mAh storage bank in three to four hours. That's enough energy to charge an average smart phone three to five times. Never worry again about running out of power at a crucial moment. The unit can also be charged like a standard storage bank via its micro-USB port. 

 

Low-Sun Energy Harvesting

By matching the solar panels to the storage bank, the unit will harvest energy even in low-sun conditions without fear of the internal charging connection shutting off. You'll never return to camp after a long day to find that a passing cloud terminated your charging cycle 15 minutes after you left.

 

Charge Your Phone At Night

Having an integrated storage bank lets you keep your phone with you during the day and recharge it after sundown. The unit's 10,000mAh capacity provides enough energy to charge your phone, a GPS, a rechargeable flashlight and run the included USB light all night long with power to spare.

 

Emergency Preparedness

FEMA, the Federal Emergency Management Agency, has advised that keeping a disaster supply kit is essential.  Since your mobile phone is your communication life line, every kit should include the ability to keep your phone charged indefinitely.

According to AccuWeather, since 1990, natural disasters have affected 217 million people every single year.  And they report that in the past 4 decades there was an 80 percent increase in the growth of climate-related disasters.  When you include those created by accidents and terrorism, the risk is magnified.

    

Fast Facts

  • Integrated storage with 10,000 mAh battery.
  • 22 W solar panel provides fast charging in full sunlight.
  • Matching panels to storage bank provides optimal energy harvesting even in low light.
  • Storage bank can also be charged through micro-USB.
  • Dual USB-A power ports (12 W) powers lights and charges any USB device.
  • Whenever the red Solar LED is on you know the unit is charging from the solar panels.
  • The four blue Charge Status LEDs indicate storage bank charge status like a fuel gauge.
  • Accessory pouch includes USB light, micro-USB cable and lightening cable.
  • The plastic case and waterproof material protect device from minor water exposure.

 

 

Perks Are Shipping!

Take a look at what one of our first backers found on their doorstep this (Thursday, Dec 15) morning.

All product in the United States ships FedEx. Man, those guys really know how to move products quickly!

 

Our Fulfillment Center is Bustling

Our friends at Blue Box Logistics worked extra hours to make sure product went out in time for Christmas.  Mission accomplished!

The Christmas rush is over and we have limited quantity of units remaining and ready to ship out immediately.

 

 

Specifications

Solar Panel Output:  5.5V / 4A / 22W

Battery Type:  2 x 5,000mAh Li-Polymer

Battery Capacity:  3.7V / 10,000mAh / 37Wh

Input Power:  5V / up to 2.1A / 10.5W

Charging Time (Solar):  3-4 hours in direct sunlight

Charging Time (USB):  4 hours with 2A charger

Output 1 Power:  5V / 2.4A / 12W

Output 2 Power:  5V / 2.4A / 12W

Operating Temperature:  Charge: 0°C to 45°C

                                                  Discharge: -20°C to 60°C

Battery Protection:  Over-charge, over-discharge, short circuit, over-current

Case Material:  Waterproof fabric, ABS

Dimensions (folded):  1.1” x 9.6” x 6.3”

Dimensions (unfolded):  0.4” x 9.6” x 33.9”

Net Weight:  1 lb 12 oz

 

FAQs

1.  My first USB port works fine but nothing charges from the second USB port.  Is my unit faulty? 

ANSWER -  Output 1 has an auto-detect circuit that will automatically turn on your SSB when you plug in a phone or other USB device.  However, Output 2 is always controlled by the on/off button.  In other words, if you plug a phone or other device into Output 1, it auto detects and turns on.  When you plug in a second device to the other output, you will need to press the on/off button.  It’s designed this way to prevent power leakage from an unused port. 

2. You show the SSB laying outside.  Can I lay it on the dashboard of my locked car so it won't get stolen? 

ANSWER - Please do not leave your SSB inside a hot car. “When temperatures outside range from 80 degrees to 100 degrees, the temperature inside a car parked in direct sunlight can quickly climb to between 130 to 172.” – Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
In college we used that to our advantage by making “dashboard burritos”. They went from a frozen brick to a hot meal in short order. But that hot dash is not so good for any of your electronic devices with lithium batteries.

 

Risks and challenges

As with any product development, unforeseen challenges are possible. The good news is that this team of professional industrial designers, engineers, programmers, sales, and marketing experts have brought hundreds of consumer products from concept to market over the last 30+ years, so we have a pretty good idea of what lies ahead and we're well equipped to deal with whatever comes our way.  And this product is already completed and in production.

That said, there are common obstacles that sometimes come up, which include:

• Shipments that are lost or damaged

• Customs delays

• Fulfillment: Delivery delays due to weather, strikes, inaccurate address information, doorstep package theft, holiday season shipping delays, etc.

As always, we are dedicated to making sure you know what is happening every step of the way. We'll be updating all of our backers regularly and letting you know exactly what's going on with the Kogalla Solar Storage Bank.

Help us launch this innovative product by selecting and clicking a "GET THIS PERK" button, and by helping us spread the word through sharing this IndieGoGo page and linking over to our Facebook and Kogalla.com web pages. This networking will help us to reach our funding goal.

After all, we're doing this together! 
We thank you for your faith in us!

story:
Unpluq working principle

 

We did extensive user tests with over 20 people, who all tested Unpluq for a week or more, to get to the current product. The results from these tests were very promising. This is what some of our users said:

 

Unpluq is the device to help you win the battle for your attention. It gives you time to focus on the things you find meaningful in life.

 

With the addition of a physical key, you have to make a conscious decision to physically plug the key in and access distracting apps. 

Furthermore, we give you the option to create the barrier to distraction yourself: you can decide where to store the Unpluq key when you want to focus.

 

 

Unpluq is the combination of a hardware key (the Unpluq key) and a custom Android launcher (the Unpluq Launcher). A launcher is the software on your phone that allows you to open other apps - it’s what you see when you press the home button. 

By detaching the Unpluq key from your phone, the launcher switches to Unpluq mode, in which only apps of your choice will be available and notifications of all other apps will be blocked. Yet when you make the conscious decision to plug the Unpluq key back in, you will have the functionality of your entire phone, and the notifications that were blocked while you were in Unpluq mode will be shown to you.

Have a look at how Unpluq works in more detail in this video of our working prototype:

 

 

 

 

Unpluq is the combination of buying a minimalist/dumb phone, combined with all the useful functionality your smartphone has to offer. No need to buy a minimalist phone, just transform your phone into one!

You decide when you use all functionality of your phone, or when you transform it into a useful, distraction-free device.

 

 

When you order an Unpluq key you will receive it together with the Unpluq launcher, a quick set-up guide and an Ebook that will give you tips on what to do with all the time that you receive by spending less time on your smartphone.  

 

We went through several iterations to get to the current hardware design. We chose this bright yellow colour to make the Unpluq key extra visible when you are plugged in. This reminds you that you are using distracting apps. 

We chose to make a combination of hardware and software because we found that for most people, the current software solutions don’t offer enough to help you regain control over your smartphone.

The Unpluq key is designed for you to be easily attached to your keychain, so you won’t lose it.

 

Unpluq launcher in Unpluq mode

 

Unpluq launcher in normal mode

 

We developed a custom Android launcher. A launcher is the software on your phone that allows you to open other apps - it’s what you see when you press the home button.

We wanted to keep it simple, without too much distraction.  That's why the launcher is in greyscale when you're in Unpluq mode. 

The launcher has a simple homescreen where you will see six of your favourite apps. Swipe up to see all your apps and swipe down to see the notifications that were filtered for you while you were unplugged. To the right of the favorite apps, you will have a screen where you can place your favorite widgets. To the left of the favorite apps, you will see your usage statistics: an overview of the total time you used your phone today, the time you were plugged out, the time the Unpluq key was plugged in, plus some more useful usage insights. 

 

Or better yet, talk with people about Unpluq and the benefits it will deliver to people and to society as a whole. Let's fight digital distractions!

 

Important notice: Unpluq is only available for Android phones with USB-C ports. iPhones are unfortunately not supported (Apple doesn't allow modifications to it's operating system). 

However, if enough people want an Unpluq key with Micro USB, we might consider that. You can leave your email here and we will drop you an email right if we decide to make a Micro USB Function.

 

 

 

We want to work together with our customers as much as possible. That’s why we give you the opportunity to suggest features for our product. We will send all of our backers a survey, in which you will be able to request features you'd like to be added.

If certain features get requested a lot, we will think about implementing them in Unpluq. We believe that together, we can build an even greater product.

 

If you don't own a creditcard, this is a way to back our project with a prepaid creditcard:

Request a pre-paid creditcard

 

At Unpluq we believe you should control technology, instead of technology controlling you. We want you to enjoy life more calmly, joyfully and peacefully. We want you to have more time to focus on what’s meaningful to you.

At Unpluq, we design products that deliver benefit to the customer with privacy in mind, we are not storing any of your data - you are not the product.

 

We estimate Unpluq will be delivered to you in September. We know a lot of crowdfunding projects deliver later than they are claiming, which is why we scheduled a buffer month for unexpected things that are outside of our control.

 

During our development we have noticed that detecting the USB key doesn't work on OnePlus devices, this is due to some firmware settings that are built into Oxygen OS. 

 

Smartphones were introduced to society a little over ten years ago. The technology is very young and has both very positive and quite negative consequences.

They have amazing capabilities, from listening to the music you want to listen to at any place, anytime, having all the knowledge of the world in your pocket to being able to navigate unfamiliar cities with a glance at your phone.

However, smartphones have also turned out to increase social anxiety, depression and have a negative impact on sleep quality and quantity. Social media apps are designed to hook you, because more time on their platform is more advertisement money for them. Smartphones have started to take over control, and we want to give that control back to you: we want you to regain control over your smartphone usage.

If you want to know more about the impact of smartphones, we've made an overview of some research on our website.  

 

 

We are a team of engineers and creatives working from Delft, The Netherlands. We all studied at the Delft University of Technology. Two advisors are successful startup founders, one of them (Julian) having completed a successful crowdfunding campaign with the Somnox sleep robot, raising over $450.000.

Using our smartphone less is something we strive for, but also struggled with. We see this problem all around us. During our studies, we were often very distracted by our smartphones. Also, when we looked around in restaurants and saw couples that were not talking to each other, but both on their smartphone half of the time, we realized the impact our technology is starting to have at society at large.

By getting rid of digital distractions, we want to enable people to focus on the important things in life.

 

Team roles

 

 

 

Thank you for reading this far. This shows a lot of interest in our project and the problem we are trying to solve. You can greatly help us by sharing the project with people you know.

Let's unplug distraction together. Let's help people to plug into life.

No need to buy a minimalist phone, just transform your phone into one!You decide when you use all functionality of your phone, or when you transform it into a useful, distraction-free device.  When you order an Unpluq key you will receive it together with the Unpluq launcher, a quick set-up guide and an Ebook that will give you tips on what to do with all the time that you receive by spending less time on your smartphone.   We went through several iterations to get to the current hardware design. We chose this bright yellow colour to make the Unpluq key extra visible when you are plugged in. This reminds you that you are using distracting apps. We chose to make a combination of hardware and software because we found that for most people, the current software solutions don’t offer enough to help you regain control over your smartphone.The Unpluq key is designed for you to be easily attached to your keychain, so you won’t lose it. Unpluq launcher in Unpluq mode Unpluq launcher in normal mode We developed a custom Android launcher. A launcher is the software on your phone that allows you to open other apps - it’s what you see when you press the home button.We wanted to keep it simple, without too much distraction.  That's why the launcher is in greyscale when you're in Unpluq mode. The launcher has a simple homescreen where you will see six of your favourite apps. Swipe up to see all your apps and swipe down to see the notifications that were filtered for you while you were unplugged. To the right of the favorite apps, you will have a screen where you can place your favorite widgets. To the left of the favorite apps, you will see your usage statistics: an overview of the total time you used your phone today, the time you were plugged out, the time the Unpluq key was plugged in, plus some more useful usage insights.    Or better yet, talk with people about Unpluq and the benefits it will deliver to people and to society as a whole. Let's fight digital distractions! Important notice: Unpluq is only available for Android phones with USB-C ports. iPhones are unfortunately not supported (Apple doesn't allow modifications to it's operating system). However, if enough people want an Unpluq key with Micro USB, we might consider that. You can leave your email here and we will drop you an email right if we decide to make a Micro USB Function.   We want to work together with our customers as much as possible. That’s why we give you the opportunity to suggest features for our product. We will send all of our backers a survey, in which you will be able to request features you'd like to be added.If certain features get requested a lot, we will think about implementing them in Unpluq. We believe that together, we can build an even greater product. If you don't own a creditcard, this is a way to back our project with a prepaid creditcard:Request a pre-paid creditcard At Unpluq we believe you should control technology, instead of technology controlling you. We want you to enjoy life more calmly, joyfully and peacefully. We want you to have more time to focus on what’s meaningful to you.At Unpluq, we design products that deliver benefit to the customer with privacy in mind, we are not storing any of your data - you are not the product. We estimate Unpluq will be delivered to you in September. We know a lot of crowdfunding projects deliver later than they are claiming, which is why we scheduled a buffer month for unexpected things that are outside of our control. During our development we have noticed that detecting the USB key doesn't work on OnePlus devices, this is due to some firmware settings that are built into Oxygen OS.  Smartphones were introduced to society a little over ten years ago. The technology is very young and has both very positive and quite negative consequences.They have amazing capabilities, from listening to the music you want to listen to at any place, anytime, having all the knowledge of the world in your pocket to being able to navigate unfamiliar cities with a glance at your phone.However, smartphones have also turned out to increase social anxiety, depression and have a negative impact on sleep quality and quantity. Social media apps are designed to hook you, because more time on their platform is more advertisement money for them. Smartphones have started to take over control, and we want to give that control back to you: we want you to regain control over your smartphone usage.If you want to know more about the impact of smartphones, we've made an overview of some research on our website.    We are a team of engineers and creatives working from Delft, The Netherlands. We all studied at the Delft University of Technology. Two advisors are successful startup founders, one of them (Julian) having completed a successful crowdfunding campaign with the Somnox sleep robot, raising over $450.000.Using our smartphone less is something we strive for, but also struggled with. We see this problem all around us. During our studies, we were often very distracted by our smartphones. Also, when we looked around in restaurants and saw couples that were not talking to each other, but both on their smartphone half of the time, we realized the impact our technology is starting to have at society at large.By getting rid of digital distractions, we want to enable people to focus on the important things in life. Team roles   Thank you for reading this far. This shows a lot of interest in our project and the problem we are trying to solve. You can greatly help us by sharing the project with people you know.Let's unplug distraction together. Let's help people to plug into life.

story:
You deserve a better phone experience. Let me show you how.

Ohsnap is a non-invasive, premium phone grip that makes it simple and easy to use your phone, no matter the circumstance. It adheres directly to your phone or phone case and provides tremendous functionality without sacrificing fashion or bulk. Ohsnap provides incredible utility while remaining so sleek and thin that you won't even notice it's there until you need it.

 

Featured on:

Meet Ohsnap.

Grip

Pressing the center circle of the Ohsnap releases the finger band. Use the "U" shape as a grip or connect the ends together to make a complete loop. With a finger through the loop, phone drops are next to impossible.

Super Strength

Kickstand

Ohsnap can be used as a snap-up kickstand. Watch videos hands-free at the best viewing angle.

Magnetic

Utilize magnetic surfaces like refrigerators, workout machinery, and magnetic car grips to place your phone somewhere convenient while you multi-task.

Sticky Plates!

Every ohsnap comes with 1 FREE sticky plate. These can be used to affix ohsnap literally anywhere. Additionally, you'll be able to purchase additional sticky plates during the survey at the end of the campaign!

Whether you're capturing content or playing it back, switching between portrait and landscape mode is easy thanks to the Ohsnap's 360 degrees of constant friction rotation.

Slide

Ohsnap allows you to reach every inch on your phone by sliding up and down.

Slim Design

Get a more secure grip on your phone while you're using it, and easily slide it in your pocket or pocket book when you're not. Ohsnap is less than 3mm thick.

Car Mount Compatible

Sticks to EXISTING magnetic car mounts. Say goodbye to complex enormous car mounts and phones sliding in the dreaded seat crack.

Wireless Charging Compatible

Easily slide out the frame for convenient wireless charging!

Comfortable

The snap band is coated in silky smooth silicone and feels great to behold. Marathon insta sessions never felt so good.

Premium Materials

Aircraft-grade aluminum, steel, and satiny silicone, resulting in a premium feel and ultimate reliability.

Ohsnap is now the world's first and only phone grip that literally checks all the boxes that other products to date have not been able to. You deserve a no-compromise phone experience.

 

You can unstick and re-apply Ohsnap multiple times! If the adhesive gets dirty, wash it with water. Once dry, the adhesive should be as strong as ever.

 

This is what a satisfied OhSnapper looks like:

Dimensions

story:
The MorphCase is an Smartcase that you snap on the iPod Touch that adds a speaker at the top and a Microphone at the bottom.  Dowload any VoIP App, and now you have completely transformed the iPod Touch into a phone.  Using wi-fi only, there are no monthly cellular bills but you can always use it with a MiFi and only pay for cellular data when you're not connected to your home, work or school wi-fi or a wi-fi hotspot.  This first version MorphCase will fit the 2nd, 3rd and 4th Generation iPod Touch.

Want to see everything that goes into bringing an idea to life?

I  have the design and engineering finished. There will be several stages from this point: design and engineering revisions for manufacturing, manufacturer selection, tooling, several stages of prototyping, function and material tests and trials to make sure the MorphCase is lasting and great quality product, finished design, and finally production. Though the journey to production may take time (6 months to a year), I promise it will be worth it.

I need your feedback, suggestions and opinions!  If you support the development of the MorphCase during the Pre-Launch here on Indiegogo, not only can you get it at a special price, you'll find out first-hand some things in store for our national launch in 2013.  I will continually keep you updated with every step along the way to getting the MorphCase in production.  I'm 100% dedicated to getting the MorphCase manufactured and the outcome being a high quality product at an affordable price...in 2013 the MorphCase will become a reality.

story:
Meet Our RenewCable

 

<All Cable will be Shipped out in 5 Days>

 

      How many broken USB cables have you replaced since your first smartphone? Did you realize USB cables are so easily-frayed that they almost lose their economic and environmental advantage just like disposable batteries?  We can replace the disposable battery with the rechargeable one. What can we replace the easy frayed cable with?

Have you been looking for a durable USB cable that magically regenerates itself after frayed or broken? You are in luck，take a look to our high-tech regenerative USB cable, "RenewCable" by SirTeen. Say NO to short-lived USB cables.


 

Great Feedbacks from Media and testers

 

How It Works

Renew Cable brings the revolutionary solution that allows the cable to regenerate after it is broken, frayed, or shredded. The cable is so durable that you will no longer need to replace it with another one!

 

 

Self Renew Instructions

Elegant Design

Unlike other self-proclaimed unbreakable USB cables, we attach the importance of aesthetic to its design. You will like its softness and colorful cord and start to ask why you need stiff and hard cable in the first place.


All Types Suit to Your Devices

 

Security Chip

Built-in security chip can detect the status of the cable and socket/port. The cable automatically turns off the current when not charging. Not only does this function protracts the battery life of your phone and gadgets, more importantly, it also protects you from electrical hazards. 

 

Benefits

Our RenewCable is designed for a lifespan of 20 years. Cables on average have the life expectancy of 3 to 6 months. If a cable is frayed every half year, one will instead consume 30 to 40 cables during the lifespan of RenewCable. The alternative 40 cables can cost you up to 400 bucks. By choosing our product, you can save over 90% on cable spending.  


We have reviewed some depressing statistics done by researchers: An estimated 50 million tons of E-waste are produced each year. The USA discards 30 million computers each year and 100 million phones are disposed of in Europe each year. The Environmental Protection Agency estimates that only 15–20% of e-waste is recycled, the rest of these electronics go directly into landfills and incinerators.

Guiyu in the Shantou region of China is a massive electronic waste processing community.
 It is often referred to as the "e-waste capital of the world."  Guiyu is only one example of digital dumps but similar places can be found across the world in Nigeria, Ghana, and India’.

We need something more sustainable and eco-friendly. By switching from regular USB Cable to Renew Cable, you are making a contribution to our environment. One RenewCable can replace more than 30 regular USB cables. The cord of our cable is covered with TPE, a material that meets the requirements of human skin contact hygiene and is widely recognized as a green environmental protection material. 


What’s Inside The Cable

Comparison Chart

 

Why It Matters

USB cable usually frays at the junction between the port and the cord. Once they are frayed, they're potentially dangerous and need to be replaced with a new one.  

A phone cable puts out 5 volts at 5 watts/1 amp (a tablet charger puts out 12 watts/2.1 amps), and while that doesn't sound like much, it's more than enough power to cause overheating and the beginnings of a fire. On top of that, a frayed cable can also cook the battery by causing a short circuit, which again can result in a fire.

Where The Idea Comes From

Our industrial designers observed the distinct regenerative nature of lizard. Facing a strong enemy, the lizard will cute its tail off so it may escape the dire situation and regenerate its tail. This was the inspiration that facilitates the design of our regenerative cable.

 

Who We Are

SirTeen is committed to innovated smart electronic products with our passionate research, production, and sales team.  Focusing on making smart devices for daily use, We insist on the originality, functionality, safety, beauty, and environmental friendliness of our products. By choosing materials with high standards of environmental protection, we are able to minimize the damage to the planet from electronic items. Our team integrates creativity with practicability into our products to offer you a better lifestyle with our innovative products.

 

Timeline

 

FAQ

 

1. Can I choose my product's color and connector?

Yes. We offer two colors and three types of connector for you to choose from.

2. Can I choose a different RenewCable connector type and color for each cable I order, even if I order them together as one perk?

Absolutely. You may do so by leaving us a comment with your order number and specifications of color, type of connector, and quantity (e.g. Order #12345; 1 red Android and 1 black Lightning) 

3. How will my order be shipped?

All orders will be shipping with the most suitable premium couriers of their locations. Couriers will vary among different countries. Your shipment will have a tracking number, which will be emailed to you once dispatched.

4. Which countries do you ship to?

We ship to all countries excluding the following which has been flagged by courier services as restricted or high risk: Belarus, Cote d'Ivoire, Cuba, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, North Korea, Sierra Leone, Sudan, Syria & Zimbabwe. If you would like a shipment to any of these countries, we will make alternative arrangements that may cost more. However, we cannot guarantee the delivery of shipments to these countries.

5. So did your company actually invent the regenerate technology?

Yes. We own full patents relate to this design and you can read the story about where the idea comes from.

6. Is there likely to be any manufacturing delays like all the other crowdfunded USB cables which have all failed to deliver?

That is unlikely, we will do our best to send the cable to you in a short time after the campaign ended.

 

FEATURES

7.  What makes RenewCable better than other so-called ‘unbreakable cables’  in the market?

We combine the elegant design with the regenerate solution. It will be much cooler than those hard-shelled USB cables

8.  Does the RenewCable come with an international warranty?

Yes, all orders will come with an international 365-day warranty.

9. What is the length of the cable?

1.5 meters, around 5 feet

COMPATIBILITY

 

10. Does RenewCable support data transfer for Apple and Android devices?

Yes, We have 3 type of cable with different connectors to support Apple and Android devices.

11. Can I plug RenewCable into my laptop, computer, car charger or power bank?

Yes,  it will work with all devices that are USB compatible.

12. Will RenewCable affect the charging speed?

RenewCable will not alter any device's charging speed and can handle the maximum charging speed for mobile phones.

REFUND POLICY

You can initiate 100% refunds within the first 8 days of backing an Indiegogo campaign by going to your contributions tab on the Indiegogo page.

RETURN AND EXCHANGE POLICY

Please note all sales are final. Contributing to a campaign and claiming a perk on Indiegogo is not the same as buying a product online. There will be no exchanges or returns for change of mind. If you have a factory defect, please email the Customer Happiness Team on renewcable@longhamtec.com  to arrange an assessment and replacement if deemed defective.

SHIPPING POLICY

If our shipping provider attempts to deliver to your address and the package is returned because of any of these reasons, there will be a reshipping fee: no-one is available to receive the package, the location is not accessible, you've provided the wrong address or you have moved without notifying us before the delivery dispatch.

Join the Movement to Protect Our Planet

 

If you have any questions please email to our Customer Happiness Team  renewcable@longhamtec.com

story:
A perfect solution for the almost 70% of users who experience poor signal coverage, mJoose delivers stronger connectivity, better call quality and fewer dropped calls. 
Works on iPhone 6/6S, 6 Plus/6S Plus, Galaxy s6 and Galaxy s6 Edge. 


                                           

CES awarded the mJoose 3-in-1 Case TWO Innovation Awards in the Portable Power and Wireless Accessories Categories. Long hours by our talented engineering team led the way to this acknowledged breakthrough technology.




                         


1) Cell Signal Amplifier

Unlike existing battery cases, the mJoose 3-in-1 Case includes cell signal amplification with patented micro-electronics that are so small they fit into the protective case. The multi-band (700-2100MHz) cell signal amplifier will improve your iPhone or Galaxy signal strength wherever you go.

2) Battery Extender

mJoose comes has an integrated 3000 mAh battery that will fully charge your battery for up to 14 hours of additional talking time. The mJoose case also charges twice as fast as traditional charging! 

3) Protective Case

Slim-line 3.5 ounce attractive protective case.


  



                                                  

Become one of the first to pre-order by taking advantage of our Early Bird specials. 





Up to 100x signal strength: While signal strength and voice quality may vary depending on the carrier and user location, the mJoose case lab results from a CTIA-certified lab verified 20dB gain which is up to 100x signal strength. 


mJoose CEO Daniel Ash demonstrates the case giving 20dB gain 


Upgraded Internet Connectivity: When signal strength is low, the smartphone user may be connected to the Internet at a tower with lower 2G or 3G equipment. mJoose can extend the reach to connect with other 4G or LTE if within the new extended range which results in better Internet connectivity at 4G or LTE speeds.

120% extended battery life: The built-in 3000 mAh rechargeable battery delivers an additional 17 hours talk time, up to 14 hours video playback and an additional 60 hours audio playback.

                               

Additional battery life savings: Poor reception significantly drains battery life as the phone aggressively tries to connect to the tower. Our amplifier secures a better connection to the carrier network which reduces the power drain up to 25% for both the extended battery and the iPhone battery. 

Complete mobility: The 3-in-1 Amp Case travels with the consumer to concerts, hotel rooms, conferences, sports field, etc.  Consumers now have ubiquitous, improved signal coverage in areas plagued by weak signals.


Whether on vacation or business trips, the world’s first cell signal amplifier that gives you up to 100x signal so you get better reception and fewer dropped calls everywhere you go!


No more running out of battery at inopportune times. 100% extended battery life: mJoose gives you 2x the battery life + charges 75% faster than traditional charging! 


Finally, you can cruise through the dreaded “weak signal” zones with confidence that your calls will not drop and your battery will not die.


                                         


                           

For the past year we have completed R&D, built prototypes and working samples. We have selected our manufacturing partner, started tooling, and have procured components. In December we will finalize the iPhone 6/6S manufacturing for January shipping, 6 Plus/6S Plus in February, and Galaxy s6 in March. 


                                                       

Q.  How does the signal amplifier work?

A.  More than 70 percent of smartphone users*  have trouble maintaining cell phone signal strength during their day at home, the office or while being out and about.  Our patented technology picks up the signals from the cell tower creating a better handshake and extends the stronger signal to your phone.  

**Source: Pew Research Center Mobile Technology Fact Sheet, http://www.pewinternet.org/fact-sheets/mobile-technology-fact-sheet/

Q. Why is signal strength a problem indoors?

A.  Cellular networks weren’t designed for indoor use. That’s why today’s mobile users are glued to the perimeter of their homes and offices, leaning and straining just to get a “strong-enough” cellular signal. 

Q. Will the mJoose Case help with connecting to the internet?

A. When signal strength is low, the smartphone user may be connected to the Internet at a tower with lower 2G or 3G equipment. mJoose can extend the reach to connect with other 4G or LTE if within the new extended range which results in better Internet connectivity at 4G or LTE speeds.

Q. Will the mJoose 3-in-1 Case drain my battery?

A. No. In fact you’ll gain up to 20-30% battery life as our technology creates a better handshake with the tower – your phone’s battery isn’t drained as it constantly tries to connect.

Q. How much power will the signal case put out, is it safe for it to be close to my head?

A. We have passed SAR testing for low power emissions. In fact the mJoose emits .0001 less output power/emissions than your smartphone. 

Q. Will the mJoose case work with any wireless carrier?

A. The 3-in-1 Case works on CDMA, GSM, TDMA, and 2G, 3G/ 4G and LTE frequencies which means it works with all U.S. carrier networks. The patented signal amplifier captures the existing signal at the specific frequency and amplifies it to improve the call reception quality effectively creating a better handshake.

Q. Can I get a refund?

A. Pre-orders are non-refundable. By making a contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are contributing to a work-in-progress and not making a direct purchase. For more details please see Indiegogo's Terms of Use.


                            

There is minimal risk in terms of us not delivering the product. We have completed all of the research and development of the project and are already in the process of tooling up for manufacturing the case. We are in the final stages of FCC regulatory and product certifications. Given any unforeseen delays in certifications, we should be able to ship all orders in Q1.

and fewer dropped calls everywhere you go!

extended battery life: mJoose gives you 2x the battery life + charges 75%

story:
This is Chargestand, the versatile stand designed to dock and charge your smart phone at home, at work, or on the go.


Phone docks are great for lots of reasons: They help de-clutter your desktop, make it quick and easy to charge and sync your phone, and allow you to see and use your phone hands-free. So what if you could do more with a stand? 


What if you had something truly portable? 

Something that could power your device in the office, kitchen or bedroom, on a plane or a bus, in a pocket or a bag?


What if you could use it in portrait or landscape orientation, sitting at your desk or reclining on your couch?


Chargestand does all these things. Not only can it conveniently charge and sync your device, it also has a built in 3000 mAh battery, enough to provide an iPhone 6 more than one full recharge.  We’ve designed a ChargeStand with lightening, micro-USB and USB-C tips that will work with both Apple and Android devices. It even works with cases.


We believe in the Chargestand’s ability to keep you connected throughout your day. There’s no extra batteries to forget; the Chargestand charges your phone, and then charges itself. The Chargestand is small, powerful, and great on the go.



Charge your device on the go by pulling the cable out of the Chargestand. Put it in your pocket, bag, or car - anywhere you may need power on the go.


The Chargestand is smaller than your wallet, so take it with you in even the smallest purse.


Use the Chargestand in your car, on a bus, on the subway or in an airplane for an extra boost getting from A to B. The battery is 3000 mAh, enough to provide an iPhone 6 more than one full recharge. The battery only takes 3-4 hours to charge from 0% to 100%.



Traditional phone docks are bulky, stationary, don’t work with cases, aren't portable and only function in portrait orientation.




Other types of phone chargers don't give you any of the additional useful features that a dock provides.







Dimensions: 2.35" x 3.30" x 1.25" closed, 3.0" tall when open

Colors: Soft touch light gray outer, glossy graphite black inner, orange and black braided cable

Materials: Main housing: PC + ABS blend, outside has premium soft touch finish. Anti-skid phone rest: TPU

Tips: Lightning, micro-USB and planning to include USB-C.

Electronic Specs:

3000 mAh battery

Braided tangle-resistant cable

Charge and sync device

Chargestand battery charge time: 3-4 hours

Input: 1 A

Output: 5 V DC (Lightning: 1 A / Micro: 1.5 A)

Short circuit, over current, over charge, over discharge and over temperature protection

Operating temperature: 14F–113F

MFi certified for Apple devices  

CE, CEC and Rohs certified



We have a final functional and aesthetic prototype, which represents the colors and materials that you will receive.

All perks will be light gray outer with a soft touch finish, graphite black inner with a polished finish, and 50/50 orange and black cable.


You will be contacted after the end of the campaign to choose between Apple and Android versions.









Estimated Shipping Date: July 2016



What is the battery size? The battery is 3000 mAh. For perspective, an iPhone 6 is 1810 mAh and Samsung Galaxy S5 is 2800 mAh, so most smartphones will receive one or more full charges.

Does the Chargestand work with a case? Yes, the stand is designed to accommodate all cases, even an Otterbox.

Does it come in any other colors? Currently, the Chargestand is only offered in one color - light gray exterior with soft touch paint, a polished graphite black interior and a 50/50 orange/black braided cable. We are open to offering other colors later in the campaign if we raise enough for the production to make sense.

Does the Chargestand work with tablets? Chargestand does not have the max charge rate that tablets require, but it will still charge and work great as a stand for 7-8" tablets.

When the stand is plugged in, does the phone charge before or after the stand? The phone charges first, and once it is fully charged the stand battery will begin to charge.

Will the Chargestand be Apple approved? Yes, the stand will be MFi certified for Apple devices, and also has CE, CEC and Rohs certifications.

If I purchase a perk that contains 2 or more Chargestands, can they be a mix of Android and Apple tips? Yes! We will be following up after the campaign ends to find out which tips you'd like. You will be able to select all Apple, all Android or a mix of both.

Does it have a speaker? The Chargestand does not have a built-in speaker, but has very little effect on the speaker sound. The speakers and headphone port will also be completely accessible in landscape mode.

How does it sync my phone? The Chargestand comes with a 4-foot micro-USB sync cable, which plugs into the back of the stand and the computer's USB port.

How long does the stand take to charge? The Chargestand takes 3-4 hours to charge from 0% to 100%.

How can I check the battery level? The Chargestand has 4 indicator lights on the front. Tap the power button on the back to see battery level (4 lights: 100%; 3 lights: 75%; and so on).

Will I always have to turn it on to use it? If your Chargestand is plugged in on your desk, you can just put your phone on it and it will work. If your stand is not connected to power, you simply press and hold the power button on the back to turn on the battery.


Ventev is a small Baltimore, MD based team that is working to solve the charging problems facing todays mobile device users. We’re known for making great tangle free cables and chargers, now we’re looking to expand into new, exciting products.

For more information, visit our website.


We worked with our in-house designers and product developers, as well as our selected contract manufacturing partner overseas to develop the latest Chargestand Unit. As part of the process, we made several improvements to prototypes along the way: 

  • The battery lasts 50% longer.
  • The tip and cable are now removable, so you can charge your phone while the unit is closed or use your phone in landscape mode.
  • The phone rest on the base of the unit is more substantial and supportive.
  • The product is slightly larger and the lid taller to support larger phones and small tablets.
  • The design is sleeker and more professional.
  • We added a quality soft touch finish to make it feel good in your hand and less likely to slip on your desktop.

Now we are looking to validate the concept and raise money to tool the product. We are also raising money for all the necessary certifications. We would love to hear your feedback and use cases around the product.


There are always risks in the design process, and here is an overview of what we forsee.

Manufacturing

We have selected a contract manufacturing partner with a solid historical track record of supplying and manufacturing both batteries and cables. Our combined experience in this category gives us strong confidence in our ability to deliver a quality product according to spec and on time.

Product Adjustments

Changes to the design and functionality which may be necessary throughout development, and will be communicated as we work thru production after the campaign ends and production begins.

Fulfillment timing

Chinese New Year, Port Strikes and the like can all influence fulfillment dates, but we have built these variables into our product development schedule and have given ourselves enough time to produce, run trials and do multiple product tests to deliver a high quality product in early summer 2016. We will keep you updated with progress along the way.


For press kit and bulk order inquires please contact us at campaign@ventev.com. 

For more information on Ventev, visit: www.ventev.com/mobile.

For more information on our campaign design partner, Trident Design, visit www.trident-design.com.


Earn 1 FREE Chargestand each time you refer 3 Chargestand purchases!

(Limited to earning 5 FREE Chargestands)

How it works:

  1. Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account.
  2. Then, visit this page on Indiegogo and look beside the main video to share and copy your unique URL.
  3. Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the "Link" icon or begin sharing on social media by simply clicking the "Facebook" or "Twitter" buttons with your URL pre-loaded.
  4. When you click on any share tool on the campaign page, then you’ll automatically get a post or tweet that’s ready-to-go with your personal URL.

How to track your results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.

story:
Do you Love your Tablet, but Hate to hold it? Have you ever supported your tablet with your legs, or propped your tablet up on a stack of pillows?  Are you ready for a solution?  Introducing Tab-Legs. Flexible Stands for your Tablet, designed for your favorite computing locations, and crafted for comfort.  


Hi, My name is Dr. Charles Barr, and I LOVE my Tablet computer.  I use it to check emails, to read, watch movies, and shop.  I almost always use my tablet when watching TV, and enjoy the mobility of my Tablet while in bed, and when I travel. 

Here’s the problem. I don't like to hold my Tablet. I love everything about it, except the fact that I need to constantly support it.  It's not heavy, but always having to hold it causes pain in my neck, back, hands, and wrists. I tried to prop it up with some pillows, and even rested it on a nearby table; but nothing worked. My posture actually got worse, and with my new awkward positions, came new types of pain.  There had to be a solution. 

So I stopped holding my Tablet, and designed a tablet computer stand specifically for the places I use my tablet the most; my sofa, recliner, bed, and on an airplane.  I wanted to create a  stand that could improve my posture and let me sit comfortably in these locations, while freeing up  my hands. Fast forward a year and a half, and I am proud to introduce 

      - Tab-Legs -  Flexible stands for tablets and phones!   Here's How they Work...


We launched Tab-Legs in the summer of 2014 on our own website, and Amazon.com and celebrated a warm welcome to market.  Our sales steadily increased until we were completely out of product. Yes, we sold out within a few months.  We literally could not make Tab-Legs fast enough, and were forced to scale the manufacturing to meet demand.  That is where we are today; scrambling to meet demand; seeking your support.


Why You are So Important:

We need your support to expand our manufacturing by securing additional space at the local factory, and hiring additional employees to manufacture and assemble.  We will also use this funding to place larger orders for our materials, thus lowering costs on future orders if done right.  Larger orders will require significant capital that your pledge will help fund.  If we don’t reach our funding goal, the raised capital will go directly into hiring another position to maximize production lead times. Either way, you get your Tab-Legs

Currently our last boutique batch of Tab-Legs is being produced by our manufacturer in West Palm Beach, Florida.  Tab-Legs are made here in America, and we have helped create jobs in our local economy: Palm Beach, and Broward County Florida. Your pledge will help secure these jobs, and create more. 


You can Support our campaign in a few different ways:

Pledge $29.00 – Early Bird Supporter

Receive a  set of Tab-Legs including:

 1-Renewable Sticky-Pad

 2 Mag-Discs

 1- Air-Caddy

Expected Delivery:  March 2015 Free Shipping

Pledge $35.00 – Immediate Holiday Delivery

Receive your own set of Tab-Legs NOW  with plenty of time for the holidays,         Your Tab-Legs include:

 1-Renewable Sticky-Pad 

2 Mag-Discs 

1- Air-Caddy

Expected Delivery:  2 Weeks – Free Shipping


With your support, we can place larger orders, and meet Minimum Order Quantities (MOQs) that are currently out of reach for us.  With your support, we can improve our production process and streamline our manufacturing.  This is a consumer driven product that was born from inspiration  and we need your help to bring Tab-Legs to Tablet users everywhere.

We have already faced the many sticking points a start up project like this brings.  We have been working on this product for almost 2 years, and have already produced quality products for tablet owners. (check out our Amazon reviews below)

Our biggest challenge is the Minimum Order Quantities that are required for the type of scaling that we need to do to address consumer demand. We need capital to grow this process, and need your support.

We also understand that you may not be able to support us financially at this time. We get it; But, there is a good chance you know someone who owns, uses, and loves their Tablet Computer. Perhaps you can share our campaign with them, and expose them to something new.  Tab-Legs will be a nice surprise for any Tablet Owner, as we all face the same issue of  how to support our device while trying to relax. 

Feel free to mention that Tab-Legs works in Bed, in the Car, in your Lazy Boy, and even on an Airplane. Yes; we have designed an attachment (the Air-Caddy) that lets you connect directly to any airplane tray table. Hands free from takeoff to taxi!

Click Here to watch a Demonstration of the Air-Caddy

Thank You for supporting our project, and for taking control of your comfort.

See what customers from Amazon.com think of Tab-Legs.....
