I love everything about it, except the fact that I need to constantly support it.  It's not heavy, but always having to hold it causes pain in my neck, back, hands, and wrists. I tried to prop it up with some pillows, and even rested it on a nearby table; but nothing worked. My posture actually got worse, and with my new awkward positions, came new types of pain.  There had to be a solution. So I stopped holding my Tablet, and designed a tablet computer stand specifically for the places I use my tablet the most; my sofa, recliner, bed, and on an airplane.  I wanted to create a  stand that could improve my posture and let me
sit comfortably in these locations, while freeing up  my hands. Fast forward
a year and a half, and I am proud to introduce       - Tab-Legs -  Flexible stands for
tablets and phones!   Here's How they Work...We launched Tab-Legs in the summer of 2014 on our own
website, and Amazon.com and celebrated a warm welcome to market.  Our sales steadily increased until we were
completely out of product. Yes, we sold out within a few months.  We literally could not make Tab-Legs fast
enough, and were forced to scale the manufacturing to meet demand.  That is where we are today; scrambling to meet
demand; seeking your support.Why You are So Important:
We need your support to expand our manufacturing by securing additional
space at the local factory, and hiring additional employees to manufacture and
assemble.  We will also use this funding
to place larger orders for our materials, thus lowering costs on future orders if done right. 
Larger orders will require significant capital that your pledge will
help fund.  If we don’t reach our funding
goal, the raised capital will go directly into hiring another position to maximize
production lead times. Either way, you get your Tab-Legs
Currently our last boutique batch of Tab-Legs is being
produced by our manufacturer in West Palm Beach, Florida.  Tab-Legs are made here in America, and we
have helped create jobs in our local economy: Palm Beach, and Broward County
Florida. Your pledge will help secure these jobs, and create more. You can Support our campaign in a few different ways:
Pledge $29.00 – Early Bird SupporterReceive a  set of Tab-Legs including: 1-Renewable Sticky-Pad 2
Mag-Discs 1- Air-Caddy
Expected Delivery:  March 2015 Free Shipping
Pledge $35.00 – Immediate Holiday DeliveryReceive your own set of Tab-Legs NOW  with plenty of time for the holidays,         Your Tab-Legs include: 1-Renewable Sticky-Pad 2
Mag-Discs 1- Air-Caddy
Expected Delivery:  2
Weeks – Free ShippingWith your support, we can place larger orders, and meet
Minimum Order Quantities (MOQs) that are currently out of reach for us.  With your support, we can improve our
production process and streamline our manufacturing.  This is a consumer driven product that was born
from inspiration  and we need your help to bring Tab-Legs to
Tablet users everywhere. 
We have already faced the many sticking points a start up project like this brings.  We have been
working on this product for almost 2 years, and have already produced quality
products for tablet owners. (check out our Amazon reviews below) 
Our biggest challenge is the Minimum Order Quantities that
are required for the type of scaling that we need to do to address consumer
demand. We need capital to grow this process, and need your support. 
We also understand that you may not be able to support us
financially at this time. We get it; But, there is a good chance you know someone
who owns, uses, and loves their Tablet Computer. Perhaps you can share our
campaign with them, and expose them to something new.  Tab-Legs will be a nice surprise for any
Tablet Owner, as we all face the same issue of  how to support our device while trying to relax.  
Feel free to mention that Tab-Legs works in Bed, in the Car,
in your Lazy Boy, and even on an Airplane. Yes; we have designed an attachment (the Air-Caddy) that lets you connect directly to any airplane tray table. Hands free from
takeoff to taxi!Click Here to watch a Demonstration of the Air-CaddyThank You for supporting our project, and for taking control
of your comfort.See what customers from Amazon.com think of Tab-Legs.....

story:
Stretch Goal Unlocked: Free Modvite T-Shirt Giveaway!

To say thanks to all of ESTEM supporters from 20 countries around the world, we would give away every backer a Modvite T-Shirt for FREE. Starting from today till the campaign ends every backer (including existing backers) will receive a T-Shirt as the extra reward. 





People need navigation when they are out on a bicycling trip, but there aren't many bike friendly options out there. Have you ever tried holding your phone in your hand and navigating while you're riding ? That can be dangerous, and it drains the battery too quickly .

Our idea was simple: design a biking stem that makes your ride uncomplicated and fun no matter where you go: urban exploration , commuting to work, or a long distance road trip.

We conceptualized a design that integrates important biking accessories with your smartphone into one unit. The specially designed slider, battery and front led system all be put together to the bike stem. This is ESTEM - the world’s simplest all-in-one smart biking stem, which includes a front light, phone navigation holder, and a portable charger.





4 STEPS TO START YOUR JOURNEY


Step 1: Plug in your smartphone


Step 2: It will begin charging automatically


Step 3: Open the app



Step 4: Start to navigate the selected best route




ESTEM = 

Connected Flash Light 

+ Phone Navigation Holder 

+ Built-in Portable Charger 

+ Fitness Hub 


Connected flash light: bright and durable


Phone navigation holder: Turns your phone into 

a bicycle navigation system


Rechargeable power station: Keeps your phone going for longer periods

   
Besides, it is optional to use MiBike app as the fitness hub in the same time.
Fitness hub: Keeps track of your biking activities



Go. Explore.

An easy, straight-forward experience

Mount ESTEM on your bike handlebars and go. 




Mount ESTEM on your handlebars, slide your phone into the charging port, click , pop only three steps can complete the charging operation on the phone, and start your trip right away!




Forget the extra accessories, ESTEM is made with module design and comes with the powerful front light, portable charger, and phone/navigation mount to meet all of your mobile demands. The phone mount is designed to safely hold your device secure even in rough terrain. The design is so simple that you can setup it by yourself just like playing LEGO!



Supports most bicycles, such as mountain bikes, cross-country (XC), as well as street bikes. The phone holder is compatible with most of the smart phones in the market. This includes iPhone and Android phones.


ESTEM comes with a rechargeable 5400mAh lithium battery, which enables your phone navigation to function for more than 42 hours of heavy use.

The battery in the back is rechargeable, you can just remove it out and take it home to charge just like the normal power banks.


ESTEM is protected from dust penetration and water immersion (15cm up to 1 meter of depth at 30 minutes) at an International Protection rating of IP66. Go ahead and ride with full confidence in rain, mud, or even snow!


Safety is paramount in biking. The 200 lumens LED front light brings you high-intensity illumination so that you can ride confidently in dark, low visibility environments. Whether you are way out in the mountains, or on poorly lit city streets, ESTEM’s light will cut through the darkness. Weak lighting is a thing of the past!


Super lightweight and highly durable structure

To enhance the users' overall riding experience, we use lightweight aluminum-magnesium alloy material (Aeronautical Material) and made ESTEM's forging integrally molded.

The lightweight material is extremely strong and resists corrosion. Our specially designed slider will hold the phone firmly without hurting it. The rubber case protects the charging port from any damage.

In order to ensure a more secure and efficient lighting experience, we designed the unit to have highly stable internal structural components, and we created a convenient method of removing the battery as well.


MEBIKE : an app has a purpose for everyday riding

"MEBIKE" is a community based hardware platform that manages your bicycling accessories, data. See what your friends and other bike aficionados are up to, and motivate each other with fun challenges! You can control all MODVITE compatible electronic products through this app, and we will be opening up the API (application program interface) for future third-party developers to access the hardware.






Headquartered in Shanghai, China, MODVTE is a dedicated group of biking enthusiasts. We strive to create cutting edge biking gear and inspire the cycle-friendly community.


After working for 8 months, we finally launch ESTEM on Indiegogo.


We are on Indiegogo as we’re not only seeking funding, but feedback from the community to refine and improve the hardware, app, and data features.

We need money to make factory production feasible. We've set our initial goal at $30k, because that is the minimum we need to get started down our path and deliver a limited batch of ESTEM units into the hands of our supporters. It is critical that we reach our target, so that we can release ESTEM to the world in these upcoming months while leveraging our partnerships with Z-Spaceship and ifgeekspace.

Timeline

FAQs

Q1. In addition to bicycles, are there any other vehicles supported by MODVITE ESTEM, such as electric bicycles, motorcycles, etc.?

A: ESTEM can be perfectly adapted to most E-bikes and bicycles with its horizontal pipe diameter of 31.8mm (1.25 inches), and fork tube diameter of 28.6mm (1.13 inches).  Mountain bikes, cross-country (XC), street bikes, and fixed-gear bicycles are included. 


Q2. What kind of smartphone cases are compatible with ESTEM's phone navigation holder?

A: ESTEM is compatible with most phone cases without a portable charger. 


Q3. Can ESTEM handle biking in rain or snow?

A: While ESTEM has a water proof rating of IP66,  for your smartphone we suggest getting an extra water resistant case. For the sake of personal safety, we do not suggest biking in heavy rain or any other extreme weather.


Q4. How can I setup ESTEM specifically on my bike?

A: The steps are pretty universal and easy to set up on standard stems, which come with 6 M4 crews and 1 M5 crew.  Check the video tutorial by Performance Bicycle here:  http://learn.performancebike.com/bikes/advice/how-to-guides/bike-parts-and-components/how-to-change-your-threadless-bike-stem


Q5. How do I control ESTEM's front light?

A: Push the round white button on the left front side of the light. The first tap = high beam, second tap = low beam, third tap = fast flash, and fourth tap = slow flash. 


Q6. Do I have to use the app M Ride together with ESTEM?

A: This is not necessary. The first generation of ESTEM can be used independently.  We still recommend you use M Ride, which will greatly enhance the riding experience.  It helps track your biking history and stores all of your data:  pace, distance, route, and personal records.  Furthermore, you can even find friends, create challenges, stay on top of the leader board, and share activity within your network.


Q7. In what environmental temperature range does ESTEM work?

A. The temperature range is between -10 °C ~ 60 °C (14°F ~ 140°F)


Q8. As a developer, how can I join the open source program for M Ride app?

A. For partnership inquiries, please contact: estem@modvite.tech


Q9. How to replace the battery?

Step1: Slide the slider to the bottom of the battery compartment, unlock the battery door.

Step2: Unscrew the battery door, close the door after the battery out. After the battery is fully charged, follow the steps above to open the door, insert the battery to power the lights and phones.


Q10. How to setup ESTEM?

Step1: Remove the metal body and the stem cell module from the packaging.

Step2: Slide the slider to the bottom of the battery compartment, unlock the battery door back into the battery module Close the door.

Step3: After the battery installed metal stem into the car first vertical rod, adjust the angle of the vehicle body by screws.

Step4: the handlebar stem into the front of the hole, after adjusting the angle by screws.

Step5: Position the headset cover, according to the phone directly from front to back manner, fixed on a metal stem.

Step6: Confirm charge the phone and lights work properly, the group covered by the bowl holes, the mobile phone bracket on the stand.


Risks and Challenges

There are risks to the schedule associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics. We understand the challenges of manufacturing hardware products and we are experienced with identifying and mitigating issues that arise. Additionally, we are working with experienced manufacturing partners who build cycling accessory products in the business.

story:
Our campaign is over but click here for future updates.

     

 

 

A smart, connected, and ultra-portable glucose meter.

 

   

 

 

No more bulky meters, cables, testing supplies, and logbooks to remember to carry all the time.

 

 

 

                  

 

 

The GluCase platform allows a user to see all the contextual information overlaid with their glucose levels so they can better understand how their lifestyle affects their health.

 

 

Operate the GluCase, App, and Platform with ease.

The mobile application, web profile, and dashboard are all built with modern interfaces that are intuitive and easy to learn.

 

The size and weight are comparable to that of a standard smartphone case. No one will know the difference.
 

All of your equipment and supplies are protected and discreet, while never too far away, allowing you to truly live life untethered.
 

 

Simple, easy-to-use privacy control to guard one's information while sharing with family, nutritionists, and physicians.
 

Data communication between the sensor, mobile application, and cloud platform is HIPAA-compliant & encrypted. GluCase uses Bluetooth low energy (BLE) technology to rapidly and securely transmit your data to your phone without the requirement of extra cables or connector devices.
 

 

GluCase has been thoroughly reviewed by the team at Dragon Innovation to ensure a sound design and manufacturing plan.
 
​
 

Dragon Innovation works with entrepreneurs to launch hardware products from prototype through production. Their client roster includes Coin, MakerBot, LIFX, Scout, Romotive, Sifteo, Orbotix, FormLabs and many more.

 


 

Development of the GluCase began in a dorm room at Cornell University in response to our self-imposed challenge to drastically improve the lives of people living with diabetes. After speaking with countless individuals living with Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes, we knew that one way to accomplish our goal would be to simplify the form factor of a traditional, bulky, and burdensome glucose meter kit by integrating it with everyone's most prized possession—our smartphone.

 

One year later, we completed the highly competitive Techstars Accelerator program (fewer than 1% of companies admitted) and had developed our first prototypes where we embedded a lancet system and test strip reader into a 3D-printed prototype model. Since then, we've worked tirelessly to get the form factor as small and polished as possible while developing the most intuitive and user-friendly app on the market. 

In the above gif, you can see the working components of an early prototype. All of the components of a traditional glucose measuring system seamlessly integrated into a discreet and compact smartphone case for iOS & Android.

Fast-forward to today in the heart of Silicon Valley. The GluCase app has been streamlined, our form factor is nearing its final state, and our amazing team is being advised by the Former Chairman of the American Diabetes Association, Larry Ellingson. Furthermore, we have ready-to-go manufacturing schedules based on thorough design for manufacture and assembly analyses in which we inspected and analyzed the GluCase design to ensure that it can be manufactured reliably and at top quality.

 

GluCase™ will donate a percent of all proceeds raised by the campaign to the Chris Dudley Foundation Basketball Camp for Kids with Diabetes.

 

What phones are compatible with GluCase?  

The first generation of GluCase will be compatible with popular iPhone and Samsung models.

Will GluCase obstruct any of my phone ports, speakers, and/or camera? 

No, GluCase allows full access to touchscreen, buttons, camera, and ports.

What information can be captured with GluCase software?

In addition to glucose levels, you will also be able to capture nutrition and carbohydrate contents, physical activity, as well as take notes. 

Is my data on the cloud stored safely?

All stored personal data on the cloud will comply with local and international privacy laws and regulations, and will be HIPAA compliant.

How is the data sent from my GluCase device to my smartphone app?

GluCase uses Bluetooth low energy (BLE) technology to rapidly and securely transmit your data, in a HIPAA-compliant manner, to your phone without the requirement of extra cables or connector devices.

Can I share my results with my caregiver through the GluCase app?

Yes. There will be a share button that allows you to share your log with your care team, as well as whomever else you’d like.

Will the GluCase app be available at the App Store and Google Play Store?

Yes.

How accurate will GluCase be?

GluCase is being designed to meet all FDA and CE requirements, including the ISO 15197:2013 requirements: In vitro diagnostic test systems - Requirements for blood-glucose monitoring systems for self-testing in managing diabetes mellitus.

Will I be able to access my account on the web/computer?

Yes, you will be able access your GluCase account from your computer at our website. You will have a custom web dashboard, where you can read and review the statistical analysis of your glucose readings, nutritional intake, activity, interactive graphs, and readings history taken directly from your mobile device GluCase app.

What kind of test strips should be used with the GluCase?

Only GluCase brand test strips will be compatible with GluCase.

How much of a blood sample is needed?

Only a small 0.5 microliter blood sample will be required. Additionally, GluCase brand strips are being designed to feature no-coding, advanced technology allowing for success on the first test.

Where can I get my strip supplies?

Monthly strip supplies will be replenished via mail order, and sent directly to the customer.

What application (software) can be used with GluCase?

The GluCase App.

Will I be able to use other brand test strips with GluCase?

No, only GluCase brand test strips will be compatible with the device. 

How do I clean the meter and how often?

The device should be cleaned and disinfected following each use with a disinfectant wipe.

Will my test strips and supplies be covered by my insurance?

We are actively working towards that. 

Will GluCase readouts be limited to mg/dL or will it also be offered in mmol/L?

We plan on having an option for both.

What is the Warranty? 

We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. We guarantee you receive your GluCase Product free of manufacturing defects. We will have 100% AQL inspection levels.

Can I change or cancel my perk?

Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can now do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information on how to do this here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk

Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections nor are we obliged to cancel or refund a perk. Such requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis. 

When can I expect to receive my GluCase device?

As soon as possible.

How is shipping handled?

We will be shipping via the United States Postal Service First Class mail with delivery tracking confirmation. International shipments will be sent via International First Class. 

How much is shipping and handling?

Shipping and handling, which includes shipping the items to our offices, packing and fulfilling orders will cost: FREE in the Domestic United States (including Hawaii, Puerto Rico, Alaska)
$15 to Canada
$25 for International Order

Where are we in Development?

We have a prototype device, but to bring GluCase™ to the vast consumer market, we still have to file with the FDA. Right now we are giving eligible subjects access to our first version of the device as part of a research study.

By helping us collect data, we can support our FDA application for market clearance via the premarket notification process. Our study protocol will be reviewed and approved by an IRB prior to initiating the study. By contributing to our campaign and participating in our study, you will help us refine the GluCase and get us ready for a formal clinical study.

The exploratory version of the GluCase is still in development and can only be used as part of an investigation. As an investigational product, it can be used to collect certain data and must be used in accordance with the study's protocol. This will happen in the framework of official clinical studies in which you will be invited to partake, only if you opt-in. For each study, you will be contacted and will have to sign an Informed Consent form.

When will I be invited to participate?

Before you are eligible to receive your GluCase, you will also receive information about the study and the Informed Consent document at which time you will be free to decide to participate in our study, and help us define the final properties of the device.

The GluCase app has been streamlined, our form factor is nearing its final state, and our amazing team is being advised by the Former Chairman of the American Diabetes Association, Larry Ellingson. Furthermore, we have ready-to-go manufacturing schedules based on thorough design for manufacture and assembly analyses in which we inspected and analyzed the GluCase design to ensure that it can be manufactured reliably and at top quality.


 


GluCase™ will donate a percent of all proceeds raised by the campaign to the Chris Dudley Foundation Basketball Camp for Kids with Diabetes.
 


What phones are compatible with GluCase?  
The first generation of GluCase will be compatible with popular iPhone and Samsung models.
Will GluCase obstruct any of my phone ports, speakers, and/or camera? 
No, GluCase allows full access to touchscreen, buttons, camera, and ports.
What information can be captured with GluCase software? 
In addition to glucose levels, you will also be able to capture nutrition and carbohydrate contents, physical activity, as well as take notes. 
Is my data on the cloud stored safely?
All stored personal data on the cloud will comply with local and international privacy laws and regulations, and will be HIPAA compliant.
How is the data sent from my GluCase device to my smartphone app?
GluCase uses Bluetooth low energy (BLE) technology to rapidly and securely transmit your data, in a HIPAA-compliant manner, to your phone without the requirement of extra cables or connector devices.
Can I share my results with my caregiver through the GluCase app?
Yes. There will be a share button that allows you to share your log with your care team, as well as whomever else you’d like.
Will the GluCase app be available at the App Store and Google Play Store?
Yes.
How accurate will GluCase be?
GluCase is being designed to meet all FDA and CE requirements, including the ISO 15197:2013 requirements: In vitro diagnostic test systems - Requirements for blood-glucose monitoring systems for self-testing in managing diabetes mellitus.
Will I be able to access my account on the web/computer? 
Yes, you will be able access your GluCase account from your computer at our website. You will have a custom web dashboard, where you can read and review the statistical analysis of your glucose readings, nutritional intake, activity, interactive graphs, and readings history taken directly from your mobile device GluCase app.
What kind of test strips should be used with the GluCase? 
Only GluCase brand test strips will be compatible with GluCase.
How much of a blood sample is needed?
Only a small 0.5 microliter blood sample will be required. Additionally, GluCase brand strips are being designed to feature no-coding, advanced technology allowing for success on the first test.
Where can I get my strip supplies?
Monthly strip supplies will be replenished via mail order, and sent directly to the customer.
What application (software) can be used with GluCase? 
The GluCase App.
Will I be able to use other brand test strips with GluCase? 
No, only GluCase brand test strips will be compatible with the device. 
How do I clean the meter and how often? 
The device should be cleaned and disinfected following each use with a disinfectant wipe.
Will my test strips and supplies be covered by my insurance?
We are actively working towards that. 
Will GluCase readouts be limited to mg/dL or will it also be offered in mmol/L?
We plan on having an option for both.
What is the Warranty? 
We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. We guarantee you receive your GluCase Product free of manufacturing defects. We will have 100% AQL inspection levels.
Can I change or cancel my perk?
Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can now do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information on how to do this here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk
Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections nor are we obliged to cancel or refund a perk. Such requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis. 
When can I expect to receive my GluCase device? 
As soon as possible.
How is shipping handled?
We will be shipping via the United States Postal Service First Class mail with delivery tracking confirmation. International shipments will be sent via International First Class. 
How much is shipping and handling?
Shipping and handling, which includes shipping the items to our offices, packing and fulfilling orders will cost: FREE in the Domestic United States (including Hawaii, Puerto Rico, Alaska)$15 to Canada$25 for International Order
Where are we in Development?
We have a prototype device, but to bring GluCase™ to the vast consumer market, we still have to file with the FDA. Right now we are giving eligible subjects access to our first version of the device as part of a research study.
By helping us collect data, we can support our FDA application for market clearance via the premarket notification process. Our study protocol will be reviewed and approved by an IRB prior to initiating the study. By contributing to our campaign and participating in our study, you will help us refine the GluCase and get us ready for a formal clinical study.
The exploratory version of the GluCase is still in development and can only be used as part of an investigation. As an investigational product, it can be used to collect certain data and must be used in accordance with the study's protocol. This will happen in the framework of official clinical studies in which you will be invited to partake, only if you opt-in. For each study, you will be contacted and will have to sign an Informed Consent form.
When will I be invited to participate?
Before you are eligible to receive your GluCase, you will also receive information about the study and the Informed Consent document at which time you will be free to decide to participate in our study, and help us define the final properties of the device.

story:
Never miss a party again with Vunee

Vunee is the first event discovery app 100% focused on music events and nightlife that provide an accurate event selection, based on your profile and preferences.

  • Open the app and visualise on a map what is going on around you
  • Our selection of events is based on your social profile 
  • Find all the available tickets for the events you want to attend

There are many event agenda available, but not a single one that really shows you in real time all the event you will like around you. And you will make it possible!

Why do we do this?

We believe that an app has to solve a real problem people generally face in life. Specialists in events, we know that:

  • Finding the right events remains a challenge for users
  • Finding enough attendees remains a challenge for event organizers and promoters

Vunee exploits this gap by enabling users to discover events on the fly, while providing event organizers with a direct channel to engage and connect with users, in real-time.

Great features to enjoy your party time

Vunee provides powerful features to help you to find and enjoy the best parties, concerts of festivals:

  • A map to visualise all the events around you (information provided by Facebook events and other sources)
  • A filter to customise your map based on your music preferences, the age of the attendees or the price of the ticket
  • Ticketing: get all the available tickets (first and second market) for the selected events
  • Chat: get in touch with the other attendees to have fun and share some valuable information about the party!
  • Live stream of photos from Instagram: get all the photos the other attendees are publishing on Instagram in real time.

What We Need & What You Get

After more than a year of hard work and testing our app is fully design. We also have a beta version, running on both iOS and Android. But we need now to make it real. We need a total of 50k to develop the definitive version.

With your contribution we will:

  • Build the definitive version on iOS and Android (35k)
  • Organise a soft launch in Barcelona and Ibiza (15k) where our best contributors will be invited
Once our product will be launched we will get to the next round of fundings, with VCs and industry specialists. But this will be the next step. For now, we do need you and your support.

Risks & Challenges

Once our product is launched, the hard work will have to continue. It won't be an end but a real beginning!

Next steps, after our launch will be:

  • Raise around 1mn euro to boost the user acquisition and internationalisation of Vunee
  • Launch in all the major "party cities": Ibiza, London, Paris, Las Vegas, Miami
  • Expend the business in all European capitals and major cities in the US

If you love parties, be part of Vunee! We have some great deals to offer!

story:
Thank you all!

 We are now in the process of massive production. 

 In the Press

    

 

                                  
          

    

         

        


 How to Contact PadBot Team

www.padbot.co  www.padbot.cn   E-mail: padbot@inbot.cn


 What is PadBot

PadBot is a telepresence robot. People can use PadBot to represent him/her remotely by showing his/her video, voice and movements in real-time. We can control PadBot to move freely and angle its head upward or downward. PadBot uses iPad/iPad Mini/Android pad as its brain. PadBot connect with iPad via wireless Bluetooth 4.0. 

The PadBots communicate with each other by using WiFi/4G connections. This connectivity are already been built into iPad/Android pad. The shape of PadBot looks like a white goose, which is elegant and human friendly. The height of PadBot is around 90 cm. This is suitable for working in indoor environment. 

PadBot greatly enhance the experience of human communications. PadBot serves as another copy of you while communicating remotely. All these simple, yet very useful functions give us tremendous flexibility for face-to-face conversations. Compared to phone calls, PadBot is a great step forward for human communications.

 PadBot Helps Us in Daily Life

  • For Business

The time and money we wasted in business trips are high. Setting up a multi-party conversation sometimes end up in a mess. PadBot utilizes the powerful iOS platform to build a peer-to-peer video & voice communications. With WiFi/4G connections, PadBot gives the staffs great mobility.  

We can connect back to office while working in the field. Or we can inspect multiple subcontractors’ factories simultaneously. We can invite our penitential clients to visit the demo room in a very cost-effective way. PadBot unleashes the productivity, enables a much more efficient and interactive enterprise communications.


  • For Family

PadBot brings lots of fun to your family members. Kids like play with iPad. By using PadBot, his/her iPad now becomes a fantastic robot. PadBot is kind of the luxury-class gift to your kids. For sure, they are going to love it. PadBot will be hottest Christmas gift, and a coolest show off thing to his/her little friends.

Grandpa & grandma may live in different locations. There is nothing more important than being there with your family members. Since you are too busy to spend hours on the road, now PadBot can bring you back home instantly. We walk around parents just like the good old days.

  • For Lovers

Hours of phone call cannot soothe the hottest love. Seeing loved ones, being there with him/her, playing around are more satisfying. Every single moment counts! PadBot helps a lot to strengthen the love relationship.


  • Yet, Many More Scenarios to be Discovered

PadBot is designed for easier usage. Its application scenarios are only limited by people's imaginations, since communications is universal requirements for human beings. We use it for business, to monitor the production line, having meetings, check the show room etc. We run PadBot for aged persons too. They need more cares by family or community members.

Feel free to discover your application scenarios and have fun! Inbot Technolog Ltd looks forward to your feedback of your new discovery.

Our contact can be found at http://www.padbot.co/about

 How PadBot Works

The whole system is consists of two parts. One is the robot itself, meaning PadBot. The other is whole software network system. PadBot has session servers to coordinate the conversations. After the connections is setup, all media data is transferred by peer-to-peer connection. PadBot has its own cloud servers, which can be expanded for capacity easily.

 Feature Highlights of PadBot

PadBot is built based on cutting-edge technologies. The hardware is built from scratch. The outward appearance is protected by patented design. These following photos illustrate the key feature highlights of PadBot.

 Multiple Terminal Support

People can take the iPad or Android Pad as the brain of PadBot. We use iPhone, iPad, Android Phone or Android Pad to control PadBot locally or remotely. The design of PadBot saves your money. PadBot turns your existing gadgets into a part of robot. It utilizes what you already have, rather than buying some high price laboratory equipment.

  Application Screens Flip Demo

PadBot App supports the iOS and Android platforms (PCs later). The user interface is unique and elegant.  It has powerful functions, such as self control, remote control, real-time video chat, friends dashboard, QR-Code etc. 

In our user survey, people start using it easily without reading a single line of user manual. The logic of interaction is clear. Buttons and text are self-explained. And PadBot App supports multiple languages, a truly globalized application.

App links:

iPad: https://itunes.apple.com/en/app/pai-bao/id790584183?mt=8

iPhone: https://itunes.apple.com/en/app/pai-bao-for-iphone/id797631387?mt=8

Please take your time and see the flip demos below:

 Multiple Angle Display

PadBot is a white goose-alike robot, which has a stable base, a refined head and two powerful wheels. It is stylistcally impeccable and fashionably stark. The design looks elegant and human friendly.


 Collision Prevention & Anti-falling System

PadBot has three sensors in the front. They are responsible for monitoring the collision detect. If any obstacle is close, the system stops automatically. There is sensors built in the rear side. Meanwhile, at the bottom of PadBot, it has anti-falling detection sensor. So whenever the PadBot is close the edges like stairs, it stops moving to prevent the damages.

 Real time Video Chat

People can use PadBot for video and voice communications. Meanwhile, people can control the movements of PadBot remotely.


 Auto Response, with Authorization Control

As long as you authorized the auto-answer account, you can control PadBot remotely without human intervention. This empowers you with great flexibility. PadBot becomes your remote monitor for home & office. Thanks to PadBot's ability to move, PadBot brings monitoring to a whole new level, compared to ordinary baby-cam and many other stationary video cameras. Meanwhile, the highly secured algorithm keep your robot and your privacy in a safe hand.

 Technical Specifications


 How Much Does PadBot Cost

The PadBot team want to build a robot for mass market. PadBot is designated for daily life, for people like you and me. We try the best to look for cost-effective solutions, rather than some fancy complex laboratory equipments. So  we achieve the best cost reduction, compared to others.  Please read diagrams below for details.

 What are the Perks


 When Can PadBot be Delivered to You

Before the crowd funding, Inbot Technology already spend one year to build serveral prototypes. Our team is now fine tuning the detail design of PadBot for final production.

After we collect the funding, the mold will be built first. Due to the complexity of the whole products, the mold supplier will take approximately 5 weeks to get everything ready. Only after the mold is built, every plastic part can be produced.

At the same time, we will start purchasing other parts for PadBot. When all parties are in the stock, we are able to assembly the whole robots. The whole time line is drawn as below. Inbot Technology works at full speed to manufacture these robots.

Note: Because of air traffic regulations, certain capacity batteries are prohibited for shipments by air. Inbot Tech will try  its best to find the carrier with faster delivery speed or reduce the battery capacity for air shipment. Each country may have different approaches. Please leave your contact clearly. Our team will contact you via e-mails or phone calls before shipping.

 Project Time line 


 Who are We

We do believe: Robots serve people.

We are a group of young & energetic people. With years of experiences in big corporations, we feel like to build something innovative on our own hands. Inbot Technology is a small but fantastic start-up company. Our team members possess rich experiences in software development, hardware design, mechanics and testing etc.

We work actively in Robotics community. The founders of Inbot Technology graduated with their major in Smart Software and Robotics. When we studied in university, for many times we participated in national and world wide robot soccer competitions. Our team won in two major categories of competition: FIRA China and RobotCup. Based on all these solid practices, we are now utilizing our expertise to build a telepresence robot for everybody.


 Why We Need Your Support

People have been talking about robots for decades. But what happened? Robot looks cool only in Hollywood movies or on TV shows. In our real life, we can only find some dummy cleaning robot or some other plastic toys for our kids. No robot brings communications at home. No robot helps your work in the office.

Though it looks simply to use, PadBot absorb much of our energy, from cooking up the whole concept, to designing the outfit, building the software systems etc. We have built 5 prototypes before the final version. To continue this project, much of our personal savings are put into the development of PadBot. Now it is time to produce PadBot massively.

We need your support to make this robot come true. 

We need your support to enhance the way people communicate.

 FQA

  • Getting Started

 What is PadBot?

PadBot is a telepresence robot. People can use PadBot to represent him/her remotely by showing his/her video, voice and movements in real-time. We can control PadBot to move freely and knock its head. PadBot is an innovative way of commmunications. It narrows the cap between face-to-face discussion and phone calls.

 How does PadBot work?

PadBot uses tablets as its brain, such as iPad or iPad mini. PadBot connect with tablets via wireless Bluetooth 4.0. The PadBots communciate with each other by using WiFi/4G connections. This connectivity are already been built into tablets. After user register their account in PadBot system, they can invite their friends, and start the conversation via PadBot.

 What scenario does PadBot fit in?

PadBot can be used for business and home usage. Business environment includes meetings, remote expertise for medical, user services, dianostic etc. For home usage, PadBot fits mostly for the kids to play with. The shape of PadBot looks like a white goose, which is elegant and human friendly.

  • Product Usage

 How long does the battery last?

The capacity of PadBot battery is as large as 9800mAh. The rechargeable battery can last 5 days in standby mode. When control the PadBot continously, it lasts around 15 hours, depending on the ground situation and user behaviors.

 How do I know padbot is fully charged?

PadBot have four green power light. We can treat each light stands for approximately 25% percent of battery capacity. So from the indication lights, you could know the battery capacity easily.

 Is there any collistion protective methods built in PadBot?

PadBot have an infrared collision prevention system. When PadBot is moving, it always keep monitoring any possible obstacles. The PadBot would stop moving when close to human or other kind of animals, like dogs and cats.

 Can PadBot stop automatically when near the floor edges?

PadBot have an anti-falling system.When PadBot is moving, it keeps detecting floor edges by two sensors built under the frontside of itself. When Padbot is close to the edge of stairs or floors, the anti-falling system will stop PadBot moving.

 Does the PadBot support 10 inch tablets?

The head of PadBot support 7 inch to 10 inch tablet.

 How much is the movement range of the head?

PadBot has a flexible head, which could knock up 30 degrees and knock down 30 degrees.

 How far away can PadBot be from my tablets?

PadBot uses Bluethooth to connect with your iPad/iPad mini or any other Android pads. It must be within 30 meters from your pad to stay connected.

  • Apps Usage

 Which model of tablet can I use for PadBot?

You can use the new iPad , iPad 4, iPad air, iPad mini or iPad mini retina as the brain of PadBot. The PadBot Apps support iOS 6.0 and up. In the meanwhile, You can use your Android Tablets as the brain of PadBot.The PadBot support 7 to 10 inches of Android Tablets and the PadBot Apps support Android 4.3 or above.

 What languages does Padbot App support?

The Padbot app will be available 34 national languages.

 How is the security controlled for privacy?

The real-time video chat is based on peer-to-peer connection, with real time encryption technology. The server only handle the setup messages. No media stream is transfer to server.

 How many friends can I invite for a video chat?

Currently, PadBot support one-to-one video chat. Multiple part video will be supported in future roadmap, it is reserved in PadBot system archecture design.

 Can I create a video chat on my laptop?

Not yet. We have iOS and Android. We think PC client is a cool idea and we are looking into scheduling it in.

 Will I be able to use PadBot locally without Internet?

You could control PadBot locally via Bluetooth 4.0, by moving forward or backward, and knocking the head up or down. But you can't create a real-time video chat with others and control PadBot remotely without Internet.

It narrows the cap between face-to-face discussion and phone calls. How does PadBot work?PadBot uses tablets as its brain, such as iPad or iPad mini. PadBot connect with tablets via wireless Bluetooth 4.0. The PadBots communciate with each other by using WiFi/4G connections. This connectivity are already been built into tablets. After user register their account in PadBot system, they can invite their friends, and start the conversation via PadBot. What scenario does PadBot fit in?PadBot can be used for business and home usage. Business environment includes meetings, remote expertise for medical, user services, dianostic etc. For home usage, PadBot fits mostly for the kids to play with. The shape of PadBot looks like a white goose, which is elegant and human friendly.Product Usage
 How long does the battery last?The capacity of PadBot battery is as large as 9800mAh. The rechargeable battery can last 5 days in standby mode. When control the PadBot continously, it lasts around 15 hours, depending on the ground situation and user behaviors. How do I know padbot is fully charged?PadBot have four green power light. We can treat each light stands for approximately 25% percent of battery capacity. So from the indication lights, you could know the battery capacity easily. Is there any collistion protective methods built in PadBot?PadBot have an infrared collision prevention system. When PadBot is moving, it always keep monitoring any possible obstacles. The PadBot would stop moving when close to human or other kind of animals, like dogs and cats. Can PadBot stop automatically when near the floor edges?PadBot have an anti-falling system.When PadBot is moving, it keeps detecting floor edges by two sensors built under the frontside of itself. When Padbot is close to the edge of stairs or floors, the anti-falling system will stop PadBot moving. Does the PadBot support 10 inch tablets?The head of PadBot support 7 inch to 10 inch tablet. How much is the movement range of the head?PadBot has a flexible head, which could knock up 30 degrees and knock down 30 degrees. How far away can PadBot be from my tablets?PadBot uses Bluethooth to connect with your iPad/iPad mini or any other Android pads. It must be within 30 meters from your pad to stay connected.Apps Usage
 Which model of tablet can I use for PadBot?You can use the new iPad , iPad 4, iPad air, iPad mini or iPad mini retina as the brain of PadBot. The PadBot Apps support iOS 6.0 and up. In the meanwhile, You can use your Android Tablets as the brain of PadBot.The PadBot support 7 to 10 inches of Android Tablets and the PadBot Apps support Android 4.3 or above. What languages does Padbot App support?The Padbot app will be available 34 national languages. How is the security controlled for privacy?The real-time video chat is based on peer-to-peer connection, with real time encryption technology. The server only handle the setup messages. No media stream is transfer to server. How many friends can I invite for a video chat?Currently, PadBot support one-to-one video chat. Multiple part video will be supported in future roadmap, it is reserved in PadBot system archecture design. Can I create a video chat on my laptop?Not yet. We have iOS and Android. We think PC client is a cool idea and we are looking into scheduling it in. Will I be able to use PadBot locally without Internet?You could control PadBot locally via Bluetooth 4.0, by moving forward or backward, and knocking the head up or down. But you can't create a real-time video chat with others and control PadBot remotely without Internet.

story:
A functional case that protects your smartphone from physical damage, improves range and reception to virtually eliminate dropped calls, enhances battery life, protects users from radiation and transfers data at never before seen speeds.

And internet is free and say goodbye to paying for data plans!

WHAT DOES THIS MEAN FOR CONSUMERS?

The ATOM accessory case delivers the following benefits to iPhone, iPad, or Android-based phones:

  • No more dropped calls
  • No more charging your smartphone battery every day
  • No more scratched and damaged phones
  • No more waiting for 30 minutes to download a HD movie or a large file
  • Negligible increase in size and weight. Thinner and lighter design than most
    cases on the market today
  • Protection from smartphone radiation which has been implicated in causing brain cancers

BENEFITS OF ATOM

Our fundamental vision is that consumers will continue to need, and therefore demand, faster wireless data access and higher bandwidth to deliver rich content to their mobile devices. Our technology meets that demand by providing following benefits:

FREEDOM: Talk, browse, and play anywhere. ATOM makes mobile devices, truly mobile. It untethers users from standard coverage areas and ensures devices are ready for an Internet connection every time, everywhere they go.

The case will allow mobile carriers to cover up to ten times more area from a single tower using existing frequencies. Dropped calls should then become a thing of the past.

SIMPLICITY: Untangle users’ lives. ATOM delivers clear, uninhibited communication. It enables users to stay completely connected, and efficiently powerful. Free Internet means no more contracts, no more wandering for better reception, no more worrying about overcharges.

SPEED: Technology of the future-our technological breakthrough of “7G” wireless digital signal enhancement improves range and reception, enabling wireless transfer of audio and video data at up to 25 gigabits per second – twenty times the current maximum wireless transfer rate. Our technology can interact with TV to provide entertainment/gaming capabilities that are unachievable with existing wireless technology. This includes data rates similar to existing wired standards, such as USB3.0, PCIe or HDMI, and the streaming of uncompressed wireless video concurrently to multiple displays. Sports games, arcade classics and mobile games just feel bigger and better on a TV screen than a smartphone.

INTEROPERABILITY: ATOM, the smartphone case of the future is an interoperable, high performance device that works seamlessly to connect people in the dynamic digital lifestyle. It provides wireless connectivity in the unlicensed 60 GHz band that ushers in a new generation of unprecedented bandwidth into the mobile consumer electronics industry.

EFFICIENCY: More efficient, with less consumption of power.

STYLE: Functional fashion. ATOM makes a stylish, fashionable statement that distinguishes its owner as being on the cutting edge. ATOM users are first adopters of this future technology and proud of it

SAFETY: Although debate rages about safety of using smartphones, there have been over 200 scientific studies that have linked electromagnetic radiation to brain cancer, salivary gland tumors, behavioral problems, migraines and vertigo. Until  the dust settles discretion is the better part of valor. Our case protects users from electromagnetic radiation.

WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION UPDATE

Our ultimate goal is to have a net positive battery charge for the smartphone. Our definition of a net positive energy charge is that once you put your phone into the sleeve it never has to be recharged again. Our case creates a perpetual charge removing the need for using a wall outlet on a standard 120 Volt/60 Hz circuit using a plug adapter and a USB cable.  

How would you like to be part of a revolutionary shift in consumer electronic technology, one where technology learns and adapts to meet your individual needs instead of you learning how to use its features? After years of research and development, we have a product in the final stages of development that can fundamentally change the way we live and play.

This product, ATOM, is a patent-pending smartphone case which combines artificial intelligence with unlicensed White Space, the most powerful, efficient and fastest wireless data transport interface in the industry today.

PROBLEM:

Smartphones are ubiquitous, and so is the frustration resulting from dropped calls, physical damage, daily depleted batteries and lost phone chargers. Progress has been limited because it has been so daunting to give the devices the ability to sense their environment, quickly determine the accurate response, and then perform the appropriate action. This bottleneck has been caused by the inability to provide efficient, super-fast data transfer which is necessary for downloading large amounts of information and responding quickly and accurately. We have solved this problem.

SOLUTION TO PROBLEM

We have developed a device which utilizes White Space, the most powerful and efficient wireless data transport interface in the industry today. This open source platform redefines high-speed wireless and will profoundly change our home and work lives, how we interact with technology, and our standard of living.

Media Li²ght Entertainment’s technological breakthrough is our extremely small, highly integrated, low power 60GHz single-chip mm-wave radio transceiver, compliant with the WiGig 1.1 and IEEE 802.11ad specifications. It can be embedded into various objects and devices and allows the open source White Space controller to communicate with our devices to transport data onto a 7G 60GHz "millimetre wave" spectrum.

 

CLICK HERE TO SEE HOW IT WORKS

This high performance allows the device to support all WiGig protocol application layers (PALs) and facilitates energy efficiency greater than 300pJ/bit, enabling wireless transfer of audio and video data at up to 5-25 gigabits per second – twenty times the current maximum wireless transfer rate. It is ideal for high bandwidth robotic mobile applications such as screen mirroring in full1080p HD.

We have also included a second WLAN chain and antenna which improves RF performance, providing large antenna gain and virtually eliminating dropped calls.

Moreover, we have incorporated carbon nanotube technology for more efficient energy usage and utilized a renewable micro energy cell that stores and harvests energy from ambient environment (radio frequency, magnetic, solar, heat and vibration) to dramatically reduce the number of times a smartphone needs to be manually re-charged.  With our technology your iPhone would need recharging every 48 hours instead of every 8 hours of normal usage. 

Since White Space is unlicensed open-source platform, internet connections are free and you save money that you are currently paying for data packages, a savings of $70-$80 per month. 

A  WHITE SPACE WIRELESS BREAKTHROUGH:

The transition to digital TV on June 12th 2009 liberated vast amounts of wireless frequencies that can be used by anyone, for FREE! These newly available frequencies are collectively called White Space.

Find out the white spaces at your location!

"Super Wi-Fi," has resulted from the deployment of unused broadcast television spectrum and is being deployed in the US and generating significant interest in many countries around the world including China, India, Britain and Brazil.

CLICK HERE FOR ROLLOUT INFORMATION

 

 
White Space is revolutionizing the wireless entertainment gaming industry. The unique property of the White Space frequency bands is its excellent propagation characteristics – signals can travel further and faster, carry a lot of information, are unaffected by weather and foliage, and can go through walls and penetrate nooks and crannies within any residential home.

The unlicensed 60 GHz band has been available for several years, but only now is it possible to implement devices in low cost SiGe BiCMOS and CMOS mobile technologies. The combination of low-cost implementation coupled with enormous spectrum makes 60 GHz ideal for CE cable replacement, rivaling the bandwidth of wired technologies such as USB 3.0, HDMI, PCIe or DisplayPort. The short wavelength means antennas (traditionally a large constraint on implementation size) can be very small, thus yielding a small footprint. In addition, at 60 GHz it possible to implement compact, highly directional antennas which improve performance and allow for frequency re-use and spatial diversity.

With your pledge, you have an opportunity to be part of a company on the cutting edge of consumer electronics. Media Li2ght is revolutionizing how we play, search for, interact with, and receive information in the world around us. We need your support to launch the first FCC-approved; White Space enabled entertainment and mobile gaming accessory in the consumer electronics marketplace.  

Join us as we take a bold step into the future we have all been dreaming about.

Thank you.

              

 
 
 
 
 

ENGINEERING DESIGNS IN DEVELOPMENT BELOW 

=======================================================

FCC RULINGS AND NEWS

Fortuitously, there have been some major regulatory rulings recently that further accentuate our application, enhanced relevance and utility of our technology and favorably tilt the consumer landscape in our direction. These include:

On Nov 4, 2008, the FCC unanimously approves rules that will open unused broadcast TV spectrum known as 'white spaces' for unlicensed use. (CLICK HERE)

On June 12, 2009, federal law requires that all full-power television broadcast stations stop broadcasting in analog format and broadcast only in digital format.

On June 22, 2009 US converts to digital transmission. This opens up the old analog network for a white space unlicensed wireless broadcast network.

On September 12, 2010 FCC's Whitespace Ruling: The Real Wi-Fi Revolution Is About to Happen

On September 23, 2010 FCC approved unlicensed operation in the TV broadcast bands

On September 13, 2010: FCC approved additional spectrum for unlicensed devices below 900 MHz and in the 3 GHz band PC World: January 27, 2012: White Spaces: The Next Generation of Wireless Broadband Has Landed (CLICK HERE)

On January 27, 2012, Article: White Spaces: The Next Generation of Wireless Broadband Has Landed. (CLICK HERE) for the article.

On May 3, 2012 national association of broadcasters drops opposition to ‘white space’ free internet

On October 15, 2012, the KTS Wireless' Agility White Space Radio Wins an Innovation Award at Tessco's Innovation Showcase 2012. (CLICK HERE)

The transition to digital TV on June 12th 2009 liberated vast amounts of wireless frequencies that can be used by anyone, for FREE! These newly available frequencies are collectively called white spaces. Find out the white spaces at your location!

The wireless revolution is here today, transforming our economy and changing the way we live. Wireless innovation will be a driving force in economic growth and job creation, which in turn will enable new breakthroughs in areas like robotics, health care, education, energy, and public safety.

Our technology promises to play important roles in all these industries. Having a robot companion may not be for everyone but you can still get a signal enhancement that improves range and reception and still a play a critical role in creating a better future by supporting the development of our project. 

White Space is going to revolutionize the wireless entertainment/gaming and robotic industry. While it has excellent propagation characteristics, complexity and other factors could be prohibitive barriers in certain applications. However, should these barriers be overcome, the long-term potential for white space is endless.

The reason these white space channels are so valuable—and why they were chosen for terrestrial television in the first place—is because their signals travel farther carry more information, are unaffected by weather and foliage, go through walls and penetrate all the nooks and crannies within the bowels of buildings.

FCC approval The Commission's Part 15 rules (47 C.F.R. 15.701 et seq.) require that unlicensed TV band devices (TVBDs) contact an authorized database system to obtain a list of channels that are authorized for operation (i.e., channels not protected for authorized radio services). Channel use authorizations are determined for a specific location. 

 

 ABOUT MEDIA LI2GHT ENTERTAINMENT

Media Li2ght Entertainment, a Delaware corporation incorporated July 31, 2012 (collectively “Media-Li2ght” or the “Company”) is a startup company privately owned development company that designs and develops electronic devices. The research and development is focused on developing nano enabled mobile electronic accessories to bridge the gap between emerging and traditional platforms for the Apple IPhone and Google Android Smart Phones utilizing high speed wireless communications, and transforming environments through new, dynamic uses of interactive technology applications.

We are currently in final negotiations with merging with a India Company which is is engaged in in the production of computer generated (CG) animated characters in feature films, TV, e-books, robotics and gaming.  The company produces licenses and distributes its animated films and characters to the theatrical, home entertainment, television, and retail markets. In addition, the Company designs, manufactures and markets a broad range of first-in-class c mobile accessories and develops advanced interactive digital content and applications. With the rise of mobile technologies and partnering of key collaborators this is the first India Company focusing on humanoid robotics.

 

OFFICERS 

Rob Richard President/CEO Global Business Development & Emerging Markets

Goal-driven Executive with proven experience developing successful sales and marketing organizations domestically and internationally. Organizational Change Agent creating value through strategic planning and P&L optimization while managing risk to achieve market, channel and brand performance. A Talent Developer who empowers teams to top performance with courage and accountability. Areas of expertise include:

• Global Product Sales • P & L Management • Business-Unit Start-Ups • Regional Turnarounds • Developing International Distribution Networks • Overcoming International Business Barriers

 

Brad Saeed Brad has extensive background in the health care industry in the areas of research, marketing and sales. He currently owns BTS Consulting which specializes in developing marketing strategy, marketing communications materials and online tools to promote products and services. His vast experience in pharmaceuticals, medical device, and health services industries enables him to assist his clients with their marketing and advertising needs to help them achieve their business objectives.

Brad serves as a Medical Device Principal Advisor reviewing scientific and medical data about our potential commercialization of the carbon fiber/radiation shield. He has extensive international experience and has played a major role in meeting regulatory requirements and commercializing products in U.S, Europe, and Asia.

Throughout his career, he has provided medical input in all stages of product development process from concept development and technical implementation to product launch, advocacy and post-market surveillance. He has also taught International Business, Organizational Behavior, Marketing, Leadership and Innovation at undergraduate and graduate levels.

Krishna Nath Chief Operating Officer Has been responsible for Media Li2ght Entertainment Inc. corporate development since the Company’s inception in July 31, 2012

Joseph Nagy (Media-Li2ght-Entertainment)

An accomplished executive with a Financial/Business Management background. Proven track record of increasing sales volume along with increasing corporate profits and ROI. Experience in launching and building new business to profitability. Strong analytical  skills. An Advisory Board Member and an Executive Operating Committee Member. Previous Business Owner. 

Professional Profile:

* Financial Analysis  * Strategic Planning * Operations Management * Purchasing * Market Analysis * Negotiations * Customer Relations 

 

OFFICE LOCATIONS

US OFFICES

Incorporated In Delaware 

Corporate Headquarters Office Address
16192 Coastal Hwy
Lewes, Delaware 19958

INTERNATIONAL OFFICES

Technopark Campus Park Centre 
Thiruvananthapuram, India 695-581 
Phone: (866) 882-9871
Fax: (866) 882-9871

story:
Build A Better Bridge

 

Thanks for taking a moment to check out this campaign!  Let me introduce myself.  My name is Joseph Colclough and my company is Seamless Solutions LLC.  The purpose of this campaign overcome job-site language barriers through mobile applications in the areas of construction, landscape and food service.  

In the U.S. alone there are over 54 million native Spanish speakers and this series of mobile apps would allow them to communicate in English effectively on the job.  

What about "Google Translate"?  The problem is simple.  When you need industry-specific translations for construction trades <plumbing, electric, drywall, framing, roofing, etc.>; landscaping <mowing, planting, pruning, waterscape, hardscape, etc.>; or food service <cooking, prep, maintenance, etc.> online translators fall short of the task and produce poor quality confusing translations.

Try it for yourself!  For example, type the word "weed wacker" in Google translate and see what you get!  Or "vice-grips", "compound miter saw" and the list goes on and on.  Or worse try typing "Get the circular saw and extension cords and hook up the nail gun to the air compresor".   

"Build A Better Bridge" is a campaign with the goal of creating a professional and accurate translation database that can be used in a series of mobile applications.  These mobile applications will included full audio pronuciation, share features to (messaging, e-mail, facebook and twitter), and one-click access to 1000's of phrases and job-specific terms.  All of this allows for clear on-the-job bilingual communication in English and Spanish.  

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have published three books on Amazon.com:  Spanish Dictionary for Contractors, Contractor Spanish for Drywall Professionals and Inglés para la construcción: Un recurso total de términos específicos para los oficios (Spanish Edition).  These book were just a small portion of the massive database of professionally translated terms for the construction trades, landscaping and the food service industry. 

After publishing the books and developing the database, we launched the first of its kind Mobile Application "Construction Spanish Pro" on April 15, 2013 on Google Play for Android.  Here is the link to our current Mobile Apps:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Seamless+Solutions+LLC.  

This version has been tested, revised, updated and reviewed.  But the need is not just for construction, it is for bilingual language apps in the areas of landscaping and food service as well.  To meet this need, we have already developed the massive databases composed of professional translations and want to take these databases and make a series of mobile applications for Android and it's sister line-up for Apple.  

Become a "Bridge Builder" today and join the team to overcome language barriers on the job through Mobile Applicaiton Development.  

If we reach the goal of $5,000 we will make the Landscaping Spanish/English Application for Android. $10,000 we will make the Restaurant Spanish/English Application.  If we reach the $15,000 goal we will make all three apps for Android as well as for Apple.  This will allows us to reach more people and build a better bridge through the use of these powerful mobile applications.

Donate $25 and get an awesome "Bridge Builder" black T-shirt with a blingin logo design.  

Donate $100 and get the awesome "Bridge Builder" T-shirt and YOUR NAME or BUSINESS will be printed in the "Bridge Team" section on the back of the shirt.  

Donate $900 and get the awesome Bridge Builder T-shirt with your name or company listed in the “Bridge Team” list on the back of the shirt.  Also, you will be one of the first to receive an autographed pre-released copy of the book "Bridge Builder" by campaign founder Joseph Colclough and your name or company will listed in "Special Thanks" section of the book .  Your name or company logo will be featured on the “Splash Page” and visible every time someone opens the Mobile App.  

Donate $9,000 and get all of the above (Bridge Team, Bridge Builder pre-release book, splash page name or logo) AND you will become THE MAIN CHARACTER in the upcoming book "Bridge Builder".  

The Impact

Think about how many Spanish-speaking people work in restaurants, landscaping and the construction trades!  Millions of people can benefit from these mobile applications.  Not only do these Apps help English-speaking workers to communicate in Spanish but they also give Spanish-speakers a powerful tool that allows them to communicate in English.  Join the cause.  Become a "Bridge Builder" today!    

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can’t contribute?  That doesn’t mean that you can’t help!

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.  
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools.
  • Tell your friends or co-workers about this and SHARE on Facebook, twitter, LinkedIn, Google+, etc.

story:
Tired of the small screen on your mobile and looking for an easy solution to watch online videos on TV? Taking forever to find what you want to watch in front of TV after a long day? Losing the online video you were watching and don’t know where to resume?

We hear you. Our dream is to make watching online videos a simple enjoyment. After working in multimedia for years, we still could not find a device that is simple enough to our family and friends. So we decide to create our very own online video player, OVO, to build an easy connection to online videos on TV.

 

Unique User Experience

Just collect online videos with your smartphone via the OVO·Q, our mobile APP that collects, organizes, and shares videos from online media, while waiting for a bus, taking the MRT, or eating in a restaurant, and you are only one click away from enjoying selected videos comfortably on your sofa.

It is also easy to share videos with the elderly and children at home, who only need to click on the OVO to play your videos. As parents, you can protect your kids from inappropriate content on the Internet by providing selected videos easily accessed by them.

Absolute Convenience

Our OVO provides many handy features so users would not be limited by space, time, or screen:

OVO·Q Cloud Services

  • Autoplay: play selected online videos simply by pressing on the OVO.
  • Resuming: watch videos continuously at different locations. (Twin pack is recommended!)
  • Switch Play: switch video play between your handheld device and the OVO.

OVO Features

  • Mirror Screen: mirror your screen to TV.
  • My Media: share media contents from your mobile device to TV.
  • Media Apps: play media contents to TV from 3rd party Media Apps, including DLNA-compliant and proprietary services. More content services will be provided, including Apps offering substantial Chinese videos.
  • OVO Remote and OVO Setting: turn your smartphone into a remote controller when playing selected videos on TV, or change your OVO hardware settings.
Simplicity isn’t simple. But through the OVO network, watching online video can be a simple enjoyment.
Beautiful Design from the Inside Out

The egg-shaped OVO not only provides a stylish look, but also fulfills engineering purposes. Its vertical design allows room for a tilt WiFi module so that higher signal quality can be achieved. With a cantilever power button built at the bottom, the OVO also enables better usability – you can activate the device simply by pressing gently on its top, with no need to pinpoint your fingertip at a small switch.

Open Collaboration

We will provide OVO’s API for developers to build video linkage to the OVO·Q. While App or Web developers can add a function icon to their user interface, system integrators can utilize our product and services to meet their display needs in chain store, classroom, or digital signage applications. You are very much welcomed to be one of our OVO beta developers, and we are looking forward to discussing more exciting ideas with you!

Hardware

We are almost READY and will enter Mass Production with Your Support!

Designed in Taiwan, a place known for expertise in volume production of high-quality IT products worldwide, the OVO comes from joint efforts of top experts in design, mechanical engineering, and production since its early development.

We have completed two prototyping phases and solved most of the mechanical and electrical issues. Almost all of the components come from suppliers that we have closely worked with for years. We are conducting a detailed review with our tooling vendor and defining the PCB testing interface with our manufacturer. Our engineering samples are expected to come out in September, before we enter mass production in October. All we need is your support to make it happen!

Can you tell the differences in shape between the two eggs above? It illustrates our 'OVO Attitude'!

Specifications

  • Full HD Media Processor
  • DDR3 2Gb, NAND Flash 2Gb
  • WiFi 802.11b/g/n, 2T2R
  • HDMI 1.4 output, Type A
  • Power DC 5V/1A input, Micro-USB
  • IR input, reserved for external IR receiver (see FAQ)
  • 61.85 mm (h), 63.32 mm (w), 72.78 mm (d)
  • 77 grams
Software

Back us to Build a Ubiquitous Digital Life !

The demos you see in our video are real working prototypes. Your support is very much needed for us to move forward. We are striving to provide complete device coverage and services that are fast, stable, and secure, as soon as possible. Please help us!

Our plan is as the following

  • OVO embedded software and OVO·Q cloud service: currently a working version, to be followed by engineering sample in Sep., and mass production in Oct.
  • OVO·Q Android and iPhone App: currently working version for Android; beta version to be released in Sep., followed by product launch in Oct.
  • OVO·Q Web services and browser extensions (Chrome, etc.):currently in early development; beta version to be released in Nov.; product launch expected in Dec. (With your help, we could accelerate it!)
Web browser extension: add your videos to OVO·Q via a simple click
We Have a Big Dream, and You can Help Make it Come True!

We have experienced engineers and designers, but not enough. With your support, we will be able to deliver a great product that allows people to enjoy, share, and connect with each other more easily.

FAQ

Q: Will the OVO and OVO·Q support my iPhone/Android phone?

A: Yes, we plan to develop product and services supporting both iPhone and Android phones for iOS 5 and above, and Android 2.3 and above, respectively.

Q: What accessories will I need to use the OVO for TV?

A: A HDMI cable and a WiFi connection to work with the OVO’s built-in WiFi.

Q: What content will I be able to watch?

A:
  • OVO·Q cloud services: content provided by media with open APIs, including YouTube and Vimeo, and App or Web developers adopting OVO’s API.
  • Media contents provided through Mirror Screen, My Media, and 3rd Party Media Apps.

Q: What does the IR port do?

A: While you can always turn your smartphone into a remote controller through OVO·Q, we do not rule out of the possibility to provide an independent controller with an IR receiver under customized circumstances.

Q: What file formats will the OVO support?

A: The OVO will support most major online video formats and videos produced by smartphones and tablets.

File Formats Supported: 
  • Video - AVI (Xvid, MPEG4, H.264, VC-1), MKV (MPEG4, H.264, VC-1), TS/TP/M2T/M2TS (MPEG4,H.264, VC-1), MP4/MOV (MPEG4, H.264), RM/RMVB
  • Photo - JPEG, PNG, GIF, TIFF, BMP
  • Audio - MPEG Audio, WAV/PCM/LPCM, AAC, FLAC, MKA, AIF/AIFF, OGG
  • Subtitle - SRT, SUB, SMI, SSA, ASS (limit to specific DLNA apps that support subtitle, such as Nero MediaHome)
Note:
  • MPEG4 SP, ASP@L5 up to 1920x1080p30
  • H.264 BP, MP, HP@L4.1 up to 1920x1080p30
  • VC-1 SP, MP, AP@L3 up to 1920x1080p30
  • RM/RMVB up to 1920x1080p30
  • JPEG baseline, BMP, PNG, GIF up to 65536x65536
  • Progressive JPEG up to 2080x2080, TIFF up to 3264x2176
  • SRT, SUB, SMI, SSA Plain text only, ASS baseline only
  • Not Supported: VC-1 CP, DviX, GIF animation, Dolby AC3, DTS and protected premium content

story:
Greetings Everyone

 We Believe there's a simple way to instantly find what you want to see on TV at home or while you are out and about. We also believe that if there's a discount available you should have it, simply using what God has given you.....your voice. Qigul is a voice-activated search app that understands individual choice. To develop Qigul we started by talking and listening to people. After listening it was clear we needed to build something beautiful, smart and easy to use. By helping us with your contribution and sharing the word you will help yourself and many others to improve their lives dramatically. If you believe the best things in life are simple, please donate now. You can help make a difference for many. 


Risk Management 

With any venture either stand-alone or with limited partners there will be some risk involved. A drive across town will involve some risk. Our biggest challenge is to make sure you're pleased and delighted once its in your hands. To overcome the hurdles of many development cycles and rigorous testing, we have assembled a brilliant team of engineers and software design developers who love what they do and understand the importance of getting it done ! 

Where Is The Money Going?

We have a detailed plan for bringing Qigul to reality for you and everyone. Currently we need funds to finish the alpha and beta development testing stages. We want you to participate in its development and be thrilled when its in your hands. All funding will go directly to the development of this giant leap forward in technology. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate please share Qigul with everyone you know on social media. This would be a tremendous help. You can easily share by using the tools and share buttons here on Indiegogo .

story:
Renz and Becca were traveling home on the 12.05am service from Oxford to Didcot when the rail replacement coach experienced an electrical fault which resulted in a black out. Moments later, a DHL lorry collided with the rear of the coach causing both vehicles to spin around and slide down the embankment.

In the chaos, along with multiple injuries received, Renz lost his phone. It has not yet been recovered by the police.

If all of his friends and family wouldn't mind chipping in £10 or £20 then we can get him a new phone for Christmas!

Thankyou for your time,

Rebecca x

(Renz's girlfriend)
