Moments later, a DHL lorry collided with the rear of the coach causing both vehicles to spin around and slide down the embankment.In the chaos, along with multiple injuries received, Renz lost his phone. It has not yet been recovered by the police.If all of his friends and family wouldn't mind chipping in £10 or £20 then we can get him a new phone for Christmas!Thankyou for your time,Rebecca x(Renz's girlfriend)

story:
Short Summary

My name is Karly and I'm the marketing manager for a small Technology Retail company - IRUK. We sell locally, from phone accessories to Desktop Computers and Cameras, until we began to sell online as well.

I have an iPhone 5 and the cable had broken - I knew they were overly expensive for a simple USB data cable and that's when I realized the market potential. IRUK have recently adopted license to sell from Apple's European Distribution centre and now we know how cheap they really are.

We want to crunch down on our prices and focus on greater number of sales rather than value of sales by squeezing our profits but we are tight on Investment which is why we are looking to crowd fund this opportunity into a reality with promising returns to all who help fund us.

What We Need & What You Get

As our goal is presented, we literally need just £3000 to begin our sale of the first batch, from there we will take income in our hands and increase our order of batches;

  • £3,000, we would like to spend approximately £2100.00 for stocking on these items for sale and the remaining  amount on marketing.
  • PLEASE NOTE: Every person, whether you donate  £1 or more, will receive something in return as our way to give back to you.
  • For everyone who donates, we will give them exclusive access to all Giveaways, Sales, Offers etc. that our company - IRUK - host, all before anyone else does.
  • As we already are a small business, all funds received will still go into this investment and all who donated will receive their respective rewards - we assure everyone this.

The Impact

"So, what's the point?" - You might ask...

  • Apple is huge but their accessories don't go cheap - at least not by other retailers. We gain a lot of exposure to the public and in return we have this amazing one - off price which many couldn't beat, thanks to the fact that IRUK is a small business online.
  • I myself have questioned the high prices and there are many like me, we have a chance to change this issue - by the way, Apple USB cables are one of the top selling Apple Accessory.
  • Once again, we are a business, we've been running for over 2 years - both in a marketplace shop and online - and we know how to handle our finance.

Risks & Challenges

We face many obstacles, one of which is market exposure. Being a small business we can do with better connections with our target market. As the market manager of this small company, I've worked for over a year now and witness returning customers - please remember we sell many more products as well to assure financial security.

Our experience in dealing with customers and finding new ones - just like the decision to expand sales online - hopefully is evident to you that we are determined. This is an opportunity that we are also excited about.

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course there are many methods for businesses to use to meet new customers and maintain brand recognition but it cannot beat social interest. Please help us and our campaign to provide a new generation of super cheap Apple USB cables - why? Because we're the only ones willing to.

  • Share this page on Facebook ,Titter, Google+ and any other social media please.
  • Don't forget, Indiegogo have already placed some nifty buttons for immediate aid. It doesn't take too long to simply click "Like". :)

My name is Karly Jackson,
this is our Indiegogo campaign,

Thanks!

Short Summary My name is Karly and I'm the marketing manager for a small Technology Retail company - IRUK. We sell locally, from phone accessories to Desktop Computers and Cameras, until we began to sell online as well.
I have an iPhone 5 and the cable had broken - I knew they were overly expensive for a simple USB data cable and that's when I realized the market potential. IRUK have recently adopted license to sell from Apple's European Distribution centre and now we know how cheap they really are.
We want to crunch down on our prices and focus on greater number of sales rather than value of sales by squeezing our profits but we are tight on Investment which is why we are looking to crowd fund this opportunity into a reality with promising returns to all who help fund us.   What We Need & What You Get As our goal is presented, we literally need just £3000 to begin our sale of the first batch, from there we will take income in our hands and increase our order of batches;  £3,000, we would like to spend approximately £2100.00 for stocking on these items for sale and the remaining  amount on marketing.
PLEASE NOTE: Every person, whether you donate  £1 or more, will receive something in return as our way to give back to you. For everyone who donates, we will give them exclusive access to all Giveaways, Sales, Offers etc. that our company - IRUK - host, all before anyone else does. As we already are a small business, all funds received will still go into this investment and all who donated will receive their respective rewards - we assure everyone this.    The Impact "So, what's the point?" - You might ask...  Apple is huge but their accessories don't go cheap - at least not by other retailers. We gain a lot of exposure to the public and in return we have this amazing one - off price which many couldn't beat, thanks to the fact that IRUK is a small business online. I myself have questioned the high prices and there are many like me, we have a chance to change this issue - by the way, Apple USB cables are one of the top selling Apple Accessory. Once again, we are a business, we've been running for over 2 years - both in a marketplace shop and online - and we know how to handle our finance.    Risks & Challenges  We face many obstacles, one of which is market exposure. Being a small business we can do with better connections with our target market. As the market manager of this small company, I've worked for over a year now and witness returning customers - please remember we sell many more products as well to assure financial security.
Our experience in dealing with customers and finding new ones - just like the decision to expand sales online - hopefully is evident to you that we are determined. This is an opportunity that we are also excited about.   Other Ways You Can Help Of course there are many methods for businesses to use to meet new customers and maintain brand recognition but it cannot beat social interest. Please help us and our campaign to provide a new generation of super cheap Apple USB cables - why? Because we're the only ones willing to.  Share this page on Facebook ,Titter, Google+ and any other social media please. Don't forget, Indiegogo have already placed some nifty buttons for immediate aid. It doesn't take too long to simply click "Like". :)   My name is Karly Jackson,this is our Indiegogo campaign,Thanks!

story:
The eSharp Project

(Please use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word and tell your contacts on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, and others! Thanks!)

Brain control interfaces are changing human computer action in exciting, profound new ways. One of the brightest and boldest engines driving this change is the affordable Emotiv EPOC consumer EEG headset. This 14-electrode headset can detect facial gestures, head movements, even strong thoughts or feelings. The goal of the eSharp project is to bring this technology to the massive C# developer community with a powerful toolkit that wraps the power of the Emotiv SDK in a convenient, easy to use set of components and gadgets.

If the project reaches the top funding goal the toolkit will include the tools I created to support the Evernote Windows COM API, my favorite developer API of all time. Although you can combine the eSharp toolkit with any API or SDK you desire or your own custom C# code, take a moment to Imagine the extraordinary software apps you could develop when you combine the power of a brain control interface with the leading information management service!

This is the important part. As a modern software developer you know how vital a rich set of mature tools and solid use case examples can be to a software development project, especially since time is always scarce and deadlines are relentless. I am a veteran programmer that has spent the last few years developing applications for the Emotiv EPOC. I already have an existing toolkit for the EPOC written for Delphi 6 that dramatically reduces the time it takes to develop brain control applications, allowing me, and soon you, to concentrate on the fun and intriguing parts of the app instead of the Emotiv SDK. My affection for Delphi is as deep as the ocean but the reality is C# is also a terrific development environment and the dominant player in the PC desktop marketplace, so that's where I'm heading. The purpose of the eSharp project is to raise the funds needed to provide the time and tools necessary to port my existing toolkit in Delphi to C#.

The Project Goal - Open Source C# Toolkit

The end result of the project will be a set of open source tools for C# ported directly from my existing Delphi toolkit. The open source license will be a liberal BSD style license instead of a license that requires you to take actions that you may not be able to comply with. It will be a "just use it" license instead of one that requires you to share your source code. If you get rich building the next killer app with brain control then you keep all the rewards.

 

Delivery Date

The project will be delivered by the end of this year by December 31, 2012.

Who Am I?

My name is Robert Oschler, a veteran programmer with a passion for pushing the envelope of what computers and software can do. Please see the list of quotes about my work and myself at the bottom of this page. For a quick overview see this New York Times article that talked about my work with robots and the Emotiv EPOC.  Also, you will find a wealth of comments about my work and myself near the bottom of this page.

Robodance, the app mentioned in the article, used the same toolkit that is shown in the video and at the heart of the eSharp project. Later I added the ability to record movies of remote telepresence sessions directly to Evernote. Robodance won the prestigious Project Of The Month award from SourceForge, the largest open source respository on the web in May 2005.

Detecting Facial Gestures

eSharp contains a wealth of events that fire whenever the EPOC detects a facial gesture, so you can write apps that detect smiles, laughs, eye blinks, and more, opening the door to intriguing new apps that can change based on the users mood, or note when they have a positive or negative reaction to entertainment media like videos, pictures, etc., an example of this was shown in the project video. There is one easy to use event for when the facial gesture starts and another for when it stops, giving you all the information you need to react to a facial gesture when it begins and ends, or to note the exact time interval a facial gesture occurred in.

Detecting Head Movement

There are convenient events that fire whenever the EPOC detects head movement giving you easy access to the horizontal and vertical head movement change values. eSharp goes even further than the Emotiv SDK by providing higher level events that tell you when the user shakes their head YES or NO, which can be useful for EPOC based dialogs that prompt the user for action, or for creating applications that can tell when a user agrees or disagrees with the current content like during a Skype call, a watching video or speech, or anything else your imagination as a developer conjures up. It even has a built-in event for detecting a series of voluntary eye-blinks by the user, an effortless movement that can be used to trigger key actions in your software.

Detecting Mood or Mental State

You can even record or react to the user's mental state detecting key attributes like Frustration, Boredom, Engagement, and others. The eSharp component gives you easy access to those values from the provided events as shown in the YouTube example in the pitch video that combined mood detection with the Evernote API.

 

Detecting a Strong Thought or Feeling

One of the most fascinating features of the EPOC headset is that it can be trained to detect a strong thought or feeling the user has and then detect or react to that thought or feeling when the user experiences it. The eSharp component provides a set of events that fire for each key event that occurs during the training process. More importantly, one of the many examples that will be provided as part of the project is how to use the component to do training and you can use that example to build your own code for your application.

Extended Gadgets

Included in the eSharp project as "bump goals" are a set of extended gadgets that make the development of key exciting brain control applications far easier. Each extended gadget will include full source under the same liberal license for the entire project, and will include a well documented example to help you use it.

 [$4000 level] Bump Goal 1: Tag Cloud Viewer

If this level of funding is reached I will port the Tag Cloud Viewer gadget shown in the pitch video to C#. Alternative user interfaces require new programming idioms like the Tag Cloud Viewer. The Tag Cloud Viewer is an EPOC friendly way to display a list of choices to the user that is intuitive and visually engaging.

[$5000 level] Bump Goal 2: Enhanced YouTube Video Player

If this level of funding is reached I will port the Enhanced YouTube Video Player gadget shown in the pitch video to C#. This gadget makes it easy to load and control the play of YouTube videos while providing the information necessary for integration with eSharp, especially the current video location so you can tie various EPOC detections easily to the current video location.

[$6000 level] Bump Goal 3: Evernote API component with ENML checker 

The grand prize. I will include a new component that provides fast convenient access to the Evernote COM API. As a bonus I will add a new feature that integrates the open source XmlLint utility. Evernote developers know that Evernote's ENML specification for notes added to a data store is very restrictive and the slightest error will trigger a parsing error. Currently you get back a blanket error when you create notes that does not tell where the problem lies. You then have to take the content of the note and run it past an XML checker like XmlLint to find out where the problem is. If this funding level is reached not only will I port over my Evernote API component that makes using the Evernote Windows COM API easier, I will add code to interface with XmlLint. There will be a debug flag that when set, will make the Evernote API component run the content of all notes submitted to the Evernote API through XmlLint and report any errors in detail so you can track down and eliminate ENML errors effortlessly.

Conclusion

Brain control apps are a fantastic new field of software development that borders on the surreal. With your help we can spread this revolutionary new technology to countless new people by enabling the army of C# developers around the world. If you are a C# developer yourself looking to jump in on the fun and the lucrative opportunities this new technology is creating, then here's a chance to get started quickly while taking a big chunk out of the learning curve. Better yet, you'll get the source code so you'll have the peace of mind of knowing that there are no barriers to your creativity if you decide to take it further or need to fix any bugs.

Please contribute now and thank you for participating!

Quotes About My Work and Myself

Here are some quotes about me from some of the most talented inventors and entrepreneurs in the world.

"Thanks for submitting your project to this year's Devcup! Robonote is
definitely one of our favorite submissions and we really want to
continue working with you on it."

-- Julien Boedec - Developer Advocate at Evernote

"Robert Oschler has shown himself to be a 21st century media-robot renaissance man. Sing, program, video, and can pull it all together admirably. He's been a one-man pro-robot advocate and as such will be one of the last destroyed during the machine uprising."

--- Mark Tilden, Robotics Physicist and inventor of the best-selling Robosapien line of robots distributed by WowWee, Ltd.

"Robert is one of the few developers who really understands the future of Robotics."

--- Caleb Chung, inventor of the mega-hit Furby animatronic toy and the Pleo baby robot dinosaur.

(Regarding my Rovio spy robot demonstration with the EPOC EEG headset).
"This is a great demonstration of the capabilities of the Emotiv EPOC. Robert has cleverly integrated several applications with the Emotiv SDK to provide a remote roving security robot under full hands-free control of the user. The application takes advantage of encrypted remote internet control and video acquisition using Skype to provide a secure and foolproof link to the robot, which could be in your apartment, inside a nuclear reactor or even on Mars (expect a bit of transmission lag for your Martian robot)."

--- Tan Le, CEO of Emotiv Lifesciences.

"Robert has a been a great supporter of WowWee's consumer robot products over the years. His program Robodance is an impressive software program that really highlights the features of our best-selling line of robot products, and also makes them easier to use. In addition, he has an unusual knack for getting the praise and attention of the top gadget blogs and web sites like Gizmodo, Engadget, SlashDot, and many others who have covered on numerous occasions his video reviews and high tech demonstrations involving our products. His best work though has been with Rovio, our WiFi enabled mobile spy cam robot, a revolutionary product for home telepresence. His recent video, where he used the Emotiv EEG headset to pilot a Rovio remotely over a Skype video call using only his thoughts and facial gestures, has become an instant favorite with us."

--- Amy Weltman, VP Marketing, WowWee USA Inc.

Industry Awards

In May of 2005 version 2 my Robodance software program won the coveted “Project Of The Month” award from SourceForge.net, the largest open source repository in the world. Out of thousands and thousands of software projects, SourceForge awards just one of them the Project Of The Month award for the current month. Note, Robodance 5 is not open source.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Quotes about a previous project of mine: Robodance

“Amazing i-SOBOT & WiiMote Mash-up (Video)”

--- Lem Fugitt, one of PC Magazine’s favorite bloggers in his post about the Robodance 4 sneak peek video I released late last year.

"In my opinion this (Robodance, my software program) is the gold standard that all other PC based control programs should seek to emulate."

--- Jamie Samans popular book “The Robosapien Companion”, pp. 211

"Using Emotiv's SDK and his own Robodance software, RobotsRule resident mad scientist Robert Oschler hacked together a system that allows him to use the headset to control the robot remotely via Skype. We can't find a good reason to put this all together except one: it's totally awesome."

--- Matt Hickey, Crave blogger at C|Net and also a writer at Gizmodo.

"You've seen Rovio hackery before, but not like this. Not with MIND CONTROL and Skype both involved. In regards to my Robodance software and the Rovio spy robot."

--- Kat Hannaford staff writer at Gizmodo.

story:
THANK YOU ALL
Our Indiegogo journey is almost over...

We owe a lot to our backers and to Indiegogo. With a great early response we had fantastic feedback which had substantial focus on the branding aspect of our product and many people looking to work with us to develop that market and international distribution channels. This had a great impact on our business plan and shifted our focus away from driving the Indiegogo campaign, but we couldn't be happier with how our business has evolved thanks to this in the most important early learning stages.
Echo will soon be found for sale in a choice of colours in countries all over the world, with more products to launch later in the year, which we will surely be launching again on Indiegogo with more focus and dedication.

Until then, there are a few days left for any last minute buyers at discount prices. After this you can find us on our website, and other sales channels such as eBay and Amazon.
Thank you all, it's been a great experience and we can't wait to see what the future holds for Echo!




No more messy cables to forget!

The Echo Connect is a sleek, durable and flexible key that connects to you or your belongings. It is the missing link for giving power to your phone, almost anywhere, and without the need to use or remember your cable.

Have it where you need it most... with you, always.

                                  




Only a week after the launch and we had problems receiving payments, but we're back to normal now and looking forward to making up for lost time.


Remembering your mobile phone cable just got easier.... 

         

 

What's new?

Well, after receiving some fantastic responses to our product, we're been able to launch in greater quantity than we'd originally anticipated, with 8 distribution partners ready to work with us, and even more importantly we've been able to lower our prices. Why? Because we want everyone to be able to have one!



ULTIMATE VERSATILITY

         


They're ready to go!

We've just said GO to mass production, expecting stock within the next few weeks when we'll be excited to start fulfilling pre-orders and sales internationally!



Become a reseller, or buy for your company...

The perfect gift or new edition to your sales stock, you could even have it as a giveaway product for your business, for clients or at an event/exhibition.

Order 200 + and we will print your company logo & web address on it for free!


No part of the Echo Connect is country specific. So anyone you know world wide could also be enjoying the simplicity and ease of this cute little key before the summer!

We are designing some excellent affiliate and reseller packages so if you're interested please contact us to discuss start selling now. We advise all interested resellers and distributors to grab a sample of the Echo Connect from this campaign via a perk (with free shipping!) and then we'll be in contact via email and phone to start planning together.



Initial response: 

We recently launched a Facebook page and shared it with 20 friends. Within a couple of weeks we have 3,000 followers, and growing rapidly!

With the exponential growth on Facebook alone we hope the Echo Connect could go viral. We have planned ahead (as we don't want to be in a position where we have demand that we cannot supply) so, we have made sure our perks have been carefully considered and that our ability to supply, will not be questioned.

This is a global product. It does't need to be adapted for any market. It's simple, convenient, and designed for the consumer. YOU! Do you like it?



Our pledge:  To fulfill our promises and hopefully surprise you!

Timely deliveries, customer updates and communication is paramount. We pledge to you that every product dispatched will be quality checked, delivered within the promised time-frame, and you will receive updates on your order prior to shipping, and after so we know it's been received, and that you are happy!

We also have a gift for all our backers:

FREE SHIPPING with all our Perks!


DESIGNED FOR YOU


Other ways you can help:

  1. Tell your friends about us
  2. Like and share our pages on: Facebook, Twitter, Google +, Pinterest, Instagram  & Linkedin
  3. Keep an eye out for us online and in stores. We're coming! 
                         
   

                    




At just over 5cm's in height the Echo Connect can always be with you...

Clip it, Wear it, Pocket it

The choice is yours....

Have it with you, when you need it most!

Become a reseller, or buy for your company...The perfect gift or new edition to your sales stock, you could even have it as a giveaway product for your business, for clients or at an event/exhibition.Order 200 + and we will print your company logo & web address on it for free!No part of the Echo Connect is country specific. So anyone you know world wide could also be enjoying the simplicity and ease of this cute little key before the summer!We are designing some excellent affiliate and reseller packages so if you're interested please contact us to discuss start selling now. We advise all interested resellers and distributors to grab a sample of the Echo Connect from this campaign via a perk (with free shipping!) and then we'll be in contact via email and phone to start planning together.Initial response: We recently launched a Facebook page and shared it with 20 friends. Within a couple of weeks we have 3,000 followers, and growing rapidly!With the exponential growth on Facebook alone we hope the Echo Connect could go viral. We have planned ahead (as we don't want to be in a position where we have demand that we cannot supply) so, we have made sure our perks have been carefully considered and that our ability to supply, will not be questioned.This is a global product. It does't need to be adapted for any market. It's simple, convenient, and designed for the consumer. YOU! Do you like it?Our pledge:  To fulfill our promises and hopefully surprise you!Timely deliveries, customer updates and communication is paramount. We pledge to you that every product dispatched will be quality checked, delivered within the promised time-frame, and you will receive updates on your order prior to shipping, and after so we know it's been received, and that you are happy!We also have a gift for all our backers:FREE SHIPPING with all our Perks!DESIGNED FOR YOUOther ways you can help:

Tell your friends about us


Like and share our pages on: Facebook, Twitter, Google +, Pinterest, Instagram  & Linkedin

Keep an eye out for us online and in stores. We're coming! 
                                                






At just over 5cm's in height the Echo Connect can always be with you... 
Clip it, Wear it, Pocket itThe choice is yours....Have it with you, when you need it most!

story:
Welcome to EZENCIEL!

 

Share your PASSION!

Share on Facebook

Imagine the impact we can all have if each of us inspires only two more people to make a difference!

WHY YOU AND EZENCIEL

Wouldn't it be great if we could all have a way to make a difference in the world as part of our daily lives?

We understand you, because we are like you. We wish we had more time to contribute and help others, but between work, school, family, friends, volunteering and our modern lives finding the way to make a bigger impact can be hard.

EZENCIEL is your and our way to share this passion and with simple actions build something great, to inspire people to make a difference, and to have an impact on a meaningful social cause.

 

OUR CAMPAIGN GOAL

With our combined efforts we can be part of EZENCIEL and with our passion have a real impact on the Philippines!

Carrying EZENCIEL's Philippines case is a unique way we can tell others a story, inspire action and invest in a meaningful social cause: 200 children can receive emergency food for 4 weeks!

 

UPDATES

  • Dec 15: We are happy to receive news of the start of the first relief mission with AAI supporting a total of 100 Kids with funds collected by EZENCIEL and matched by AAI. The effort will last until January 7th.



  • Dec 7: We are happy to introduce new phone models: iPhone 4
  • Nov 21: The Perfect Gift for Christmas! Help someone and give a Case for a Cause! Order before December 15th
  • Nov 19th: We are happy to offer FREE shipping within the continental U.S., Colombia and South Korea.

 

HOW WE CAN ALL BE PART OF EZENCIEL

A Case for a Cause: Why you make a difference!

 

Making a difference is as simple as carrying your case and sharing it with the world!

We want to produce the EZENCIEL Philippines Case for people to show their support and inspire others to do the same. Each person we inspire to join EZENCIEL multiplies our effort and has a direct impact providing emergency food to a child.

Together we can all help many of the great people, who after Typhoon Haiyan, count on us to carry our passion around and share it with the world.

The Impact

Imagine the huge impact we can have! A single case provides a kid with emergency food including rice, canned food, milk and water for 4 weeks.

Thanks to the relief work Asia America Initiative (AAI) is carrying out in the affected areas of the Philippines , we can make a difference. EZENCIEL is working with AAI to channel our efforts into helping as many kids as possible.

 

 

AAI Impact updates:
- 150 packs containing rice, canned goods, hygiene and first-aid items, water and milk were distributed to families in the affected town of Batad
- This amazing work was carried out by volunteer students and young professionals from local communities of the areas affected by Typhoon Haiyan

AAI's relief missions are providing immediate impact bringing hope and happiness to the Philippines. In the long-term AAI is also working to provide assistance to the medical and social systems of the affected communities.

Help us have a bigger impact! Join us...

https://www.facebook.com/aaiph

 


www.ezenciel.com

 

The Case

You will love this case, but you will love more being part of the EZENCIEL community and having helped the Philippines! We are very excited for you to join us!

EZENCIEL's Case for the Philippines was designed by our design partner Neil Samur and will be manufactured in Colombia by our partners from Viterbo.

 

Frequently Asked Questions 

  1. How can I track my impact? 
    We always partner with NGOs and other partners to bring the best resources to solve challenging problems. Our social investment will help the NGO partner to carry the project and they will provide us with updates of your impact. The progress will always be available on our website and accessible through the QR code printed on your case.
  2. When will I receive my smartphone cases?
    As soon as the campaign ends, we will start production and you should be receiving your EZENCIEL case latest by February 28th in the U.S. Orders outside of the U.S. may take longer to be delivered depending on the location. EZENCIEL's manufacturing partner, Viterbo has more than 3 years of experience in design and manufacturing. Unforeseen factors may delay our timely shipment of the cases.

story:
In this campaign, you have the opportunity to choose from a wide variety of plate backings, including: a custom designed plate, nano-suction anti-gravity attachment, minimalist wallet attachment, ring holder/kickstand attachment, genuine leather folio attachment that features card and cash pockets. We also have 3 mount options: multi-purpose mount (perfect for strollers and handle bars), a vent mount for your car and a suction mount. 

Each attachment will fit perfectly in our durable BUDU case and is available for both the iPhone 7 (compatible with iPhone 6/6s) and iPhone 7 Plus (compatible with iPhone 6 Plus/6s Plus).

BUDU Case - Phone Compatibility

 

BUDU Attachment Summary

We wanted to create a couple options at HUGE discounts to keep it simple and rewarding, but don't fret, if you want more, we will extend the option to add on after the campaign with the same discount included in your perk. 

 

 

CUSTOM IMAGE: Over 80% of the back of your BUDU case is printable space! Choose the rewards offering custom designs and we will print photos or graphics of your choice.

WALLET: Perfect for the times when you don't need a bulky wallet - complete with RFID protection against credit card theft

ARMBAND: Great for any workout; gym, runs, hiking or walking. Giving you complete access to your phone

CLAMP MOUNT: This multi-use clamp can be used on bikes, strollers, railings, poles and many other places; freeing your hands to multi-task elsewhere

 

CAR VENT MOUNT: Easily clicks on and off while keeping a secure fit in portrait and landscape modes; keeping your phone visible and safe while driving

FOLIO: Take 3-4 cards and case with you in a RFID protected, genuine leather-bound folio; perfect when your privacy and convenience are key

ANTI-GRAVITY: Can be securely placed and removed on most cabinets, walls, mirrors and other smooth surfaces; keeping your phone in just the right place

RING HOLDER/KICKSTAND: Slide over your finger when you're on the go or to prop up your favorite show; will quickly become your favorite gadget​

 

BUDU is simple to use and customize, with the entire locking interface hidden inside the case and under the plate or attachment. This keeps the back of your case clean and classy. Others who see it won't notice anything different.

 

The BUDU case has a ton of functionality, but we haven't forgotten about protecting your phone. We have spend the last 6 months iterating on a design that will provide superior protection, while keeping it as minimal as possible.

We have thoroughly tested all attachments in production configuration with higher strength magnets than what's used on the production attachments to verify that the magnets don't interfere with the workings of the phone or your credit cards in those attachments that carry them.

And don't worry...we've done many drop tests, all the way up to 8ft!

 

The BUDU case has a ton of functionality, more than any of our competitors in the space, but it is also smaller and less obtrusive!

BUDU/Competitor Dimension Comparison​

But don't just take our word for it, we were able to let people from all walks of life demo BUDU before our launch. Here's what they have to say.

 
 

 

 

Here we are. We don't have a huge team, but have delivered a high quality product none-the-less, embracing the true Indiegogo spirit!

 

 

 

FAQs

Do we make cases for iPhone 6/6s/6 Plus/6s Plus?

Yes! Our cases are compatible with all of these. The  iPhone 7 case is actually backwards compatible to the iPhone 6 and 6s, and similarly our iPhone 7+ case is compatible to the iPhone 6+ and 6s+. A lot of our content on the page was actually shot with an iPhone 6s in our iPhone 7 case!

Do you make cases for Android phones?

At the moment, sadly, no...BUT! We hope to offer cases for other popular phone types as stretch goals. So if you're interested, we recommend backing at a non-reward level, and as we get close to a stretch goal we will ask the community, which case to make next.

Will the magnets demagnetize or interfere with my credit cards?

No. Both the wallet and folio attachments have been thoroughly tested in the production configuration with magnets of higher strength then those used for the attachments. The magnets are intentionally placed away from the credit cards to prevent this from happening.

No credit cards were harmed while making BUDU ;)

Will the magnets interfere with the workings of the phone?

No. Older technologies used in cell phones used to be sensitive to magnets, now currently the only component that is of concern is the internal compass. We have made several design iterations while placing the magnets to keep from interfering with the compass. So if you're lost in the woods (well, we wouldn't recommend having to rely on the phones compass anyhow, its not that great), but if you are, your BUDU case won't get in the way.

How can you help?

You can help by sharing this with all your friends and family. The more people that know about this, the better the campaign will do, and the more you will get. We want to offer many stretch goals, including different colors, phone types and additional attachments. 

What are stretch goals?

Stretch goals are milestones of the campaign. At predetermined funding amounts we will release additional case features including, but not limited to; additional case colors, additional phone types supported and additional attachments to chose from. Each of these will be voted on by the current backers, so please tell all your friends and family about our awesome product and campaign.

Are the attachments interchangeable between the iPhone 6/6s/7 case and iPhone 6+/6s+/7+ case?

The short answer is no. We wanted to maximize the customizable space for each case, so that makes each attachment unique to its specific phone type. However, the mounts are interchangeable between the two.

Manufacturing Updates

We are currently manufacturing our first production run for iPhone 6/6s/7 phones. Take a look.

Risks and Challenges

We have tried to think about what the hurdles will look like before we get to them. A sample production run of 50 iPhone 6/6s/7 cases and 150 plates have already been made, and distributed to case reviewers, influencers as well as to everyday users. Feedback has been overwhelmingly positive, strengthening our foundation to push forward with BUDU, as well as help us perfect all features of our case and attachments.

The tooling for the iPhone 6/6s/7 and 6+/6s+/7+ tooling will be done by the campaign end, which will allow us to start manufacturing right away. We have chosen mechanical attachments versus more complicated electronic attachments, such as an external battery, to keep our startup costs and certifications low. This will remove many of the hurdles that have plagued other advanced phone case campaigns, and allow us to deliver our product to you on time, and with the level of quality you expect!

Our main concern is the number of options being given, it’s awesome from your point of view, but it can be a challenge for us. To help alleviate this, we plan on reaching out to every backer shortly after they back to get more information as to exactly what they want. This will allow us to prepare and project the orders real time.

story:
What is MultiROM?

MultiROM (XDA Thread) is one-of-a-kind multi-boot mod for Nexus 7. It can boot any Android ROM available for that device as well as other systems like Ubuntu Touch, Plasma Active, Bohdi Linux or WebOS port. Besides booting from device's internal memory, MultiROM can boot from USB drive connected to the device via OTG cable.

The main part of MultiROM is a boot manager, which appears every time your device starts and lets you choose ROM to boot. You can see how it looks on the left image below and in gallery.

ROMs are installed and managed via modified TeamWin Recovery Project. You can use standard ZIP files to install secondary Android ROMs, daily prebuilt image files to install Ubuntu Touch and MultiROM even has its own installer system, which can be used to ship other Linux-based systems.

 It is already done and working...

...but for different device. MultiROM for older version of Nexus 7 (2012) is working like a charm, and already has hundreds of users. Feel free to browse the XDA thread or YouTube for all the MultiROM videos. It is even mentioned on the official wiki page for Ubuntu Core on Nexus 7. And Linux Journal has an article about it!

However, this is only one device. I would love to continue improving MultiROM and port it to other devices, which is why this campaign exists.

What is this funding for?

This campaign is only to buy test devices, the first one being the new Nexus 7 (2013). I love to work with Android devices and I want MultiROM to support multiple devices, so countless hours spent developing the project aren't covered by this campaign, but the devices are unfortunatelly a bit too expensive for me as a student.

MultiROM will be ported to all devices funded by this campaign and they will be used to further improve not only MultiROM, but also TWRP and some other projects - for example new Nexus 7 needs somebody to port and maintain Ubuntu Touch, I could probably do that.

$500 target* is for second generation Nexus 7 device and it's shipping to Czech Republic. If this campaign raises more money, it will be used to buy another test devices - which ones depends on the total amount of money and I suppose some kind of survey would be appropriate.

This campaign is using fixed funding - if it doesn't reach the target, you'll get full refund within 5 days.

*Indiegogo's minimal target is $500.

When it will be ready?

If this campaign gets funded and everything goes okay, MultiROM for second-gen N7 should be ready in about a month after I receive the device. If any other devices are funded, their versions should follow shortly after.

What needs to be done?

While the code is working for 1st-gen Nexus 7, there are some parts which need to be modified, namely screen drawing code and storage-related parts. The modified TWRP recovery will probably also need a lot of work, since that wasn't made with multiple devices in mind.

My goal is to have shared codebase for all devices MultiROM supports, the same way TWRP does it. This would potentially enable easy porting to different devices.

Who am I?

My name is Vojtěch Boček, I'm 18 years old and I live in Brno, Czech Republic. I'm middle-school student and a young programmer who likes to play with small devices carrying any type of processor, be it ARM phone and tablets or small robots which play chess.

You can find all my projects on my github page or my website, these are the most important:

  • MultiROM for Nexus 7
  • Lorris Toolbox - very useful development tool for anybody who works with robots or any other microchip applications
  • VNote - simple, but surprisingly widely adopted note application which can open .vnt files used by older dumbphones.
  • I also contribute to TeamWin Recovery Project. For example scrollbars in file manager and highlights after button press are my work. I ported TWRP 2.6 to LG Optimus One, too.

Support and questions

If you have any questions, feel free to ask. You can use...

  • Send me an e-mail to vbocek(-)gmail.com, subject: MultiROM Indiegogo question
  • Use discussion here on Indiegogo
  • Use this Reddit thread
  • Find me on IRC - freenode.net, #multirom or #twrp, my nick is tassadar_. I'm in GMT+2. Webchat

 

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
Ubuntu and Ubuntu logo are registered trademarks of Canonical Ltd.
